original: Ṛgveda 1
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_1,001.01a agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam /
analyzed: agnim īḍe purohitam yajñasya devam ṛtvijam

original: RV_1,001.01c hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam //
analyzed: hotāram ratna dhātamam

original: RV_1,001.02a agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta /
analyzed: agniḥ pūrvebhiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ īḍyaḥ nūtanaiḥ uta

original: RV_1,001.02c sa devāṃ eha vakṣati //
analyzed: sa devān ā iha vakṣati

original: RV_1,001.03a agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive-dive /
analyzed: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive dive

original: RV_1,001.03c yaśasaṃ vīravattamam //
analyzed: yaśasam vīravattamam

original: RV_1,001.04a agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
analyzed: agne yam yajñam adhvaram viśvatas paribhūḥ asi

original: RV_1,001.04c sa id deveṣu gacchati //
analyzed: saḥ id deveṣu gacchati

original: RV_1,001.05a agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ hotā kavi kratuḥ satyaḥ citra śravastamaḥ

original: RV_1,001.05c devo devebhir ā gamat //
analyzed: devaḥ devebhiḥ ā gamat

original: RV_1,001.06a yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi /
analyzed: yat aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadram kariṣyasi

original: RV_1,001.06c tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ //
analyzed: tava id tat satyam aṅgiraḥ

original: RV_1,001.07a upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam /
analyzed: upa tvā agne dive dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam

original: RV_1,001.07c namo bharanta emasi //
analyzed: namaḥ bharantaḥ emasi

original: RV_1,001.08a rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim /
analyzed: rājantam adhvarāṇām gopām ṛtasya dīdivim

original: RV_1,001.08c vardhamānaṃ sve dame //
analyzed: vardhamānam sve dame

original: RV_1,001.09a sa naḥ piteva sūnave 'gne sūpāyano bhava /
analyzed: sa naḥ pitā iva sūnave gne su upāyanaḥ bhava

original: RV_1,001.09c sacasvā naḥ svastaye //
analyzed: sacasva naḥ svastaye

original: RV_1,002.01a vāyav ā yāhi darśateme somā araṅkṛtāḥ /
analyzed: vāyo ā yāhi darśata ime somāḥ araṅkṛtāḥ

original: RV_1,002.01c teṣām pāhi śrudhī havam //
analyzed: teṣām pāhi śrudhi havam

original: RV_1,002.02a vāya ukthebhir jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ /
analyzed: vāyo ukthebhiḥ jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ

original: RV_1,002.02c sutasomā aharvidaḥ //
analyzed: suta somāḥ ahar vidaḥ

original: RV_1,002.03a vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe /
analyzed: vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,002.03c urūcī somapītaye //
analyzed: urūcī soma pītaye

original: RV_1,002.04a indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhir ā gatam /
analyzed: indra vāyū ime sutāḥ upa prayobhiḥ ā gatam

original: RV_1,002.04c indavo vām uśanti hi //
analyzed: indavaḥ vām uśanti hi

original: RV_1,002.05a vāyav indraś ca cetathaḥ sutānāṃ vājinīvasū /
analyzed: vāyo indraḥ ca cetathaḥ sutānām vājinīvasū

original: RV_1,002.05c tāv ā yātam upa dravat //
analyzed: tau ā yātam upa dravat

original: RV_1,002.06a vāyav indraś ca sunvata ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: vāyo indraḥ ca sunvataḥ ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam

original: RV_1,002.06c makṣv itthā dhiyā narā //
analyzed: makṣū itthā dhiyā narā

original: RV_1,002.07a mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam /
analyzed: mitram huve pūta dakṣam varuṇam ca riśādasam

original: RV_1,002.07c dhiyaṃ ghṛtācīṃ sādhantā //
analyzed: dhiyam ghṛtācīm sādhantā

original: RV_1,002.08a ṛtena mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtaspṛśā /
analyzed: ṛtena mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāvṛdhau ṛta spṛśā

original: RV_1,002.08c kratum bṛhantam āśāthe //
analyzed: kratum bṛhantam āśāthe

original: RV_1,002.09a kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā /
analyzed: kavī naḥ mitrāvaruṇā tuvi jātau uru kṣayā

original: RV_1,002.09c dakṣaṃ dadhāte apasam //
analyzed: dakṣam dadhāte apasam

original: RV_1,003.01a aśvinā yajvarīr iṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī /
analyzed: aśvinā yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ dravat pāṇī śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_1,003.01c purubhujā canasyatam //
analyzed: puru bhujā canasyatam

original: RV_1,003.02a aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā /
analyzed: aśvinā puru daṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā

original: RV_1,003.02c dhiṣṇyā vanataṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: dhiṣṇyā vanatam giraḥ

original: RV_1,003.03a dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutāḥ nāsatyā vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_1,003.03c ā yātaṃ rudravartanī //
analyzed: ā yātam rudravartanī

original: RV_1,003.04a indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi citra bhāno sutāḥ ime tvāyavaḥ

original: RV_1,003.04c aṇvībhis tanā pūtāsaḥ //
analyzed: aṇvībhiḥ tanā pūtāsaḥ

original: RV_1,003.05a indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi dhiyā iṣitaḥ vipra jūtaḥ sutāvataḥ

original: RV_1,003.05c upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ //
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ

original: RV_1,003.06a indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ /
analyzed: indra ā yāhi tūtujānaḥ upa brahmāṇi harivas

original: RV_1,003.06c sute dadhiṣva naś canaḥ //
analyzed: sute dadhiṣva naḥ canaḥ

original: RV_1,003.07a omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā gata /
analyzed: omāsaḥ carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ viśve devāsaḥ ā gata

original: RV_1,003.07c dāśvāṃso dāśuṣaḥ sutam //
analyzed: dāśvāṃsaḥ dāśuṣaḥ sutam

original: RV_1,003.08a viśve devāso apturaḥ sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ apturaḥ sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_1,003.08c usrā iva svasarāṇi //
analyzed: usrāḥ iva svasarāṇi

original: RV_1,003.09a viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ asridhaḥ ehimāyāsaḥ adruhaḥ

original: RV_1,003.09c medhaṃ juṣanta vahnayaḥ //
analyzed: medham juṣanta vahnayaḥ

original: RV_1,003.10a pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī /
analyzed: pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhiḥ vājinīvatī

original: RV_1,003.10c yajñaṃ vaṣṭu dhiyāvasuḥ //
analyzed: yajñam vaṣṭu dhiyāvasuḥ

original: RV_1,003.11a codayitrī sūnṛtānāṃ cetantī sumatīnām /
analyzed: codayitrī sūnṛtānām cetantī sumatīnām

original: RV_1,003.11c yajñaṃ dadhe sarasvatī //
analyzed: yajñam dadhe sarasvatī

original: RV_1,003.12a maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā /
analyzed: mahaḥ arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā

original: RV_1,003.12c dhiyo viśvā vi rājati //
analyzed: dhiyaḥ viśvāḥ vi rājati

original: RV_1,004.01a surūpakṛtnum ūtaye sudughām iva goduhe /
analyzed: su rūpa kṛtnum ūtaye sudughām iva go duhe

original: RV_1,004.01c juhūmasi dyavi-dyavi //
analyzed: juhūmasi dyavidyavi

original: RV_1,004.02a upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba /
analyzed: upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya soma pāḥ piba

original: RV_1,004.02c godā id revato madaḥ //
analyzed: go dāḥ id revataḥ madaḥ

original: RV_1,004.03a athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām /
analyzed: athā te antamānām vidyāma sumatīnām

original: RV_1,004.03c mā no ati khya ā gahi //
analyzed: mā naḥ ati khyaḥ ā gahi

original: RV_1,004.04a parehi vigram astṛtam indram pṛcchā vipaścitam /
analyzed: parehi vigram astṛtam indram pṛccha vipaścitam

original: RV_1,004.04c yas te sakhibhya ā varam //
analyzed: yaḥ te sakhibhyaḥ ā varam

original: RV_1,004.05a uta bruvantu no nido nir anyataś cid ārata /
analyzed: uta bruvantu naḥ nidaḥ niḥ anyatas cit ārata

original: RV_1,004.05c dadhānā indra id duvaḥ //
analyzed: dadhānāḥ indraḥ id duvaḥ

original: RV_1,004.06a uta naḥ subhagāṃ arir voceyur dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ subhagām ariḥ voceyuḥ dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,004.06c syāmed indrasya śarmaṇi //
analyzed: syāma id indrasya śarmaṇi

original: RV_1,004.07a em āśum āśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam /
analyzed: ā īm āśum āśave bhara yajña śriyam nṛ mādanam

original: RV_1,004.07c patayan mandayatsakham //
analyzed: patayat mandayatsakham

original: RV_1,004.08a asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ /
analyzed: asya pītvā śatakrato ghanaḥ vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ

original: RV_1,004.08c prāvo vājeṣu vājinam //
analyzed: prāvaḥ vājeṣu vājinam

original: RV_1,004.09a taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: tam tvā vājeṣu vājinam vājayāmaḥ śatakrato

original: RV_1,004.09c dhanānām indra sātaye //
analyzed: dhanānām indra sātaye

original: RV_1,004.10a yo rāyo 'vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā /
analyzed: yaḥ rāyaḥ vaniḥ mahān su pāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_1,004.10c tasmā indrāya gāyata //
analyzed: tasmai indrāya gāyata

original: RV_1,005.01a ā tv etā ni ṣīdatendram abhi pra gāyata /
analyzed: ā tu eta ni sīdata indram abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_1,005.01c sakhāya stomavāhasaḥ //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ stoma vāhasaḥ

original: RV_1,005.02a purūtamam purūṇām īśānaṃ vāryāṇām /
analyzed: purutamam purūṇām īśānam vāryāṇām

original: RV_1,005.02c indraṃ some sacā sute //
analyzed: indram some sacā sute

original: RV_1,005.03a sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām /
analyzed: sa ghā naḥ yoge ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām

original: RV_1,005.03c gamad vājebhir ā sa naḥ //
analyzed: gamat vājebhiḥ ā sa naḥ

original: RV_1,005.04a yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ /
analyzed: yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ

original: RV_1,005.04c tasmā indrāya gāyata //
analyzed: tasmai indrāya gāyata

original: RV_1,005.05a sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye /
analyzed: suta pāvne sutāḥ ime śucayaḥ yanti vītaye

original: RV_1,005.05c somāso dadhyāśiraḥ //
analyzed: somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_1,005.06a tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ /
analyzed: tvam sutasya pītaye sadyas vṛddhaḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: RV_1,005.06c indra jyaiṣṭhyāya sukrato //
analyzed: indra jyaiṣṭhyāya sukrato

original: RV_1,005.07a ā tvā viśantv āśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā viśantu āśavaḥ somāsaḥ indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,005.07c śaṃ te santu pracetase //
analyzed: śam te santu pracetase

original: RV_1,005.08a tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato /
analyzed: tvām stomāḥ avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato

original: RV_1,005.08c tvāṃ vardhantu no giraḥ //
analyzed: tvām vardhantu naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_1,005.09a akṣitotiḥ saned imaṃ vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam /
analyzed: a kṣita ūtiḥ sanet imam vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam

original: RV_1,005.09c yasmin viśvāni pauṃsyā //
analyzed: yasmin viśvāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_1,005.10a mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ martāḥ abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,005.10c īśāno yavayā vadham //
analyzed: īśānaḥ yavaya vadham

original: RV_1,006.01a yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ /
analyzed: yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣam carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ

original: RV_1,006.01c rocante rocanā divi //
analyzed: rocante rocanā divi

original: RV_1,006.02a yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe /
analyzed: yuñjanti asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe

original: RV_1,006.02c śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhasā //
analyzed: śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛ vāhasā

original: RV_1,006.03a ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase /
analyzed: ketum kṛṇvan a ketave peśaḥ maryāḥ a peśase

original: RV_1,006.03c sam uṣadbhir ajāyathāḥ //
analyzed: sam uṣadbhiḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: RV_1,006.04a ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire /
analyzed: āt aha svadhām anu punar garbha tvam erire

original: RV_1,006.04c dadhānā nāma yajñiyam //
analyzed: dadhānāḥ nāma yajñiyam

original: RV_1,006.05a vīḷu cid ārujatnubhir guhā cid indra vahnibhiḥ /
analyzed: vīḷu cit ārujatnubhiḥ guhā cit indra vahnibhiḥ

original: RV_1,006.05c avinda usriyā anu //
analyzed: avindaḥ usriyāḥ anu

original: RV_1,006.06a devayanto yathā matim acchā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ /
analyzed: devayantaḥ yathā matim acchā vidadvasum giraḥ

original: RV_1,006.06c mahām anūṣata śrutam //
analyzed: mahām anūṣata śrutam

original: RV_1,006.07a indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā /
analyzed: indreṇa sam hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmānaḥ a bibhyuṣā

original: RV_1,006.07c mandū samānavarcasā //
analyzed: mandū samāna varcasā

original: RV_1,006.08a anavadyair abhidyubhir makhaḥ sahasvad arcati /
analyzed: anavadyaiḥ abhidyubhiḥ makhaḥ sahasvat arcati

original: RV_1,006.08c gaṇair indrasya kāmyaiḥ //
analyzed: gaṇaiḥ indrasya kāmyaiḥ

original: RV_1,006.09a ataḥ parijmann ā gahi divo vā rocanād adhi /
analyzed: atas parijman ā gahi divaḥ vā rocanāt adhi

original: RV_1,006.09c sam asminn ṛñjate giraḥ //
analyzed: sam asmin ṛñjate giraḥ

original: RV_1,006.10a ito vā sātim īmahe divo vā pārthivād adhi /
analyzed: itas vā sātim īmahe divaḥ vā pārthivāt adhi

original: RV_1,006.10c indram maho vā rajasaḥ //
analyzed: indram mahaḥ vā rajasaḥ

original: RV_1,007.01a indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ /
analyzed: indram id gāthinaḥ bṛhat indram arkebhiḥ arkiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,007.01c indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣata //
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anūṣata

original: RV_1,007.02a indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā /
analyzed: indraḥ id haryoḥ sacā sammiślaḥ ā vacaḥ yujā

original: RV_1,007.02c indro vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ vajrī hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_1,007.03a indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi /
analyzed: indraḥ dīrghāya cakṣase ā sūryam rohayat divi

original: RV_1,007.03c vi gobhir adrim airayat //
analyzed: vi gobhiḥ adrim airayat

original: RV_1,007.04a indra vājeṣu no 'va sahasrapradhaneṣu ca /
analyzed: indra vājeṣu naḥ vaḥ sahasra pradhaneṣu ca

original: RV_1,007.04c ugra ugrābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: ugraḥ ugrābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,007.05a indraṃ vayam mahādhana indram arbhe havāmahe /
analyzed: indram vayam mahādhane indram arbhe havāmahe

original: RV_1,007.05c yujaṃ vṛtreṣu vajriṇam //
analyzed: yujam vṛtreṣu vajriṇam

original: RV_1,007.06a sa no vṛṣann amuṃ caruṃ satrādāvann apā vṛdhi /
analyzed: sa naḥ vṛṣan amum carum satrādāvan apa ā vṛdhi

original: RV_1,007.06c asmabhyam apratiṣkutaḥ //
analyzed: asmabhyam apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_1,007.07a tuñje-tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tuñjetuñje ye uttare stomāḥ indrasya vajriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,007.07c na vindhe asya suṣṭutim //
analyzed: na vindhe asya suṣṭutim

original: RV_1,007.08a vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīr iyarty ojasā /
analyzed: vṛṣā yūthā iva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ iyarti ojasā

original: RV_1,007.08c īśāno apratiṣkutaḥ //
analyzed: īśānaḥ apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_1,007.09a ya ekaś carṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnām irajyati /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ carṣaṇīnām vasūnām irajyati

original: RV_1,007.09c indraḥ pañca kṣitīnām //
analyzed: indraḥ pañca kṣitīnām

original: RV_1,007.10a indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ /
analyzed: indram vaḥ viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,007.10c asmākam astu kevalaḥ //
analyzed: asmākam astu kevalaḥ

original: RV_1,008.01a endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham /
analyzed: ā indra sānasim rayim sa jitvānam sadāsaham

original: RV_1,008.01c varṣiṣṭham ūtaye bhara //
analyzed: varṣiṣṭham ūtaye bhara

original: RV_1,008.02a ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai /
analyzed: ni yena muṣṭi hatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai

original: RV_1,008.02c tvotāso ny arvatā //
analyzed: tvotāsaḥ ni arvatā

original: RV_1,008.03a indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi /
analyzed: indra tvotāsaḥ ā vayam vajram ghanā dadīmahi

original: RV_1,008.03c jayema saṃ yudhi spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: jayema sam yudhi spṛdhaḥ

original: RV_1,008.04a vayaṃ śūrebhir astṛbhir indra tvayā yujā vayam /
analyzed: vayam śūrebhiḥ astṛbhiḥ indra tvayā yujā vayam

original: RV_1,008.04c sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ //
analyzed: sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ

original: RV_1,008.05a mahāṃ indraḥ paraś ca nu mahitvam astu vajriṇe /
analyzed: mahān indraḥ paras ca nu mahi tvam astu vajriṇe

original: RV_1,008.05c dyaur na prathinā śavaḥ //
analyzed: dyauḥ na prathinā śavaḥ

original: RV_1,008.06a samohe vā ya āśata naras tokasya sanitau /
analyzed: samohe vā ye āśata naraḥ tokasya sanitau

original: RV_1,008.06c viprāso vā dhiyāyavaḥ //
analyzed: viprāsaḥ vā dhiyāyavaḥ

original: RV_1,008.07a yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate /
analyzed: yaḥ kukṣiḥ soma pātamaḥ samudraḥ iva pinvate

original: RV_1,008.07c urvīr āpo na kākudaḥ //
analyzed: urvīḥ āpaḥ na kākudaḥ

original: RV_1,008.08a evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī /
analyzed: eva hi asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī

original: RV_1,008.08c pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe //
analyzed: pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,008.09a evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate /
analyzed: eva hi te vibhūtayaḥ ūtayaḥ indra māvate

original: RV_1,008.09c sadyaś cit santi dāśuṣe //
analyzed: sadyas cit santi dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,008.10a evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā /
analyzed: eva hi asya kāmyā stomaḥ uktham ca śaṃsyā

original: RV_1,008.10c indrāya somapītaye //
analyzed: indrāya soma pītaye

original: RV_1,009.01a indrehi matsy andhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ /
analyzed: indra ihi matsi andhasaḥ viśvebhiḥ soma parvabhiḥ

original: RV_1,009.01c mahāṃ abhiṣṭir ojasā //
analyzed: mahān abhiṣṭiḥ ojasā

original: RV_1,009.02a em enaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine /
analyzed: ā īm enam sṛjata sute mandim indrāya mandine

original: RV_1,009.02c cakriṃ viśvāni cakraye //
analyzed: cakrim viśvāni cakraye

original: RV_1,009.03a matsvā suśipra mandibhi stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇe /
analyzed: matsva su śipra mandibhiḥ stomebhiḥ viśvacarṣaṇe

original: RV_1,009.03c sacaiṣu savaneṣv ā //
analyzed: sacā eṣu savaneṣu ā

original: RV_1,009.04a asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata /
analyzed: asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata

original: RV_1,009.04c ajoṣā vṛṣabham patim //
analyzed: ajoṣāḥ vṛṣabham patim

original: RV_1,009.05a saṃ codaya citram arvāg rādha indra vareṇyam /
analyzed: sam codaya citram arvāk rādhaḥ indra vareṇyam

original: RV_1,009.05c asad it te vibhu prabhu //
analyzed: asat id te vibhu prabhu

original: RV_1,009.06a asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ /
analyzed: asmān su tatra codaya indra rāye rabhasvataḥ

original: RV_1,009.06c tuvidyumna yaśasvataḥ //
analyzed: tuvi dyumna yaśasvataḥ

original: RV_1,009.07a saṃ gomad indra vājavad asme pṛthu śravo bṛhat /
analyzed: sam gomat indra vājavat asme pṛthu śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_1,009.07c viśvāyur dhehy akṣitam //
analyzed: viśva āyuḥ dhehi akṣitam

original: RV_1,009.08a asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam /
analyzed: asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat dyumnam sahasra sātamam

original: RV_1,009.08c indra tā rathinīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: indra tāḥ rathinīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_1,009.09a vasor indraṃ vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam /
analyzed: vasoḥ indram vasu patim gīrbhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ ṛgmiyam

original: RV_1,009.09c homa gantāram ūtaye //
analyzed: homa gantāram ūtaye

original: RV_1,009.10a sute-sute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata ed ariḥ /
analyzed: sutesute nyokase bṛhat bṛhate ā id ariḥ

original: RV_1,009.10c indrāya śūṣam arcati //
analyzed: indrāya śūṣam arcati

original: RV_1,010.01a gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇo 'rcanty arkam arkiṇaḥ /
analyzed: gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇaḥ rcanti arkam arkiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,010.01c brahmāṇas tvā śatakrata ud vaṃśam iva yemire //
analyzed: brahmāṇaḥ tvā śatakrato ud vaṃśam iva yemire

original: RV_1,010.02a yat sānoḥ sānum āruhad bhūry aspaṣṭa kartvam /
analyzed: yat sānoḥ sānum āruhat bhūri aspaṣṭa kartvam

original: RV_1,010.02c tad indro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇir ejati //
analyzed: tat indraḥ artham cetati yūthena vṛṣṇiḥ ejati

original: RV_1,010.03a yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā /
analyzed: yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣya prā

original: RV_1,010.03c athā na indra somapā girām upaśrutiṃ cara //
analyzed: athā naḥ indra soma pāḥ girām upaśrutim cara

original: RV_1,010.04a ehi stomāṃ abhi svarābhi gṛṇīhy ā ruva /
analyzed: ehi stomān abhi svara abhi gṛṇīhi ā ruva

original: RV_1,010.04c brahma ca no vaso sacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya //
analyzed: brahma ca naḥ vaso sacā indra yajñam ca vardhaya

original: RV_1,010.05a uktham indrāya śaṃsyaṃ vardhanam puruniṣṣidhe /
analyzed: uktham indrāya śaṃsyam vardhanam puru niṣṣidhe

original: RV_1,010.05c śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca //
analyzed: śakraḥ yathā suteṣu naḥ rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca

original: RV_1,010.06a tam it sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye /
analyzed: tam id sakhi tve īmahe tam rāye tam su vīrye

original: RV_1,010.06c sa śakra uta naḥ śakad indro vasu dayamānaḥ //
analyzed: sa śakraḥ uta naḥ śakat indraḥ vasu dayamānaḥ

original: RV_1,010.07a suvivṛtaṃ sunirajam indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ /
analyzed: suvivṛtam sunirajam indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ

original: RV_1,010.07c gavām apa vrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ //
analyzed: gavām apa vrajam vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādhaḥ adrivas

original: RV_1,010.08a nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ /
analyzed: nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ

original: RV_1,010.08c jeṣaḥ svarvatīr apaḥ saṃ gā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi //
analyzed: jeṣaḥ svarvatīḥ apaḥ sam gāḥ asmabhyam dhūnuhi

original: RV_1,010.09a āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me giraḥ /
analyzed: āśrut karṇa śrudhi havam nu cit dadhiṣva me giraḥ

original: RV_1,010.09c indra stomam imam mama kṛṣvā yujaś cid antaram //
analyzed: indra stomam imam mama kṛṣva yujaḥ cit antaram

original: RV_1,010.10a vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam /
analyzed: vidma hi tvā vṛṣantamam vājeṣu havana śrutam

original: RV_1,010.10c vṛṣantamasya hūmaha ūtiṃ sahasrasātamām //
analyzed: vṛṣantamasya hūmahe ūtim sahasra sātamām

original: RV_1,010.11a ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutam piba /
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutam piba

original: RV_1,010.11c navyam āyuḥ pra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim //
analyzed: navyam āyuḥ pra su tira kṛdhi sahasra sām ṛṣim

original: RV_1,010.12a pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ /
analyzed: pari tvā girvaṇaḥ giraḥ imāḥ bhavantu viśvatas

original: RV_1,010.12c vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: vṛddha āyum anu vṛddhayaḥ juṣṭāḥ bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,011.01a indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ /
analyzed: indram viśvāḥ avīvṛdhan samudra vyacasam giraḥ

original: RV_1,011.01c rathītamaṃ rathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatim patim //
analyzed: rathītamam rathīnām vājānām satpatim patim

original: RV_1,011.02a sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate /
analyzed: sakhye te indra vājinaḥ mā bhema śavasaḥ pate

original: RV_1,011.02c tvām abhi pra ṇonumo jetāram aparājitam //
analyzed: tvām abhi pra ṇonumaḥ jetāram aparājitam

original: RV_1,011.03a pūrvīr indrasya rātayo na vi dasyanty ūtayaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ indrasya rātayaḥ na vi dasyanti ūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,011.03c yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham //
analyzed: yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyaḥ maṃhate magham

original: RV_1,011.04a purām bhindur yuvā kavir amitaujā ajāyata /
analyzed: purām bhinduḥ yuvā kaviḥ amita ojāḥ ajāyata

original: RV_1,011.04c indro viśvasya karmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ viśvasya karmaṇaḥ dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ

original: RV_1,011.05a tvaṃ valasya gomato 'pāvar adrivo bilam /
analyzed: tvam valasya gomataḥ pāvaḥ adrivas bilam

original: RV_1,011.05c tvāṃ devā abibhyuṣas tujyamānāsa āviṣuḥ //
analyzed: tvām devāḥ a bibhyuṣaḥ tujyamānāsaḥ āviṣuḥ

original: RV_1,011.06a tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ praty āyaṃ sindhum āvadan /
analyzed: tava aham śūra rātibhiḥ prati āyam sindhum āvadan

original: RV_1,011.06c upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ //
analyzed: upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇaḥ viduḥ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ

original: RV_1,011.07a māyābhir indra māyinaṃ tvaṃ śuṣṇam avātiraḥ /
analyzed: māyābhiḥ indra māyinam tvam śuṣṇam avātiraḥ

original: RV_1,011.07c viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirās teṣāṃ śravāṃsy ut tira //
analyzed: viduḥ te tasya medhirāḥ teṣām śravāṃsi ud tira

original: RV_1,011.08a indram īśānam ojasābhi stomā anūṣata /
analyzed: indram īśānam ojasā abhi stomāḥ anūṣata

original: RV_1,011.08c sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ //
analyzed: sahasram yasya rātayaḥ uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ

original: RV_1,012.01a agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam /
analyzed: agnim dūtam vṛṇīmahe hotāram viśva vedasam

original: RV_1,012.01c asya yajñasya sukratum //
analyzed: asya yajñasya sukratum

original: RV_1,012.02a agnim-agniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim /
analyzed: agnim agnim havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim

original: RV_1,012.02c havyavāham purupriyam //
analyzed: havyavāham puru priyam

original: RV_1,012.03a agne devāṃ ihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe /
analyzed: agne devān iha ā vaha jajñānaḥ vṛktabarhiṣe

original: RV_1,012.03c asi hotā na īḍyaḥ //
analyzed: asi hotā naḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_1,012.04a tāṃ uśato vi bodhaya yad agne yāsi dūtyam /
analyzed: tām uśataḥ vi bodhaya yat agne yāsi dūtyam

original: RV_1,012.04c devair ā satsi barhiṣi //
analyzed: devaiḥ ā satsi barhiṣi

original: RV_1,012.05a ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha /
analyzed: ghṛta āhavana dīdivas prati sma riṣataḥ daha

original: RV_1,012.05c agne tvaṃ rakṣasvinaḥ //
analyzed: agne tvam rakṣasvinaḥ

original: RV_1,012.06a agnināgniḥ sam idhyate kavir gṛhapatir yuvā /
analyzed: agninā agniḥ sam idhyate kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_1,012.06c havyavāḍ juhvāsyaḥ //
analyzed: havyavāṭ juhū āsyaḥ

original: RV_1,012.07a kavim agnim upa stuhi satyadharmāṇam adhvare /
analyzed: kavim agnim upa stuhi satya dharmāṇam adhvare

original: RV_1,012.07c devam amīvacātanam //
analyzed: devam amīva cātanam

original: RV_1,012.08a yas tvām agne haviṣpatir dūtaṃ deva saparyati /
analyzed: yaḥ tvām agne haviṣpatiḥ dūtam deva saparyati

original: RV_1,012.08c tasya sma prāvitā bhava //
analyzed: tasya sma prāvitā bhava

original: RV_1,012.09a yo agniṃ devavītaye haviṣmāṃ āvivāsati /
analyzed: yaḥ agnim deva vītaye haviṣmān āvivāsati

original: RV_1,012.09c tasmai pāvaka mṛḷaya //
analyzed: tasmai pāvaka mṛḍaya

original: RV_1,012.10a sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devāṃ ihā vaha /
analyzed: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivas gne devān iha ā vaha

original: RV_1,012.10c upa yajñaṃ haviś ca naḥ //
analyzed: upa yajñam haviḥ ca naḥ

original: RV_1,012.11a sa na stavāna ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā /
analyzed: sa naḥ stavānaḥ ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā

original: RV_1,012.11c rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam //
analyzed: rayim vīravatīm iṣam

original: RV_1,012.12a agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhir devahūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhiḥ deva hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,012.12c imaṃ stomaṃ juṣasva naḥ //
analyzed: imam stomam juṣasva naḥ

original: RV_1,013.01a susamiddho na ā vaha devāṃ agne haviṣmate /
analyzed: su samiddhaḥ naḥ ā vaha devān agne haviṣmate

original: RV_1,013.01c hotaḥ pāvaka yakṣi ca //
analyzed: hotar pāvaka yakṣi ca

original: RV_1,013.02a madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave /
analyzed: madhumantam tanūnapāt yajñam deveṣu naḥ kave

original: RV_1,013.02c adyā kṛṇuhi vītaye //
analyzed: adyā kṛṇuhi vītaye

original: RV_1,013.03a narāśaṃsam iha priyam asmin yajña upa hvaye /
analyzed: narāśaṃsam iha priyam asmin yajñe upa hvaye

original: RV_1,013.03c madhujihvaṃ haviṣkṛtam //
analyzed: madhu jihvam haviṣkṛtam

original: RV_1,013.04a agne sukhatame rathe devāṃ īḷita ā vaha /
analyzed: agne sukhatame rathe devān īḍitaḥ ā vaha

original: RV_1,013.04c asi hotā manurhitaḥ //
analyzed: asi hotā manuḥ hitaḥ

original: RV_1,013.05a stṛṇīta barhir ānuṣag ghṛtapṛṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: stṛṇīta barhiḥ ānuṣak ghṛta pṛṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,013.05c yatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇam //
analyzed: yatra amṛtasya cakṣaṇam

original: RV_1,013.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ /
analyzed: vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ dvāraḥ devīḥ asaścataḥ

original: RV_1,013.06c adyā nūnaṃ ca yaṣṭave //
analyzed: adyā nūnam ca yaṣṭave

original: RV_1,013.07a naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye /
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā supeśasā asmin yajñe upa hvaye

original: RV_1,013.07c idaṃ no barhir āsade //
analyzed: idam naḥ barhiḥ āsade

original: RV_1,013.08a tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī /
analyzed: tā su jihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī

original: RV_1,013.08c yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imam //
analyzed: yajñam naḥ yakṣatām imam

original: RV_1,013.09a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ /
analyzed: iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisraḥ devīḥ mayobhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,013.09c barhiḥ sīdantv asridhaḥ //
analyzed: barhiḥ sīdantu asridhaḥ

original: RV_1,013.10a iha tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ viśvarūpam upa hvaye /
analyzed: iha tvaṣṭāram agriyam viśva rūpam upa hvaye

original: RV_1,013.10c asmākam astu kevalaḥ //
analyzed: asmākam astu kevalaḥ

original: RV_1,013.11a ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ /
analyzed: ava sṛja vanaspate deva devebhyaḥ haviḥ

original: RV_1,013.11c pra dātur astu cetanam //
analyzed: pra dātuḥ astu cetanam

original: RV_1,013.12a svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano gṛhe /
analyzed: svāhā yajñam kṛṇotana indrāya yajvanaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_1,013.12c tatra devāṃ upa hvaye //
analyzed: tatra devān upa hvaye

original: RV_1,014.01a aibhir agne duvo giro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: ā ebhiḥ agne duvaḥ giraḥ viśvebhiḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_1,014.01c devebhir yāhi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: devebhiḥ yāhi yakṣi ca

original: RV_1,014.02a ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā kaṇvāḥ ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ

original: RV_1,014.02c devebhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: devebhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,014.03a indravāyū bṛhaspatim mitrāgnim pūṣaṇam bhagam /
analyzed: indra vāyū bṛhaspatim mitra agnim pūṣaṇam bhagam

original: RV_1,014.03c ādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam //
analyzed: ādityān mārutam gaṇam

original: RV_1,014.04a pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ /
analyzed: pra vaḥ bhriyantaḥ indavaḥ matsarāḥ mādayiṣṇavaḥ

original: RV_1,014.04c drapsā madhvaś camūṣadaḥ //
analyzed: drapsāḥ madhvaḥ camūṣadaḥ

original: RV_1,014.05a īḷate tvām avasyavaḥ kaṇvāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
analyzed: īḍate tvām avasyavaḥ kaṇvāsaḥ vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_1,014.05c haviṣmanto araṅkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: haviṣmantaḥ araṅkṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,014.06a ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ /
analyzed: ghṛta pṛṣṭhāḥ manaḥ yujaḥ ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_1,014.06c ā devān somapītaye //
analyzed: ā devān soma pītaye

original: RV_1,014.07a tān yajatrāṃ ṛtāvṛdho 'gne patnīvatas kṛdhi /
analyzed: tān yajatrān ṛtāvṛdhaḥ gne patnīvataḥ kṛdhi

original: RV_1,014.07c madhvaḥ sujihva pāyaya //
analyzed: madhvaḥ su jihva pāyaya

original: RV_1,014.08a ye yajatrā ya īḍyās te te pibantu jihvayā /
analyzed: ye yajatrāḥ ye īḍyāḥ te te pibantu jihvayā

original: RV_1,014.08c madhor agne vaṣaṭkṛti //
analyzed: madhoḥ agne vaṣaṭkṛti

original: RV_1,014.09a ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ /
analyzed: ākīm sūryasya rocanāt viśvān devān uṣarbudhaḥ

original: RV_1,014.09c vipro hoteha vakṣati //
analyzed: vipraḥ hotā iha vakṣati

original: RV_1,014.10a viśvebhiḥ somyam madhv agna indreṇa vāyunā /
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ somyam madhu agne indreṇa vāyunā

original: RV_1,014.10c pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,014.11a tvaṃ hotā manurhito 'gne yajñeṣu sīdasi /
analyzed: tvam hotā manuḥ hitaḥ gne yajñeṣu sīdasi

original: RV_1,014.11c semaṃ no adhvaraṃ yaja //
analyzed: sā imam naḥ adhvaram yaja

original: RV_1,014.12a yukṣvā hy aruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ /
analyzed: yukṣvā hi aruṣī rathe haritaḥ deva rohitaḥ

original: RV_1,014.12c tābhir devāṃ ihā vaha //
analyzed: tābhiḥ devān iha ā vaha

original: RV_1,015.01a indra somam piba ṛtunā tvā viśantv indavaḥ /
analyzed: indra somam piba ṛtunā tvā viśantu indavaḥ

original: RV_1,015.01c matsarāsas tadokasaḥ //
analyzed: matsarāsaḥ tad okasaḥ

original: RV_1,015.02a marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñam punītana /
analyzed: marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrāt yajñam punītana

original: RV_1,015.02c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavaḥ //
analyzed: yūyam hi stha sudānavaḥ

original: RV_1,015.03a abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā /
analyzed: abhi yajñam gṛṇīhi naḥ gnāvaḥ na iṣṭar piba ṛtunā

original: RV_1,015.03c tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi //
analyzed: tvam hi ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_1,015.04a agne devāṃ ihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu /
analyzed: agne devān iha ā vaha sādaya yoniṣu triṣu

original: RV_1,015.04c pari bhūṣa piba ṛtunā //
analyzed: pari bhūṣa piba ṛtunā

original: RV_1,015.05a brāhmaṇād indra rādhasaḥ pibā somam ṛtūṃr anu /
analyzed: brāhmaṇāt indra rādhasaḥ piba somam ṛtūṃr anu

original: RV_1,015.05c taved dhi sakhyam astṛtam //
analyzed: tava id hi sakhyam astṛtam

original: RV_1,015.06a yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham /
analyzed: yuvam dakṣam dhṛta vrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḍabham

original: RV_1,015.06c ṛtunā yajñam āśāthe //
analyzed: ṛtunā yajñam āśāthe

original: RV_1,015.07a draviṇodā draviṇaso grāvahastāso adhvare /
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ draviṇasaḥ grāva hastāsaḥ adhvare

original: RV_1,015.07c yajñeṣu devam īḷate //
analyzed: yajñeṣu devam īḍate

original: RV_1,015.08a draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire /
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ dadātu naḥ vasūni yāni śṛṇvire

original: RV_1,015.08c deveṣu tā vanāmahe //
analyzed: deveṣu tā vanāmahe

original: RV_1,015.09a draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata /
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata

original: RV_1,015.09c neṣṭrād ṛtubhir iṣyata //
analyzed: neṣṭrāt ṛtubhiḥ iṣyata

original: RV_1,015.10a yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhir draviṇodo yajāmahe /
analyzed: yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhiḥ draviṇaḥ daḥ yajāmahe

original: RV_1,015.10c adha smā no dadir bhava //
analyzed: adha smā naḥ dadiḥ bhava

original: RV_1,015.11a aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdyagnī śucivratā /
analyzed: aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdi agnī śuci vratā

original: RV_1,015.11c ṛtunā yajñavāhasā //
analyzed: ṛtunā yajña vāhasā

original: RV_1,015.12a gārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīr asi /
analyzed: gārhapatyena santyaḥ ṛtunā yajñanīḥ asi

original: RV_1,015.12c devān devayate yaja //
analyzed: devān devayate yaja

original: RV_1,016.01a ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye /
analyzed: ā tvā vahantu harayaḥ vṛṣaṇam soma pītaye

original: RV_1,016.01c indra tvā sūracakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: indra tvā sūra cakṣasaḥ

original: RV_1,016.02a imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ dhānāḥ ghṛtasnuvaḥ harī iha upa vakṣataḥ

original: RV_1,016.02c indraṃ sukhatame rathe //
analyzed: indram sukhatame rathe

original: RV_1,016.03a indram prātar havāmaha indram prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: indram prātar havāmahe indram prayati adhvare

original: RV_1,016.03c indraṃ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: indram somasya pītaye

original: RV_1,016.04a upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhir indra keśibhiḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhiḥ indra keśibhiḥ

original: RV_1,016.04c sute hi tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: sute hi tvā havāmahe

original: RV_1,016.05a semaṃ na stomam ā gahy upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
analyzed: sā imam naḥ stomam ā gahi upa idam savanam sutam

original: RV_1,016.05c gauro na tṛṣitaḥ piba //
analyzed: gauraḥ na tṛṣitaḥ piba

original: RV_1,016.06a ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi /
analyzed: ime somāsaḥ indavaḥ sutāsaḥ adhi barhiṣi

original: RV_1,016.06c tāṃ indra sahase piba //
analyzed: tām indra sahase piba

original: RV_1,016.07a ayaṃ te stomo agriyo hṛdispṛg astu śantamaḥ /
analyzed: ayam te stomaḥ agriyaḥ hṛdispṛś astu śantamaḥ

original: RV_1,016.07c athā somaṃ sutam piba //
analyzed: athā somam sutam piba

original: RV_1,016.08a viśvam it savanaṃ sutam indro madāya gacchati /
analyzed: viśvam id savanam sutam indraḥ madāya gacchati

original: RV_1,016.08c vṛtrahā somapītaye //
analyzed: vṛtrahā soma pītaye

original: RV_1,016.09a semaṃ naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhir aśvaiḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: sa imam naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ śatakrato

original: RV_1,016.09c stavāma tvā svādhyaḥ //
analyzed: stavāma tvā svādhyaḥ

original: RV_1,017.01a indrāvaruṇayor ahaṃ samrājor ava ā vṛṇe /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇayoḥ aham samrājoḥ avaḥ ā vṛṇe

original: RV_1,017.01c tā no mṛḷāta īdṛśe //
analyzed: tā naḥ mṛḷātaḥ īdṛśe

original: RV_1,017.02a gantārā hi stho 'vase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ /
analyzed: gantārā hi sthaḥ vase havam viprasya māvataḥ

original: RV_1,017.02c dhartārā carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: dhartārā carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_1,017.03a anukāmaṃ tarpayethām indrāvaruṇa rāya ā /
analyzed: anukāmam tarpayethām indrāvaruṇa rāyaḥ ā

original: RV_1,017.03c tā vāṃ nediṣṭham īmahe //
analyzed: tā vām nediṣṭham īmahe

original: RV_1,017.04a yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām /
analyzed: yuvāku hi śacīnām yuvāku sumatīnām

original: RV_1,017.04c bhūyāma vājadāvnām //
analyzed: bhūyāma vāja dāvnām

original: RV_1,017.05a indraḥ sahasradāvnāṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃsyānām /
analyzed: indraḥ sahasra dāvnām varuṇaḥ śaṃsyānām

original: RV_1,017.05c kratur bhavaty ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: kratuḥ bhavati ukthyaḥ

original: RV_1,017.06a tayor id avasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi /
analyzed: tayoḥ id avasā vayam sanema ni ca dhīmahi

original: RV_1,017.06c syād uta prarecanam //
analyzed: syāt uta prarecanam

original: RV_1,017.07a indrāvaruṇa vām ahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇa vām aham huve citrāya rādhase

original: RV_1,017.07c asmān su jigyuṣas kṛtam //
analyzed: asmān su jigyuṣaḥ kṛtam

original: RV_1,017.08a indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣv ā /
analyzed: indrāvaruṇa nu nu vām siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣu ā

original: RV_1,017.08c asmabhyaṃ śarma yacchatam //
analyzed: asmabhyam śarma yacchatam

original: RV_1,017.09a pra vām aśnotu suṣṭutir indrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve /
analyzed: pra vām aśnotu suṣṭutiḥ indrāvaruṇa yām huve

original: RV_1,017.09c yām ṛdhāthe sadhastutim //
analyzed: yām ṛdhāthe sadhastutim

original: RV_1,018.01a somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate /
analyzed: somānam svaraṇam kṛṇuhi brahmaṇaḥ pate

original: RV_1,018.01c kakṣīvantaṃ ya auśijaḥ //
analyzed: kakṣīvantam yaḥ auśijaḥ

original: RV_1,018.02a yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ revān yaḥ amīva hā vasu vid puṣṭi vardhanaḥ

original: RV_1,018.02c sa naḥ siṣaktu yas turaḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ siṣaktu yaḥ turaḥ

original: RV_1,018.03a mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya /
analyzed: mā naḥ śaṃsaḥ a raruṣaḥ dhūrtiḥ praṇak martyasya

original: RV_1,018.03c rakṣā ṇo brahmaṇas pate //
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ brahmaṇas pate

original: RV_1,018.04a sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yam indro brahmaṇas patiḥ /
analyzed: sa ghā vīraḥ na riṣyati yam indraḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_1,018.04c somo hinoti martyam //
analyzed: somaḥ hinoti martyam

original: RV_1,018.05a tvaṃ tam brahmaṇas pate soma indraś ca martyam /
analyzed: tvam tam brahmaṇaḥ pate somaḥ indraḥ ca martyam

original: RV_1,018.05c dakṣiṇā pātv aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_1,018.06a sadasas patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam /
analyzed: sadasas patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam

original: RV_1,018.06c sanim medhām ayāsiṣam //
analyzed: sanim medhām ayāsiṣam

original: RV_1,018.07a yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaś cana /
analyzed: yasmāt ṛte na sidhyati yajñaḥ vipaścitaḥ cana

original: RV_1,018.07c sa dhīnāṃ yogam invati //
analyzed: sa dhīnām yogam invati

original: RV_1,018.08a ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim prāñcaṃ kṛṇoty adhvaram /
analyzed: āt ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim prāñcam kṛṇoti adhvaram

original: RV_1,018.08c hotrā deveṣu gacchati //
analyzed: hotrā deveṣu gacchati

original: RV_1,018.09a narāśaṃsaṃ sudhṛṣṭamam apaśyaṃ saprathastamam /
analyzed: narāśaṃsam sudhṛṣṭamam apaśyam saprathastamam

original: RV_1,018.09c divo na sadmamakhasam //
analyzed: divaḥ na sadmamakhasam

original: RV_1,019.01a prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase /
analyzed: prati tyam cārum adhvaram gopīthāya pra hūyase

original: RV_1,019.01c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.02a nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratum paraḥ /
analyzed: nahi devaḥ na martyaḥ mahaḥ tava kratum paraḥ

original: RV_1,019.02c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.03a ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ /
analyzed: ye mahaḥ rajasaḥ viduḥ viśve devāsaḥ adruhaḥ

original: RV_1,019.03c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.04a ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā /
analyzed: ye ugrāḥ arkam ānṛcuḥ anādhṛṣṭāsaḥ ojasā

original: RV_1,019.04c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.05a ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: ye śubhrāḥ ghora varpasaḥ su kṣatrāsaḥ riśādasaḥ

original: RV_1,019.05c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.06a ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate /
analyzed: ye nākasya adhi rocane divi devāsaḥ āsate

original: RV_1,019.06c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.07a ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram arṇavam /
analyzed: ye īṅkhayanti parvatān tiras samudram arṇavam

original: RV_1,019.07c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.08a ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram ojasā /
analyzed: ā ye tanvanti raśmibhiḥ tiras samudram ojasā

original: RV_1,019.08c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,019.09a abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyam madhu /
analyzed: abhi tvā pūrva pītaye sṛjāmi somyam madhu

original: RV_1,019.09c marudbhir agna ā gahi //
analyzed: marudbhiḥ agne ā gahi

original: RV_1,020.01a ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhir āsayā /
analyzed: ayam devāya janmane stomaḥ viprebhiḥ āsayā

original: RV_1,020.01c akāri ratnadhātamaḥ //
analyzed: akāri ratna dhātamaḥ

original: RV_1,020.02a ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣur manasā harī /
analyzed: ye indrāya vacaḥ yujā tatakṣuḥ manasā harī

original: RV_1,020.02c śamībhir yajñam āśata //
analyzed: śamībhiḥ yajñam āśata

original: RV_1,020.03a takṣan nāsatyābhyām parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham /
analyzed: takṣan nāsatyābhyām parijmānam sukham ratham

original: RV_1,020.03c takṣan dhenuṃ sabardughām //
analyzed: takṣan dhenum sabardughām

original: RV_1,020.04a yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ /
analyzed: yuvānā pitarā punar satya mantrāḥ ṛjūyavaḥ

original: RV_1,020.04c ṛbhavo viṣṭy akrata //
analyzed: ṛbhavaḥ viṣṭī akrata

original: RV_1,020.05a saṃ vo madāso agmatendreṇa ca marutvatā /
analyzed: sam vaḥ madāsaḥ agmata indreṇa ca marutvatā

original: RV_1,020.05c ādityebhiś ca rājabhiḥ //
analyzed: ādityebhiḥ ca rājabhiḥ

original: RV_1,020.06a uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭur devasya niṣkṛtam /
analyzed: uta tyam camasam navam tvaṣṭuḥ devasya niṣkṛtam

original: RV_1,020.06c akarta caturaḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: akarta caturaḥ punar

original: RV_1,020.07a te no ratnāni dhattana trir ā sāptāni sunvate /
analyzed: te naḥ ratnāni dhattana tris ā sāptāni sunvate

original: RV_1,020.07c ekam-ekaṃ suśastibhiḥ //
analyzed: ekam ekam su śastibhiḥ

original: RV_1,020.08a adhārayanta vahnayo 'bhajanta sukṛtyayā /
analyzed: adhārayanta vahnayaḥ bhajanta su kṛtyayā

original: RV_1,020.08c bhāgaṃ deveṣu yajñiyam //
analyzed: bhāgam deveṣu yajñiyam

original: RV_1,021.01a ihendrāgnī upa hvaye tayor it stomam uśmasi /
analyzed: iha indra agnī upa hvaye tayoḥ id stomam uśmasi

original: RV_1,021.01c tā somaṃ somapātamā //
analyzed: tā somam soma pātamā

original: RV_1,021.02a tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ /
analyzed: tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsata indra agnī śumbhata naraḥ

original: RV_1,021.02c tā gāyatreṣu gāyata //
analyzed: tā gāyatreṣu gāyata

original: RV_1,021.03a tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāgnī tā havāmahe /
analyzed: tā mitrasya praśastaye indra agnī tā havāmahe

original: RV_1,021.03c somapā somapītaye //
analyzed: soma pā soma pītaye

original: RV_1,021.04a ugrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
analyzed: ugrā santā havāmahe upa idam savanam sutam

original: RV_1,021.04c indrāgnī eha gacchatām //
analyzed: indra agnī ā iha gacchatām

original: RV_1,021.05a tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāgnī rakṣa ubjatam /
analyzed: tā mahāntā sadaspatī indra agnī rakṣaḥ ubjatam

original: RV_1,021.05c aprajāḥ santv atriṇaḥ //
analyzed: aprajāḥ santu atriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,021.06a tena satyena jāgṛtam adhi pracetune pade /
analyzed: tena satyena jāgṛtam adhi pracetune pade

original: RV_1,021.06c indrāgnī śarma yacchatam //
analyzed: indra agnī śarma yacchatam

original: RV_1,022.01a prātaryujā vi bodhayāśvināv eha gacchatām /
analyzed: prātar yujā vi bodhaya aśvinau ā iha gacchatām

original: RV_1,022.01c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_1,022.02a yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā /
analyzed: yā su rathā rathītamā ubhā devā divispṛśā

original: RV_1,022.02c aśvinā tā havāmahe //
analyzed: aśvinā tā havāmahe

original: RV_1,022.03a yā vāṃ kaśā madhumaty aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī /
analyzed: yā vām kaśā madhumatī aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī

original: RV_1,022.03c tayā yajñam mimikṣatam //
analyzed: tayā yajñam mimikṣatam

original: RV_1,022.04a nahi vām asti dūrake yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ /
analyzed: nahi vām asti dūrake yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ

original: RV_1,022.04c aśvinā somino gṛham //
analyzed: aśvinā sominaḥ gṛham

original: RV_1,022.05a hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye /
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye

original: RV_1,022.05c sa cettā devatā padam //
analyzed: sa cettā devatā padam

original: RV_1,022.06a apāṃ napātam avase savitāram upa stuhi /
analyzed: apām napātam avase savitāram upa stuhi

original: RV_1,022.06c tasya vratāny uśmasi //
analyzed: tasya vratāni uśmasi

original: RV_1,022.07a vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasoś citrasya rādhasaḥ /
analyzed: vibhaktāram havāmahe vasoḥ citrasya rādhasaḥ

original: RV_1,022.07c savitāraṃ nṛcakṣasam //
analyzed: savitāram nṛ cakṣasam

original: RV_1,022.08a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ /
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ ā ni sīdata savitā stomyaḥ nu naḥ

original: RV_1,022.08c dātā rādhāṃsi śumbhati //
analyzed: dātā rādhāṃsi śumbhati

original: RV_1,022.09a agne patnīr ihā vaha devānām uśatīr upa /
analyzed: agne patnīḥ iha ā vaha devānām uśatīḥ upa

original: RV_1,022.09c tvaṣṭāraṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram soma pītaye

original: RV_1,022.10a ā gnā agna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm /
analyzed: ā gnāḥ agne iha avase hotrām yaviṣṭha bhāratīm

original: RV_1,022.10c varūtrīṃ dhiṣaṇāṃ vaha //
analyzed: varūtrīm dhiṣaṇām vaha

original: RV_1,022.11a abhi no devīr avasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ /
analyzed: abhi naḥ devīḥ avasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛ patnīḥ

original: RV_1,022.11c acchinnapatrāḥ sacantām //
analyzed: a chinna patrāḥ sacantām

original: RV_1,022.12a ihendrāṇīm upa hvaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye /
analyzed: iha indrāṇīm upa hvaye varuṇānīm svastaye

original: RV_1,022.12c agnāyīṃ somapītaye //
analyzed: agnāyīm soma pītaye

original: RV_1,022.13a mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñam mimikṣatām /
analyzed: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca naḥ imam yajñam mimikṣatām

original: RV_1,022.13c pipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pipṛtām naḥ bharīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,022.14a tayor id ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ /
analyzed: tayoḥ id ghṛtavat payaḥ viprāḥ rihanti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_1,022.14c gandharvasya dhruve pade //
analyzed: gandharvasya dhruve pade

original: RV_1,022.15a syonā pṛthivi bhavānṛkṣarā niveśanī /
analyzed: syonā pṛthivi bhava anṛkṣarā niveśanī

original: RV_1,022.15c yacchā naḥ śarma saprathaḥ //
analyzed: yaccha naḥ śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_1,022.16a ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇur vicakrame /
analyzed: atas devāḥ avantu naḥ yatas viṣṇuḥ vicakrame

original: RV_1,022.16c pṛthivyāḥ sapta dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ sapta dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,022.17a idaṃ viṣṇur vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam /
analyzed: idam viṣṇuḥ vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam

original: RV_1,022.17c samūḷham asya pāṃsure //
analyzed: samūḍham asya pāṃsure

original: RV_1,022.18a trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_1,022.18c ato dharmāṇi dhārayan //
analyzed: atas dharmāṇi dhārayan

original: RV_1,022.19a viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe /
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yatas vratāni paspaśe

original: RV_1,022.19c indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā //
analyzed: indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā

original: RV_1,022.20a tad viṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: RV_1,022.20c divīva cakṣur ātatam //
analyzed: divi iva cakṣuḥ ātatam

original: RV_1,022.21a tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate /
analyzed: tat viprāsaḥ vipanyavaḥ jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate

original: RV_1,022.21c viṣṇor yat paramam padam //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam

original: RV_1,023.01a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahy āśīrvantaḥ sutā ime /
analyzed: tīvrāḥ somāsaḥ ā gahi āśīrvantaḥ sutāḥ ime

original: RV_1,023.01c vāyo tān prasthitān piba //
analyzed: vāyo tān prasthitān piba

original: RV_1,023.02a ubhā devā divispṛśendravāyū havāmahe /
analyzed: ubhā devā divispṛśā indra vāyū havāmahe

original: RV_1,023.02c asya somasya pītaye //
analyzed: asya somasya pītaye

original: RV_1,023.03a indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye /
analyzed: indra vāyū manaḥ juvā viprāḥ havante ūtaye

original: RV_1,023.03c sahasrākṣā dhiyas patī //
analyzed: sahasra akṣā dhiyaḥ patī

original: RV_1,023.04a mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye /
analyzed: mitram vayam havāmahe varuṇam soma pītaye

original: RV_1,023.04c jajñānā pūtadakṣasā //
analyzed: jajñānā pūta dakṣasā

original: RV_1,023.05a ṛtena yāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtasya jyotiṣas patī /
analyzed: ṛtena yau ṛtāvṛdhau ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patī

original: RV_1,023.05c tā mitrāvaruṇā huve //
analyzed: tā mitrāvaruṇā huve

original: RV_1,023.06a varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvat mitraḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,023.06c karatāṃ naḥ surādhasaḥ //
analyzed: karatām naḥ su rādhasaḥ

original: RV_1,023.07a marutvantaṃ havāmaha indram ā somapītaye /
analyzed: marutvantam havāmahe indram ā soma pītaye

original: RV_1,023.07c sajūr gaṇena tṛmpatu //
analyzed: sajūs gaṇena tṛmpatu

original: RV_1,023.08a indrajyeṣṭhā marudgaṇā devāsaḥ pūṣarātayaḥ /
analyzed: indra jyeṣṭhāḥ marut gaṇāḥ devāsaḥ pūṣa rātayaḥ

original: RV_1,023.08c viśve mama śrutā havam //
analyzed: viśve mama śruta havam

original: RV_1,023.09a hata vṛtraṃ sudānava indreṇa sahasā yujā /
analyzed: hata vṛtram sudānavaḥ indreṇa sahasā yujā

original: RV_1,023.09c mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata //
analyzed: mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_1,023.10a viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_1,023.10c ugrā hi pṛśnimātaraḥ //
analyzed: ugrāḥ hi pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_1,023.11a jayatām iva tanyatur marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: jayatām iva tanyatuḥ marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_1,023.11c yac chubhaṃ yāthanā naraḥ //
analyzed: yat śubham yāthana naraḥ

original: RV_1,023.12a haskārād vidyutas pary ato jātā avantu naḥ /
analyzed: haskārāt vidyutaḥ pari atas jātāḥ avantu naḥ

original: RV_1,023.12c maruto mṛḷayantu naḥ //
analyzed: marutaḥ mṛḍayantu naḥ

original: RV_1,023.13a ā pūṣañ citrabarhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: ā pūṣam citra barhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇam divaḥ

original: RV_1,023.13c ājā naṣṭaṃ yathā paśum //
analyzed: ājā naṣṭam yathā paśum

original: RV_1,023.14a pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇir apagūḷhaṃ guhā hitam /
analyzed: pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇiḥ apagūḍham guhā hitam

original: RV_1,023.14c avindac citrabarhiṣam //
analyzed: avindat citrabarhiṣam

original: RV_1,023.15a uto sa mahyam indubhiḥ ṣaḍ yuktāṃ anuseṣidhat /
analyzed: uta u sa mahyam indubhiḥ ṣaṣ yuktām anuseṣidhat

original: RV_1,023.15c gobhir yavaṃ na carkṛṣat //
analyzed: gobhiḥ yavam na carkṛṣat

original: RV_1,023.16a ambayo yanty adhvabhir jāmayo adhvarīyatām /
analyzed: ambayaḥ yanti adhvabhiḥ jāmayaḥ adhvarīyatām

original: RV_1,023.16c pṛñcatīr madhunā payaḥ //
analyzed: pṛñcatīḥ madhunā payaḥ

original: RV_1,023.17a amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha /
analyzed: amūḥ yāḥ upa sūrye yābhiḥ vā sūryaḥ saha

original: RV_1,023.17c tā no hinvantv adhvaram //
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ hinvantu adhvaram

original: RV_1,023.18a apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ devīḥ upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ

original: RV_1,023.18c sindhubhyaḥ kartvaṃ haviḥ //
analyzed: sindhubhyaḥ kartvam haviḥ

original: RV_1,023.19a apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastaye /
analyzed: apsu antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastaye

original: RV_1,023.19c devā bhavata vājinaḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ bhavata vājinaḥ

original: RV_1,023.20a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
analyzed: apsu me somaḥ abravīt antar viśvāni bheṣajā

original: RV_1,023.20c agniṃ ca viśvaśambhuvam āpaś ca viśvabheṣajīḥ //
analyzed: agnim ca viśva śambhuvam āpaḥ ca viśva bheṣajīḥ

original: RV_1,023.21a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama /
analyzed: āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajam varūtham tanve mama

original: RV_1,023.21c jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe //
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_1,023.22a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi /
analyzed: idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kim ca duritam mayi

original: RV_1,023.22c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam //
analyzed: yat vā aham abhidudroha yat vā śepe uta anṛtam

original: RV_1,023.23a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi /
analyzed: āpaḥ adya anu acāriṣam rasena sam agasmahi

original: RV_1,023.23c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā //
analyzed: payasvān agne ā gahi tam mā sam sṛja varcasā

original: RV_1,023.24a sam māgne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā /
analyzed: sam mā agne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā

original: RV_1,023.24c vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: vidyuḥ me asya devāḥ indraḥ vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ

original: RV_1,024.01a kasya nūnaṃ katamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma /
analyzed: kasya nūnam katamasya amṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma

original: RV_1,024.01c ko no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca //
analyzed: kaḥ naḥ mahyai aditaye punar dāt pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca

original: RV_1,024.02a agner vayam prathamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma /
analyzed: agneḥ vayam prathamasya amṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma

original: RV_1,024.02c sa no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca //
analyzed: sa naḥ mahyai aditaye punar dāt pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca

original: RV_1,024.03a abhi tvā deva savitar īśānaṃ vāryāṇām /
analyzed: abhi tvā deva savitar īśānam vāryāṇām

original: RV_1,024.03c sadāvan bhāgam īmahe //
analyzed: sadā avan bhāgam īmahe

original: RV_1,024.04a yaś cid dhi ta itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ cit hi te itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ

original: RV_1,024.04c adveṣo hastayor dadhe //
analyzed: a dveṣaḥ hastayoḥ dadhe

original: RV_1,024.05a bhagabhaktasya te vayam ud aśema tavāvasā /
analyzed: bhaga bhaktasya te vayam ud aśema tava avasā

original: RV_1,024.05c mūrdhānaṃ rāya ārabhe //
analyzed: mūrdhānam rāyaḥ ārabhe

original: RV_1,024.06a nahi te kṣatraṃ na saho na manyuṃ vayaś canāmī patayanta āpuḥ /
analyzed: nahi te kṣatram na sahaḥ na manyum vayaḥ cana amī patayantaḥ āpuḥ

original: RV_1,024.06c nemā āpo animiṣaṃ carantīr na ye vātasya praminanty abhvam //
analyzed: na imāḥ āpaḥ animiṣam carantīḥ na ye vātasya praminanti abhvam

original: RV_1,024.07a abudhne rājā varuṇo vanasyordhvaṃ stūpaṃ dadate pūtadakṣaḥ /
analyzed: abudhne rājā varuṇaḥ vanasya ūrdhvam stūpam dadate pūta dakṣaḥ

original: RV_1,024.07c nīcīnā sthur upari budhna eṣām asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ syuḥ //
analyzed: nīcīnā sthuḥ upari budhne eṣām asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ syuḥ

original: RV_1,024.08a uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u /
analyzed: urum hi rājā varuṇaḥ cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavai u

original: RV_1,024.08c apade pādā pratidhātave 'kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cit //
analyzed: a pade pādā pratidhātave kaḥ uta apavaktā hṛdayāvidhaḥ cit

original: RV_1,024.09a śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gabhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu /
analyzed: śatam te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gabhīrā sumatiḥ ṭe astu

original: RV_1,024.09c bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumugdhy asmat //
analyzed: bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācais kṛtam cit enaḥ pra mumugdhi asmat

original: RV_1,024.10a amī ya ṛkṣā nihitāsa uccā naktaṃ dadṛśre kuha cid diveyuḥ /
analyzed: amī ye ṛkṣāḥ nihitāsaḥ uccā naktam dadṛśre kuha cit divā īyuḥ

original: RV_1,024.10c adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśac candramā naktam eti //
analyzed: adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśat candramāḥ naktam eti

original: RV_1,024.11a tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad ā śāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ tat ā śāste yajamānaḥ havirbhiḥ

original: RV_1,024.11c aheḷamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ //
analyzed: a heḍamānaḥ varuṇa iha bodhi uru śaṃsa mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ

original: RV_1,024.12a tad in naktaṃ tad divā mahyam āhus tad ayaṃ keto hṛda ā vi caṣṭe /
analyzed: tat id naktam tat divā mahyam āhuḥ tat ayam ketaḥ hṛdaḥ ā vi caṣṭe

original: RV_1,024.12c śunaḥśepo yam ahvad gṛbhītaḥ so asmān rājā varuṇo mumoktu //
analyzed: śunaḥśepaḥ yam ahvat gṛbhītaḥ saḥ asmān rājā varuṇaḥ mumoktu

original: RV_1,024.13a śunaḥśepo hy ahvad gṛbhītas triṣv ādityaṃ drupadeṣu baddhaḥ /
analyzed: śunaḥśepaḥ hi ahvat gṛbhītaḥ triṣu ādityam dru padeṣu baddhaḥ

original: RV_1,024.13c avainaṃ rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyād vidvāṃ adabdho vi mumoktu pāśān //
analyzed: ava enam rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyāt vidvān adabdhaḥ vi mumoktu pāśān

original: RV_1,024.14a ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
analyzed: ava te heḍaḥ varuṇa namobhiḥ ava yajñebhiḥ īmahe havirbhiḥ

original: RV_1,024.14c kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
analyzed: kṣayan asmabhyam asura pracetāḥ rājan enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni

original: RV_1,024.15a ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya /
analyzed: ud uttamam varuṇa pāśam asmat ava adhamam vi madhyamam śrathāya

original: RV_1,024.15c athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
analyzed: atha vayam āditya vrate tava anāgasaḥ aditaye syāma

original: RV_1,025.01a yac cid dhi te viśo yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam /
analyzed: yat cit hi te viśaḥ yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam

original: RV_1,025.01c minīmasi dyavi-dyavi //
analyzed: minīmasi dyavi dyavi

original: RV_1,025.02a mā no vadhāya hatnave jihīḷānasya rīradhaḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhāya hatnave jihīḍānasya rīradhaḥ

original: RV_1,025.02c mā hṛṇānasya manyave //
analyzed: mā hṛṇānasya manyave

original: RV_1,025.03a vi mṛḷīkāya te mano rathīr aśvaṃ na saṃditam /
analyzed: vi mṛḷīkāya te manaḥ rathīḥ aśvam na saṃditam

original: RV_1,025.03c gīrbhir varuṇa sīmahi //
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ varuṇa sīmahi

original: RV_1,025.04a parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye /
analyzed: parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye

original: RV_1,025.04c vayo na vasatīr upa //
analyzed: vayaḥ na vasatīḥ upa

original: RV_1,025.05a kadā kṣatraśriyaṃ naram ā varuṇaṃ karāmahe /
analyzed: kadā kṣatra śriyam naram ā varuṇam karāmahe

original: RV_1,025.05c mṛḷīkāyorucakṣasam //
analyzed: mṛḷīkāya uru cakṣasam

original: RV_1,025.06a tad it samānam āśāte venantā na pra yucchataḥ /
analyzed: tat id samānam āśāte venantā na pra yucchataḥ

original: RV_1,025.06c dhṛtavratāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: dhṛta vratāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,025.07a vedā yo vīnām padam antarikṣeṇa patatām /
analyzed: vedā yaḥ vīnām padam antarikṣeṇa patatām

original: RV_1,025.07c veda nāvaḥ samudriyaḥ //
analyzed: veda nāvaḥ samudriyaḥ

original: RV_1,025.08a veda māso dhṛtavrato dvādaśa prajāvataḥ /
analyzed: veda māsaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ dvādaśa prajāvataḥ

original: RV_1,025.08c vedā ya upajāyate //
analyzed: vedā yaḥ upajāyate

original: RV_1,025.09a veda vātasya vartanim uror ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ /
analyzed: veda vātasya vartanim uroḥ ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ

original: RV_1,025.09c vedā ye adhyāsate //
analyzed: vedā ye adhyāsate

original: RV_1,025.10a ni ṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā /
analyzed: ni ṣasāda dhṛta vrataḥ varuṇaḥ pastyāsu ā

original: RV_1,025.10c sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ //
analyzed: sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ

original: RV_1,025.11a ato viśvāny adbhutā cikitvāṃ abhi paśyati /
analyzed: atas viśvāni adbhutā cikitvān abhi paśyati

original: RV_1,025.11c kṛtāni yā ca kartvā //
analyzed: kṛtāni yā ca kartvā

original: RV_1,025.12a sa no viśvāhā sukratur ādityaḥ supathā karat /
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāhā su kratuḥ ādityaḥ su pathā karat

original: RV_1,025.12c pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //
analyzed: pra naḥ āyūṃṣi tāriṣat

original: RV_1,025.13a bibhrad drāpiṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇo vasta nirṇijam /
analyzed: bibhrat drāpim hiraṇyayam varuṇaḥ vasta nirṇijam

original: RV_1,025.13c pari spaśo ni ṣedire //
analyzed: pari spaśaḥ ni sedire

original: RV_1,025.14a na yaṃ dipsanti dipsavo na druhvāṇo janānām /
analyzed: na yam dipsanti dipsavaḥ na druhvāṇaḥ janānām

original: RV_1,025.14c na devam abhimātayaḥ //
analyzed: na devam abhimātayaḥ

original: RV_1,025.15a uta yo mānuṣeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā /
analyzed: uta yaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā

original: RV_1,025.15c asmākam udareṣv ā //
analyzed: asmākam udareṣu ā

original: RV_1,025.16a parā me yanti dhītayo gāvo na gavyūtīr anu /
analyzed: parā me yanti dhītayaḥ gāvaḥ na gavyūtīḥ anu

original: RV_1,025.16c icchantīr urucakṣasam //
analyzed: icchantīḥ uru cakṣasam

original: RV_1,025.17a saṃ nu vocāvahai punar yato me madhv ābhṛtam /
analyzed: sam nu vocāvahai punar yatas me madhu ābhṛtam

original: RV_1,025.17c hoteva kṣadase priyam //
analyzed: hotā iva kṣadase priyam

original: RV_1,025.18a darśaṃ nu viśvadarśataṃ darśaṃ ratham adhi kṣami /
analyzed: darśam nu viśva darśatam darśam ratham adhi kṣami

original: RV_1,025.18c etā juṣata me giraḥ //
analyzed: etāḥ juṣata me giraḥ

original: RV_1,025.19a imam me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḷaya /
analyzed: imam me varuṇa śrudhi havam adyā ca mṛḍaya

original: RV_1,025.19c tvām avasyur ā cake //
analyzed: tvām avasyuḥ ā cake

original: RV_1,025.20a tvaṃ viśvasya medhira divaś ca gmaś ca rājasi /
analyzed: tvam viśvasya medhira divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca rājasi

original: RV_1,025.20c sa yāmani prati śrudhi //
analyzed: sa yāmani prati śrudhi

original: RV_1,025.21a ud uttamam mumugdhi no vi pāśam madhyamaṃ cṛta /
analyzed: ud uttamam mumugdhi naḥ vi pāśam madhyamam cṛta

original: RV_1,025.21c avādhamāni jīvase //
analyzed: ava adhamāni jīvase

original: RV_1,026.01a vasiṣvā hi miyedhya vastrāṇy ūrjām pate /
analyzed: vasiṣva hi miyedhya vastrāṇi ūrjām pate

original: RV_1,026.01c semaṃ no adhvaraṃ yaja //
analyzed: sā imam naḥ adhvaram yaja

original: RV_1,026.02a ni no hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ /
analyzed: ni naḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,026.02c agne divitmatā vacaḥ //
analyzed: agne divitmatā vacaḥ

original: RV_1,026.03a ā hi ṣmā sūnave pitāpir yajaty āpaye /
analyzed: ā hi sma sūnave pitā āpiḥ yajati āpaye

original: RV_1,026.03c sakhā sakhye vareṇyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhā sakhye vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_1,026.04a ā no barhī riśādaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: ā naḥ barhīḥ riśādasaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_1,026.04c sīdantu manuṣo yathā //
analyzed: sīdantu manuṣaḥ yathā

original: RV_1,026.05a pūrvya hotar asya no mandasva sakhyasya ca /
analyzed: pūrvya hotar asya naḥ mandasva sakhyasya ca

original: RV_1,026.05c imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ u su śrudhi giraḥ

original: RV_1,026.06a yac cid dhi śaśvatā tanā devaṃ-devaṃ yajāmahe /
analyzed: yat cit hi śaśvatā tanā devaṃdevam yajāmahe

original: RV_1,026.06c tve id dhūyate haviḥ //
analyzed: tve id dhūyate haviḥ

original: RV_1,026.07a priyo no astu viśpatir hotā mandro vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: priyaḥ naḥ astu viśpatiḥ hotā mandraḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_1,026.07c priyāḥ svagnayo vayam //
analyzed: priyāḥ su agnayaḥ vayam

original: RV_1,026.08a svagnayo hi vāryaṃ devāso dadhire ca naḥ /
analyzed: su agnayaḥ hi vāryam devāsaḥ dadhire ca naḥ

original: RV_1,026.08c svagnayo manāmahe //
analyzed: su agnayaḥ manāmahe

original: RV_1,026.09a athā na ubhayeṣām amṛta martyānām /
analyzed: athā naḥ ubhayeṣām amṛta martyānām

original: RV_1,026.09c mithaḥ santu praśastayaḥ //
analyzed: mithas santu praśastayaḥ

original: RV_1,026.10a viśvebhir agne agnibhir imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ agne agnibhiḥ imam yajñam idam vacaḥ

original: RV_1,026.10c cano dhāḥ sahaso yaho //
analyzed: canaḥ dhāḥ sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_1,027.01a aśvaṃ na tvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā agniṃ namobhiḥ /
analyzed: aśvam na tvā vāravantam vandadhyāḥ agnim namobhiḥ

original: RV_1,027.01c samrājantam adhvarāṇām //
analyzed: samrājantam adhvarāṇām

original: RV_1,027.02a sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ /
analyzed: sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthu pragāmā su śevaḥ

original: RV_1,027.02c mīḍhvāṃ asmākam babhūyāt //
analyzed: mīḍhvām asmākam babhūyāt

original: RV_1,027.03a sa no dūrāc cāsāc ca ni martyād aghāyoḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ dūrāt ca āsāt ca ni martyāt aghāyoḥ

original: RV_1,027.03c pāhi sadam id viśvāyuḥ //
analyzed: pāhi sadam id viśvāyuḥ

original: RV_1,027.04a imam ū ṣu tvam asmākaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navyāṃsam /
analyzed: imam u su tvam asmākam sanim gāyatram navyāṃsam

original: RV_1,027.04c agne deveṣu pra vocaḥ //
analyzed: agne deveṣu pra vocaḥ

original: RV_1,027.05a ā no bhaja parameṣv ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhaja parameṣu ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu

original: RV_1,027.05c śikṣā vasvo antamasya //
analyzed: śikṣa vasvaḥ antamasya

original: RV_1,027.06a vibhaktāsi citrabhāno sindhor ūrmā upāka ā /
analyzed: vibhaktā asi citrabhāno sindhoḥ ūrmau upāke ā

original: RV_1,027.06c sadyo dāśuṣe kṣarasi //
analyzed: sadyas dāśuṣe kṣarasi

original: RV_1,027.07a yam agne pṛtsu martyam avā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ /
analyzed: yam agne pṛtsu martyam avāḥ vājeṣu yam junāḥ

original: RV_1,027.07c sa yantā śaśvatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: sa yantā śaśvatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_1,027.08a nakir asya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit /
analyzed: nakir asya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit

original: RV_1,027.08c vājo asti śravāyyaḥ //
analyzed: vājaḥ asti śravāyyaḥ

original: RV_1,027.09a sa vājaṃ viśvacarṣaṇir arvadbhir astu tarutā /
analyzed: sa vājam viśvacarṣaṇiḥ arvadbhiḥ astu tarutā

original: RV_1,027.09c viprebhir astu sanitā //
analyzed: viprebhiḥ astu sanitā

original: RV_1,027.10a jarābodha tad viviḍḍhi viśe-viśe yajñiyāya /
analyzed: jarā bodha tat viviḍḍhi viśeviśe yajñiyāya

original: RV_1,027.10c stomaṃ rudrāya dṛśīkam //
analyzed: stomam rudrāya dṛśīkam

original: RV_1,027.11a sa no mahāṃ animāno dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ /
analyzed: sa naḥ mahān animānaḥ dhūma ketuḥ puru ścandraḥ

original: RV_1,027.11c dhiye vājāya hinvatu //
analyzed: dhiye vājāya hinvatu

original: RV_1,027.12a sa revāṃ iva viśpatir daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ /
analyzed: sa revān iva viśpatiḥ daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_1,027.12c ukthair agnir bṛhadbhānuḥ //
analyzed: ukthaiḥ agniḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ

original: RV_1,027.13a namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ namaḥ arbhakebhyaḥ namaḥ yuvabhyaḥ namaḥ āśinebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,027.13c yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ //
analyzed: yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ

original: RV_1,028.01a yatra grāvā pṛthubudhna ūrdhvo bhavati sotave /
analyzed: yatra grāvā pṛthu budhnaḥ ūrdhvaḥ bhavati sotave

original: RV_1,028.01c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
analyzed: ulūkhala sutānām avet u indra jalgulaḥ

original: RV_1,028.02a yatra dvāv iva jaghanādhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā /
analyzed: yatra dvau iva jaghanā adhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā

original: RV_1,028.02c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
analyzed: ulūkhala sutānām avet u indra jalgulaḥ

original: RV_1,028.03a yatra nāry apacyavam upacyavaṃ ca śikṣate /
analyzed: yatra nārī apacyavam upacyavam ca śikṣate

original: RV_1,028.03c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
analyzed: ulūkhala sutānām avet u indra jalgulaḥ

original: RV_1,028.04a yatra manthāṃ vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavā iva /
analyzed: yatra manthām vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavai iva

original: RV_1,028.04c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
analyzed: ulūkhala sutānām avet u indra jalgulaḥ

original: RV_1,028.05a yac cid dhi tvaṃ gṛhe-gṛha ulūkhalaka yujyase /
analyzed: yat cit hi tvam gṛhe gṛhe ulūkhalaka yujyase

original: RV_1,028.05c iha dyumattamaṃ vada jayatām iva dundubhiḥ //
analyzed: iha dyumattamam vada jayatām iva dundubhiḥ

original: RV_1,028.06a uta sma te vanaspate vāto vi vāty agram it /
analyzed: uta sma te vanaspate vātaḥ vi vāti agram id

original: RV_1,028.06c atho indrāya pātave sunu somam ulūkhala //
analyzed: atho indrāya pātave sunu somam ulūkhala

original: RV_1,028.07a āyajī vājasātamā tā hy uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: āyajī vāja sātamā tā hi uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,028.07c harī ivāndhāṃsi bapsatā //
analyzed: harī iva andhāṃsi bapsatā

original: RV_1,028.08a tā no adya vanaspatī ṛṣvāv ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: tā naḥ adya vanaspatī ṛṣvau ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,028.08c indrāya madhumat sutam //
analyzed: indrāya madhumat sutam

original: RV_1,028.09a uc chiṣṭaṃ camvor bhara somam pavitra ā sṛja /
analyzed: ud śiṣṭam camvoḥ bhara somam pavitre ā sṛja

original: RV_1,028.09c ni dhehi gor adhi tvaci //
analyzed: ni dhehi goḥ adhi tvaci

original: RV_1,029.01a yac cid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi /
analyzed: yat cit hi satya soma pāḥ anāśastāḥ iva smasi

original: RV_1,029.01c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.02a śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā /
analyzed: śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā

original: RV_1,029.02c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.03a ni ṣvāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām abudhyamāne /
analyzed: ni ṣvāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām a budhyamāne

original: RV_1,029.03c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.04a sasantu tyā arātayo bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ /
analyzed: sasantu tyāḥ arātayaḥ bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ

original: RV_1,029.04c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.05a sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam pāpayāmuyā /
analyzed: sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam pāpayā amuyā

original: RV_1,029.05c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.06a patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūraṃ vāto vanād adhi /
analyzed: patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūram vātaḥ vanāt adhi

original: RV_1,029.06c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,029.07a sarvam parikrośaṃ jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam /
analyzed: sarvam parikrośam jahi jambhaya kṛkadāśvam

original: RV_1,029.07c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
analyzed: ā tū naḥ indra śaṃsaya goṣu aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha

original: RV_1,030.01a ā va indraṃ kriviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum /
analyzed: ā vaḥ indram krivim yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum

original: RV_1,030.01c maṃhiṣṭhaṃ siñca indubhiḥ //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham siñce indubhiḥ

original: RV_1,030.02a śataṃ vā yaḥ śucīnāṃ sahasraṃ vā samāśirām /
analyzed: śatam vā yaḥ śucīnām sahasram vā samāśirām

original: RV_1,030.02c ed u nimnaṃ na rīyate //
analyzed: ā id u nimnam na rīyate

original: RV_1,030.03a saṃ yan madāya śuṣmiṇa enā hy asyodare /
analyzed: sam yat madāya śuṣmiṇe enā hi asya udare

original: RV_1,030.03c samudro na vyaco dadhe //
analyzed: samudraḥ na vyacaḥ dadhe

original: RV_1,030.04a ayam u te sam atasi kapota iva garbhadhim /
analyzed: ayam u te sam atasi kapotaḥ iva garbhadhim

original: RV_1,030.04c vacas tac cin na ohase //
analyzed: vacaḥ tat cit naḥ ohase

original: RV_1,030.05a stotraṃ rādhānām pate girvāho vīra yasya te /
analyzed: stotram rādhānām pate gir vāhaḥ vīra yasya te

original: RV_1,030.05c vibhūtir astu sūnṛtā //
analyzed: vibhūtiḥ astu sūnṛtā

original: RV_1,030.06a ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā na ūtaye 'smin vāje śatakrato /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ tiṣṭha naḥ ūtaye smin vāje śatakrato

original: RV_1,030.06c sam anyeṣu bravāvahai //
analyzed: sam anyeṣu bravāvahai

original: RV_1,030.07a yoge-yoge tavastaraṃ vāje-vāje havāmahe /
analyzed: yoge yoge tavastaram vāje vāje havāmahe

original: RV_1,030.07c sakhāya indram ūtaye //
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye

original: RV_1,030.08a ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhir ūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: ā ghā gamat yadi śravat sahasriṇībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,030.08c vājebhir upa no havam //
analyzed: vājebhiḥ upa naḥ havam

original: RV_1,030.09a anu pratnasyaukaso huve tuvipratiṃ naram /
analyzed: anu pratnasya okasaḥ huve tuvi pratim naram

original: RV_1,030.09c yaṃ te pūrvam pitā huve //
analyzed: yam te pūrvam pitā huve

original: RV_1,030.10a taṃ tvā vayaṃ viśvavārā śāsmahe puruhūta /
analyzed: tam tvā vayam viśva vārā śāsmahe puruhūta

original: RV_1,030.10c sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_1,030.11a asmākaṃ śipriṇīnāṃ somapāḥ somapāvnām /
analyzed: asmākam śipriṇīnām soma pāḥ soma pāvnām

original: RV_1,030.11c sakhe vajrin sakhīnām //
analyzed: sakhe vajrin sakhīnām

original: RV_1,030.12a tathā tad astu somapāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu /
analyzed: tathā tat astu soma pāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu

original: RV_1,030.12c yathā ta uśmasīṣṭaye //
analyzed: yathā te uśmasi iṣṭaye

original: RV_1,030.13a revatīr naḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ /
analyzed: revatīḥ naḥ sadhamādaḥ indre santu tuvi vājāḥ

original: RV_1,030.13c kṣumanto yābhir madema //
analyzed: kṣumantaḥ yābhiḥ madema

original: RV_1,030.14a ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇav iyānaḥ /
analyzed: ā gha tvāvān tmanā āpta stotṛbhyaḥ dhṛṣṇo iyānaḥ

original: RV_1,030.14c ṛṇor akṣaṃ na cakryoḥ //
analyzed: ṛṇoḥ akṣam na cakryoḥ

original: RV_1,030.15a ā yad duvaḥ śatakratav ā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām /
analyzed: ā yat duvaḥ śatakrato ā kāmam jaritṝṇām

original: RV_1,030.15c ṛṇor akṣaṃ na śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: ṛṇoḥ akṣam na śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,030.16a śaśvad indraḥ popruthadbhir jigāya nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhir dhanāni /
analyzed: śaśvat indraḥ popruthadbhiḥ jigāya nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhiḥ dhanāni

original: RV_1,030.16c sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no 'dāt //
analyzed: sa naḥ hiraṇya ratham daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa naḥ dāt

original: RV_1,030.17a āśvināv aśvāvatyeṣā yātaṃ śavīrayā /
analyzed: āśvinau yātam śavīrayā

original: RV_1,030.17c gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat //
analyzed: gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat

original: RV_1,030.18a samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāv amartyaḥ /
analyzed: samāna yojanaḥ hi vām rathaḥ dasrau amartyaḥ

original: RV_1,030.18c samudre aśvineyate //
analyzed: samudre aśvinā īyate

original: RV_1,030.19a ny aghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ /
analyzed: ni aghnyasya mūrdhani cakram rathasya yemathuḥ

original: RV_1,030.19c pari dyām anyad īyate //
analyzed: pari dyām anyat īyate

original: RV_1,030.20a kas ta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye /
analyzed: kaḥ te uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje martaḥ amartye

original: RV_1,030.20c kaṃ nakṣase vibhāvari //
analyzed: kam nakṣase vibhāvari

original: RV_1,030.21a vayaṃ hi te amanmahy āntād ā parākāt /
analyzed: vayam hi te amanmahi ā antāt ā parākāt

original: RV_1,030.21c aśve na citre aruṣi //
analyzed: aśve na citre aruṣi

original: RV_1,030.22a tvaṃ tyebhir ā gahi vājebhir duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: tvam tyebhiḥ ā gahi vājebhiḥ duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_1,030.22c asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya //
analyzed: asme rayim ni dhāraya

original: RV_1,031.01a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣir devo devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirāḥ ṛṣiḥ devaḥ devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_1,031.01c tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso 'jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: tava vrate kavayaḥ vidmana apasaḥ jāyanta marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,031.02a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavir devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam /
analyzed: tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ kaviḥ devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam

original: RV_1,031.02c vibhur viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cid āyave //
analyzed: vibhuḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiraḥ dvi mātā śayuḥ katidhā cit āyave

original: RV_1,031.03a tvam agne prathamo mātariśvana āvir bhava sukratūyā vivasvate /
analyzed: tvam agne prathamaḥ mātariśvane āvis bhava sukratūyā vivasvate

original: RV_1,031.03c arejetāṃ rodasī hotṛvūrye 'saghnor bhāram ayajo maho vaso //
analyzed: arejetām rodasī hotṛ vūrye saghnoḥ bhāram ayajaḥ mahaḥ vaso

original: RV_1,031.04a tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase su kṛte sukṛttaraḥ

original: RV_1,031.04c śvātreṇa yat pitror mucyase pary ā tvā pūrvam anayann āparam punaḥ //
analyzed: śvātreṇa yat pitroḥ mucyase pari ā tvā pūrvam anayan ā aparam punar

original: RV_1,031.05a tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭivardhana udyatasruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭi vardhanaḥ udyata sruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ

original: RV_1,031.05c ya āhutim pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtim ekāyur agre viśa āvivāsasi //
analyzed: yaḥ āhutim pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtim eka āyuḥ agre viśaḥ āvivāsasi

original: RV_1,031.06a tvam agne vṛjinavartaniṃ naraṃ sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: tvam agne vṛjina vartanim naram sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_1,031.06c yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiś cit samṛtā haṃsi bhūyasaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiḥ cit samṛtā haṃsi bhūyasaḥ

original: RV_1,031.07a tvaṃ tam agne amṛtatva uttame martaṃ dadhāsi śravase dive-dive /
analyzed: tvam tam agne amṛta tve uttame martam dadhāsi śravase dive dive

original: RV_1,031.07c yas tātṛṣāṇa ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi praya ā ca sūraye //
analyzed: yaḥ tātṛṣāṇaḥ ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi prayaḥ ā ca sūraye

original: RV_1,031.08a tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne sanaye dhanānām yaśasam kārum kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ

original: RV_1,031.08c ṛdhyāma karmāpasā navena devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
analyzed: ṛdhyāma karma apasā navena devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_1,031.09a tvaṃ no agne pitror upastha ā devo deveṣv anavadya jāgṛviḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne pitroḥ upasthe ā devaḥ deveṣu anavadya jāgṛviḥ

original: RV_1,031.09c tanūkṛd bodhi pramatiś ca kārave tvaṃ kalyāṇa vasu viśvam opiṣe //
analyzed: tanū kṛt bodhi pramatiḥ ca kārave tvam kalyāṇa vasu viśvam opiṣe

original: RV_1,031.10a tvam agne pramatis tvam pitāsi nas tvaṃ vayaskṛt tava jāmayo vayam /
analyzed: tvam agne pramatiḥ tvam pitā asi naḥ tvam vayaskṛt tava jāmayaḥ vayam

original: RV_1,031.10c saṃ tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ saṃ sahasriṇaḥ suvīraṃ yanti vratapām adābhya //
analyzed: sam tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ sam sahasriṇaḥ su vīram yanti vrata pām adābhya

original: RV_1,031.11a tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave devā akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim /
analyzed: tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave devāḥ akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim

original: RV_1,031.11c iḷām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm pitur yat putro mamakasya jāyate //
analyzed: iḷām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm pituḥ yat putraḥ mamakasya jāyate

original: RV_1,031.12a tvaṃ no agne tava deva pāyubhir maghono rakṣa tanvaś ca vandya /
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne tava deva pāyubhiḥ maghonaḥ rakṣa tanvaḥ ca vandya

original: RV_1,031.12c trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asy animeṣaṃ rakṣamāṇas tava vrate //
analyzed: trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asi animeṣam rakṣamāṇaḥ tava vrate

original: RV_1,031.13a tvam agne yajyave pāyur antaro 'niṣaṅgāya caturakṣa idhyase /
analyzed: tvam agne yajyave pāyuḥ antaraḥ niṣaṅgāya catur akṣaḥ idhyase

original: RV_1,031.13c yo rātahavyo 'vṛkāya dhāyase kīreś cin mantram manasā vanoṣi tam //
analyzed: yaḥ rāta havyaḥ vṛkāya dhāyase kīreḥ cit mantram manasā vanoṣi tam

original: RV_1,031.14a tvam agna uruśaṃsāya vāghate spārhaṃ yad rekṇaḥ paramaṃ vanoṣi tat /
analyzed: tvam agne uru śaṃsāya vāghate spārham yat rekṇaḥ paramam vanoṣi tat

original: RV_1,031.14c ādhrasya cit pramatir ucyase pitā pra pākaṃ śāssi pra diśo viduṣṭaraḥ //
analyzed: ādhrasya cit pramatiḥ ucyase pitā pra pākam śāssi pra diśaḥ viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_1,031.15a tvam agne prayatadakṣiṇaṃ naraṃ varmeva syūtam pari pāsi viśvataḥ /
analyzed: tvam agne prayata dakṣiṇam naram varma iva syūtam pari pāsi viśvatas

original: RV_1,031.15c svādukṣadmā yo vasatau syonakṛj jīvayājaṃ yajate sopamā divaḥ //
