analyzed: svādu kṣadmā yaḥ vasatau syona kṛt jīva yājam yajate saḥ upamā divaḥ

original: RV_1,031.16a imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣo na imam adhvānaṃ yam agāma dūrāt /
analyzed: imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣaḥ naḥ imam adhvānam yam agāma dūrāt

original: RV_1,031.16c āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām bhṛmir asy ṛṣikṛn martyānām //
analyzed: āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām bhṛmiḥ asi ṛṣi kṛt martyānām

original: RV_1,031.17a manuṣvad agne aṅgirasvad aṅgiro yayātivat sadane pūrvavac chuce /
analyzed: manuṣvat agne aṅgirasvat aṅgiraḥ yayāti vat sadane pūrvavat śuce

original: RV_1,031.17c accha yāhy ā vahā daivyaṃ janam ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam //
analyzed: accha yāhi ā vaha daivyam janam ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam

original: RV_1,031.18a etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā /
analyzed: etena agne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛma vidā vā

original: RV_1,031.18c uta pra ṇeṣy abhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā //
analyzed: uta pra neṣi abhi vasyaḥ asmān sam naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā

original: RV_1,032.01a indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī /
analyzed: indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocam yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī

original: RV_1,032.01c ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām //
analyzed: ahan ahim anu apaḥ tatarda pra vakṣaṇāḥ abhinat parvatānām

original: RV_1,032.02a ahann ahim parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa /
analyzed: ahan ahim parvate śiśriyāṇam tvaṣṭā asmai vajram svaryam tatakṣa

original: RV_1,032.02c vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ //
analyzed: vāśrāḥ iva dhenavaḥ syandamānāḥ añjas samudram ava jagmuḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_1,032.03a vṛṣāyamāṇo 'vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya /
analyzed: vṛṣāyamāṇaḥ vṛṇīta somam trikadrukeṣu apibat sutasya

original: RV_1,032.03c ā sāyakam maghavādatta vajram ahann enam prathamajām ahīnām //
analyzed: ā sāyakam maghavā adatta vajram ahan enam prathama jām ahīnām

original: RV_1,032.04a yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ /
analyzed: yat indra ahan prathama jām ahīnām āt māyinām amināḥ pra uta māyāḥ

original: RV_1,032.04c āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse //
analyzed: āt sūryam janayan dyām uṣāsam tādītnā śatrum na kila vivitse

original: RV_1,032.05a ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena /
analyzed: ahan vṛtram vṛtrataram vyaṃsam indraḥ vajreṇa mahatā vadhena

original: RV_1,032.05c skandhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇāhiḥ śayata upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: skandhāṃsi iva kuliśena vivṛkṇā ahiḥ śayate upapṛc pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_1,032.06a ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tuvibādham ṛjīṣam /
analyzed: a yoddhā iva durmadaḥ ā hi juhve mahā vīram tuvi bādham ṛjīṣam

original: RV_1,032.06c nātārīd asya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ //
analyzed: na atārīt asya samṛtim vadhānām sam rujā anāḥ pipiṣe indra śatruḥ

original: RV_1,032.07a apād ahasto apṛtanyad indram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna /
analyzed: a pād a hastaḥ apṛtanyat indram ā asya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna

original: RV_1,032.07c vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtraḥ aśayat vyastaḥ

original: RV_1,032.08a nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānam mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ /
analyzed: nadam na bhinnam amuyā śayānam manaḥ ruhāṇāḥ ati yanti āpaḥ

original: RV_1,032.08c yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva //
analyzed: yāḥ cit vṛtraḥ mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīḥ babhūva

original: RV_1,032.09a nīcāvayā abhavad vṛtraputrendro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra /
analyzed: nīcā vayāḥ abhavat vṛtra putrā indraḥ asyai ava vadhar jabhāra

original: RV_1,032.09c uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ //
analyzed: uttarā sūḥ adharaḥ putraḥ āsīt dānuḥ śaye saha vatsā na dhenuḥ

original: RV_1,032.10a atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānām madhye nihitaṃ śarīram /
analyzed: a tiṣṭhantīnām a niveśanānām kāṣṭhānām madhye nihitam śarīram

original: RV_1,032.10c vṛtrasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ //
analyzed: vṛtrasya niṇyam vi caranti āpaḥ dīrgham tamaḥ ā aśayat indra śatruḥ

original: RV_1,032.11a dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ /
analyzed: dāsa patnīḥ ahi gopāḥ atiṣṭhat niruddhāḥ āpaḥ paṇinā iva gāvaḥ

original: RV_1,032.11c apām bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ apa tad vavāra //
analyzed: apām bilam apihitam yat āsīt vṛtram jaghanvām apa tat vavāra

original: RV_1,032.12a aśvyo vāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ /
analyzed: aśvyaḥ vāraḥ abhavaḥ tat indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_1,032.12c ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn //
analyzed: ajayaḥ gāḥ ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn

original: RV_1,032.13a nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirad dhrāduniṃ ca /
analyzed: na asmai vidyut na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirat hrādunim ca

original: RV_1,032.13c indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś cotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye //
analyzed: indraḥ ca yat yuyudhāte ahiḥ ca uta aparībhyaḥ maghavā vi jigye

original: RV_1,032.14a aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat /
analyzed: aheḥ yātāram kam apaśyaḥ indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣaḥ bhīḥ agacchat

original: RV_1,032.14c nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi //
analyzed: nava ca yat navatim ca sravantīḥ śyenaḥ na bhītaḥ ataraḥ rajāṃsi

original: RV_1,032.15a indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ yātaḥ vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇaḥ vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_1,032.15c sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva //
analyzed: sa id u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arāt na nemiḥ pari tāḥ babhūva

original: RV_1,033.01a etāyāmopa gavyanta indram asmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti /
analyzed: eta āyāma upa gavyantaḥ indram asmākam su pramatim vāvṛdhāti

original: RV_1,033.01c anāmṛṇaḥ kuvid ād asya rāyo gavāṃ ketam param āvarjate naḥ //
analyzed: anāmṛṇaḥ kuvid āt asya rāyaḥ gavām ketam param āvarjate naḥ

original: RV_1,033.02a uped ahaṃ dhanadām apratītaṃ juṣṭāṃ na śyeno vasatim patāmi /
analyzed: upa id aham dhana dām apratītam juṣṭām na śyenaḥ vasatim patāmi

original: RV_1,033.02c indraṃ namasyann upamebhir arkair ya stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman //
analyzed: indram namasyan upamebhiḥ arkaiḥ ya stotṛbhyaḥ havyaḥ asti yāman

original: RV_1,033.03a ni sarvasena iṣudhīṃr asakta sam aryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi /
analyzed: ni sarva senaḥ iṣudhīṃr asakta sam aryaḥ gāḥ ajati yasya vaṣṭi

original: RV_1,033.03c coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇir bhūr asmad adhi pravṛddha //
analyzed: coṣkūyamāṇaḥ indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇiḥ bhūḥ asmat adhi pravṛddha

original: RV_1,033.04a vadhīr hi dasyuṃ dhaninaṃ ghanenaṃ ekaś carann upaśākebhir indra /
analyzed: vadhīḥ hi dasyum dhaninam ghanenaṃ ekaḥ caran upaśākebhiḥ indra

original: RV_1,033.04c dhanor adhi viṣuṇak te vy āyann ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ //
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi viṣuṇak te vi āyan ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ

original: RV_1,033.05a parā cic chīrṣā vavṛjus ta indrāyajvāno yajvabhi spardhamānāḥ /
analyzed: parā cit śīrṣā vavṛjuḥ te indra ayajvānaḥ yajvabhi spardhamānāḥ

original: RV_1,033.05c pra yad divo hariva sthātar ugra nir avratāṃ adhamo rodasyoḥ //
analyzed: pra yat divaḥ harivas sthātar ugra niḥ avratān adhamaḥ rodasyoḥ

original: RV_1,033.06a ayuyutsann anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayo navagvāḥ /
analyzed: ayuyutsan anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_1,033.06c vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhir indrāc citayanta āyan //
analyzed: vṛṣāyudhaḥ na vadhrayaḥ niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhiḥ indrāt citayantaḥ āyan

original: RV_1,033.07a tvam etān rudato jakṣataś cāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre /
analyzed: tvam etān rudataḥ jakṣataḥ ca ayodhayaḥ rajasaḥ indra pāre

original: RV_1,033.07c avādaho diva ā dasyum uccā pra sunvata stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ //
analyzed: avādahaḥ divaḥ ā dasyum uccā pra sunvata stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ

original: RV_1,033.08a cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ /
analyzed: cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyāḥ hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_1,033.08c na hinvānāsas titirus ta indram pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa //
analyzed: na hinvānāsaḥ titiruḥ te indram pari spaśaḥ adadhāt sūryeṇa

original: RV_1,033.09a pari yad indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīr mahinā viśvataḥ sīm /
analyzed: pari yat indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīḥ mahinā viśvatas sīm

original: RV_1,033.09c amanyamānāṃ abhi manyamānair nir brahmabhir adhamo dasyum indra //
analyzed: a manyamānām abhi manyamānaiḥ niḥ brahmabhiḥ adhamaḥ dasyum indra

original: RV_1,033.10a na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antam āpur na māyābhir dhanadām paryabhūvan /
analyzed: na ye divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ antam āpuḥ na māyābhiḥ dhana dām paryabhūvan

original: RV_1,033.10c yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaś cakra indro nir jyotiṣā tamaso gā adukṣat //
analyzed: yujam vajram vṛṣabhaḥ cakre indraḥ niḥ jyotiṣā tamasaḥ gāḥ adukṣat

original: RV_1,033.11a anu svadhām akṣarann āpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām /
analyzed: anu svadhām akṣaran āpaḥ asya avardhata madhye ā nāvyānām

original: RV_1,033.11c sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhann abhi dyūn //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indraḥ ojiṣṭhena hanmanā ahan abhi dyūn

original: RV_1,033.12a ny āvidhyad ilībiśasya dṛḷhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinac chuṣṇam indraḥ /
analyzed: ni āvidhyat ilībiśasya dṛḷhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinat śuṣṇam indraḥ

original: RV_1,033.12c yāvat taro maghavan yāvad ojo vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum //
analyzed: yāvat taraḥ maghavan yāvat ojaḥ vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum

original: RV_1,033.13a abhi sidhmo ajigād asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puro 'bhet /
analyzed: abhi sidhmaḥ ajigāt asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇa puraḥ bhet

original: RV_1,033.13c saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirac chāśadānaḥ //
analyzed: sam vajreṇa asṛjat vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirat śāśadānaḥ

original: RV_1,033.14a āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
analyzed: āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmin cākan prāvaḥ yudhyantam vṛṣabham daśadyum

original: RV_1,033.14c śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau //
analyzed: śapha cyutaḥ reṇuḥ nakṣata dyām ud śvaitreyaḥ nṛṣāhyāya tasthau

original: RV_1,033.15a āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañ chvitryaṃ gām /
analyzed: āvaḥ śamam vṛṣabham tugryāsu kṣetra jeṣe maghavan śvitryam gām

original: RV_1,033.15c jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañ chatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ //
analyzed: jyok cit atra tasthivāṃsaḥ akram śatrūyatām adharā vedanā akaḥ

original: RV_1,034.01a triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā /
analyzed: tris cit naḥ adya bhavatam navedasā vibhuḥ vām yāmaḥ uta rātiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_1,034.01c yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso 'bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi yantram himyā iva vāsasaḥ bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_1,034.02a trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id viduḥ /
analyzed: trayaḥ pavayaḥ madhu vāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśve id viduḥ

original: RV_1,034.02c traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v aśvinā divā //
analyzed: traya skambhāsa skabhitāsaḥ ārabhe tris naktam yāthaḥ tris u aśvinā divā

original: RV_1,034.03a samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam /
analyzed: samāne ahan tris avadya gohanā tris adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam

original: RV_1,034.03c trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca pinvatam //
analyzed: tris vājavatīḥ iṣaḥ aśvinā yuvam doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaḥ ca pinvatam

original: RV_1,034.04a trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvye tredheva śikṣatam /
analyzed: tris vartiḥ yātam tris anuvrate jane tris suprāvye tredhā iva śikṣatam

original: RV_1,034.04c trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva pinvatam //
analyzed: tris nāndyam vahatam aśvinā yuvam tris pṛkṣaḥ asme akṣarā iva pinvatam

original: RV_1,034.05a trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir utāvataṃ dhiyaḥ /
analyzed: tris naḥ rayim vahatam aśvinā yuvam tris devatātā tris uta avatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_1,034.05c triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre duhitā ruhad ratham //
analyzed: tris saubhaga tvam tris uta śravāṃsi naḥ triṣṭham vām sūraḥ duhitā ruhat ratham

original: RV_1,034.06a trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ /
analyzed: tris naḥ aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā tris pārthivāni tris u dattam adbhyaḥ

original: RV_1,034.06c omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī //
analyzed: omānam śaṃyoḥ mamakāya sūnave tri dhātu śarma vahatam śubhaḥ patī

original: RV_1,034.07a trir no aśvinā yajatā dive-dive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam /
analyzed: tris naḥ aśvinā yajatā dive dive pari tri dhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam

original: RV_1,034.07c tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam //
analyzed: tisraḥ nāsatyā rathyā parāvataḥ ātmā iva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam

original: RV_1,034.08a trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam /
analyzed: tris aśvinā sindhubhiḥ sapta mātṛbhiḥ trayaḥ āhāvāḥ tredhā haviḥ kṛtam

original: RV_1,034.08c tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam //
analyzed: tisraḥ pṛthivīḥ upari pravā divaḥ nākam rakṣethe dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ hitam

original: RV_1,034.09a kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ /
analyzed: kva trī cakrā trivṛtaḥ rathasya kva trayaḥ vandhuraḥ ye sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_1,034.09c kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ //
analyzed: kadā yogaḥ vājinaḥ rāsabhasya yena yajñam nāsatyā upayāthaḥ

original: RV_1,034.10a ā nāsatyā gacchataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ /
analyzed: ā nāsatyā gacchatam hūyate haviḥ madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhiḥ āsabhiḥ

original: RV_1,034.10c yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati //
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi pūrvam savitā uṣasaḥ ratham ṛtāya citram ghṛtavantam iṣyati

original: RV_1,034.11a ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā /
analyzed: ā nāsatyā tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha devebhiḥ yātam madhu peyam aśvinā

original: RV_1,034.11c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
analyzed: pra āyuḥ tāriṣṭam niḥ rapāṃsi mṛkṣatam sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā

original: RV_1,034.12a ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram /
analyzed: ā naḥ aśvinā trivṛtā rathena arvāñcam rayim vahatam su vīram

original: RV_1,034.12c śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
analyzed: śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau

original: RV_1,035.01a hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase /
analyzed: hvayāmi agnim prathamam svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇau iha avase

original: RV_1,035.01c hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
analyzed: hvayāmi rātrīm jagataḥ niveśanīm hvayāmi devam savitāram ūtaye

original: RV_1,035.02a ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca /
analyzed: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca

original: RV_1,035.02c hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
analyzed: hiraṇyayena savitā rathena ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan

original: RV_1,035.03a yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām /
analyzed: yāti devaḥ pravatā yāti udvatā yāti śubhrābhyām yajataḥ haribhyām

original: RV_1,035.03c ā devo yāti savitā parāvato 'pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ //
analyzed: ā devaḥ yāti savitā parāvataḥ pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ

original: RV_1,035.04a abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam /
analyzed: abhīvṛtam kṛśanaiḥ viśva rūpam hiraṇya śamyam yajataḥ bṛhantam

original: RV_1,035.04c āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ //
analyzed: āsthāt ratham savitā citra bhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīm dadhānaḥ

original: RV_1,035.05a vi janāñ chyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraugaṃ vahantaḥ /
analyzed: vi janām śyāvāḥ śiti pādaḥ akhyan ratham hiraṇyapraugam vahantaḥ

original: RV_1,035.05c śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: śaśvat viśaḥ savituḥ daivyasya upasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_1,035.06a tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ /
analyzed: tisraḥ dyāvaḥ savituḥ dvau upasthe ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāh

original: RV_1,035.06c āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat //
analyzed: āṇim na rathyam amṛtā adhi tasthuḥ iha bravītu yaḥ u tat ciketat

original: RV_1,035.07a vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ /
analyzed: vi suparṇaḥ antarikṣāṇi akhyat gabhīra vepāḥ asuraḥ su nīthaḥ

original: RV_1,035.07c kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna //
analyzed: kva idānīm sūryaḥ kaḥ ciketa katamām dyām raśmiḥ asya ā tatāna

original: RV_1,035.08a aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn /
analyzed: aṣṭau vi akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn

original: RV_1,035.08c hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: hiraṇya akṣaḥ savitā devaḥ āgāt dadhat ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_1,035.09a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate /
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇiḥ ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate

original: RV_1,035.09c apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti //
analyzed: apa amīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti

original: RV_1,035.10a hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ /
analyzed: hiraṇya hastaḥ asuraḥ su nīthaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ su avām yātu arvāṅ

original: RV_1,035.10c apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānān asthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: apasedhan rakṣasaḥ yātudhānān asthāt devaḥ pratidoṣam gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_1,035.11a ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe /
analyzed: ye te panthāḥ savitar pūrvyāsaḥ reṇavaḥ su kṛtāḥ antarikṣe

original: RV_1,035.11c tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ adya pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ rakṣā ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva

original: RV_1,036.01a pra vo yahvam purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām /
analyzed: pra vaḥ yahvam purūṇām viśām devayatīnām

original: RV_1,036.01c agniṃ sūktebhir vacobhir īmahe yaṃ sīm id anya īḷate //
analyzed: agnim sūktebhiḥ vacobhiḥ īmahe yam sīm id anye īḍate

original: RV_1,036.02a janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te /
analyzed: janāsaḥ agnim dadhire sahaḥ vṛdham haviṣmantaḥ vidhema te

original: RV_1,036.02c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ iha avitā bhava vājeṣu santya

original: RV_1,036.03a pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam /
analyzed: pra tvā dūtam vṛṇīmahe hotāram viśva vedasam

original: RV_1,036.03c mahas te sato vi caranty arcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ te sataḥ vi caranti arcayaḥ divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ

original: RV_1,036.04a devāsas tvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtam pratnam indhate /
analyzed: devāsaḥ tvā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā sam dūtam pratnam indhate

original: RV_1,036.04c viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yas te dadāśa martyaḥ //
analyzed: viśvam saḥ agne jayati tvayā dhanam yaḥ te dadāśa martyaḥ

original: RV_1,036.05a mandro hotā gṛhapatir agne dūto viśām asi /
analyzed: mandraḥ hotā gṛhapatiḥ agne dūtaḥ viśām asi

original: RV_1,036.05c tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata //
analyzed: tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: RV_1,036.06a tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ /
analyzed: tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ

original: RV_1,036.06c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ adya sumanāḥ uta aparam yakṣi devān su vīryā

original: RV_1,036.07a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
analyzed: tam gha īm itthā namasvinaḥ upa svarājam āsate

original: RV_1,036.07c hotrābhir agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ //
analyzed: hotrābhiḥ agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate titirvāṃsaḥ ati sridhaḥ

original: RV_1,036.08a ghnanto vṛtram ataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire /
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtram ataran rodasī apaḥ uru kṣayāya cakrire

original: RV_1,036.08c bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumny āhutaḥ krandad aśvo gaviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumnī āhutaḥ krandat aśvaḥ gaviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,036.09a saṃ sīdasva mahāṃ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ /
analyzed: sam sīdasva mahān asi śocasva deva vītamaḥ

original: RV_1,036.09c vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam //
analyzed: vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam

original: RV_1,036.10a yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhur iha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana /
analyzed: yam tvā devāsaḥ manave iha yajiṣṭham havyavāhana

original: RV_1,036.10c yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithir dhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ //
analyzed: yam kaṇvaḥ medhyātithiḥ dhana spṛtam yam vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ

original: RV_1,036.11a yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtād adhi /
analyzed: yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇvaḥ īdhe ṛtāt adhi

original: RV_1,036.11c tasya preṣo dīdiyus tam imā ṛcas tam agniṃ vardhayāmasi //
analyzed: tasya pra iṣaḥ dīdiyuḥ tam imāḥ ṛcaḥ tam agnim vardhayāmasi

original: RV_1,036.12a rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo 'sti hi te 'gne deveṣv āpyam /
analyzed: rāyaḥ pūrdhi svadhāvas sti hi te gne deveṣu āpyam

original: RV_1,036.12c tvaṃ vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahāṃ asi //
analyzed: tvam vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa naḥ mṛḍa mahān asi

original: RV_1,036.13a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ u su naḥ ūtaye tiṣṭha devaḥ na savitā

original: RV_1,036.13c ūrdhvo vājasya sanitā yad añjibhir vāghadbhir vihvayāmahe //
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ vājasya sanitā yat añjibhiḥ vāghadbhiḥ vihvayāmahe

original: RV_1,036.14a ūrdhvo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ ni ketunā viśvam sam atriṇam daha

original: RV_1,036.14c kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñ carathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ //
analyzed: kṛdhi naḥ ūrdhvām carathāya jīvase vida deveṣu naḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_1,036.15a pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrter arāvṇaḥ /
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrteḥ arāvṇaḥ

original: RV_1,036.15c pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: pāhi rīṣataḥ uta vā jighāṃsataḥ bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_1,036.16a ghaneva viṣvag vi jahy arāvṇas tapurjambha yo asmadhruk /
analyzed: ghanā iva viṣvak vi jahi arāvṇaḥ tapuḥ jambha yaḥ asmadhruk

original: RV_1,036.16c yo martyaḥ śiśīte aty aktubhir mā naḥ sa ripur īśata //
analyzed: yaḥ martyaḥ śiśīte ati aktubhiḥ mā naḥ sa ripuḥ īśata

original: RV_1,036.17a agnir vavne suvīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam /
analyzed: agniḥ vavne su vīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam

original: RV_1,036.17c agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithim agniḥ sātā upastutam //
analyzed: agniḥ prāvat mitrā uta medhyātithim agniḥ sātau upastutam

original: RV_1,036.18a agninā turvaśaṃ yadum parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe /
analyzed: agninā turvaśam yadum parāvataḥ ugrādevam havāmahe

original: RV_1,036.18c agnir nayan navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ nayat navavāstvam bṛhat ratham turvītim dasyave sahaḥ

original: RV_1,036.19a ni tvām agne manur dadhe jyotir janāya śaśvate /
analyzed: ni tvām agne manuḥ dadhe jyotiḥ janāya śaśvate

original: RV_1,036.19c dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: dīdetha kaṇve ṛta jātaḥ ukṣitaḥ yam namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,036.20a tveṣāso agner amavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye /
analyzed: tveṣāsaḥ agneḥ amavantaḥ arcayaḥ bhīmāsaḥ na pratītaye

original: RV_1,036.20c rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvato viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha //
analyzed: rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvataḥ viśvam sam atriṇam daha

original: RV_1,037.01a krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutam anarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham /
analyzed: krīḍam vaḥ śardhaḥ mārutam anarvāṇam ratheśubham

original: RV_1,037.01c kaṇvā abhi pra gāyata //
analyzed: kaṇvāḥ abhi pra gāyata

original: RV_1,037.02a ye pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākaṃ vāśībhir añjibhiḥ /
analyzed: ye pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākam vāśībhiḥ añjibhiḥ

original: RV_1,037.02c ajāyanta svabhānavaḥ //
analyzed: ajāyanta sva bhānavaḥ

original: RV_1,037.03a iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān /
analyzed: iha iva śṛṇve eṣām kaśāḥ hasteṣu yat vadān

original: RV_1,037.03c ni yāmañ citram ṛñjate //
analyzed: ni yāmam citram ṛñjate

original: RV_1,037.04a pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe /
analyzed: pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣa dyumnāya śuṣmiṇe

original: RV_1,037.04c devattam brahma gāyata //
analyzed: devattam brahma gāyata

original: RV_1,037.05a pra śaṃsā goṣv aghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yac chardho mārutam /
analyzed: pra śaṃsa goṣu aghnyam krīḍam yat śardhaḥ mārutam

original: RV_1,037.05c jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe //
analyzed: jambhe rasasya vāvṛdhe

original: RV_1,037.06a ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaś ca gmaś ca dhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ varṣiṣṭhaḥ ā naraḥ divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,037.06c yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha //
analyzed: yat sīm antam na dhūnutha

original: RV_1,037.07a ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave /
analyzed: ni vaḥ yāmāya mānuṣaḥ dadhre ugrāya manyave

original: RV_1,037.07c jihīta parvato giriḥ //
analyzed: jihīta parvataḥ giriḥ

original: RV_1,037.08a yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvān iva viśpatiḥ

original: RV_1,037.08c bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate //
analyzed: bhiyā yāmeṣu rejate

original: RV_1,037.09a sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave /
analyzed: sthiram hi jānam eṣām vayaḥ mātuḥ niretave

original: RV_1,037.09c yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ

original: RV_1,037.10a ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata /
analyzed: ud u tye sūnavaḥ giraḥ kāṣṭhāḥ ajmeṣu atnata

original: RV_1,037.10c vāśrā abhijñu yātave //
analyzed: vāśrāḥ abhijñu yātave

original: RV_1,037.11a tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram /
analyzed: tyam cit gha dīrgham pṛthum mihaḥ napātam amṛdhram

original: RV_1,037.11c pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,037.12a maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana /
analyzed: marutaḥ yat ha vaḥ balam janān acucyavītana

original: RV_1,037.12c girīṃr acucyavītana //
analyzed: girīṃr acucyavītana

original: RV_1,037.13a yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate 'dhvann ā /
analyzed: yat ha yānti marutaḥ sam ha bruvate dhvan ā

original: RV_1,037.13c śṛṇoti kaś cid eṣām //
analyzed: śṛṇoti kaḥ cit eṣām

original: RV_1,037.14a pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ /
analyzed: pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vaḥ duvaḥ

original: RV_1,037.14c tatro ṣu mādayādhvai //
analyzed: tatra u su mādayādhvai

original: RV_1,037.15a asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām /
analyzed: asti hi sma madāya vaḥ smasi sma vayam eṣām

original: RV_1,037.15c viśvaṃ cid āyur jīvase //
analyzed: viśvam cit āyuḥ jīvase

original: RV_1,038.01a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ /
analyzed: kad ha nūnam kadhapriyaḥ pitā putram na hastayoḥ

original: RV_1,038.01c dadhidhve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ //
analyzed: dadhidhve vṛkta barhiṣaḥ

original: RV_1,038.02a kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: kva nūnam kad vaḥ artham gantā divaḥ na pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_1,038.02c kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti //
analyzed: kva vaḥ gāvaḥ na raṇyanti

original: RV_1,038.03a kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā /
analyzed: kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā

original: RV_1,038.03c kvo viśvāni saubhagā //
analyzed: kva u viśvāni saubhagā

original: RV_1,038.04a yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana /
analyzed: yat yūyam pṛśni mātaraḥ martāsaḥ syātana

original: RV_1,038.04c stotā vo amṛtaḥ syāt //
analyzed: stotā vaḥ amṛtaḥ syāt

original: RV_1,038.05a mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ /
analyzed: mā vaḥ mṛgaḥ na yavase jaritā bhūt ajoṣyaḥ

original: RV_1,038.05c pathā yamasya gād upa //
analyzed: pathā yamasya gāt upa

original: RV_1,038.06a mo ṣu ṇaḥ parā-parā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt /
analyzed: mā u su naḥ parāparā nirṛtiḥ durhaṇā vadhīt

original: RV_1,038.06c padīṣṭa tṛṣṇayā saha //
analyzed: padīṣṭa tṛṣṇayā saha

original: RV_1,038.07a satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ /
analyzed: satyam tveṣāḥ amavantaḥ dhanvam cit ā rudriyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,038.07c mihaṃ kṛṇvanty avātām //
analyzed: miham kṛṇvanti avātām

original: RV_1,038.08a vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti /
analyzed: vāśrā iva vidyut mimāti vatsam na mātā siṣakti

original: RV_1,038.08c yad eṣāṃ vṛṣṭir asarji //
analyzed: yat eṣām vṛṣṭiḥ asarji

original: RV_1,038.09a divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena /
analyzed: divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyena uda vāhena

original: RV_1,038.09c yat pṛthivīṃ vyundanti //
analyzed: yat pṛthivīm vyundanti

original: RV_1,038.10a adha svanān marutāṃ viśvam ā sadma pārthivam /
analyzed: adha svanāt marutām viśvam ā sadma pārthivam

original: RV_1,038.10c arejanta pra mānuṣāḥ //
analyzed: arejanta pra mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_1,038.11a maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu /
analyzed: marutaḥ vīḍu pāṇibhiḥ citrāḥ rodhasvatīḥ anu

original: RV_1,038.11c yātem akhidrayāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: yāta īm akhidra yāmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,038.12a sthirā vaḥ santu nemayo rathā aśvāsa eṣām /
analyzed: sthirāḥ vaḥ santu nemayaḥ rathāḥ aśvāsaḥ eṣām

original: RV_1,038.12c susaṃskṛtā abhīśavaḥ //
analyzed: su saṃskṛtāḥ abhīśavaḥ

original: RV_1,038.13a acchā vadā tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim /
analyzed: acchā vada tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim

original: RV_1,038.13c agnim mitraṃ na darśatam //
analyzed: agnim mitram na darśatam

original: RV_1,038.14a mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanya iva tatanaḥ /
analyzed: mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanyaḥ iva tatanaḥ

original: RV_1,038.14c gāya gāyatram ukthyam //
analyzed: gāya gāyatram ukthyam

original: RV_1,038.15a vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam /
analyzed: vandasva mārutam gaṇam tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam

original: RV_1,038.15c asme vṛddhā asann iha //
analyzed: asme vṛddhāḥ asan iha

original: RV_1,039.01a pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha /
analyzed: pra yat itthā parāvataḥ śociḥ na mānam asyatha

original: RV_1,039.01c kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kaṃ yātha kaṃ ha dhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kam yātha kam ha dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,039.02a sthirā vaḥ santv āyudhā parāṇude vīḷū uta pratiṣkabhe /
analyzed: sthirā vaḥ santu āyudhā parāṇude vīḍū uta pratiṣkabhe

original: RV_1,039.02c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ

original: RV_1,039.03a parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru /
analyzed: parā ha yat sthiram hatha naraḥ vartayathā guru

original: RV_1,039.03c vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām //
analyzed: vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vi āśāḥ parvatānām

original: RV_1,039.04a nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ /
analyzed: nahi vaḥ śatruḥ vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyām riśādasaḥ

original: RV_1,039.04c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe //
analyzed: yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāsaḥ nu cit ādhṛṣe

original: RV_1,039.05a pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn /
analyzed: pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn

original: RV_1,039.05c pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā //
analyzed: pra u ārata marutaḥ durmadāḥ iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā

original: RV_1,039.06a upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
analyzed: upa u ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam praṣṭiḥ vahati rohitaḥ

original: RV_1,039.06c ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ //
analyzed: ā vaḥ yāmāya pṛthivī cit aśrot abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ

original: RV_1,039.07a ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā vaḥ makṣū tanāya kam rudrāḥ avaḥ vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_1,039.07c gantā nūnaṃ no 'vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe //
analyzed: ganta nūnam naḥ vasā yathā purā itthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe

original: RV_1,039.08a yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate /
analyzed: yuṣmeṣitaḥ marutaḥ martya iṣitaḥ ā yaḥ naḥ abhvaḥ īṣate

original: RV_1,039.08c vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: vi tam yuyota śavasā vi ojasā vi yuṣmākābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,039.09a asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvam dada pracetasaḥ

original: RV_1,039.09c asāmibhir maruta ā na ūtibhir gantā vṛṣṭiṃ na vidyutaḥ //
analyzed: asāmibhiḥ marutaḥ ā naḥ ūtibhiḥ ganta vṛṣṭim na vidyutaḥ

original: RV_1,039.10a asāmy ojo bibhṛthā sudānavo 'sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ /
analyzed: asāmi ojaḥ bibhṛtha sudānavaḥ sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ

original: RV_1,039.10c ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam //
analyzed: ṛṣi dviṣe marutaḥ parimanyavaḥ iṣum na sṛjata dviṣam

original: RV_1,040.01a ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantas tvemahe /
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇaḥ pate devayantaḥ tvā īmahe

original: RV_1,040.01c upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūr bhavā sacā //
analyzed: upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānavaḥ indra prāśūḥ bhava sacā

original: RV_1,040.02a tvām id dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite /
analyzed: tvām id hi sahasas putra martyaḥ upabrūte dhane hite

original: RV_1,040.02c suvīryam maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake //
analyzed: su vīryam marutaḥ ā su aśvyam dadhīta yaḥ vaḥ ācake

original: RV_1,040.03a praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devy etu sūnṛtā /
analyzed: praitu brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ pra devī etu sūnṛtā

original: RV_1,040.03c acchā vīraṃ naryam paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ //
analyzed: acchā vīram naryam paṅkti rādhasam devāḥ yajñam nayantu naḥ

original: RV_1,040.04a yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vāghate dadāti sūnaram vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ

original: RV_1,040.04c tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrām ā yajāmahe supratūrtim anehasam //
analyzed: tasmai iḷām su vīrām ā yajāmahe su pratūrtim anehasam

original: RV_1,040.05a pra nūnam brahmaṇas patir mantraṃ vadaty ukthyam /
analyzed: pra nūnam brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ mantram vadati ukthyam

original: RV_1,040.05c yasminn indro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire //
analyzed: yasmin indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā devāḥ okāṃsi cakrire

original: RV_1,040.06a tam id vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantraṃ devā anehasam /
analyzed: tam id voca imāḥ vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantram devāḥ anehasam

original: RV_1,040.06c imāṃ ca vācam pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat //
analyzed: imām ca vācam pratiharyathā naraḥ viśvā id vāmā vaḥ aśnavat

original: RV_1,040.07a ko devayantam aśnavaj janaṃ ko vṛktabarhiṣam /
analyzed: kaḥ devayantam aśnavat janam kaḥ vṛkta barhiṣam

original: RV_1,040.07c pra-pra dāśvān pastyābhir asthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe //
analyzed: pra pra dāśvān pastyābhiḥ asthita antarvāvat kṣayam dadhe

original: RV_1,040.08a upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhir bhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe /
analyzed: upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhiḥ bhaye cit su kṣitim dadhe

original: RV_1,040.08c nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ //
analyzed: na asya vartā na tarutā mahādhane na arbhe asti vajriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,041.01a yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: yam rakṣanti pracetasaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_1,041.01c nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ //
analyzed: nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ

original: RV_1,041.02a yam bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ /
analyzed: yam bāhutā iva piprati pānti martyam riṣaḥ

original: RV_1,041.02c ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate //
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ sarvaḥ edhate

original: RV_1,041.03a vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām /
analyzed: vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puras ghnanti rājānaḥ eṣām

original: RV_1,041.03c nayanti duritā tiraḥ //
analyzed: nayanti duritā tiras

original: RV_1,041.04a sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate /
analyzed: su gaḥ panthāḥ anṛkṣaraḥ ādityāsaḥ ṛtam yate

original: RV_1,041.04c nātrāvakhādo asti vaḥ //
analyzed: na atra avakhādaḥ asti vaḥ

original: RV_1,041.05a yaṃ yajñaṃ nayathā nara ādityā ṛjunā pathā /
analyzed: yam yajñam nayathā naraḥ ādityāḥ ṛjunā pathā

original: RV_1,041.05c pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat //
analyzed: pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat

original: RV_1,041.06a sa ratnam martyo vasu viśvaṃ tokam uta tmanā /
analyzed: sa ratnam martyaḥ vasu viśvam tokam uta tmanā

original: RV_1,041.06c acchā gacchaty astṛtaḥ //
analyzed: acchā gacchati astṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,041.07a kathā rādhāma sakhāya stomam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ /
analyzed: kathā rādhāma sakhāyaḥ stomam mitrasya aryamṇaḥ

original: RV_1,041.07c mahi psaro varuṇasya //
analyzed: mahi psaraḥ varuṇasya

original: RV_1,041.08a mā vo ghnantam mā śapantam prati voce devayantam /
analyzed: mā vaḥ ghnantam mā śapantam prati voce devayantam

original: RV_1,041.08c sumnair id va ā vivāse //
analyzed: sumnaiḥ id vaḥ ā vivāse

original: RV_1,041.09a caturaś cid dadamānād bibhīyād ā nidhātoḥ /
analyzed: caturaḥ cit dadamānāt bibhīyāt ā nidhātoḥ

original: RV_1,041.09c na duruktāya spṛhayet //
analyzed: na duruktāya spṛhayet

original: RV_1,042.01a sam pūṣann adhvanas tira vy aṃho vimuco napāt /
analyzed: sam pūṣan adhvanaḥ tira vi aṃhaḥ vimucaḥ napāt

original: RV_1,042.01c sakṣvā deva pra ṇas puraḥ //
analyzed: sakṣva deva pra naḥ puras

original: RV_1,042.02a yo naḥ pūṣann agho vṛko duḥśeva ādideśati /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pūṣan aghaḥ vṛkaḥ duḥśevaḥ ādideśati

original: RV_1,042.02c apa sma tam patho jahi //
analyzed: apa sma tam pathaḥ jahi

original: RV_1,042.03a apa tyam paripanthinam muṣīvāṇaṃ huraścitam /
analyzed: apa tyam paripanthinam muṣīvāṇam huraścitam

original: RV_1,042.03c dūram adhi sruter aja //
analyzed: dūram adhi sruteḥ aja

original: RV_1,042.04a tvaṃ tasya dvayāvino 'ghaśaṃsasya kasya cit /
analyzed: tvam tasya dvayāvinaḥ gha śaṃsasya kasya cit

original: RV_1,042.04c padābhi tiṣṭha tapuṣim //
analyzed: padā abhi tiṣṭha tapuṣim

original: RV_1,042.05a ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ pūṣann avo vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā tat te dasra mantumas pūṣan avaḥ vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_1,042.05c yena pitṝn acodayaḥ //
analyzed: yena pitṝn acodayaḥ

original: RV_1,042.06a adhā no viśvasaubhaga hiraṇyavāśīmattama /
analyzed: adha naḥ viśva saubhaga hiraṇya vāśīmattama

original: RV_1,042.06c dhanāni suṣaṇā kṛdhi //
analyzed: dhanāni suṣaṇā kṛdhi

original: RV_1,042.07a ati naḥ saścato naya sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu /
analyzed: ati naḥ saścataḥ naya su gā naḥ su pathā kṛṇu

original: RV_1,042.07c pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ //
analyzed: pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ

original: RV_1,042.08a abhi sūyavasaṃ naya na navajvāro adhvane /
analyzed: abhi sū yavasam naya na nava jvāraḥ adhvane

original: RV_1,042.08c pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ //
analyzed: pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ

original: RV_1,042.09a śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsy udaram /
analyzed: śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsi udaram

original: RV_1,042.09c pūṣann iha kratuṃ vidaḥ //
analyzed: pūṣan iha kratum vidaḥ

original: RV_1,042.10a na pūṣaṇam methāmasi sūktair abhi gṛṇīmasi /
analyzed: na pūṣaṇam methāmasi sūktaiḥ abhi gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_1,042.10c vasūni dasmam īmahe //
analyzed: vasūni dasmam īmahe

original: RV_1,043.01a kad rudrāya pracetase mīḷhuṣṭamāya tavyase /
analyzed: kad rudrāya pracetase mīḍhuṣṭamāya tavyase

original: RV_1,043.01c vocema śantamaṃ hṛde //
analyzed: vocema śantamam hṛde

original: RV_1,043.02a yathā no aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyo yathā gave /
analyzed: yathā naḥ aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyaḥ yathā gave

original: RV_1,043.02c yathā tokāya rudriyam //
analyzed: yathā tokāya rudriyam

original: RV_1,043.03a yathā no mitro varuṇo yathā rudraś ciketati /
analyzed: yathā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ yathā rudraḥ ciketati

original: RV_1,043.03c yathā viśve sajoṣasaḥ //
analyzed: yathā viśve sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_1,043.04a gāthapatim medhapatiṃ rudraṃ jalāṣabheṣajam /
analyzed: gātha patim medha patim rudram jalāṣa bheṣajam

original: RV_1,043.04c tac chaṃyoḥ sumnam īmahe //
analyzed: tat śaṃyoḥ sumnam īmahe

original: RV_1,043.05a yaḥ śukra iva sūryo hiraṇyam iva rocate /
analyzed: yaḥ śukraḥ iva sūryaḥ hiraṇyam iva rocate

original: RV_1,043.05c śreṣṭho devānāṃ vasuḥ //
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ devānām vasuḥ

original: RV_1,043.06a śaṃ naḥ karaty arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye /
analyzed: śam naḥ karati arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye

original: RV_1,043.06c nṛbhyo nāribhyo gave //
analyzed: nṛbhyaḥ nāribhyaḥ gave

original: RV_1,043.07a asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām /
analyzed: asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām

original: RV_1,043.07c mahi śravas tuvinṛmṇam //
analyzed: mahi śravaḥ tuvi nṛmṇam

original: RV_1,043.08a mā naḥ somaparibādho mārātayo juhuranta /
analyzed: mā naḥ soma paribādhaḥ mā arātayaḥ juhuranta

original: RV_1,043.08c ā na indo vāje bhaja //
analyzed: ā naḥ indo vāje bhaja

original: RV_1,043.09a yās te prajā amṛtasya parasmin dhāmann ṛtasya /
analyzed: yāḥ te prajāḥ amṛtasya parasmin dhāman ṛtasya

original: RV_1,043.09c mūrdhā nābhā soma vena ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhā nābhā soma venaḥ ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ

original: RV_1,044.01a agne vivasvad uṣasaś citraṃ rādho amartya /
analyzed: agne vivasvat uṣasaḥ citram rādhaḥ amartya

original: RV_1,044.01c ā dāśuṣe jātavedo vahā tvam adyā devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ //
analyzed: ā dāśuṣe jātavedaḥ vaha tvam adyā devān uṣarbudhaḥ

original: RV_1,044.02a juṣṭo hi dūto asi havyavāhano 'gne rathīr adhvarāṇām /
analyzed: juṣṭaḥ hi dūtaḥ asi havya vāhanaḥ gneḥ rathīḥ adhvarāṇām

original: RV_1,044.02c sajūr aśvibhyām uṣasā suvīryam asme dhehi śravo bṛhat //
analyzed: sajūs aśvibhyām uṣasā su vīryam asme dhehi śravaḥ bṛhat

original: RV_1,044.03a adyā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe vasum agnim purupriyam /
analyzed: adyā dūtam vṛṇīmahe vasum agnim puru priyam

original: RV_1,044.03c dhūmaketum bhāṛjīkaṃ vyuṣṭiṣu yajñānām adhvaraśriyam //
analyzed: dhūma ketum bhāṛjīkam vyuṣṭiṣu yajñānām adhvara śriyam

original: RV_1,044.04a śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭham atithiṃ svāhutaṃ juṣṭaṃ janāya dāśuṣe /
analyzed: śreṣṭham yaviṣṭham atithim su āhutam juṣṭam janāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,044.04c devāṃ acchā yātave jātavedasam agnim īḷe vyuṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: devān acchā yātave jātavedasam agnim īḍe vyuṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,044.05a staviṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ viśvasyāmṛta bhojana /
analyzed: staviṣyāmi tvām aham viśvasya amṛta bhojana

original: RV_1,044.05c agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana //
analyzed: agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya yajiṣṭham havyavāhana

original: RV_1,044.06a suśaṃso bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ /
analyzed: su śaṃsaḥ bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhu jihvaḥ su āhutaḥ

original: RV_1,044.06c praskaṇvasya pratirann āyur jīvase namasyā daivyaṃ janam //
analyzed: praskaṇvasya pratiran āyuḥ jīvase namasya daivyam janam

original: RV_1,044.07a hotāraṃ viśvavedasaṃ saṃ hi tvā viśa indhate /
analyzed: hotāram viśva vedasam sam hi tvā viśaḥ indhate

original: RV_1,044.07c sa ā vaha puruhūta pracetaso 'gne devāṃ iha dravat //
analyzed: saḥ ā vaha puruhūta pracetasaḥ gne devān iha dravat

original: RV_1,044.08a savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam agniṃ vyuṣṭiṣu kṣapaḥ /
analyzed: savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam agnim vyuṣṭiṣu kṣapaḥ

original: RV_1,044.08c kaṇvāsas tvā sutasomāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ svadhvara //
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ tvā suta somāsaḥ indhate havyavāham su adhvara

original: RV_1,044.09a patir hy adhvarāṇām agne dūto viśām asi /
analyzed: patiḥ hi adhvarāṇām agne dūtaḥ viśām asi

original: RV_1,044.09c uṣarbudha ā vaha somapītaye devāṃ adya svardṛśaḥ //
analyzed: uṣarbudhaḥ ā vaha soma pītaye devān adya svar dṛśaḥ

original: RV_1,044.10a agne pūrvā anūṣaso vibhāvaso dīdetha viśvadarśataḥ /
analyzed: agne pūrvāḥ anu uṣasaḥ vibhāvaso dīdetha viśva darśataḥ

original: RV_1,044.10c asi grāmeṣv avitā purohito 'si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ //
analyzed: asi grāmeṣu avitā purohitaḥ si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ

original: RV_1,044.11a ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam agne hotāram ṛtvijam /
analyzed: ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam agne hotāram ṛtvijam

original: RV_1,044.11c manuṣvad deva dhīmahi pracetasaṃ jīraṃ dūtam amartyam //
analyzed: manuṣvat deva dhīmahi pracetasam jīram dūtam amartyam

original: RV_1,044.12a yad devānām mitramahaḥ purohito 'ntaro yāsi dūtyam /
analyzed: yat devānām mitra mahas purohitaḥ ntaras yāsi dūtyam

original: RV_1,044.12c sindhor iva prasvanitāsa ūrmayo 'gner bhrājante arcayaḥ //
analyzed: sindhoḥ iva prasvanitāsaḥ ūrmayaḥ gneḥ bhrājante arcayaḥ

original: RV_1,044.13a śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhir devair agne sayāvabhiḥ /
analyzed: śrudhi śrut karṇa vahnibhiḥ devaiḥ agne sa yāvabhiḥ

original: RV_1,044.13c ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram //
analyzed: ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitraḥ aryamā prātaryāvāṇaḥ adhvaram

original: RV_1,044.14a śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavo 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavaḥ gni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_1,044.14c pibatu somaṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrato 'śvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ //
analyzed: pibatu somam varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ śvibhyām uṣasā sajūs

original: RV_1,045.01a tvam agne vasūṃr iha rudrāṃ ādityāṃ uta /
analyzed: tvam agne vasūn iha rudrān ādityān uta

original: RV_1,045.01c yajā svadhvaraṃ janam manujātaṃ ghṛtapruṣam //
analyzed: yaja su adhvaram janam manu jātam ghṛta pruṣam

original: RV_1,045.02a śruṣṭīvāno hi dāśuṣe devā agne vicetasaḥ /
analyzed: śruṣṭīvānaḥ hi dāśuṣe devāḥ agne vicetasaḥ

original: RV_1,045.02c tān rohidaśva girvaṇas trayastriṃśatam ā vaha //
analyzed: tān rohit aśva girvaṇaḥ trayastriṃśatam ā vaha

original: RV_1,045.03a priyamedhavad atrivaj jātavedo virūpavat /
analyzed: priyamedha vat atri vat jātavedaḥ virūpa vat

original: RV_1,045.03c aṅgirasvan mahivrata praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam //
analyzed: aṅgirasvat mahi vrata praskaṇvasya śrudhi havam

original: RV_1,045.04a mahikerava ūtaye priyamedhā ahūṣata /
analyzed: mahi keravaḥ ūtaye priyamedhāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_1,045.04c rājantam adhvarāṇām agniṃ śukreṇa śociṣā //
analyzed: rājantam adhvarāṇām agnim śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_1,045.05a ghṛtāhavana santyemā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ /
analyzed: ghṛtāhavana santi ā imāḥ u su śrudhi giraḥ

original: RV_1,045.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavo havante 'vase tvā //
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavaḥ havante vase tvā

original: RV_1,045.06a tvāṃ citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ /
analyzed: tvām citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ

original: RV_1,045.06c śociṣkeśam purupriyāgne havyāya voḷhave //
analyzed: śociṣkeśam puru priya agne havyāya voḷhave

original: RV_1,045.07a ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijaṃ dadhire vasuvittamam /
analyzed: ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijam dadhire vasu vittamam

original: RV_1,045.07c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ viprā agne diviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: śrut karṇam saprathastamam viprāḥ agne diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,045.08a ā tvā viprā acucyavuḥ sutasomā abhi prayaḥ /
analyzed: ā tvā viprāḥ acucyavuḥ suta somāḥ abhi prayaḥ

original: RV_1,045.08c bṛhad bhā bibhrato havir agne martāya dāśuṣe //
analyzed: bṛhat bhās bibhrataḥ haviḥ agne martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,045.09a prātaryāvṇaḥ sahaskṛta somapeyāya santya /
analyzed: prātaryāvṇaḥ sahaskṛta soma peyāya santya

original: RV_1,045.09c ihādya daivyaṃ janam barhir ā sādayā vaso //
analyzed: iha adya daivyam janam barhiḥ ā sādaya vaso

original: RV_1,045.10a arvāñcaṃ daivyaṃ janam agne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ /
analyzed: arvāñcam daivyam janam agne yakṣva sa hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,045.10c ayaṃ somaḥ sudānavas tam pāta tiroahnyam //
analyzed: ayam somaḥ sudānavaḥ tam pāta tiroahnyam

original: RV_1,046.01a eṣo uṣā apūrvyā vy ucchati priyā divaḥ /
analyzed: eṣā u uṣāḥ apūrvyā vi ucchati priyā divaḥ

original: RV_1,046.01c stuṣe vām aśvinā bṛhat //
analyzed: stuṣe vām aśvinā bṛhat

original: RV_1,046.02a yā dasrā sindhumātarā manotarā rayīṇām /
analyzed: yā dasrā sindhu mātarā manotarā rayīṇām

original: RV_1,046.02c dhiyā devā vasuvidā //
analyzed: dhiyā devā vasu vidā

original: RV_1,046.03a vacyante vāṃ kakuhāso jūrṇāyām adhi viṣṭapi /
analyzed: vacyante vām kakuhāsaḥ jūrṇāyām adhi viṣṭapi

original: RV_1,046.03c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt //
analyzed: yat vām rathaḥ vibhiḥ patāt

original: RV_1,046.04a haviṣā jāro apām piparti papurir narā /
analyzed: haviṣā jāraḥ apām piparti papuriḥ narā

original: RV_1,046.04c pitā kuṭasya carṣaṇiḥ //
analyzed: pitā kuṭasya carṣaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,046.05a ādāro vām matīnāṃ nāsatyā matavacasā /
analyzed: ādāraḥ vām matīnām nāsatyā mata vacasā

original: RV_1,046.05c pātaṃ somasya dhṛṣṇuyā //
analyzed: pātam somasya dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_1,046.06a yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ /
analyzed: yā naḥ pīparat aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamaḥ tiras

original: RV_1,046.06c tām asme rāsāthām iṣam //
analyzed: tām asme rāsāthām iṣam

original: RV_1,046.07a ā no nāvā matīnāṃ yātam pārāya gantave /
analyzed: ā naḥ nāvā matīnām yātam pārāya gantave

original: RV_1,046.07c yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham //
analyzed: yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham

original: RV_1,046.08a aritraṃ vāṃ divas pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnāṃ rathaḥ /
analyzed: aritram vām divaḥ pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnām rathaḥ

original: RV_1,046.08c dhiyā yuyujra indavaḥ //
analyzed: dhiyā yuyujre indavaḥ

original: RV_1,046.09a divas kaṇvāsa indavo vasu sindhūnām pade /
analyzed: divaḥ kaṇvāsaḥ indavaḥ vasu sindhūnām pade

original: RV_1,046.09c svaṃ vavriṃ kuha dhitsathaḥ //
analyzed: svam vavrim kuha dhitsathaḥ

original: RV_1,046.10a abhūd u bhā u aṃśave hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ /
analyzed: abhūt u bhās u aṃśave hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ

original: RV_1,046.10c vy akhyaj jihvayāsitaḥ //
analyzed: vi akhyat jihvayā asitaḥ

original: RV_1,046.11a abhūd u pāram etave panthā ṛtasya sādhuyā /
analyzed: abhūt u pāram etave panthāḥ ṛtasya sādhuyā

original: RV_1,046.11c adarśi vi srutir divaḥ //
analyzed: adarśi vi srutiḥ divaḥ

original: RV_1,046.12a tat-tad id aśvinor avo jaritā prati bhūṣati /
analyzed: tat tat id aśvinoḥ avaḥ jaritā prati bhūṣati

original: RV_1,046.12c made somasya pipratoḥ //
analyzed: made somasya pipratoḥ

original: RV_1,046.13a vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā /
analyzed: vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā

original: RV_1,046.13c manuṣvac chambhū ā gatam //
analyzed: manuṣvat śambhū ā gatam

original: RV_1,046.14a yuvor uṣā anu śriyam parijmanor upācarat /
analyzed: yuvoḥ uṣāḥ anu śriyam parijmanoḥ upācarat

original: RV_1,046.14c ṛtā vanatho aktubhiḥ //
analyzed: ṛtā vanathaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_1,046.15a ubhā pibatam aśvinobhā naḥ śarma yacchatam /
analyzed: ubhā pibatam aśvinā ubhā naḥ śarma yacchatam

original: RV_1,046.15c avidriyābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: avidriyābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,047.01a ayaṃ vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: ayam vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ somaḥ ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_1,047.01c tam aśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: tam aśvinā pibatam tiroahnyam dhattam ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,047.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
analyzed: tri vandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathena ā yātam aśvinā

original: RV_1,047.02c kaṇvāso vām brahma kṛṇvanty adhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam //
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ vām brahma kṛṇvanti adhvare teṣām su śṛṇutam havam

original: RV_1,047.03a aśvinā madhumattamam pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: aśvinā madhumattamam pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_1,047.03c athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam //
analyzed: atha adya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam

original: RV_1,047.04a triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam /
analyzed: triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśva vedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam

original: RV_1,047.04c kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā //
analyzed: kaṇvāsaḥ vām suta somāḥ abhidyavaḥ yuvām havante aśvinā

original: RV_1,047.05a yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvataṃ yuvam aśvinā /
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvatam yuvam aśvinā

original: RV_1,047.05c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ avataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
analyzed: tābhiḥ su asmān avatam śubhaḥ patī pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_1,047.06a sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatam aśvinā /
analyzed: sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣaḥ vahatam aśvinā

original: RV_1,047.06c rayiṃ samudrād uta vā divas pary asme dhattam puruspṛham //
analyzed: rayim samudrāt uta vā divas pari asme dhattam puruspṛham

original: RV_1,047.07a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe /
analyzed: yat nāsatyā parāvati yat vā sthaḥ adhi turvaśe

original: RV_1,047.07c ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: atas rathena suvṛtā naḥ ā gatam sākam sūryasya raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_1,047.08a arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa /
analyzed: arvāñcā vām saptayaḥ dhvara śriyaḥ vahantu savanā id upa

original: RV_1,047.08c iṣam pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā //
analyzed: iṣam pṛñcantā su kṛte sudānavaḥ ā barhiḥ sīdatam narā

original: RV_1,047.09a tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā /
analyzed: tena nāsatyā gatam rathena sūrya tvacā

original: RV_1,047.09c yena śaśvad ūhathur dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
analyzed: yena śaśvat ūhathuḥ dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye

original: RV_1,047.10a ukthebhir arvāg avase purūvasū arkaiś ca ni hvayāmahe /
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ arvāk avase purūvasū arkaiḥ ca ni hvayāmahe

original: RV_1,047.10c śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somam papathur aśvinā //
analyzed: śaśvat kaṇvānām sadasi priye hi kam somam papathuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_1,048.01a saha vāmena na uṣo vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: saha vāmena naḥ uṣaḥ vi uccha duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_1,048.01c saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī //
analyzed: saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī

original: RV_1,048.02a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvasuvido bhūri cyavanta vastave /
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ viśva su vidaḥ bhūri cyavanta vastave

original: RV_1,048.02c ud īraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaś coda rādho maghonām //
analyzed: ud īraya prati mā sūnṛtāḥ uṣaḥ coda rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_1,048.03a uvāsoṣā ucchāc ca nu devī jīrā rathānām /
analyzed: uvāsa uṣāḥ ucchāt ca nu devī jīrā rathānām

original: RV_1,048.03c ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ //
analyzed: ye asyāḥ ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ

original: RV_1,048.04a uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥ ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate manaḥ dānāya sūrayaḥ

original: RV_1,048.04c atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām //
analyzed: atra aha tat kaṇvaḥ eṣām kaṇvatamaḥ nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām

original: RV_1,048.05a ā ghā yoṣeva sūnary uṣā yāti prabhuñjatī /
analyzed: ā gha yoṣā iva sūnarī uṣāḥ yāti prabhuñjatī

original: RV_1,048.05c jarayantī vṛjanam padvad īyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: jarayantī vṛjanam padvat īyate ud pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,048.06a vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vy arthinaḥ padaṃ na vety odatī /
analyzed: vi yā sṛjati samanam vi arthinaḥ padam na veti odatī

original: RV_1,048.06c vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati //
analyzed: vayaḥ nakir te paptivāṃsaḥ āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati

original: RV_1,048.07a eṣāyukta parāvataḥ sūryasyodayanād adhi /
analyzed: eṣā ayukta parāvataḥ sūryasya udayanāt adhi

original: RV_1,048.07c śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yāty abhi mānuṣān //
analyzed: śatam rathebhiḥ subhagā uṣāḥ iyam vi yāti abhi mānuṣān

original: RV_1,048.08a viśvam asyā nānāma cakṣase jagaj jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī /
analyzed: viśvam asyāḥ nānāma cakṣase jagat jyotiḥ kṛṇoti sūnarī

original: RV_1,048.08c apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ //
analyzed: apa dveṣaḥ maghonī duhitā divaḥ uṣāḥ ucchat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_1,048.09a uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ /
analyzed: uṣe ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_1,048.09c āvahantī bhūry asmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyucchantī diviṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: āvahantī bhūri asmabhyam saubhagam vyucchantī diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,048.10a viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yad ucchasi sūnari /
analyzed: viśvasya hi prāṇanam jīvanam tve vi yat ucchasi sūnari

original: RV_1,048.10c sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam //
analyzed: sā naḥ rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam

original: RV_1,048.11a uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaś citro mānuṣe jane /
analyzed: uṣaḥ vājam hi vaṃsva yaḥ citraḥ mānuṣe jane

original: RV_1,048.11c tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarāṃ upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ //
analyzed: tena ā vaha su kṛtaḥ adhvarān upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ

original: RV_1,048.12a viśvān devāṃ ā vaha somapītaye 'ntarikṣād uṣas tvam /
analyzed: viśvān devān ā vaha soma pītaye ntarikṣāt uṣaḥ tvam

original: RV_1,048.12c sāsmāsu dhā gomad aśvāvad ukthyam uṣo vājaṃ suvīryam //
analyzed: sā asmāsu dhāḥ gomat aśvāvat ukthyam uṣaḥ vājam su vīryam

original: RV_1,048.13a yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata /
analyzed: yasyāḥ ruśantaḥ arcayaḥ prati bhadrāḥ adṛkṣata

original: RV_1,048.13c sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasam uṣā dadātu sugmyam //
analyzed: sā naḥ rayim viśva vāram supeśasam uṣāḥ dadātu sugmyam

original: RV_1,048.14a ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre 'vase mahi /
analyzed: ye cit hi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrve ūtaye juhūre vase mahi

original: RV_1,048.14c sā na stomāṃ abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā //
analyzed: sā naḥ stomān abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasā uṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā

original: RV_1,048.15a uṣo yad adya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ /
analyzed: uṣaḥ yat adya bhānunā vi dvārau ṛṇavaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_1,048.15c pra no yacchatād avṛkam pṛthu cchardiḥ pra devi gomatīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatāt avṛkam pṛthu chardiḥ pra devi gomatīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_1,048.16a saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā sam iḷābhir ā /
analyzed: sam naḥ rāyā bṛhatā viśva peśasā mimikṣvā sam iḷābhiḥ ā

original: RV_1,048.16c saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājair vājinīvati //
analyzed: sam dyumnena viśva turā uṣaḥ mahi sam vājaiḥ vājinīvati

original: RV_1,049.01a uṣo bhadrebhir ā gahi divaś cid rocanād adhi /
analyzed: uṣaḥ bhadrebhiḥ ā gahi divaḥ cit rocanāt adhi

original: RV_1,049.01c vahantv aruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham //
analyzed: vahantu aruṇapsavaḥ upa tvā sominaḥ gṛham

original: RV_1,049.02a supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yam adhyasthā uṣas tvam /
analyzed: supeśasam sukham ratham yam adhyasthāḥ uṣaḥ tvam

original: RV_1,049.02c tenā suśravasaṃ janam prāvādya duhitar divaḥ //
analyzed: tena su śravasam janam prāva adya duhitar divaḥ

original: RV_1,049.03a vayaś cit te patatriṇo dvipac catuṣpad arjuni /
analyzed: vayaḥ cit te patatriṇaḥ dvipad catuṣpad arjuni

original: RV_1,049.03c uṣaḥ prārann ṛtūṃr anu divo antebhyas pari //
analyzed: uṣaḥ prāran ṛtūṃr anu divaḥ antebhyaḥ pari

original: RV_1,049.04a vyucchantī hi raśmibhir viśvam ābhāsi rocanam /
analyzed: vyucchantī hi raśmibhiḥ viśvam ābhāsi rocanam

original: RV_1,049.04c tāṃ tvām uṣar vasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata //
analyzed: tām tvām uṣar vasūyavaḥ gīrbhiḥ kaṇvāḥ ahūṣata

original: RV_1,050.01a ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
analyzed: ud u tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ

original: RV_1,050.01c dṛśe viśvāya sūryam //
analyzed: dṛśe viśvāya sūryam

original: RV_1,050.02a apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: apa tye tāyavaḥ yathā nakṣatrāḥ yanti aktubhiḥ

original: RV_1,050.02c sūrāya viśvacakṣase //
analyzed: sūrāya viśva cakṣase

original: RV_1,050.03a adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu /
analyzed: adṛśram asya ketavaḥ vi raśmayaḥ janān anu

original: RV_1,050.03c bhrājanto agnayo yathā //
analyzed: bhrājantaḥ agnayaḥ yathā

original: RV_1,050.04a taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya /
analyzed: taraṇiḥ viśva darśataḥ jyotiṣkṛt asi sūrya

original: RV_1,050.04c viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam //
analyzed: viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam

original: RV_1,050.05a pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān /
analyzed: pratyaṅ devānām viśaḥ pratyaṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān

original: RV_1,050.05c pratyaṅ viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //
analyzed: pratyaṅ viśvam svar dṛśe

original: RV_1,050.06a yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu /
analyzed: yena pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantam janān anu

original: RV_1,050.06c tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi //
analyzed: tvam varuṇa paśyasi

original: RV_1,050.07a vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahā mimāno aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: vi dyām eṣi rajaḥ pṛthu ahā mimānaḥ aktubhiḥ

original: RV_1,050.07c paśyañ janmāni sūrya //
analyzed: paśyam janmāni sūrya

original: RV_1,050.08a sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya /
analyzed: sapta tvā haritaḥ rathe vahanti deva sūrya

original: RV_1,050.08c śociṣkeśaṃ vicakṣaṇa //
analyzed: śociṣkeśam vicakṣaṇa

original: RV_1,050.09a ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ /
analyzed: ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūraḥ rathasya naptyaḥ

original: RV_1,050.09c tābhir yāti svayuktibhiḥ //
analyzed: tābhiḥ yāti sva yuktibhiḥ

original: RV_1,050.10a ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram /
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari jyotiḥ paśyantaḥ uttaram

original: RV_1,050.10c devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
analyzed: devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: RV_1,050.11a udyann adya mitramaha ārohann uttarāṃ divam /
analyzed: udyan adya mitra mahaḥ ārohan uttarām divam

original: RV_1,050.11c hṛdrogam mama sūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya //
analyzed: hṛd rogam mama sūrya harimāṇam ca nāśaya

original: RV_1,050.12a śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi /
analyzed: śukeṣu me harimāṇam ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi

original: RV_1,050.12c atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi //
analyzed: atha u hāridraveṣu me harimāṇam ni dadhmasi

original: RV_1,050.13a ud agād ayam ādityo viśvena sahasā saha /
analyzed: ud agāt ayam ādityaḥ viśvena sahasā saha

original: RV_1,050.13c dviṣantam mahyaṃ randhayan mo ahaṃ dviṣate radham //
analyzed: dviṣantam mahyam randhayan mā u aham dviṣate radham

original: RV_1,051.01a abhi tyam meṣam puruhūtam ṛgmiyam indraṃ gīrbhir madatā vasvo arṇavam /
analyzed: abhi tyam meṣam puru hūtam ṛgmiyam indram gīrbhiḥ madata vasvaḥ arṇavam

original: RV_1,051.01c yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipram arcata //
analyzed: yasya dyāvaḥ na vicaranti mānuṣāḥ bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipram arcata

original: RV_1,051.02a abhīm avanvan svabhiṣṭim ūtayo 'ntarikṣaprāṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam /
analyzed: abhi īm avanvan su abhiṣṭim ūtayaḥ ntarikṣa prām taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtam

original: RV_1,051.02c indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī sūnṛtāruhat //
analyzed: indram dakṣāsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ mada cyutam śatakratum javanī sūnṛtā āruhat

original: RV_1,051.03a tvaṃ gotram aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apotātraye śatadureṣu gātuvit /
analyzed: tvam gotram aṅgirobhyaḥ vṛṇoḥ apa uta atraye śata dureṣu gātu vid

original: RV_1,051.03c sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasv ājāv adriṃ vāvasānasya nartayan //
analyzed: sasena cit vimadāya avahaḥ vasū ājau adrim vāvasānasya nartayan

original: RV_1,051.04a tvam apām apidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu /
analyzed: tvam apām apidhānā avṛṇoḥ apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumat vasu

original: RV_1,051.04c vṛtraṃ yad indra śavasāvadhīr ahim ād it sūryaṃ divy ārohayo dṛśe //
analyzed: vṛtram yat indra śavasā avadhīḥ ahim āt id sūryam divi ārohayaḥ dṛśe

original: RV_1,051.05a tvam māyābhir apa māyino 'dhamaḥ svadhābhir ye adhi śuptāv ajuhvata /
analyzed: tvam māyābhiḥ apa māyinaḥ dhamaḥ svadhābhiḥ ye adhi śuptau ajuhvata

original: RV_1,051.05c tvam pipror nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣv āvitha //
analyzed: tvam piproḥ nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānam dasyu hatyeṣu āvitha

original: RV_1,051.06a tvaṃ kutsaṃ śuṣṇahatyeṣv āvithārandhayo 'tithigvāya śambaram /
analyzed: tvam kutsam śuṣṇa hatyeṣu āvitha arandhayaḥ tithigvāya śambaram

original: RV_1,051.06c mahāntaṃ cid arbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanād eva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe //
analyzed: mahāntam cit arbudam ni kramīḥ padā sanāt eva dasyu hatyāya jajñiṣe

original: RV_1,051.07a tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate /
analyzed: tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryak ghitā tava rādhaḥ soma pīthāya harṣate

original: RV_1,051.07c tava vajraś cikite bāhvor hito vṛścā śatror ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā //
analyzed: tava vajraḥ cikite bāhvoḥ hitaḥ vṛśca śatroḥ ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā

original: RV_1,051.08a vi jānīhy āryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsad avratān /
analyzed: vi jānīhi āryān ye ca dasyavaḥ barhiṣmate randhaya śāsat avratān

original: RV_1,051.08c śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana //
analyzed: śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvā id tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana

original: RV_1,051.09a anuvratāya randhayann apavratān ābhūbhir indraḥ śnathayann anābhuvaḥ /
analyzed: anuvratāya randhayan apavratān ābhūbhiḥ indraḥ śnathayan an ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,051.09c vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyām inakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna saṃdihaḥ //
analyzed: vṛddhasya cit vardhataḥ dyām inakṣata stavānaḥ vamraḥ vi jaghāna saṃdihaḥ

original: RV_1,051.10a takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ /
analyzed: takṣat yat te uśanā sahasā sahaḥ vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ

original: RV_1,051.10c ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇam avahann abhi śravaḥ //
analyzed: ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇaḥ manaḥ yujaḥ ā pūryamāṇam avahan abhi śravaḥ

original: RV_1,051.11a mandiṣṭa yad uśane kāvye sacāṃ indro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: mandiṣṭa yat uśane kāvye sacā indraḥ vaṅkū vaṅkutarā adhi tiṣṭhati

original: RV_1,051.11c ugro yayiṃ nir apaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat puraḥ //
analyzed: ugraḥ yayim niḥ apaḥ srotasā asṛjat vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitāḥ airayat puraḥ

original: RV_1,051.12a ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtā yeṣu mandase /
analyzed: ā smā ratham vṛṣa pāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtāḥ yeṣu mandase

original: RV_1,051.12c indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano 'narvāṇaṃ ślokam ā rohase divi //
analyzed: indra yathā suta someṣu cākanaḥ narvāṇam ślokam ā rohase divi

original: RV_1,051.13a adadā arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate /
analyzed: adadāḥ arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate

original: RV_1,051.13c menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā //
analyzed: menā abhavaḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya su krato viśvā id tā te savaneṣu pravācyā

original: RV_1,051.14a indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ aśrāyi su dhyaḥ nireke pajreṣu stomaḥ duryaḥ na yūpaḥ

original: RV_1,051.14c aśvayur gavyū rathayur vasūyur indra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā //
analyzed: aśvayuḥ gavyuḥ rathayuḥ vasūyuḥ indraḥ id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā

original: RV_1,051.15a idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci /
analyzed: idam namaḥ vṛṣabhāya sva rāje satya śuṣmāya tavase vāci

original: RV_1,051.15c asminn indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhis tava śarman syāma //
analyzed: asmin indra vṛjane sarva vīrāḥ smat sūribhiḥ tava śarman syāma

original: RV_1,052.01a tyaṃ su meṣam mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākam īrate /
analyzed: tyam su meṣam mahayā svar vidam śatam yasya su bhvaḥ sākam īrate

original: RV_1,052.01c atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ ratham endraṃ vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ //
analyzed: atyam na vājam havanasyadam ratham ā indram vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_1,052.02a sa parvato na dharuṇeṣv acyutaḥ sahasramūtis taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe /
analyzed: sa parvataḥ na dharuṇeṣu acyutaḥ sahasram ūtiḥ taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe

original: RV_1,052.02c indro yad vṛtram avadhīn nadīvṛtam ubjann arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇo andhasā //
analyzed: indraḥ yat vṛtram avadhīt nadīvṛtam ubjan arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇaḥ andhasā

original: RV_1,052.03a sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ /
analyzed: sa hi dvaraḥ dvariṣu vavraḥ ūdhani candra budhnaḥ mada vṛddhaḥ manīṣibhiḥ

original: RV_1,052.03c indraṃ tam ahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprir andhasaḥ //
analyzed: indram tam ahve su apasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭha rātim sa hi papriḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_1,052.04a ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā abhiṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadma barhiṣaḥ samudram na su bhvaḥ svāḥ abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,052.04c taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthur ūtayaḥ śuṣmā indram avātā ahrutapsavaḥ //
analyzed: tam vṛtra hatye anu tasthuḥ ūtayaḥ śuṣmāḥ indram a vātāḥ ahrutapsavaḥ

original: RV_1,052.05a abhi svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyato raghvīr iva pravaṇe sasrur ūtayaḥ /
analyzed: abhi sva vṛṣṭim made asya yudhyataḥ raghvīḥ iva pravaṇe sasruḥ ūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,052.05c indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīṃr iva tritaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ yat vajrī dhṛṣamāṇaḥ andhasā bhinat valasya paridhīṃr iva tritaḥ

original: RV_1,052.06a parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo 'po vṛtvī rajaso budhnam āśayat /
analyzed: pari īm ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavaḥ paḥ vṛtvī rajasaḥ budhnam āśayat

original: RV_1,052.06c vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvor indra tanyatum //
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvanaḥ nijaghantha hanvoḥ indra tanyatum

original: RV_1,052.07a hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣanty ūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni vardhanā /
analyzed: hradam na hi tvā nyṛṣanti ūrmayaḥ brahmāṇi indra tava yāni vardhanā

original: RV_1,052.07c tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavas tatakṣa vajram abhibhūtyojasam //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā cit te yujyam vāvṛdhe śavaḥ tatakṣa vajram abhibhūti ojasam

original: RV_1,052.08a jaghanvāṃ u haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratav indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyann apaḥ /
analyzed: jaghanvām u haribhiḥ sambhṛta krato indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyan apaḥ

original: RV_1,052.08c ayacchathā bāhvor vajram āyasam adhārayo divy ā sūryaṃ dṛśe //
analyzed: ayacchathāḥ bāhvoḥ vajram āyasam adhārayaḥ divi ā sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_1,052.09a bṛhat svaścandram amavad yad ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhat svaścandram amavat yat ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇam divaḥ

original: RV_1,052.09c yan mānuṣapradhanā indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣāco maruto 'madann anu //
analyzed: yat mānuṣa pradhanāḥ indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣācaḥ marutaḥ madan anu

original: RV_1,052.10a dyauś cid asyāmavāṃ aheḥ svanād ayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra te /
analyzed: dyauḥ cit asya amavān aheḥ svanāt ayoyavīt bhiyasā vajre indra te

original: RV_1,052.10c vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinac chiraḥ //
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasā abhinat śiraḥ

original: RV_1,052.11a yad in nv indra pṛthivī daśabhujir ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: yat id nu indra pṛthivī daśabhujiḥ ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,052.11c atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat //
analyzed: atra aha te maghavan viśrutam sahaḥ dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat

original: RV_1,052.12a tvam asya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ /
analyzed: tvam asya pāre rajasaḥ vyomanaḥ sva bhūti ojāḥ avase dhṛṣat manaḥ

original: RV_1,052.12c cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojaso 'paḥ svaḥ paribhūr eṣy ā divam //
analyzed: cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojasā paḥ svar paribhūḥ eṣi ā divam

original: RV_1,052.13a tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patir bhūḥ /
analyzed: tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ ṛṣva vīrasya bṛhataḥ patiḥ bhūḥ

original: RV_1,052.13c viśvam āprā antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakir anyas tvāvān //
analyzed: viśvam āprāḥ antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakir anyaḥ tvāvān

original: RV_1,052.14a na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyacaḥ na sindhavaḥ rajasaḥ antam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_1,052.14c nota svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyata eko anyac cakṛṣe viśvam ānuṣak //
analyzed: na uta sva vṛṣṭim made asya yudhyataḥ ekaḥ anyat cakṛṣe viśvam ānuṣak

original: RV_1,052.15a ārcann atra marutaḥ sasminn ājau viśve devāso amadann anu tvā /
analyzed: ārcan atra marutaḥ sasmin ājau viśve devāsaḥ amadan anu tvā

original: RV_1,052.15c vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra praty ānaṃ jaghantha //
analyzed: vṛtrasya yat bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra prati ānam jaghantha

original: RV_1,053.01a ny ū ṣu vācam pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: ni u su vācam pra mahe bharāmahe giraḥ indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ

original: RV_1,053.01c nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatām ivāvidan na duṣṭutir draviṇodeṣu śasyate //
analyzed: nu cit hi ratnam sasatām iva avidat na duṣṭutiḥ draviṇaḥ deṣu śasyate

original: RV_1,053.02a duro aśvasya dura indra gor asi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ /
analyzed: duraḥ aśvasya duraḥ indra goḥ asi duraḥ yavasya vasunaḥ inaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_1,053.02c śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyas tam idaṃ gṛṇīmasi //
analyzed: śikṣā naraḥ pradivaḥ a kāma karśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyaḥ tam idam gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_1,053.03a śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama taved idam abhitaś cekite vasu /
analyzed: śacīvas indra puru kṛt dyumattama tava id idam abhitas cekite vasu

original: RV_1,053.03c ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ //
analyzed: atas saṃgṛbhya abhibhūtaḥ ā bhara mā tvāyataḥ jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ

original: RV_1,053.04a ebhir dyubhiḥ sumanā ebhir indubhir nirundhāno amatiṃ gobhir aśvinā /
analyzed: ebhiḥ dyubhiḥ sumanāḥ ebhiḥ indubhiḥ nirundhānaḥ amatim gobhiḥ aśvinā

original: RV_1,053.04c indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhir yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi //
analyzed: indreṇa dasyum darayantaḥ indubhiḥ yuta dveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi

original: RV_1,053.05a sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrair abhidyubhiḥ /
analyzed: sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi sam vājebhiḥ puru ścandraiḥ abhidyubhiḥ

original: RV_1,053.05c saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi //
analyzed: sam devyā pramatyā vīra śuṣmayā go agrayā aśvāvatyā rabhemahi

original: RV_1,053.06a te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate /
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāsaḥ vṛtra hatyeṣu satpate

original: RV_1,053.06c yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇy aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ //
analyzed: yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇi aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ

original: RV_1,053.07a yudhā yudham upa ghed eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ sam idaṃ haṃsy ojasā /
analyzed: yudhā yudham upa gha id eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puram sam idam haṃsi ojasā

original: RV_1,053.07c namyā yad indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam //
analyzed: namyā yat indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayaḥ namucim nāma māyinam

original: RV_1,053.08a tvaṃ karañjam uta parṇayaṃ vadhīs tejiṣṭhayātithigvasya vartanī /
analyzed: tvam karañjam uta parṇayam vadhīḥ tejiṣṭhayā atithigvasya vartanī

original: RV_1,053.08c tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā //
analyzed: tvam śatā vaṅgṛdasya abhinat puraḥ nā anudaḥ pariṣūtāḥ ṛjiśvanā

original: RV_1,053.09a tvam etāñ janarājño dvir daśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tvam etām jana rājñaḥ dvis daśa abandhunā suśravasā upajagmuṣaḥ

original: RV_1,053.09c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak //
analyzed: ṣaṣṭim sahasrā navatim nava śrutaḥ ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadā avṛṇak

original: RV_1,053.10a tvam āvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhis tava trāmabhir indra tūrvayāṇam /
analyzed: tvam āvitha suśravasam tava ūtibhiḥ tava trāmabhiḥ indra tūrvayāṇam

original: RV_1,053.10c tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ //
analyzed: tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ

original: RV_1,053.11a ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyas te śivatamā asāma /
analyzed: yaḥ udṛci indra deva gopāḥ sakhāyaḥ te śivatamāḥ asāma

original: RV_1,053.11c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: tvām stoṣāma tvayā su vīrāḥ drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_1,054.01a mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsv aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe /
analyzed: mā naḥ asmin maghavan pṛtsu aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe

original: RV_1,054.01c akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīr bhiyasā sam ārata //
analyzed: akrandayaḥ nadyaḥ roruvat vanā kathā na kṣoṇīḥ bhiyasā sam ārata

original: RV_1,054.02a arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayann abhi ṣṭuhi /
analyzed: arca śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayan abhi stuhi

original: RV_1,054.02c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate //
analyzed: yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣa tvā vṛṣabhaḥ nyṛñjate

original: RV_1,054.03a arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan manaḥ /
analyzed: arca dive bṛhate śūṣyam vacaḥ svakṣatram yasya dhṛṣataḥ dhṛṣat manaḥ

original: RV_1,054.03c bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhat śravāḥ asuraḥ barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puras haribhyām vṛṣabhaḥ rathaḥ hi saḥ

original: RV_1,054.04a tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo 'va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat /
analyzed: tvam divaḥ bṛhataḥ sānu kopayaḥ vaḥ tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat

original: RV_1,054.04c yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣac chitāṃ gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi //
analyzed: yat māyinaḥ vrandinaḥ mandinā dhṛṣat śitām gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi

original: RV_1,054.05a ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandino roruvad vanā /
analyzed: ni yat vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cit vrandinaḥ roruvat vanā

original: RV_1,054.05c prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yad adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kas tvā pari //
analyzed: prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yat adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kaḥ tvā pari

original: RV_1,054.06a tvam āvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃ śatakrato /
analyzed: tvam āvitha naryam turvaśam yadum tvam turvītim vayyam śatakrato

original: RV_1,054.06c tvaṃ ratham etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvam puro navatiṃ dambhayo nava //
analyzed: tvam ratham etaśam kṛtvye dhane tvam puraḥ navatim dambhayaḥ nava

original: RV_1,054.07a sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvaj jano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati /
analyzed: sa ghā rājā sat patiḥ śūśuvat janaḥ rāta havyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati

original: RV_1,054.07c ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānur asmā uparā pinvate divaḥ //
analyzed: ukthā vā yaḥ abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānuḥ asmai uparā pinvate divaḥ

original: RV_1,054.08a asamaṃ kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme /
analyzed: asamam kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra soma pāḥ apasā santu neme

original: RV_1,054.08c ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ ca //
analyzed: ye te indra daduṣaḥ vardhayanti mahi kṣatram sthaviram vṛṣṇyam ca

original: RV_1,054.09a tubhyed ete bahulā adridugdhāś camūṣadaś camasā indrapānāḥ /
analyzed: tubhya id ete bahulāḥ adri dugdhāḥ camūṣadaḥ camasāḥ indra pānāḥ

original: RV_1,054.09c vy aśnuhi tarpayā kāmam eṣām athā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva //
analyzed: vi aśnuhi tarpaya kāmam eṣām athā manaḥ vasu deyāya kṛṣva

original: RV_1,054.10a apām atiṣṭhad dharuṇahvaraṃ tamo 'ntar vṛtrasya jaṭhareṣu parvataḥ /
analyzed: apām atiṣṭhat dharuṇahvaram tamaḥ ntar vṛtrasya jaṭhareṣu parvataḥ

original: RV_1,054.10c abhīm indro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate //
analyzed: abhi īm indraḥ nadyaḥ vavriṇā hitāḥ viśvāḥ anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate

original: RV_1,054.11a sa śevṛdham adhi dhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷ indra tavyam /
analyzed: sa śevṛdham adhi dhāḥ dyumnam asme mahi kṣatram janāṣāh indra tavyam

original: RV_1,054.11c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ //
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ su apatyai iṣe dhāḥ

original: RV_1,055.01a divaś cid asya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati /
analyzed: divaḥ cit asya varimā vi paprathe indram na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati

original: RV_1,055.01c bhīmas tuviṣmāñ carṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ //
analyzed: bhīmaḥ tuviṣmān carṣaṇibhyaḥ ātapaḥ śiśīte vajram tejase na vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_1,055.02a so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ arṇavaḥ na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritāḥ varīmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,055.02c indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate //
analyzed: indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhmaḥ ojasā panasyate

original: RV_1,055.03a tvaṃ tam indra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām irajyasi /
analyzed: tvam tam indra parvatam na bhojase mahaḥ nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām irajyasi

original: RV_1,055.03c pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ //
analyzed: pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmai ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ
