original: RV_1,055.04a sa id vane namasyubhir vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam /
analyzed: saḥ id vane namasyubhiḥ vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇaḥ indriyam

original: RV_1,055.04c vṛṣā chandur bhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yad invati //
analyzed: vṛṣā chanduḥ bhavati haryataḥ vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yat invati

original: RV_1,055.05a sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ id mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhmaḥ ojasā janebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,055.05c adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham //
analyzed: adhā cana śrat dadhati tviṣīmate indrāya vajram nighanighnate vadham

original: RV_1,055.06a sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā vināśayan /
analyzed: sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhānaḥ ojasā vināśayan

original: RV_1,055.06c jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvann avṛkāṇi yajyave 'va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ sṛjat //
analyzed: jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvan avṛkāṇi yajyave vaḥ su kratuḥ sartavai apaḥ sṛjat

original: RV_1,055.07a dānāya manaḥ somapāvann astu te 'rvāñcā harī vandanaśrud ā kṛdhi /
analyzed: dānāya manaḥ soma pāvan astu te rvāñcā harī vandana śrut ā kṛdhi

original: RV_1,055.07c yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketā ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ //
analyzed: yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayaḥ ye indra te na tvā ketāḥ ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ

original: RV_1,055.08a aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayor aṣāḷhaṃ sahas tanvi śruto dadhe /
analyzed: a prakṣitam vasu bibharṣi hastayoḥ a sāḍham sahaḥ tanvi śrutaḥ dadhe

original: RV_1,055.08c āvṛtāso 'vatāso na kartṛbhis tanūṣu te kratava indra bhūrayaḥ //
analyzed: āvṛtāsaḥ vatāsaḥ na kartṛbhiḥ tanūṣu te kratavaḥ indra bhūrayaḥ

original: RV_1,056.01a eṣa pra pūrvīr ava tasya camriṣo 'tyo na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ /
analyzed: eṣa pra pūrvīḥ ava tasya camriṣaḥ tyaḥ na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,056.01c dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ ratham āvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam //
analyzed: dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayam ratham āvṛtya hari yogam ṛbhvasam

original: RV_1,056.02a taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ /
analyzed: tam gūrtayaḥ nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudram na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ

original: RV_1,056.02c patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā //
analyzed: patim dakṣasya vidathasya nu sahaḥ girim na venāḥ adhi roha tejasā

original: RV_1,056.03a sa turvaṇir mahāṃ areṇu pauṃsye girer bhṛṣṭir na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ /
analyzed: sa turvaṇiḥ mahān areṇu pauṃsye gireḥ bhṛṣṭiḥ na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ

original: RV_1,056.03c yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyaso made dudhra ābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani //
analyzed: yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyasaḥ made dudhraḥ ābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani

original: RV_1,056.04a devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ /
analyzed: devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhā ūtaye indram siṣakti uṣasam na sūryaḥ

original: RV_1,056.04c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇum bṛhad arhariṣvaṇiḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tamaḥ iyarti reṇum bṛhat arhariṣvaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,056.05a vi yat tiro dharuṇam acyutaṃ rajo 'tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsu barhaṇā /
analyzed: vi yat tiras dharuṇam acyutam rajaḥ tiṣṭhipaḥ divaḥ ātāsu barhaṇā

original: RV_1,056.05c svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjo arṇavam //
analyzed: svarmīḍhe yat made indra harṣya ahan vṛtram niḥ apām aubjaḥ arṇavam

original: RV_1,056.06a tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ /
analyzed: tvam divaḥ dharuṇam dhiṣe ojasā pṛthivyāḥ indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ

original: RV_1,056.06c tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ //
analyzed: tvam sutasya made ariṇāḥ apaḥ vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyā arujaḥ

original: RV_1,057.01a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matim bhare /
analyzed: pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satya śuṣmāya tavase matim bhare

original: RV_1,057.01c apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam //
analyzed: apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharam rādhaḥ viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam

original: RV_1,057.02a adha te viśvam anu hāsad iṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ /
analyzed: adha te viśvam anu ha asat iṣṭayaḥ āpaḥ nimnā iva savanā haviṣmataḥ

original: RV_1,057.02c yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ //
analyzed: yat parvate na samaśīta haryataḥ indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ

original: RV_1,057.03a asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharā panīyase /
analyzed: asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvare uṣaḥ na śubhraḥ ā bhara panīyase

original: RV_1,057.03c yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotir akāri harito nāyase //
analyzed: yasya dhāma śravase nāma indriyam jyotiḥ akāri haritaḥ nāyase

original: RV_1,057.04a ime ta indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso /
analyzed: ime te indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvā ārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso

original: RV_1,057.04c nahi tvad anyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīr iva prati no harya tad vacaḥ //
analyzed: nahi tvat anyaḥ girvaṇaḥ giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīḥ iva prati naḥ harya tat vacaḥ

original: RV_1,057.05a bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasy asya stotur maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa /
analyzed: bhūri te indra vīryam tava smasi asya stotuḥ maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa

original: RV_1,057.05c anu te dyaur bṛhatī vīryam mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase //
analyzed: anu te dyauḥ bṛhatī vīryam mama iyam ca te pṛthivī neme ojase

original: RV_1,057.06a tvaṃ tam indra parvatam mahām uruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaś cakartitha /
analyzed: tvam tam indra parvatam mahām urum vajreṇa vajrin parvaśas cakartitha

original: RV_1,057.06c avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ //
analyzed: avāsṛjaḥ nivṛtāḥ sartavai apaḥ satrā viśvam dadhiṣe kevalam sahaḥ

original: RV_1,058.01a nū cit sahojā amṛto ni tundate hotā yad dūto abhavad vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: nu cit sahaḥ jāḥ amṛtaḥ ni tundate hotā yat dūtaḥ abhavat vivasvataḥ

original: RV_1,058.01c vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhī rajo mama ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati //
analyzed: vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhiḥ rajaḥ mama ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati

original: RV_1,058.02a ā svam adma yuvamāno ajaras tṛṣv aviṣyann ataseṣu tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: ā svam adma yuvamānaḥ ajaraḥ tṛṣu aviṣyan ataseṣu tiṣṭhati

original: RV_1,058.02c atyo na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divo na sānu stanayann acikradat //
analyzed: atyaḥ na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divaḥ na sānu stanayan acikradat

original: RV_1,058.03a krāṇā rudrebhir vasubhiḥ purohito hotā niṣatto rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ /
analyzed: krāṇā rudrebhiḥ vasubhiḥ purohitaḥ hotā niṣattaḥ rayiṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_1,058.03c ratho na vikṣv ṛñjasāna āyuṣu vy ānuṣag vāryā deva ṛṇvati //
analyzed: rathaḥ na vikṣu ṛñjasānaḥ āyuṣu vi ānuṣak vāryā devaḥ ṛṇvati

original: RV_1,058.04a vi vātajūto ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ /
analyzed: vi vāta jūtaḥ ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ

original: RV_1,058.04c tṛṣu yad agne vanino vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśadūrme ajara //
analyzed: tṛṣu yat agne vaninaḥ vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇam te ema ruśat ūrme ajara

original: RV_1,058.05a tapurjambho vana ā vātacodito yūthe na sāhvāṃ ava vāti vaṃsagaḥ /
analyzed: tapuḥ jambhaḥ vane ā vāta coditaḥ yūthe na sāhvām ava vāti vaṃsagaḥ

original: RV_1,058.05c abhivrajann akṣitam pājasā raja sthātuś caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ //
analyzed: abhivrajan akṣitam pājasā rajaḥ sthātuḥ caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,058.06a dadhuṣ ṭvā bhṛgavo mānuṣeṣv ā rayiṃ na cāruṃ suhavaṃ janebhyaḥ /
analyzed: dadhuḥ tvā bhṛgavaḥ mānuṣeṣu ā rayim na cārum su havam janebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,058.06c hotāram agne atithiṃ vareṇyam mitraṃ na śevaṃ divyāya janmane //
analyzed: hotāram agne atithim vareṇyam mitram na śevam divyāya janmane

original: RV_1,058.07a hotāraṃ sapta juhvo yajiṣṭhaṃ yaṃ vāghato vṛṇate adhvareṣu /
analyzed: hotāram sapta juhvaḥ yajiṣṭham yam vāghataḥ vṛṇate adhvareṣu

original: RV_1,058.07c agniṃ viśveṣām aratiṃ vasūnāṃ saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam //
analyzed: agnim viśveṣām aratim vasūnām saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam

original: RV_1,058.08a acchidrā sūno sahaso no adya stotṛbhyo mitramahaḥ śarma yaccha /
analyzed: acchidrā sūno sahasaḥ naḥ adya stotṛbhyaḥ mitra mahas śarma yaccha

original: RV_1,058.08c agne gṛṇantam aṃhasa uruṣyorjo napāt pūrbhir āyasībhiḥ //
analyzed: agne gṛṇantam aṃhasaḥ uruṣya ūrjaḥ napāt pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ

original: RV_1,058.09a bhavā varūthaṃ gṛṇate vibhāvo bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma /
analyzed: bhava varūtham gṛṇate vibhāvaḥ bhava maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma

original: RV_1,058.09c uruṣyāgne aṃhaso gṛṇantam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: uruṣya agne aṃhasaḥ gṛṇantam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,059.01a vayā id agne agnayas te anye tve viśve amṛtā mādayante /
analyzed: vayāḥ id agne agnayaḥ te anye tve viśve amṛtāḥ mādayante

original: RV_1,059.01c vaiśvānara nābhir asi kṣitīnāṃ sthūṇeva janāṃ upamid yayantha //
analyzed: vaiśvānara nābhiḥ asi kṣitīnām sthūṇā iva janān upamit yayantha

original: RV_1,059.02a mūrdhā divo nābhir agniḥ pṛthivyā athābhavad aratī rodasyoḥ /
analyzed: mūrdhā divaḥ nābhiḥ agniḥ pṛthivyāḥ atha abhavat aratī rodasyoḥ

original: RV_1,059.02c taṃ tvā devāso 'janayanta devaṃ vaiśvānara jyotir id āryāya //
analyzed: tam tvā devāsaḥ janayanta devam vaiśvānara jyotiḥ id āryāya

original: RV_1,059.03a ā sūrye na raśmayo dhruvāso vaiśvānare dadhire 'gnā vasūni /
analyzed: ā sūrye na raśmayaḥ dhruvāsaḥ vaiśvānare dadhire gnā vasūni

original: RV_1,059.03c yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu yā mānuṣeṣv asi tasya rājā //
analyzed: yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu yā mānuṣeṣu asi tasya rājā

original: RV_1,059.04a bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giro hotā manuṣyo na dakṣaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giraḥ hotā manuṣyaḥ na dakṣaḥ

original: RV_1,059.04c svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīr vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ //
analyzed: svarvate satya śuṣmāya pūrvīḥ vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ

original: RV_1,059.05a divaś cit te bṛhato jātavedo vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam /
analyzed: divaḥ cit te bṛhataḥ jātavedaḥ vaiśvānara pra ririce mahi tvam

original: RV_1,059.05c rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha //
analyzed: rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇām yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha

original: RV_1,059.06a pra nū mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya vocaṃ yam pūravo vṛtrahaṇaṃ sacante /
analyzed: pra nu mahi tvam vṛṣabhasya vocam yam pūravaḥ vṛtra haṇam sacante

original: RV_1,059.06c vaiśvānaro dasyum agnir jaghanvāṃ adhūnot kāṣṭhā ava śambaram bhet //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ dasyum agniḥ jaghanvān adhūnot kāṣṭhāḥ ava śambaram bhet

original: RV_1,059.07a vaiśvānaro mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭir bharadvājeṣu yajato vibhāvā /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭiḥ bharadvājeṣu yajataḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_1,059.07c śātavaneye śatinībhir agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān //
analyzed: śātavaneye śatinībhiḥ agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān

original: RV_1,060.01a vahniṃ yaśasaṃ vidathasya ketuṃ suprāvyaṃ dūtaṃ sadyoartham /
analyzed: vahnim yaśasam vidathasya ketum suprāvyam dūtam sadyoartham

original: RV_1,060.01c dvijanmānaṃ rayim iva praśastaṃ rātim bharad bhṛgave mātariśvā //
analyzed: dvijanmānam rayim iva praśastam rātim bharat bhṛgave mātariśvā

original: RV_1,060.02a asya śāsur ubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmanta uśijo ye ca martāḥ /
analyzed: asya śāsuḥ ubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmantaḥ uśijaḥ ye ca martāḥ

original: RV_1,060.02c divaś cit pūrvo ny asādi hotāpṛcchyo viśpatir vikṣu vedhāḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ cit pūrvaḥ ni asādi hotā āpṛcchyaḥ viśpatiḥ vikṣu vedhāḥ

original: RV_1,060.03a taṃ navyasī hṛda ā jāyamānam asmat sukīrtir madhujihvam aśyāḥ /
analyzed: tam navyasī hṛdaḥ ā jāyamānam asmat su kīrtiḥ madhu jihvam aśyāḥ

original: RV_1,060.03c yam ṛtvijo vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvanta āyavo jījananta //
analyzed: yam ṛtvijaḥ vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvantaḥ āyavaḥ jījananta

original: RV_1,060.04a uśik pāvako vasur mānuṣeṣu vareṇyo hotādhāyi vikṣu /
analyzed: uśij pāvakaḥ vasuḥ mānuṣeṣu vareṇyaḥ hotā adhāyi vikṣu

original: RV_1,060.04c damūnā gṛhapatir dama āṃ agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām //
analyzed: damūnāḥ gṛhapatiḥ dame ām agniḥ bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_1,060.05a taṃ tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām pra śaṃsāmo matibhir gotamāsaḥ /
analyzed: tam tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām pra śaṃsāmaḥ matibhiḥ gotamāsaḥ

original: RV_1,060.05c āśuṃ na vājambharam marjayantaḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: āśum na vājambharam marjayantaḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,061.01a asmā id u pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomam māhināya /
analyzed: asmai id u pra tavase turāya prayaḥ na harmi stomam māhināya

original: RV_1,061.01c ṛcīṣamāyādhrigava oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā //
analyzed: ṛcīṣamāya adhrigave oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā

original: RV_1,061.02a asmā id u praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmy āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti /
analyzed: asmai id u prayaḥ iva pra yaṃsi bharāmi āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti

original: RV_1,061.02c indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyo marjayanta //
analyzed: indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyaḥ marjayanta

original: RV_1,061.03a asmā id u tyam upamaṃ svarṣām bharāmy āṅgūṣam āsyena /
analyzed: asmai id u tyam upamam svarṣām bharāmi āṅgūṣam āsyena

original: RV_1,061.03c maṃhiṣṭham acchoktibhir matīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭham acchoktibhiḥ matīnām suvṛktibhiḥ sūrim vāvṛdhadhyai

original: RV_1,061.04a asmā id u stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya /
analyzed: asmai id u stomam sam hinomi ratham na taṣṭā iva tatsināya

original: RV_1,061.04c giraś ca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya //
analyzed: giraḥ ca gir vāhase suvṛktī indrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya

original: RV_1,061.05a asmā id u saptim iva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā sam añje /
analyzed: asmai id u saptim iva śravasyā indrāya arkam juhvā sam añje

original: RV_1,061.05c vīraṃ dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam //
analyzed: vīram dānaukasam vandadhyai purām gūrta śravasam darmāṇam

original: RV_1,061.06a asmā id u tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya /
analyzed: asmai id u tvaṣṭā takṣat vajram su apastamam svaryam raṇāya

original: RV_1,061.06c vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujann īśānas tujatā kiyedhāḥ //
analyzed: vṛtrasya cit vidat yena marma tujan īśānaḥ tujatā kiyedhāḥ

original: RV_1,061.07a asyed u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pitum papivāñ cārv annā /
analyzed: asya id u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyas mahaḥ pitum papivān cārū annā

original: RV_1,061.07c muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhaṃ tiro adrim astā //
analyzed: muṣāyat viṣṇuḥ pacatam sahīyān vidhyat varāham tiras adrim astā

original: RV_1,061.08a asmā id u gnāś cid devapatnīr indrāyārkam ahihatya ūvuḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u gnāḥ cit deva patnīḥ indrāya arkam ahi hatye ūvuḥ

original: RV_1,061.08c pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānam pari ṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhre urvī na asya te mahimānam pari staḥ

original: RV_1,061.09a asyed eva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt /
analyzed: asya id eva pra ririce mahi tvam divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari antarikṣāt

original: RV_1,061.09c svarāḷ indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svarir amatro vavakṣe raṇāya //
analyzed: svarāj indraḥ dame ā viśva gūrtaḥ svariḥ amatraḥ vavakṣe raṇāya

original: RV_1,061.10a asyed eva śavasā śuṣantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ /
analyzed: asya id eva śavasā śuṣantam vi vṛścat vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ

original: RV_1,061.10c gā na vrāṇā avanīr amuñcad abhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ //
analyzed: gāḥ na vrāṇāḥ avanīḥ amuñcat abhi śravaḥ dāvane sacetāḥ

original: RV_1,061.11a asyed u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīm ayacchat /
analyzed: asya id u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yat vajreṇa sīm ayacchat

original: RV_1,061.11c īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ //
analyzed: īśāna kṛt dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādham turvaṇiḥ kaḥ

original: RV_1,061.12a asmā id u pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u pra bhara tūtujānaḥ vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ

original: RV_1,061.12c gor na parva vi radā tiraśceṣyann arṇāṃsy apāṃ caradhyai //
analyzed: goḥ na parva vi rada tiras ca iṣyan arṇāṃsi apām caradhyai

original: RV_1,061.13a asyed u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: asya id u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navyaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_1,061.13c yudhe yad iṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn //
analyzed: yudhe yat iṣṇānaḥ āyudhāni ṛghāyamāṇaḥ niriṇāti śatrūn

original: RV_1,061.14a asyed u bhiyā girayaś ca dṛḷhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣas tujete /
analyzed: asya id u bhiyā girayaḥ ca dṛḍhāḥ dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣaḥ tujete

original: RV_1,061.14c upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ //
analyzed: upa u venasya joguvānaḥ oṇim sadyas bhuvat vīryāya nodhāḥ

original: RV_1,061.15a asmā id u tyad anu dāyy eṣām eko yad vavne bhūrer īśānaḥ /
analyzed: asmai id u tyad anu dāyi eṣām ekaḥ yat vavne bhūreḥ īśānaḥ

original: RV_1,061.15c praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvim āvad indraḥ //
analyzed: pra etaśam sūrye paspṛdhānam sauvaśvye suṣvim āvat indraḥ

original: RV_1,061.16a evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran /
analyzed: eva te hāriyojana suvṛktī indra brahmāṇi gotamāsaḥ akran

original: RV_1,061.16c aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: ā eṣu viśva peśasam dhiyam dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,062.01a pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat /
analyzed: pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣam girvaṇase aṅgirasvat

original: RV_1,062.01c suvṛktibhi stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya //
analyzed: suvṛktibhiḥ stuvate ṛgmiyāya arcāma arkam nare viśrutāya

original: RV_1,062.02a pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvam āṅgūṣyaṃ śavasānāya sāma /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahi namaḥ bharadhvam āṅgūṣyam śavasānāya sāma

original: RV_1,062.02c yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan //
analyzed: yena naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ arcantaḥ aṅgirasaḥ gāḥ avindan

original: RV_1,062.03a indrasyāṅgirasāṃ ceṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim /
analyzed: indrasya aṅgirasām ca iṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim

original: RV_1,062.03c bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ sam usriyābhir vāvaśanta naraḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ sam usriyābhiḥ vāvaśanta naraḥ

original: RV_1,062.04a sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇādriṃ svaryo navagvaiḥ /
analyzed: sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇa adrim svaryaḥ navagvaiḥ

original: RV_1,062.04c saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra valaṃ raveṇa darayo daśagvaiḥ //
analyzed: saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra valam raveṇa darayaḥ daśagvaiḥ

original: RV_1,062.05a gṛṇāno aṅgirobhir dasma vi var uṣasā sūryeṇa gobhir andhaḥ /
analyzed: gṛṇānaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ dasma vi var uṣasā sūryeṇa gobhiḥ andhaḥ

original: RV_1,062.05c vi bhūmyā aprathaya indra sānu divo raja uparam astabhāyaḥ //
analyzed: vi bhūmyāḥ aprathayaḥ indra sānu divaḥ rajaḥ uparam astabhāyaḥ

original: RV_1,062.06a tad u prayakṣatamam asya karma dasmasya cārutamam asti daṃsaḥ /
analyzed: tat u prayakṣatamam asya karma dasmasya cārutamam asti daṃsaḥ

original: RV_1,062.06c upahvare yad uparā apinvan madhvarṇaso nadyaś catasraḥ //
analyzed: upahvare yat uparāḥ apinvat madhu arṇasaḥ nadyaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_1,062.07a dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhir arkaiḥ /
analyzed: dvitā vi vavre sana jā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_1,062.07c bhago na mene parame vyomann adhārayad rodasī sudaṃsāḥ //
analyzed: bhagaḥ na mene parame vyoman adhārayat rodasī su daṃsāḥ

original: RV_1,062.08a sanād divam pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhir evaiḥ /
analyzed: sanāt divam pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_1,062.08c kṛṣṇebhir aktoṣā ruśadbhir vapurbhir ā carato anyānyā //
analyzed: kṛṣṇebhiḥ akta uṣāḥ ruśadbhiḥ vapurbhiḥ ā carataḥ anyā anyā

original: RV_1,062.09a sanemi sakhyaṃ svapasyamānaḥ sūnur dādhāra śavasā sudaṃsāḥ /
analyzed: sanemi sakhyam svapasyamānaḥ sūnuḥ dādhāra śavasā su daṃsāḥ

original: RV_1,062.09c āmāsu cid dadhiṣe pakvam antaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśad rohiṇīṣu //
analyzed: āmāsu cit dadhiṣe pakvam antar payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśat rohiṇīṣu

original: RV_1,062.10a sanāt sanīḷā avanīr avātā vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ /
analyzed: sanāt sanīḍāḥ avanīḥ a vātāḥ vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_1,062.10c purū sahasrā janayo na patnīr duvasyanti svasāro ahrayāṇam //
analyzed: purū sahasrā janayaḥ na patnīḥ duvasyanti svasāraḥ ahrayāṇam

original: RV_1,062.11a sanāyuvo namasā navyo arkair vasūyavo matayo dasma dadruḥ /
analyzed: sanāyuvaḥ namasā navyaḥ arkaiḥ vasūyavaḥ matayaḥ dasma dadruḥ

original: RV_1,062.11c patiṃ na patnīr uśatīr uśantaṃ spṛśanti tvā śavasāvan manīṣāḥ //
analyzed: patim na patnīḥ uśatīḥ uśantam spṛśanti tvā śavasāvat manīṣāḥ

original: RV_1,062.12a sanād eva tava rāyo gabhastau na kṣīyante nopa dasyanti dasma /
analyzed: sanāt eva tava rāyaḥ gabhastau na kṣīyante na upa dasyanti dasma

original: RV_1,062.12c dyumāṃ asi kratumāṃ indra dhīraḥ śikṣā śacīvas tava naḥ śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: dyumān asi kratumān indra dhīraḥ śikṣa śacīvas tava naḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,062.13a sanāyate gotama indra navyam atakṣad brahma hariyojanāya /
analyzed: sanāyate gotamaḥ indra navyam atakṣat brahma hari yojanāya

original: RV_1,062.13c sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: su nīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,063.01a tvam mahāṃ indra yo ha śuṣmair dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ /
analyzed: tvam mahān indra yaḥ ha śuṣmaiḥ dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ

original: RV_1,063.01c yad dha te viśvā girayaś cid abhvā bhiyā dṛḷhāsaḥ kiraṇā naijan //
analyzed: yat ha te viśvā girayaḥ cit abhvā bhiyā dṛḍhāsaḥ kiraṇāḥ na aijan

original: RV_1,063.02a ā yad dharī indra vivratā ver ā te vajraṃ jaritā bāhvor dhāt /
analyzed: ā yat harī indra vivratā veḥ ā te vajram jaritā bāhvoḥ dhāt

original: RV_1,063.02c yenāviharyatakrato amitrān pura iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: yena a viharyata krato amitrān puraḥ iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ

original: RV_1,063.03a tvaṃ satya indra dhṛṣṇur etān tvam ṛbhukṣā naryas tvaṃ ṣāṭ /
analyzed: tvam satyaḥ indra dhṛṣṇuḥ etān tvam ṛbhukṣāḥ naryaḥ tvam sāh

original: RV_1,063.03c tvaṃ śuṣṇaṃ vṛjane pṛkṣa āṇau yūne kutsāya dyumate sacāhan //
analyzed: tvam śuṣṇam vṛjane pṛkṣe āṇau yūne kutsāya dyumate sacā ahan

original: RV_1,063.04a tvaṃ ha tyad indra codīḥ sakhā vṛtraṃ yad vajrin vṛṣakarmann ubhnāḥ /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra codīḥ sakhā vṛtram yat vajrin vṛṣa karman ubhnāḥ

original: RV_1,063.04c yad dha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācair vi dasyūṃr yonāv akṛto vṛthāṣāṭ //
analyzed: yat ha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācais vi dasyūṃr yonau akṛtaḥ vṛthāṣāh

original: RV_1,063.05a tvaṃ ha tyad indrāriṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cin martānām ajuṣṭau /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra a riṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cit martānām ajuṣṭau

original: RV_1,063.05c vy asmad ā kāṣṭhā arvate var ghaneva vajriñ chnathihy amitrān //
analyzed: vi asmat ā kāṣṭhāḥ arvate var ghanā iva vajrim chnathihi amitrān

original: RV_1,063.06a tvāṃ ha tyad indrārṇasātau svarmīḷhe nara ājā havante /
analyzed: tvām ha tyad indra arṇa sātau svarmīḍhe naraḥ ājā havante

original: RV_1,063.06c tava svadhāva iyam ā samarya ūtir vājeṣv atasāyyā bhūt //
analyzed: tava svadhāvas iyam ā samarye ūtiḥ vājeṣu atasāyyā bhūt

original: RV_1,063.07a tvaṃ ha tyad indra sapta yudhyan puro vajrin purukutsāya dardaḥ /
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra sapta yudhyan puraḥ vajrin purukutsāya dardar

original: RV_1,063.07c barhir na yat sudāse vṛthā varg aṃho rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ //
analyzed: barhiḥ na yat sudāse vṛthā vark aṃhaḥ rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ

original: RV_1,063.08a tvaṃ tyāṃ na indra deva citrām iṣam āpo na pīpayaḥ parijman /
analyzed: tvam tyām naḥ indra deva citrām iṣam āpaḥ na pīpayaḥ parijman

original: RV_1,063.08c yayā śūra praty asmabhyaṃ yaṃsi tmanam ūrjaṃ na viśvadha kṣaradhyai //
analyzed: yayā śūra prati asmabhyam yaṃsi tmanam ūrjam na viśvadha kṣaradhyai

original: RV_1,063.09a akāri ta indra gotamebhir brahmāṇy oktā namasā haribhyām /
analyzed: akāri te indra gotamebhiḥ brahmāṇi ā uktā namasā haribhyām

original: RV_1,063.09c supeśasaṃ vājam ā bharā naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: supeśasam vājam ā bhara naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,064.01a vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bharā marudbhyaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṇe śardhāya su makhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bhara marudbhyaḥ

original: RV_1,064.01c apo na dhīro manasā suhastyo giraḥ sam añje vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ na dhīraḥ manasā suhastyaḥ giraḥ sam añje vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,064.02a te jajñire diva ṛṣvāsa ukṣaṇo rudrasya maryā asurā arepasaḥ /
analyzed: te jajñire divaḥ ṛṣvāsaḥ ukṣaṇaḥ rudrasya maryāḥ asurāḥ arepasaḥ

original: RV_1,064.02c pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryā iva satvāno na drapsino ghoravarpasaḥ //
analyzed: pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryāḥ iva satvānaḥ na drapsinaḥ ghora varpasaḥ

original: RV_1,064.03a yuvāno rudrā ajarā abhogghano vavakṣur adhrigāvaḥ parvatā iva /
analyzed: yuvānaḥ rudrāḥ ajarāḥ abhogghanaḥ vavakṣuḥ adhrigāvaḥ parvatāḥ iva

original: RV_1,064.03c dṛḷhā cid viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā //
analyzed: dṛḍhā cit viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā

original: RV_1,064.04a citrair añjibhir vapuṣe vy añjate vakṣassu rukmāṃ adhi yetire śubhe /
analyzed: citraiḥ añjibhiḥ vapuṣe vi añjate vakṣassu rukmān adhi yetire śubhe

original: RV_1,064.04c aṃseṣv eṣāṃ ni mimṛkṣur ṛṣṭayaḥ sākaṃ jajñire svadhayā divo naraḥ //
analyzed: aṃseṣu eṣām ni mimṛkṣuḥ ṛṣṭayaḥ sākam jajñire svadhayā divaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_1,064.05a īśānakṛto dhunayo riśādaso vātān vidyutas taviṣībhir akrata /
analyzed: īśāna kṛtaḥ dhunayaḥ riśādasaḥ vātān vidyutaḥ taviṣībhiḥ akrata

original: RV_1,064.05c duhanty ūdhar divyāni dhūtayo bhūmim pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ //
analyzed: duhanti ūdhar divyāni dhūtayaḥ bhūmim pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ

original: RV_1,064.06a pinvanty apo marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payo ghṛtavad vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ /
analyzed: pinvanti apaḥ marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payaḥ ghṛtavat vidatheṣu ābhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,064.06c atyaṃ na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsaṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitam //
analyzed: atyam na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsam duhanti stanayantam akṣitam

original: RV_1,064.07a mahiṣāso māyinaś citrabhānavo girayo na svatavaso raghuṣyadaḥ /
analyzed: mahiṣāsaḥ māyinaḥ citra bhānavaḥ girayaḥ na svatavasaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ

original: RV_1,064.07c mṛgā iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā yad āruṇīṣu taviṣīr ayugdhvam //
analyzed: mṛgāḥ iva hastinaḥ khādathāḥ vanā yat āruṇīṣu taviṣīḥ ayugdhvam

original: RV_1,064.08a siṃhā iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśā iva supiśo viśvavedasaḥ /
analyzed: siṃhāḥ iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśāḥ iva supiśaḥ viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_1,064.08c kṣapo jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sam it sabādhaḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ //
analyzed: kṣapaḥ jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhiḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ sam id sabādhaḥ śavasā ahi manyavaḥ

original: RV_1,064.09a rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyo nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ /
analyzed: rodasī ā vadata gaṇa śriyaḥ nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasā ahi manyavaḥ

original: RV_1,064.09c ā vandhureṣv amatir na darśatā vidyun na tasthau maruto ratheṣu vaḥ //
analyzed: ā vandhureṣu amatiḥ na darśatā vidyut na tasthau marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ

original: RV_1,064.10a viśvavedaso rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsas taviṣībhir virapśinaḥ /
analyzed: viśva vedasaḥ rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsaḥ taviṣībhiḥ virapśinaḥ

original: RV_1,064.10c astāra iṣuṃ dadhire gabhastyor anantaśuṣmā vṛṣakhādayo naraḥ //
analyzed: astāraḥ iṣum dadhire gabhastyoḥ ananta śuṣmāḥ vṛṣa khādayaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_1,064.11a hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdha ujjighnanta āpathyo na parvatān /
analyzed: hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payaḥ vṛdhaḥ ujjighnantaḥ āpathyaḥ na parvatān

original: RV_1,064.11c makhā ayāsaḥ svasṛto dhruvacyuto dudhrakṛto maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: makhāḥ ayāsaḥ svasṛtaḥ dhruva cyutaḥ dudhra kṛtaḥ marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,064.12a ghṛṣum pāvakaṃ vaninaṃ vicarṣaṇiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā gṛṇīmasi /
analyzed: ghṛṣum pāvakam vaninam vicarṣaṇim rudrasya sūnum havasā gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_1,064.12c rajasturaṃ tavasam mārutaṃ gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ saścata śriye //
analyzed: rajasturam tavasam mārutam gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇam vṛṣaṇam saścata śriye

original: RV_1,064.13a pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janāṃ ati tasthau va ūtī maruto yam āvata /
analyzed: pra nu sa martaḥ śavasā janān ati tasthau vaḥ ūtī marutaḥ yam āvata

original: RV_1,064.13c arvadbhir vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhir āpṛcchyaṃ kratum ā kṣeti puṣyati //
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ āpṛcchyam kratum ā kṣeti puṣyati

original: RV_1,064.14a carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ dyumantaṃ śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana /
analyzed: carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaram dyumantam śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana

original: RV_1,064.14c dhanaspṛtam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ tokam puṣyema tanayaṃ śataṃ himāḥ //
analyzed: dhana spṛtam ukthyam viśvacarṣaṇim tokam puṣyema tanayam śatam himāḥ

original: RV_1,064.15a nū ṣṭhiram maruto vīravantam ṛtīṣāhaṃ rayim asmāsu dhatta /
analyzed: nu sthiram marutaḥ vīravantam ṛtīṣāham rayim asmāsu dhatta

original: RV_1,064.15c sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ śūśuvāṃsam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
analyzed: sahasriṇam śatinam śūśuvāṃsam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasuḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,065.01 paśvā na tāyuṃ guhā catantaṃ namo yujānaṃ namo vahantam //
analyzed: paśvā na tāyum guhā catantam namaḥ yujānam namaḥ vahantam

original: RV_1,065.02 sajoṣā dhīrāḥ padair anu gmann upa tvā sīdan viśve yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: sajoṣāḥ dhīrāḥ padaiḥ anu gman upa tvā sīdan viśve yajatrāḥ

original: RV_1,065.03 ṛtasya devā anu vratā gur bhuvat pariṣṭir dyaur na bhūma //
analyzed: ṛtasya devāḥ anu vratā guḥ bhuvat pariṣṭiḥ dyauḥ na bhūma

original: RV_1,065.04 vardhantīm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam //
analyzed: vardhanti īm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe su jātam

original: RV_1,065.05 puṣṭir na raṇvā kṣitir na pṛthvī girir na bhujma kṣodo na śambhu //
analyzed: puṣṭiḥ na raṇvā kṣitiḥ na pṛthvī giriḥ na bhujma kṣodaḥ na śambhu

original: RV_1,065.06 atyo nājman sargaprataktaḥ sindhur na kṣodaḥ ka īṃ varāte //
analyzed: atyaḥ na ajman sarga prataktaḥ sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ kaḥ īm varāte

original: RV_1,065.07 jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrāteva svasrām ibhyān na rājā vanāny atti //
analyzed: jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrātā iva svasrām ibhyān na rājā vanāni atti

original: RV_1,065.08 yad vātajūto vanā vy asthād agnir ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ //
analyzed: yat vāta jūtaḥ vanā vi asthāt agniḥ ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_1,065.09 śvasity apsu haṃso na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭho viśām uṣarbhut //
analyzed: śvasiti apsu haṃsaḥ na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭhaḥ viśām uṣarbudh

original: RV_1,065.10 somo na vedhā ṛtaprajātaḥ paśur na śiśvā vibhur dūrebhāḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ na vedhāḥ ṛta prajātaḥ paśuḥ na śiśvā vibhuḥ dūrebhāḥ

original: RV_1,066.01 rayir na citrā sūro na saṃdṛg āyur na prāṇo nityo na sūnuḥ //
analyzed: rayiḥ na citrā sūraḥ na saṃdṛś āyuḥ na prāṇaḥ nityaḥ na sūnuḥ

original: RV_1,066.02 takvā na bhūrṇir vanā siṣakti payo na dhenuḥ śucir vibhāvā //
analyzed: takvā na bhūrṇiḥ vanā siṣakti payaḥ na dhenuḥ śuciḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_1,066.03 dādhāra kṣemam oko na raṇvo yavo na pakvo jetā janānām //
analyzed: dādhāra kṣemam okaḥ na raṇvaḥ yavaḥ na pakvaḥ jetā janānām

original: RV_1,066.04 ṛṣir na stubhvā vikṣu praśasto vājī na prīto vayo dadhāti //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ na stubhvā vikṣu praśastaḥ vājī na prītaḥ vayaḥ dadhāti

original: RV_1,066.05 durokaśociḥ kratur na nityo jāyeva yonāv araṃ viśvasmai //
analyzed: duroka śociḥ kratuḥ na nityaḥ jāyā iva yonau aram viśvasmai

original: RV_1,066.06 citro yad abhrāṭ chveto na vikṣu ratho na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu //
analyzed: citraḥ yat abhrāṭ śvetaḥ na vikṣu rathaḥ na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu

original: RV_1,066.07 seneva sṛṣṭāmaṃ dadhāty astur na didyut tveṣapratīkā //
analyzed: senā iva sṛṣṭā āmam dadhāti astuḥ na didyut tveṣa pratīkā

original: RV_1,066.08 yamo ha jāto yamo janitvaṃ jāraḥ kanīnām patir janīnām //
analyzed: yamaḥ ha jātaḥ yamaḥ janitvam jāraḥ kanīnām patiḥ janīnām

original: RV_1,066.09 taṃ vaś carāthā vayaṃ vasatyāstaṃ na gāvo nakṣanta iddham //
analyzed: tam vaḥ carātha vayam vasatyā astam na gāvaḥ nakṣante iddham

original: RV_1,066.10 sindhur na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīr ainon navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke //
analyzed: sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīḥ ainot navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke

original: RV_1,067.01 vaneṣu jāyur marteṣu mitro vṛṇīte śruṣṭiṃ rājevājuryam //
analyzed: vaneṣu jāyuḥ marteṣu mitraḥ vṛṇīte śruṣṭim rājā iva ajuryam

original: RV_1,067.02 kṣemo na sādhuḥ kratur na bhadro bhuvat svādhīr hotā havyavāṭ //
analyzed: kṣemaḥ na sādhuḥ kratuḥ na bhadraḥ bhuvat svādhīḥ hotā havyavāṭ

original: RV_1,067.03 haste dadhāno nṛmṇā viśvāny ame devān dhād guhā niṣīdan //
analyzed: haste dadhānaḥ nṛmṇā viśvāni ame devān dhāt guhā niṣīdan

original: RV_1,067.04 vidantīm atra naro dhiyandhā hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrāṃ aśaṃsan //
analyzed: vidanti īm atra naraḥ hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrān aśaṃsan

original: RV_1,067.05 ajo na kṣāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ //
analyzed: ajaḥ na kṣām dādhāra pṛthivīm tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ

original: RV_1,067.06 priyā padāni paśvo ni pāhi viśvāyur agne guhā guhaṃ gāḥ //
analyzed: priyā padāni paśvaḥ ni pāhi viśvāyuḥ agne guhā guham gāḥ

original: RV_1,067.07 ya īṃ ciketa guhā bhavantam ā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya //
analyzed: yaḥ īm ciketa guhā bhavantam ā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya

original: RV_1,067.08 vi ye cṛtanty ṛtā sapanta ād id vasūni pra vavācāsmai //
analyzed: vi ye cṛtanti ṛtā sapantaḥ āt id vasūni pra vavāca asmai

original: RV_1,067.09 vi yo vīrutsu rodhan mahitvota prajā uta prasūṣv antaḥ //
analyzed: vi yaḥ vīrutsu rodhat mahitvā uta prajāḥ uta prasūṣu antar

original: RV_1,067.10 cittir apāṃ dame viśvāyuḥ sadmeva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ //
analyzed: cittiḥ apām dame viśvāyuḥ sadma iva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ

original: RV_1,068.01 śrīṇann upa sthād divam bhuraṇyu sthātuś caratham aktūn vy ūrṇot //
analyzed: śrīṇan upa sthāt divam bhuraṇyu sthātuḥ caratham aktūn vi ūrṇot

original: RV_1,068.02 pari yad eṣām eko viśveṣām bhuvad devo devānām mahitvā //
analyzed: pari yat eṣām ekaḥ viśveṣām bhuvat devaḥ devānām mahitvā

original: RV_1,068.03 ād it te viśve kratuṃ juṣanta śuṣkād yad deva jīvo janiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: āt id te viśve kratum juṣanta śuṣkāt yat deva jīvaḥ janiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_1,068.04 bhajanta viśve devatvaṃ nāma ṛtaṃ sapanto amṛtam evaiḥ //
analyzed: bhajanta viśve deva tvam nāma ṛtam sapantaḥ amṛtam evaiḥ

original: RV_1,068.05 ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītir viśvāyur viśve apāṃsi cakruḥ //
analyzed: ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītiḥ viśvāyuḥ viśve apāṃsi cakruḥ

original: RV_1,068.06 yas tubhyaṃ dāśād yo vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvān rayiṃ dayasva //
analyzed: yaḥ tubhyam dāśāt yaḥ vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvān rayim dayasva

original: RV_1,068.07 hotā niṣatto manor apatye sa cin nv āsām patī rayīṇām //
analyzed: hotā niṣattaḥ manoḥ apatye sa cit nu āsām patiḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_1,068.08 icchanta reto mithas tanūṣu saṃ jānata svair dakṣair amūrāḥ //
analyzed: icchanta retaḥ mithas tanūṣu sam jānata svaiḥ dakṣaiḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_1,068.09 pitur na putrāḥ kratuṃ juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsaṃ turāsaḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ na putrāḥ kratum juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsam turāsaḥ

original: RV_1,068.10 vi rāya aurṇod duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākaṃ stṛbhir damūnāḥ //
analyzed: vi rāyaḥ aurṇot duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākam stṛbhiḥ damūnāḥ

original: RV_1,069.01 śukraḥ śuśukvāṃ uṣo na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divo na jyotiḥ //
analyzed: śukraḥ śuśukvām uṣaḥ na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divaḥ na jyotiḥ

original: RV_1,069.02 pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvo devānām pitā putraḥ san //
analyzed: pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvaḥ devānām pitā putraḥ san

original: RV_1,069.03 vedhā adṛpto agnir vijānann ūdhar na gonāṃ svādmā pitūnām //
analyzed: vedhāḥ adṛptaḥ agniḥ vijānan ūdhar na gonām svādmā pitūnām

original: RV_1,069.04 jane na śeva āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣatto raṇvo duroṇe //
analyzed: jane na śevaḥ āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣattaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe

original: RV_1,069.05 putro na jāto raṇvo duroṇe vājī na prīto viśo vi tārīt //
analyzed: putraḥ na jātaḥ raṇvaḥ duroṇe vājī na prītaḥ viśaḥ vi tārīt

original: RV_1,069.06 viśo yad ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷā agnir devatvā viśvāny aśyāḥ //
analyzed: viśaḥ yat ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷāḥ agniḥ deva tvā viśvāni aśyāḥ

original: RV_1,069.07 nakiṣ ṭa etā vratā minanti nṛbhyo yad ebhyaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakartha //
analyzed: nakir ṭe etā vratā minanti nṛbhyaḥ yat ebhyaḥ śruṣṭim cakartha

original: RV_1,069.08 tat tu te daṃso yad ahan samānair nṛbhir yad yukto vive rapāṃsi //
analyzed: tat tu te daṃsaḥ yat ahan samānaiḥ nṛbhiḥ yat yuktaḥ viveḥ rapāṃsi

original: RV_1,069.09 uṣo na jāro vibhāvosraḥ saṃjñātarūpaś ciketad asmai //
analyzed: uṣaḥ na jāraḥ vibhāvā usraḥ saṃjñāta rūpaḥ ciketat asmai

original: RV_1,069.10 tmanā vahanto duro vy ṛṇvan navanta viśve svar dṛśīke //
analyzed: tmanā vahantaḥ duraḥ vi ṛṇvan navanta viśve svar dṛśīke

original: RV_1,070.01 vanema pūrvīr aryo manīṣā agniḥ suśoko viśvāny aśyāḥ //
analyzed: vanema pūrvīḥ aryaḥ manīṣāḥ agniḥ su śokaḥ viśvāni aśyāḥ

original: RV_1,070.02 ā daivyāni vratā cikitvān ā mānuṣasya janasya janma //
analyzed: ā daivyāni vratā cikitvān ā mānuṣasya janasya janma

original: RV_1,070.03 garbho yo apāṃ garbho vanānāṃ garbhaś ca sthātāṃ garbhaś carathām //
analyzed: garbhaḥ yaḥ apām garbhaḥ vanānām garbhaḥ ca sthātām garbhaḥ carathām

original: RV_1,070.04 adrau cid asmā antar duroṇe viśāṃ na viśvo amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ //
analyzed: adrau cit asmai antar duroṇe viśām na viśvaḥ amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ

original: RV_1,070.05 sa hi kṣapāvāṃ agnī rayīṇāṃ dāśad yo asmā araṃ sūktaiḥ //
analyzed: sa hi kṣapāvān agniḥ rayīṇām dāśat yaḥ asmai aram sūktaiḥ

original: RV_1,070.06 etā cikitvo bhūmā ni pāhi devānāṃ janma martāṃś ca vidvān //
analyzed: etā cikitvaḥ bhūmā ni pāhi devānām janma martān ca vidvān

original: RV_1,070.07 vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapo virūpā sthātuś ca ratham ṛtapravītam //
analyzed: vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapaḥ virūpā sthātuḥ ca ratham ṛta pravītam

original: RV_1,070.08 arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvāny apāṃsi satyā //
analyzed: arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvāni apāṃsi satyā

original: RV_1,070.09 goṣu praśastiṃ vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve baliṃ svar ṇaḥ //
analyzed: goṣu praśastim vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve balim svar naḥ

original: RV_1,070.10 vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pitur na jivrer vi vedo bharanta //
analyzed: vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pituḥ na jivreḥ vi vedaḥ bharanta

original: RV_1,070.11 sādhur na gṛdhnur asteva śūro yāteva bhīmas tveṣaḥ samatsu //
analyzed: sādhuḥ na gṛdhnuḥ astā iva śūraḥ yātā iva bhīmaḥ tveṣaḥ samatsu

original: RV_1,071.01a upa pra jinvann uśatīr uśantam patiṃ na nityaṃ janayaḥ sanīḷāḥ /
analyzed: upa pra jinvan uśatīḥ uśantam patim na nityam janayaḥ sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_1,071.01c svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣrañ citram ucchantīm uṣasaṃ na gāvaḥ //
analyzed: svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣram citram ucchantīm uṣasam na gāvaḥ

original: RV_1,071.02a vīḷu cid dṛḷhā pitaro na ukthair adriṃ rujann aṅgiraso raveṇa /
analyzed: vīḷu cit dṛḷhā pitaraḥ naḥ ukthaiḥ adrim rujan aṅgirasaḥ raveṇa

original: RV_1,071.02c cakrur divo bṛhato gātum asme ahaḥ svar vividuḥ ketum usrāḥ //
analyzed: cakruḥ divaḥ bṛhataḥ gātum asme ahar svar vividuḥ ketum usrāḥ

original: RV_1,071.03a dadhann ṛtaṃ dhanayann asya dhītim ād id aryo didhiṣvo vibhṛtrāḥ /
analyzed: dadhan ṛtam dhanayan asya dhītim āt id aryaḥ didhiṣvaḥ vibhṛtrāḥ

original: RV_1,071.03c atṛṣyantīr apaso yanty acchā devāñ janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ //
analyzed: a tṛṣyantīḥ apasaḥ yanti acchā devām janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ

original: RV_1,071.04a mathīd yad īṃ vibhṛto mātariśvā gṛhe-gṛhe śyeto jenyo bhūt /
analyzed: mathīt yat īm vibhṛtaḥ mātariśvā gṛhe gṛhe śyetaḥ jenyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_1,071.04c ād īṃ rājñe na sahīyase sacā sann ā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇo vivāya //
analyzed: āt īm rājñe na sahīyase sacā san ā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇaḥ vivāya

original: RV_1,071.05a mahe yat pitra īṃ rasaṃ dive kar ava tsarat pṛśanyaś cikitvān /
analyzed: mahe yat pitre īm rasam dive kaḥ ava tsarat pṛśanyaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_1,071.05c sṛjad astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai svāyāṃ devo duhitari tviṣiṃ dhāt //
analyzed: sṛjat astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai svāyām devaḥ duhitari tviṣim dhāt

original: RV_1,071.06a sva ā yas tubhyaṃ dama ā vibhāti namo vā dāśād uśato anu dyūn /
analyzed: sve ā yaḥ tubhyam dame ā vibhāti namaḥ vā dāśāt uśataḥ anu dyūn

original: RV_1,071.06c vardho agne vayo asya dvibarhā yāsad rāyā sarathaṃ yaṃ junāsi //
analyzed: vardha u agne vayaḥ asya dvibarhāḥ yāsat rāyā sa ratham yam junāsi

original: RV_1,071.07a agniṃ viśvā abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudraṃ na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ /
analyzed: agnim viśvāḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudram na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ

original: RV_1,071.07c na jāmibhir vi cikite vayo no vidā deveṣu pramatiṃ cikitvān //
analyzed: na jāmibhiḥ vi cikite vayaḥ naḥ vidāḥ deveṣu pramatim cikitvān

original: RV_1,071.08a ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ chuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaur abhīke /
analyzed: ā yat iṣe nṛpatim tejaḥ ānaṭ śuci retaḥ niṣiktam dyauḥ abhīke

original: RV_1,071.08c agniḥ śardham anavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayac ca //
analyzed: agniḥ śardham anavadyam yuvānam svādhyam janayat sūdayat ca

original: RV_1,071.09a mano na yo 'dhvanaḥ sadya ety ekaḥ satrā sūro vasva īśe /
analyzed: manaḥ na yaḥ dhvanaḥ sadyas eti ekaḥ satrā sūraḥ vasvaḥ īśe

original: RV_1,071.09c rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī goṣu priyam amṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇā //
analyzed: rājānā mitrāvaruṇā su pāṇī goṣu priyam amṛtam rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_1,071.10a mā no agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhā abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san /
analyzed: mā naḥ agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhāḥ abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san

original: RV_1,071.10c nabho na rūpaṃ jarimā mināti purā tasyā abhiśaster adhīhi //
analyzed: nabhaḥ na rūpam jarimā mināti purā tasyāḥ abhiśasteḥ adhīhi

original: RV_1,072.01a ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvatas kar haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi /
analyzed: ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvataḥ kaḥ haste dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi

original: RV_1,072.01c agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇāṃ satrā cakrāṇo amṛtāni viśvā //
analyzed: agniḥ bhuvat rayi patiḥ rayīṇām satrā cakrāṇaḥ amṛtāni viśvā

original: RV_1,072.02a asme vatsam pari ṣantaṃ na vindann icchanto viśve amṛtā amūrāḥ /
analyzed: asme vatsam pari santam na vindan icchantaḥ viśve amṛtāḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_1,072.02c śramayuvaḥ padavyo dhiyandhās tasthuḥ pade parame cārv agneḥ //
analyzed: śramayuvaḥ padavyaḥ dhiyandhāḥ tasthuḥ pade parame cāru agneḥ

original: RV_1,072.03a tisro yad agne śaradas tvām ic chuciṃ ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān /
analyzed: tisraḥ yat agne śaradaḥ tvām id śucim ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān

original: RV_1,072.03c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāny asūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ //
analyzed: nāmāni cit dadhire yajñiyāni asūdayanta tanvaḥ su jātāḥ

original: RV_1,072.04a ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyāḥ jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,072.04c vidan marto nemadhitā cikitvān agnim pade parame tasthivāṃsam //
analyzed: vidat martaḥ nemadhitā cikitvān agnim pade parame tasthivāṃsam

original: RV_1,072.05a saṃjānānā upa sīdann abhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyan /
analyzed: saṃjānānāḥ upa sīdan abhijñu patnīvantaḥ namasyam namasyan

original: RV_1,072.05c ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyur nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: ririkvāṃsaḥ tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_1,072.06a triḥ sapta yad guhyāni tve it padāvidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tris sapta yat guhyāni tve id padā avidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,072.06c tebhī rakṣante amṛtaṃ sajoṣāḥ paśūñ ca sthātṝñ carathaṃ ca pāhi //
analyzed: tebhiḥ rakṣante amṛtam sajoṣāḥ paśūm ca sthātṝm caratham ca pāhi

original: RV_1,072.07a vidvāṃ agne vayunāni kṣitīnāṃ vy ānuṣak churudho jīvase dhāḥ /
analyzed: vidvān agne vayunāni kṣitīnām vi ānuṣak śurudhaḥ jīvase dhāḥ

original: RV_1,072.07c antarvidvāṃ adhvano devayānān atandro dūto abhavo havirvāṭ //
analyzed: antar vidvān adhvanaḥ deva yānān atandraḥ dūtaḥ abhavaḥ haviḥ vāh

original: RV_1,072.08a svādhyo diva ā sapta yahvī rāyo duro vy ṛtajñā ajānan /
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ divaḥ ā sapta yahvī rāyaḥ duraḥ vi ṛta jñāḥ ajānan

original: RV_1,072.08c vidad gavyaṃ saramā dṛḷham ūrvaṃ yenā nu kam mānuṣī bhojate viṭ //
analyzed: vidat gavyam saramā dṛḍham ūrvam yena ā nu kam mānuṣī bhojate viś

original: RV_1,072.09a ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum /
analyzed: ā ye viśvā su apatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāsaḥ amṛta tvāya gātum

original: RV_1,072.09c mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putrair aditir dhāyase veḥ //
analyzed: mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putraiḥ aditiḥ dhāyase veḥ

original: RV_1,072.10a adhi śriyaṃ ni dadhuś cārum asmin divo yad akṣī amṛtā akṛṇvan /
analyzed: adhi śriyam ni dadhuḥ cārum asmin divaḥ yat akṣī amṛtāḥ akṛṇvan

original: RV_1,072.10c adha kṣaranti sindhavo na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nīcīr agne aruṣīr ajānan //
analyzed: adha kṣaranti sindhavaḥ na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nīcīḥ agne aruṣīḥ ajānan

original: RV_1,073.01a rayir na yaḥ pitṛvitto vayodhāḥ supraṇītiś cikituṣo na śāsuḥ /
analyzed: rayiḥ na yaḥ pitṛ vittaḥ vayodhāḥ su praṇītiḥ cikituṣaḥ na śāsuḥ

original: RV_1,073.01c syonaśīr atithir na prīṇāno hoteva sadma vidhato vi tārīt //
analyzed: syonaśīḥ atithiḥ na prīṇānaḥ hotā iva sadma vidhataḥ vi tārīt

original: RV_1,073.02a devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā /
analyzed: devaḥ na yaḥ savitā satya manmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,073.02c purupraśasto amatir na satya ātmeva śevo didhiṣāyyo bhūt //
analyzed: puru praśastaḥ amatiḥ na satyaḥ ātmā iva śevaḥ didhiṣāyyaḥ bhūt

original: RV_1,073.03a devo na yaḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upakṣeti hitamitro na rājā /
analyzed: devaḥ na yaḥ pṛthivīm viśva dhāyas upakṣeti hita mitraḥ na rājā

original: RV_1,073.03c puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā anavadyā patijuṣṭeva nārī //
analyzed: puraḥsadaḥ śarma sadaḥ na vīrāḥ anavadyā pati juṣṭā iva nārī

original: RV_1,073.04a taṃ tvā naro dama ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu /
analyzed: tam tvā naraḥ dame ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu

original: RV_1,073.04c adhi dyumnaṃ ni dadhur bhūry asmin bhavā viśvāyur dharuṇo rayīṇām //
analyzed: adhi dyumnam ni dadhuḥ bhūri asmin bhava viśvāyuḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām

original: RV_1,073.05a vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyur vi sūrayo dadato viśvam āyuḥ /
analyzed: vi pṛkṣaḥ agne maghavānaḥ aśyuḥ vi sūrayaḥ dadataḥ viśvam āyuḥ

original: RV_1,073.05c sanema vājaṃ samitheṣv aryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: sanema vājam samitheṣu aryaḥ bhāgam deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ

original: RV_1,073.06a ṛtasya hi dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi dhenavaḥ vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyu bhaktāḥ

original: RV_1,073.06c parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇā vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasrur adrim //
analyzed: parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasruḥ adrim

original: RV_1,073.07a tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇā divi śravo dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ divi śravaḥ dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,073.07c naktā ca cakrur uṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃ dhuḥ //
analyzed: naktā ca cakruḥ uṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇam ca varṇam aruṇam ca sam dhuḥ

original: RV_1,073.08a yān rāye martān suṣūdo agne te syāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca /
analyzed: yān rāye martān suṣūdaḥ agne te syāma maghavānaḥ vayam ca

original: RV_1,073.08c chāyeva viśvam bhuvanaṃ sisakṣy āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam //
analyzed: chāyā iva viśvam bhuvanam sisakṣi āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam

original: RV_1,073.09a arvadbhir agne arvato nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ /
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ agne arvataḥ nṛbhiḥ nṝn vīraiḥ vīrān vanuyāma tvotāḥ

original: RV_1,073.09c īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyo vi sūrayaḥ śatahimā no aśyuḥ //
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ pitṛ vittasya rāyaḥ vi sūrayaḥ śata himā naḥ aśyuḥ

original: RV_1,073.10a etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca /
analyzed: etā te agne ucathāni vedhaḥ juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca

original: RV_1,073.10c śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: śakema rāyaḥ su dhuraḥ yamam te dhi śravaḥ deva bhaktam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_1,074.01a upaprayanto adhvaram mantraṃ vocemāgnaye /
analyzed: upaprayantaḥ adhvaram mantram vocema agnaye

original: RV_1,074.01c āre asme ca śṛṇvate //
analyzed: āre asme ca śṛṇvate

original: RV_1,074.02a yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,074.02c arakṣad dāśuṣe gayam //
analyzed: arakṣat dāśuṣe gayam

original: RV_1,074.03a uta bruvantu jantava ud agnir vṛtrahājani /
analyzed: uta bruvantu jantavaḥ ud agniḥ vṛtra hā ajani

original: RV_1,074.03c dhanañjayo raṇe-raṇe //
analyzed: dhanañjayaḥ raṇeraṇe

original: RV_1,074.04a yasya dūto asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye /
analyzed: yasya dūtaḥ asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye

original: RV_1,074.04c dasmat kṛṇoṣy adhvaram //
analyzed: dasmat kṛṇoṣi adhvaram

original: RV_1,074.05a tam it suhavyam aṅgiraḥ sudevaṃ sahaso yaho /
analyzed: tam id su havyam aṅgiraḥ su devam sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_1,074.05c janā āhuḥ subarhiṣam //
analyzed: janai āhuḥ su barhiṣam

original: RV_1,074.06a ā ca vahāsi tāṃ iha devāṃ upa praśastaye /
analyzed: ā ca vahāsi tām iha devām upa praśastaye

original: RV_1,074.06c havyā suścandra vītaye //
analyzed: havyā su ścandra vītaye

original: RV_1,074.07a na yor upabdir aśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kac cana /
analyzed: na upabdiḥ aśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kat cana

original: RV_1,074.07c yad agne yāsi dūtyam //
analyzed: yat agne yāsi dūtyam

original: RV_1,074.08a tvoto vājy ahrayo 'bhi pūrvasmād aparaḥ /
analyzed: tvotaḥ vājī ahrayaḥ bhi pūrvasmāt aparaḥ

original: RV_1,074.08c pra dāśvāṃ agne asthāt //
analyzed: pra dāśvān agne asthāt

original: RV_1,074.09a uta dyumat suvīryam bṛhad agne vivāsasi /
analyzed: uta dyumat su vīryam bṛhat agne vivāsasi

original: RV_1,074.09c devebhyo deva dāśuṣe //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ deva dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,075.01a juṣasva saprathastamaṃ vaco devapsarastamam /
analyzed: juṣasva saprathastamam vacaḥ deva psarastamam

original: RV_1,075.01c havyā juhvāna āsani //
analyzed: havyā juhvānaḥ āsani

original: RV_1,075.02a athā te aṅgirastamāgne vedhastama priyam /
analyzed: athā te aṅgirastama agne vedhastama priyam

original: RV_1,075.02c vocema brahma sānasi //
analyzed: vocema brahma sānasi

original: RV_1,075.03a kas te jāmir janānām agne ko dāśvadhvaraḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ te jāmiḥ janānām agne kaḥ dāśu adhvaraḥ

original: RV_1,075.03c ko ha kasminn asi śritaḥ //
analyzed: kaḥ ha kasmin asi śritaḥ

original: RV_1,075.04a tvaṃ jāmir janānām agne mitro asi priyaḥ /
analyzed: tvam jāmiḥ janānām agne mitraḥ asi priyaḥ

original: RV_1,075.04c sakhā sakhibhya īḍyaḥ //
analyzed: sakhā sakhibhyaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_1,075.05a yajā no mitrāvaruṇā yajā devāṃ ṛtam bṛhat /
analyzed: yaja naḥ mitrāvaruṇā yaja devān ṛtam bṛhat

original: RV_1,075.05c agne yakṣi svaṃ damam //
analyzed: agne yakṣi svam damam

original: RV_1,076.01a kā ta upetir manaso varāya bhuvad agne śantamā kā manīṣā /
analyzed: kā te upetiḥ manasaḥ varāya bhuvat agne śantamā kā manīṣā

original: RV_1,076.01c ko vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣaṃ ta āpa kena vā te manasā dāśema //
analyzed: kaḥ vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣam te āpa kena vā te manasā dāśema

original: RV_1,076.02a ehy agna iha hotā ni ṣīdādabdhaḥ su puraetā bhavā naḥ /
analyzed: ehi agne iha hotā ni sīda adabdhaḥ su puraetā bhava naḥ

original: RV_1,076.02c avatāṃ tvā rodasī viśvaminve yajā mahe saumanasāya devān //
analyzed: avatām tvā rodasī viśvaminve yaja mahe saumanasāya devān

original: RV_1,076.03a pra su viśvān rakṣaso dhakṣy agne bhavā yajñānām abhiśastipāvā /
analyzed: pra su viśvān rakṣasaḥ dhakṣi agne bhava yajñānām abhiśasti pāvā

original: RV_1,076.03c athā vaha somapatiṃ haribhyām ātithyam asmai cakṛmā sudāvne //
analyzed: athā vaha soma patim haribhyām ātithyam asmai cakṛma sudāvne

original: RV_1,076.04a prajāvatā vacasā vahnir āsā ca huve ni ca satsīha devaiḥ /
analyzed: prajāvatā vacasā vahniḥ āsā ca huve ni ca satsi iha devaiḥ

original: RV_1,076.04c veṣi hotram uta potraṃ yajatra bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām //
analyzed: veṣi hotram uta potram yajatra bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām

original: RV_1,076.05a yathā viprasya manuṣo havirbhir devāṃ ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san /
analyzed: yathā viprasya manuṣaḥ havirbhiḥ devān ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san

original: RV_1,076.05c evā hotaḥ satyatara tvam adyāgne mandrayā juhvā yajasva //
analyzed: eva hotar satyatara tvam adya agne mandrayā juhvā yajasva

original: RV_1,077.01a kathā dāśemāgnaye kāsmai devajuṣṭocyate bhāmine gīḥ /
analyzed: kathā dāśema agnaye kā asmai deva juṣṭā ucyate bhāmine gīḥ

original: RV_1,077.01c yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭha it kṛṇoti devān //
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu amṛtaḥ ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ id kṛṇoti devān

original: RV_1,077.02a yo adhvareṣu śantama ṛtāvā hotā tam ū namobhir ā kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: yaḥ adhvareṣu śantamaḥ ṛtāvā hotā tam u namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_1,077.02c agnir yad ver martāya devān sa cā bodhāti manasā yajāti //
analyzed: agniḥ yat veḥ martāya devān sa ca ā bodhāti manasā yajāti

original: RV_1,077.03a sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhur mitro na bhūd adbhutasya rathīḥ /
analyzed: sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhuḥ mitraḥ na bhūt adbhutasya rathīḥ

original: RV_1,077.03c tam medheṣu prathamaṃ devayantīr viśa upa bruvate dasmam ārīḥ //
analyzed: tam medheṣu prathamam devayantīḥ viśaḥ upa bruvate dasmam ārīḥ

original: RV_1,077.04a sa no nṛṇāṃ nṛtamo riśādā agnir giro 'vasā vetu dhītim /
analyzed: sa naḥ nṛṇām nṛtamaḥ riśādāḥ agniḥ giraḥ vasā vetu dhītim

original: RV_1,077.04c tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭhā vājaprasūtā iṣayanta manma //
analyzed: tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭhāḥ vāja prasūtāḥ iṣayanta manma

original: RV_1,077.05a evāgnir gotamebhir ṛtāvā viprebhir astoṣṭa jātavedāḥ /
analyzed: eva agniḥ gotamebhiḥ ṛtāvā viprebhiḥ astoṣṭa jātavedāḥ

original: RV_1,077.05c sa eṣu dyumnam pīpayat sa vājaṃ sa puṣṭiṃ yāti joṣam ā cikitvān //
analyzed: saḥ eṣu dyumnam pīpayat sa vājam sa puṣṭim yāti joṣam ā cikitvān

original: RV_1,078.01a abhi tvā gotamā girā jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
analyzed: abhi tvā gotamāḥ girā jātavedaḥ vicarṣaṇe

original: RV_1,078.01c dyumnair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_1,078.02a tam u tvā gotamo girā rāyaskāmo duvasyati /
analyzed: tam u tvā gotamaḥ girā rāyaskāmaḥ duvasyati

original: RV_1,078.02c dyumnair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_1,078.03a tam u tvā vājasātamam aṅgirasvad dhavāmahe /
analyzed: tam u tvā vāja sātamam aṅgirasvat havāmahe

original: RV_1,078.03c dyumnair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_1,078.04a tam u tvā vṛtrahantamaṃ yo dasyūṃr avadhūnuṣe /
analyzed: tam u tvā vṛtra hantamam yaḥ dasyūṃr avadhūnuṣe

original: RV_1,078.04c dyumnair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_1,078.05a avocāma rahūgaṇā agnaye madhumad vacaḥ /
analyzed: avocāma rahūgaṇāḥ agnaye madhumat vacaḥ

original: RV_1,078.05c dyumnair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ //
analyzed: dyumnaiḥ abhi pra ṇonumaḥ

original: RV_1,079.01a hiraṇyakeśo rajaso visāre 'hir dhunir vāta iva dhrajīmān /
analyzed: hiraṇya keśaḥ rajasaḥ visāre hiḥ dhuniḥ vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān

original: RV_1,079.01c śucibhrājā uṣaso navedā yaśasvatīr apasyuvo na satyāḥ //
analyzed: śuci bhrājāḥ uṣasaḥ navedāḥ yaśasvatīḥ apasyuvaḥ na satyāḥ

original: RV_1,079.02a ā te suparṇā aminantaṃ evaiḥ kṛṣṇo nonāva vṛṣabho yadīdam /
analyzed: ā te suparṇau aminantam evaiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam

original: RV_1,079.02c śivābhir na smayamānābhir āgāt patanti miha stanayanty abhrā //
analyzed: śivābhiḥ na smayamānābhiḥ āgāt patanti mihaḥ stanayanti abhrā

original: RV_1,079.03a yad īm ṛtasya payasā piyāno nayann ṛtasya pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ /
analyzed: yat īm ṛtasya payasā piyānaḥ nayan ṛtasya pathibhiḥ rajiṣṭhaiḥ

original: RV_1,079.03c aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ parijmā tvacam pṛñcanty uparasya yonau //
analyzed: aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ parijmā tvacam pṛñcanti uparasya yonau

original: RV_1,079.04a agne vājasya gomata īśānaḥ sahaso yaho /
analyzed: agne vājasya gomataḥ īśānaḥ sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_1,079.04c asme dhehi jātavedo mahi śravaḥ //
analyzed: asme dhehi jātavedaḥ mahi śravaḥ

original: RV_1,079.05a sa idhāno vasuṣ kavir agnir īḷenyo girā /
analyzed: saḥ idhānaḥ vasuṣ kaviḥ agniḥ īḍenyaḥ girā

original: RV_1,079.05c revad asmabhyam purvaṇīka dīdihi //
analyzed: revat asmabhyam purvaṇīka dīdihi

original: RV_1,079.06a kṣapo rājann uta tmanāgne vastor utoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: kṣapaḥ rājan uta tmanā agne vastoḥ uta uṣasaḥ

original: RV_1,079.06c sa tigmajambha rakṣaso daha prati //
analyzed: sa tigma jambha rakṣasaḥ daha prati

original: RV_1,079.07a avā no agna ūtibhir gāyatrasya prabharmaṇi /
analyzed: ava naḥ agne ūtibhiḥ gāyatrasya prabharmaṇi

original: RV_1,079.07c viśvāsu dhīṣu vandya //
analyzed: viśvāsu dhīṣu vandya

original: RV_1,079.08a ā no agne rayim bhara satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyam /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne rayim bhara satrāsāham vareṇyam

original: RV_1,079.08c viśvāsu pṛtsu duṣṭaram //
analyzed: viśvāsu pṛtsu duṣṭaram

original: RV_1,079.09a ā no agne sucetunā rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam /
analyzed: ā naḥ agne su cetunā rayim viśvāyu poṣasam

original: RV_1,079.09c mārḍīkaṃ dhehi jīvase //
analyzed: mārḍīkam dhehi jīvase

original: RV_1,079.10a pra pūtās tigmaśociṣe vāco gotamāgnaye /
analyzed: pra pūtāḥ tigma śociṣe vācaḥ gotama agnaye

original: RV_1,079.10c bharasva sumnayur giraḥ //
analyzed: bharasva sumnayuḥ giraḥ

original: RV_1,079.11a yo no agne 'bhidāsaty anti dūre padīṣṭa saḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ agne bhidāsati anti dūre padīṣṭa saḥ

original: RV_1,079.11c asmākam id vṛdhe bhava //
analyzed: asmākam id vṛdhe bhava

original: RV_1,079.12a sahasrākṣo vicarṣaṇir agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati /
analyzed: sahasra akṣaḥ vicarṣaṇiḥ agniḥ rakṣāṃsi sedhati

original: RV_1,079.12c hotā gṛṇīta ukthyaḥ //
analyzed: hotā gṛṇīte ukthyaḥ

original: RV_1,080.01a itthā hi soma in made brahmā cakāra vardhanam /
analyzed: itthā hi some id made brahmā cakāra vardhanam

original: RV_1,080.01c śaviṣṭha vajrinn ojasā pṛthivyā niḥ śaśā ahim arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: śaviṣṭha vajrin ojasā pṛthivyāḥ niḥ śaśāḥ ahim arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.02a sa tvāmadad vṛṣā madaḥ somaḥ śyenābhṛtaḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: sa tvā amadat vṛṣā madaḥ somaḥ śyena ābhṛtaḥ sutaḥ

original: RV_1,080.02c yenā vṛtraṃ nir adbhyo jaghantha vajrinn ojasārcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: yena vṛtram niḥ adbhyaḥ jaghantha vajrin ojasā arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.03a prehy abhīhi dhṛṣṇuhi na te vajro ni yaṃsate /
analyzed: prehi abhīhi dhṛṣṇuhi na te vajraḥ ni yaṃsate

original: RV_1,080.03c indra nṛmṇaṃ hi te śavo hano vṛtraṃ jayā apo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: indra nṛmṇam hi te śavaḥ hanaḥ vṛtram jayāḥ apaḥ rcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.04a nir indra bhūmyā adhi vṛtraṃ jaghantha nir divaḥ /
analyzed: niḥ indra bhūmyāḥ adhi vṛtram jaghantha niḥ divaḥ

original: RV_1,080.04c sṛjā marutvatīr ava jīvadhanyā imā apo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: sṛja marutvatīḥ ava jīva dhanyāḥ imāḥ apaḥ rcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.05a indro vṛtrasya dodhataḥ sānuṃ vajreṇa hīḷitaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrasya dodhataḥ sānum vajreṇa hi iḍitaḥ

original: RV_1,080.05c abhikramyāva jighnate 'paḥ sarmāya codayann arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: abhikramya ava jighnate paḥ sarmāya codayan arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.06a adhi sānau ni jighnate vajreṇa śataparvaṇā /
analyzed: adhi sānau ni jighnate vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: RV_1,080.06c mandāna indro andhasaḥ sakhibhyo gātum icchaty arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: mandānaḥ indraḥ andhasaḥ sakhibhyaḥ gātum icchati arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.07a indra tubhyam id adrivo 'nuttaṃ vajrin vīryam /
analyzed: indra tubhyam id adrivas nuttam vajrin vīryam

original: RV_1,080.07c yad dha tyam māyinam mṛgaṃ tam u tvam māyayāvadhīr arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: yat ha tyam māyinam mṛgam tam u tvam māyayā avadhīḥ arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.08a vi te vajrāso asthiran navatiṃ nāvyā anu /
analyzed: vi te vajrāsaḥ asthiran navatim nāvyāḥ anu

original: RV_1,080.08c mahat ta indra vīryam bāhvos te balaṃ hitam arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: mahat te indra vīryam bāhvoḥ te balam hitam arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.09a sahasraṃ sākam arcata pari ṣṭobhata viṃśatiḥ /
analyzed: sahasram sākam arcata pari stobhata viṃśatiḥ

original: RV_1,080.09c śatainam anv anonavur indrāya brahmodyatam arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: śatā enam anu anonavuḥ indrāya brahma udyatam arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.10a indro vṛtrasya taviṣīṃ nir ahan sahasā sahaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtrasya taviṣīm niḥ ahan sahasā sahaḥ

original: RV_1,080.10c mahat tad asya pauṃsyaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: mahat tat asya pauṃsyam vṛtram jaghanvān asṛjat arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.11a ime cit tava manyave vepete bhiyasā mahī /
analyzed: ime cit tava manyave vepete bhiyasā mahī

original: RV_1,080.11c yad indra vajrinn ojasā vṛtram marutvāṃ avadhīr arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: yat indra vajrin ojasā vṛtram marutvān avadhīḥ arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.12a na vepasā na tanyatendraṃ vṛtro vi bībhayat /
analyzed: na vepasā na tanyatā indram vṛtraḥ vi bībhayat

original: RV_1,080.12c abhy enaṃ vajra āyasaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭir āyatārcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: abhi enam vajraḥ āyasaḥ sahasra bhṛṣṭiḥ āyata arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.13a yad vṛtraṃ tava cāśaniṃ vajreṇa samayodhayaḥ /
analyzed: yat vṛtram tava ca aśanim vajreṇa samayodhayaḥ

original: RV_1,080.13c ahim indra jighāṃsato divi te badbadhe śavo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: ahim indra jighāṃsataḥ divi te badbadhe śavaḥ rcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.14a abhiṣṭane te adrivo yat sthā jagac ca rejate /
analyzed: abhiṣṭane te adrivas yat sthāḥ jagat ca rejate

original: RV_1,080.14c tvaṣṭā cit tava manyava indra vevijyate bhiyārcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā cit tava manyave indra vevijyate bhiyā arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.15a nahi nu yād adhīmasīndraṃ ko vīryā paraḥ /
analyzed: nahi nu yāt adhīmasi indram kaḥ vīryā paraḥ

original: RV_1,080.15c tasmin nṛmṇam uta kratuṃ devā ojāṃsi saṃ dadhur arcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: tasmin nṛmṇam uta kratum devāḥ ojāṃsi sam arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,080.16a yām atharvā manuṣ pitā dadhyaṅ dhiyam atnata /
analyzed: yām atharvā manuḥ pitā dadhyaṅ dhiyam atnata

original: RV_1,080.16c tasmin brahmāṇi pūrvathendra ukthā sam agmatārcann anu svarājyam //
analyzed: tasmin brahmāṇi pūrvathā indre ukthā sam agmata arcan anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,081.01a indro madāya vāvṛdhe śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ madāya vāvṛdhe śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,081.01c tam in mahatsv ājiṣūtem arbhe havāmahe sa vājeṣu pra no 'viṣat //
analyzed: tam id mahatsu ājiṣu uta īm arbhe havāmahe sa vājeṣu pra naḥ viṣat

original: RV_1,081.02a asi hi vīra senyo 'si bhūri parādadiḥ /
analyzed: asi hi vīra senyaḥ si bhūri parādadiḥ

original: RV_1,081.02c asi dabhrasya cid vṛdho yajamānāya śikṣasi sunvate bhūri te vasu //
analyzed: asi dabhrasya cit vṛdhaḥ yajamānāya śikṣasi sunvate bhūri te vasu

original: RV_1,081.03a yad udīrata ājayo dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā /
analyzed: yat udīrate ājayaḥ dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā

original: RV_1,081.03c yukṣvā madacyutā harī kaṃ hanaḥ kaṃ vasau dadho 'smāṃ indra vasau dadhaḥ //
analyzed: yukṣvā mada cyutā harī kam hanaḥ kam vasau dadhaḥ smām indra vasau dadhaḥ

original: RV_1,081.04a kratvā mahāṃ anuṣvadham bhīma ā vāvṛdhe śavaḥ /
analyzed: kratvā mahān anuṣvadham bhīmaḥ ā vāvṛdhe śavaḥ

original: RV_1,081.04c śriya ṛṣva upākayor ni śiprī harivān dadhe hastayor vajram āyasam //
analyzed: śriye ṛṣvaḥ upākayoḥ ni śiprī harivān dadhe hastayoḥ vajram āyasam

original: RV_1,081.05a ā paprau pārthivaṃ rajo badbadhe rocanā divi /
analyzed: ā paprau pārthivam rajaḥ badbadhe rocanā divi

original: RV_1,081.05c na tvāvāṃ indra kaś cana na jāto na janiṣyate 'ti viśvaṃ vavakṣitha //
analyzed: na tvāvān indra kaḥ cana na jātaḥ na janiṣyate ti viśvam vavakṣitha

original: RV_1,081.06a yo aryo martabhojanam parādadāti dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ aryaḥ marta bhojanam parādadāti dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,081.06c indro asmabhyaṃ śikṣatu vi bhajā bhūri te vasu bhakṣīya tava rādhasaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ asmabhyam śikṣatu vi bhaja bhūri te vasu bhakṣīya tava rādhasaḥ

original: RV_1,081.07a made-made hi no dadir yūthā gavām ṛjukratuḥ /
analyzed: mademade hi naḥ dadiḥ yūthā gavām ṛju kratuḥ

original: RV_1,081.07c saṃ gṛbhāya purū śatobhayāhastyā vasu śiśīhi rāya ā bhara //
analyzed: sam gṛbhāya purū śata ubhayā hastyā vasu śiśīhi rāyaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_1,081.08a mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase /
analyzed: mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase

original: RV_1,081.08c vidmā hi tvā purūvasum upa kāmān sasṛjmahe 'thā no 'vitā bhava //
analyzed: vidma hi tvā purūvasum upa kāmān sasṛjmahe thā naḥ vitā bhava

original: RV_1,081.09a ete ta indra jantavo viśvam puṣyanti vāryam /
analyzed: ete te indra jantavaḥ viśvam puṣyanti vāryam

original: RV_1,081.09c antar hi khyo janānām aryo vedo adāśuṣāṃ teṣāṃ no veda ā bhara //
analyzed: antar hi khyaḥ janānām aryaḥ vedaḥ a dāśuṣām teṣām naḥ vedaḥ ā bhara

original: RV_1,082.01a upo ṣu śṛṇuhī giro maghavan mātathā iva /
analyzed: upa u su śṛṇuhī giraḥ maghavan mā atathāḥ iva

original: RV_1,082.01c yadā naḥ sūnṛtāvataḥ kara ād arthayāsa id yojā nv indra te harī //
analyzed: yadā naḥ sūnṛtāvataḥ karaḥ āt arthayāse id yojā nu indra te harī

original: RV_1,082.02a akṣann amīmadanta hy ava priyā adhūṣata /
analyzed: akṣan amīmadanta hi ava priyāḥ adhūṣata

original: RV_1,082.02c astoṣata svabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayā matī yojā nv indra te harī //
analyzed: astoṣata sva bhānavaḥ viprāḥ naviṣṭhayā matī yojā nu indra te harī

original: RV_1,082.03a susaṃdṛśaṃ tvā vayam maghavan vandiṣīmahi /
analyzed: su saṃdṛśam tvā vayam maghavan vandiṣīmahi

original: RV_1,082.03c pra nūnam pūrṇavandhura stuto yāhi vaśāṃ anu yojā nv indra te harī //
analyzed: pra nūnam pūrṇa vandhura stutaḥ yāhi vaśām anu yojā nu indra te harī

original: RV_1,082.04a sa ghā taṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ ratham adhi tiṣṭhāti govidam /
analyzed: sa ghā tam vṛṣaṇam ratham adhi tiṣṭhāti go vidam

original: RV_1,082.04c yaḥ pātraṃ hāriyojanam pūrṇam indra ciketati yojā nv indra te harī //
analyzed: yaḥ pātram hāriyojanam pūrṇam indra ciketati yojā nu indra te harī

original: RV_1,082.05a yuktas te astu dakṣiṇa uta savyaḥ śatakrato /
analyzed: yuktaḥ te astu dakṣiṇaḥ uta savyaḥ śatakrato

original: RV_1,082.05c tena jāyām upa priyām mandāno yāhy andhaso yojā nv indra te harī //
analyzed: tena jāyām upa priyām mandānaḥ yāhi andhasaḥ yojā nu indra te harī

original: RV_1,082.06a yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_1,082.06c ut tvā sutāso rabhasā amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin sam u patnyāmadaḥ //
analyzed: ud tvā sutāsaḥ rabhasāḥ amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin sam u patnyā amadaḥ

original: RV_1,083.01a aśvāvati prathamo goṣu gacchati suprāvīr indra martyas tavotibhiḥ /
analyzed: aśvāvati prathamaḥ goṣu gacchati su prāvīḥ indra martyaḥ tava ūtibhiḥ

original: RV_1,083.01c tam it pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpo yathābhito vicetasaḥ //
analyzed: tam id pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpaḥ yathā abhitas vicetasaḥ

original: RV_1,083.02a āpo na devīr upa yanti hotriyam avaḥ paśyanti vitataṃ yathā rajaḥ /
analyzed: āpaḥ na devīḥ upa yanti hotriyam avaḥ paśyanti vitatam yathā rajaḥ

original: RV_1,083.02c prācair devāsaḥ pra ṇayanti devayum brahmapriyaṃ joṣayante varā iva //
analyzed: prācais devāsaḥ pra nayanti devayum brahma priyam joṣayante varāḥ iva

original: RV_1,083.03a adhi dvayor adadhā ukthyaṃ vaco yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ /
analyzed: adhi dvayoḥ adadhāḥ ukthyam vacaḥ yata srucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ

original: RV_1,083.03c asaṃyatto vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktir yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: a saṃyattaḥ vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktiḥ yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_1,083.04a ād aṅgirāḥ prathamaṃ dadhire vaya iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā ye sukṛtyayā /
analyzed: āt aṅgirāḥ prathamam dadhire vayaḥ iddha agnayaḥ śamyā ye su kṛtyayā

original: RV_1,083.04c sarvam paṇeḥ sam avindanta bhojanam aśvāvantaṃ gomantam ā paśuṃ naraḥ //
analyzed: sarvam paṇeḥ sam avindanta bhojanam aśvāvantam gomantam ā paśum naraḥ

original: RV_1,083.05a yajñair atharvā prathamaḥ pathas tate tataḥ sūryo vratapā vena ājani /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ pathaḥ tate tatas sūryaḥ vrata pāḥ venaḥ ājani

original: RV_1,083.05c ā gā ājad uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātam amṛtaṃ yajāmahe //
analyzed: ā gāḥ ājat uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātam amṛtam yajāmahe

original: RV_1,083.06a barhir vā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate 'rko vā ślokam āghoṣate divi /
analyzed: barhiḥ vā yat su apatyāya vṛjyate rkaḥ vā ślokam āghoṣate divi

original: RV_1,083.06c grāvā yatra vadati kārur ukthyas tasyed indro abhipitveṣu raṇyati //
analyzed: grāvā yatra vadati kāruḥ ukthyaḥ tasya id indraḥ abhipitveṣu raṇyati

original: RV_1,084.01a asāvi soma indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇav ā gahi /
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇo ā gahi

original: RV_1,084.01c ā tvā pṛṇaktv indriyaṃ rajaḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ //
analyzed: ā tvā pṛṇaktu indriyam rajaḥ sūryaḥ na raśmibhiḥ

original: RV_1,084.02a indram id dharī vahato 'pratidhṛṣṭaśavasam /
analyzed: indram id harī vahataḥ pratidhṛṣṭa śavasam

original: RV_1,084.02c ṛṣīṇāṃ ca stutīr upa yajñaṃ ca mānuṣāṇām //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām ca stutīḥ upa yajñam ca mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_1,084.03a ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan rathaṃ yuktā te brahmaṇā harī /
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham yuktā te brahmaṇā harī

original: RV_1,084.03c arvācīnaṃ su te mano grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā //
analyzed: arvācīnam su te manaḥ grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā

original: RV_1,084.04a imam indra sutam piba jyeṣṭham amartyam madam /
analyzed: imam indra sutam piba jyeṣṭham amartyam madam

original: RV_1,084.04c śukrasya tvābhy akṣaran dhārā ṛtasya sādane //
analyzed: śukrasya tvā abhi akṣaran dhārāḥ ṛtasya sādane

original: RV_1,084.05a indrāya nūnam arcatokthāni ca bravītana /
analyzed: indrāya nūnam arcata ukthāni ca bravītana

original: RV_1,084.05c sutā amatsur indavo jyeṣṭhaṃ namasyatā sahaḥ //
analyzed: sutāḥ amatsuḥ indavaḥ jyeṣṭham namasyata sahaḥ

original: RV_1,084.06a nakiṣ ṭvad rathītaro harī yad indra yacchase /
analyzed: nakir tvat rathītaraḥ harī yat indra yacchase

original: RV_1,084.06c nakiṣ ṭvānu majmanā nakiḥ svaśva ānaśe //
analyzed: nakir tvā anu majmanā nakir su aśvaḥ ānaśe

original: RV_1,084.07a ya eka id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe /
analyzed: yaḥ ekaḥ id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,084.07c īśāno apratiṣkuta indro aṅga //
analyzed: īśānaḥ apratiṣkutaḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_1,084.08a kadā martam arādhasam padā kṣumpam iva sphurat /
analyzed: kadā martam arādhasam padā kṣumpam iva sphurat

original: RV_1,084.08c kadā naḥ śuśravad gira indro aṅga //
analyzed: kadā naḥ śuśravat giraḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_1,084.09a yaś cid dhi tvā bahubhya ā sutāvāṃ āvivāsati /
analyzed: yaḥ cit hi tvā bahubhyaḥ ā sutāvān āvivāsati

original: RV_1,084.09c ugraṃ tat patyate śava indro aṅga //
analyzed: ugram tat patyate śavaḥ indraḥ aṅga

original: RV_1,084.10a svādor itthā viṣūvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ /
analyzed: svādoḥ itthā viṣūvataḥ madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ

original: RV_1,084.10c yā indreṇa sayāvarīr vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīr anu svarājyam //
analyzed: yāḥ indreṇa sa yāvarīḥ vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,084.11a tā asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somam śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ

original: RV_1,084.11c priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr anu svarājyam //
analyzed: priyāḥ indrasya dhenavaḥ vajram hinvanti sāyakam vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,084.12a tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ

original: RV_1,084.12c vratāny asya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīr anu svarājyam //
analyzed: vratāni asya saścire purūṇi pūrva cittaye vasvīḥ anu sva rājyam

original: RV_1,084.13a indro dadhīco asthabhir vṛtrāṇy apratiṣkutaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ dadhīcaḥ asthabhiḥ vṛtrāṇi apratiṣkutaḥ

original: RV_1,084.13c jaghāna navatīr nava //
analyzed: jaghāna navatīḥ nava

original: RV_1,084.14a icchann aśvasya yac chiraḥ parvateṣv apaśritam /
analyzed: icchan aśvasya yat śiraḥ parvateṣu apaśritam

original: RV_1,084.14c tad vidac charyaṇāvati //
analyzed: tat vidat śaryaṇāvati

original: RV_1,084.15a atrāha gor amanvata nāma tvaṣṭur apīcyam /
analyzed: atra aha goḥ amanvata nāma tvaṣṭuḥ apīcyam

original: RV_1,084.15c itthā candramaso gṛhe //
analyzed: itthā candramasaḥ gṛhe

original: RV_1,084.16a ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāmino durhṛṇāyūn /
analyzed: kaḥ adya yuṅkte dhuri gāḥ ṛtasya śimīvataḥ bhāminaḥ durhṛṇāyūn

original: RV_1,084.16c āsanniṣūn hṛtsvaso mayobhūn ya eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt //
analyzed: āsanniṣūn hṛtsvasaḥ mayobhūn yaḥ eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt

original: RV_1,084.17a ka īṣate tujyate ko bibhāya ko maṃsate santam indraṃ ko anti /
analyzed: kaḥ īṣate tujyate kaḥ bibhāya kaḥ maṃsate santam indram kaḥ anti

original: RV_1,084.17c kas tokāya ka ibhāyota rāye 'dhi bravat tanve ko janāya //
analyzed: kaḥ tokāya kaḥ ibhāya uta rāye dhi bravat tanve kaḥ janāya

original: RV_1,084.18a ko agnim īṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātā ṛtubhir dhruvebhiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ agnim īṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātai ṛtubhiḥ dhruvebhiḥ

original: RV_1,084.18c kasmai devā ā vahān āśu homa ko maṃsate vītihotraḥ sudevaḥ //
analyzed: kasmai devāḥ ā vahān āśu homa kaḥ maṃsate vītihotraḥ su devaḥ

original: RV_1,084.19a tvam aṅga pra śaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam /
analyzed: tvam aṅga pra śaṃsiṣaḥ devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam

original: RV_1,084.19c na tvad anyo maghavann asti marḍitendra bravīmi te vacaḥ //
analyzed: na tvat anyaḥ maghavan asti marḍitā indra bravīmi te vacaḥ

original: RV_1,084.20a mā te rādhāṃsi mā ta ūtayo vaso 'smān kadā canā dabhan /
analyzed: mā te rādhāṃsi mā te ūtayaḥ vaso smān kadā cana ā dabhan

original: RV_1,084.20c viśvā ca na upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhya ā //
analyzed: viśvā ca naḥ upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhyaḥ ā

original: RV_1,085.01a pra ye śumbhante janayo na saptayo yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ sudaṃsasaḥ /
analyzed: pra ye śumbhante janayaḥ na saptayaḥ yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ su daṃsasaḥ

original: RV_1,085.01c rodasī hi marutaś cakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ //
analyzed: rodasī hi marutaḥ cakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrāḥ vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_1,085.02a ta ukṣitāso mahimānam āśata divi rudrāso adhi cakrire sadaḥ /
analyzed: te ukṣitāsaḥ mahimānam āśata divi rudrāsaḥ adhi cakrire sadaḥ

original: RV_1,085.02c arcanto arkaṃ janayanta indriyam adhi śriyo dadhire pṛśnimātaraḥ //
analyzed: arcantaḥ arkam janayantaḥ indriyam adhi śriyaḥ dadhire pṛśni mātaraḥ

original: RV_1,085.03a gomātaro yac chubhayante añjibhis tanūṣu śubhrā dadhire virukmataḥ /
analyzed: go mātaraḥ yat śubhayante añjibhiḥ tanūṣu śubhrāḥ dadhire virukmataḥ

original: RV_1,085.03c bādhante viśvam abhimātinam apa vartmāny eṣām anu rīyate ghṛtam //
analyzed: bādhante viśvam abhimātinam apa vartmāni eṣām anu rīyate ghṛtam

original: RV_1,085.04a vi ye bhrājante sumakhāsa ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayanto acyutā cid ojasā /
analyzed: vi ye bhrājante su makhāsaḥ ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayantaḥ acyutā cit ojasā

original: RV_1,085.04c manojuvo yan maruto ratheṣv ā vṛṣavrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam //
analyzed: manaḥ juvaḥ yat marutaḥ ratheṣu ā vṛṣa vrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam

original: RV_1,085.05a pra yad ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ vāje adrim maruto raṃhayantaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat ratheṣu pṛṣatīḥ ayugdhvam vāje adrim marutaḥ raṃhayantaḥ

original: RV_1,085.05c utāruṣasya vi ṣyanti dhārāś carmevodabhir vy undanti bhūma //
analyzed: uta aruṣasya vi syanti dhārāḥ carmā iva udabhiḥ vi undanti bhūma

original: RV_1,085.06a ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā vaḥ vahantu saptayaḥ raghuṣyadaḥ raghu patvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ

original: RV_1,085.06c sīdatā barhir uru vaḥ sadas kṛtam mādayadhvam maruto madhvo andhasaḥ //
analyzed: sīdata ā barhiḥ uru vaḥ sadaḥ kṛtam mādayadhvam marutaḥ madhvaḥ andhasaḥ

original: RV_1,085.07a te 'vardhanta svatavaso mahitvanā nākaṃ tasthur uru cakrire sadaḥ /
analyzed: te vardhanta svatavasaḥ mahitvanā nākam tasthuḥ uru cakrire sadaḥ

original: RV_1,085.07c viṣṇur yad dhāvad vṛṣaṇam madacyutaṃ vayo na sīdann adhi barhiṣi priye //
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ yat dhāvat vṛṣaṇam mada cyutam vayaḥ na sīdan adhi barhiṣi priye

original: RV_1,085.08a śūrā ived yuyudhayo na jagmayaḥ śravasyavo na pṛtanāsu yetire /
analyzed: śūrāḥ iva id yuyudhayaḥ na jagmayaḥ śravasyavaḥ na pṛtanāsu yetire

original: RV_1,085.08c bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyo rājāna iva tveṣasaṃdṛśo naraḥ //
analyzed: bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyaḥ rājānaḥ iva tveṣa saṃdṛśaḥ naraḥ

original: RV_1,085.09a tvaṣṭā yad vajraṃ sukṛtaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ svapā avartayat /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā yat vajram su kṛtam hiraṇyayam sahasra bhṛṣṭim su apāḥ avartayat

original: RV_1,085.09c dhatta indro nary apāṃsi kartave 'han vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjad arṇavam //
analyzed: dhatte indraḥ apāṃsi kartave han vṛtram niḥ apām aubjat arṇavam

original: RV_1,085.10a ūrdhvaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ ta ojasā dādṛhāṇaṃ cid bibhidur vi parvatam /
analyzed: ūrdhvam nunudre vatam te ojasā dādṛhāṇam cit bibhiduḥ vi parvatam

original: RV_1,085.10c dhamanto vāṇam marutaḥ sudānavo made somasya raṇyāni cakrire //
analyzed: dhamantaḥ vāṇam marutaḥ sudānavaḥ made somasya raṇyāni cakrire

original: RV_1,085.11a jihmaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ tayā diśāsiñcann utsaṃ gotamāya tṛṣṇaje /
analyzed: jihmam nunudre vatam tayā diśā asiñcan utsam gotamāya tṛṣṇaje

original: RV_1,085.11c ā gacchantīm avasā citrabhānavaḥ kāmaṃ viprasya tarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: ā gacchanti īm avasā citra bhānavaḥ kāmam viprasya tarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ

original: RV_1,085.12a yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tridhātūni dāśuṣe yacchatādhi /
analyzed: yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tri dhātūni dāśuṣe yacchata adhi

original: RV_1,085.12c asmabhyaṃ tāni maruto vi yanta rayiṃ no dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram //
analyzed: asmabhyam tāni marutaḥ vi yanta rayim naḥ dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ su vīram

original: RV_1,086.01a maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ /
analyzed: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ

original: RV_1,086.01c sa sugopātamo janaḥ //
analyzed: sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ

original: RV_1,086.02a yajñair vā yajñavāhaso viprasya vā matīnām /
analyzed: yajñaiḥ vā yajña vāhasaḥ viprasya vā matīnām

original: RV_1,086.02c marutaḥ śṛṇutā havam //
analyzed: marutaḥ śṛṇutā havam

original: RV_1,086.03a uta vā yasya vājino 'nu vipram atakṣata /
analyzed: uta vā yasya vājinaḥ nu vipram atakṣata

original: RV_1,086.03c sa gantā gomati vraje //
analyzed: sa gantā gomati vraje

original: RV_1,086.04a asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somo diviṣṭiṣu /
analyzed: asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somaḥ diviṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,086.04c uktham madaś ca śasyate //
analyzed: uktham madaḥ ca śasyate

original: RV_1,086.05a asya śroṣantv ā bhuvo viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhi /
analyzed: asya śroṣantu ā bhuvaḥ viśvāḥ yaḥ carṣaṇīḥ abhi

original: RV_1,086.05c sūraṃ cit sasruṣīr iṣaḥ //
analyzed: sūram cit sasruṣīḥ iṣaḥ

original: RV_1,086.06a pūrvībhir hi dadāśima śaradbhir maruto vayam /
analyzed: pūrvībhiḥ hi dadāśima śaradbhiḥ marutaḥ vayam

original: RV_1,086.06c avobhiś carṣaṇīnām //
analyzed: avobhiḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_1,086.07a subhagaḥ sa prayajyavo maruto astu martyaḥ /
analyzed: subhagaḥ sa prayajyavaḥ marutaḥ astu martyaḥ

original: RV_1,086.07c yasya prayāṃsi parṣatha //
analyzed: yasya prayāṃsi parṣatha
