original: RV_1,086.08a śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satyaśavasaḥ /
analyzed: śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satya śavasaḥ

original: RV_1,086.08c vidā kāmasya venataḥ //
analyzed: vidā kāmasya venataḥ

original: RV_1,086.09a yūyaṃ tat satyaśavasa āviṣ karta mahitvanā /
analyzed: yūyam tat satya śavasaḥ āvis karta mahitvanā

original: RV_1,086.09c vidhyatā vidyutā rakṣaḥ //
analyzed: vidhyatā vidyutā rakṣaḥ

original: RV_1,086.10a gūhatā guhyaṃ tamo vi yāta viśvam atriṇam /
analyzed: gūhata guhyam tamaḥ vi yāta viśvam atriṇam

original: RV_1,086.10c jyotiṣ kartā yad uśmasi //
analyzed: jyotiḥ kartā yat uśmasi

original: RV_1,087.01a pratvakṣasaḥ pratavaso virapśino 'nānatā avithurā ṛjīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: pratvakṣasaḥ pratavasaḥ virapśinaḥ nānatāḥ avithurāḥ ṛjīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,087.01c juṣṭatamāso nṛtamāso añjibhir vy ānajre ke cid usrā iva stṛbhiḥ //
analyzed: juṣṭatamāsaḥ nṛtamāsaḥ añjibhiḥ vi ānajre ke cit usrāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,087.02a upahvareṣu yad acidhvaṃ yayiṃ vaya iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā /
analyzed: upahvareṣu yat acidhvam yayim vayaḥ iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā

original: RV_1,087.02c ścotanti kośā upa vo ratheṣv ā ghṛtam ukṣatā madhuvarṇam arcate //
analyzed: ścotanti kośāḥ upa vaḥ ratheṣu ā ghṛtam ukṣata madhu varṇam arcate

original: RV_1,087.03a praiṣām ajmeṣu vithureva rejate bhūmir yāmeṣu yad dha yuñjate śubhe /
analyzed: pra eṣām ajmeṣu vithurā iva rejate bhūmiḥ yāmeṣu yat ha yuñjate śubhe

original: RV_1,087.03c te krīḷayo dhunayo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ svayam mahitvam panayanta dhūtayaḥ //
analyzed: te krīḍayaḥ dhunayaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ svayam mahitvam panayanta dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,087.04a sa hi svasṛt pṛṣadaśvo yuvā gaṇo 'yā īśānas taviṣībhir āvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi svasṛt pṛṣat aśvaḥ yuvā gaṇaḥ yāḥ īśānaḥ taviṣībhiḥ āvṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,087.04c asi satya ṛṇayāvānedyo 'syā dhiyaḥ prāvitāthā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: asi satyaḥ ṛṇayāvā anedyaḥ syāḥ dhiyaḥ prāvitā athā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,087.05a pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā /
analyzed: pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā

original: RV_1,087.05c yad īm indraṃ śamy ṛkvāṇa āśatād in nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire //
analyzed: yat īm indram śamī ṛkvāṇaḥ āśata āt id nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire

original: RV_1,087.06a śriyase kam bhānubhiḥ sam mimikṣire te raśmibhis ta ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ /
analyzed: śriyase kam bhānubhiḥ sam mimikṣire te raśmibhiḥ te ṛkvabhiḥ su khādayaḥ

original: RV_1,087.06c te vāśīmanta iṣmiṇo abhīravo vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ //
analyzed: te vāśīmantaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ abhīravaḥ vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ

original: RV_1,088.01a ā vidyunmadbhir marutaḥ svarkai rathebhir yāta ṛṣṭimadbhir aśvaparṇaiḥ /
analyzed: ā vidyunmadbhiḥ marutaḥ su arkaiḥ rathebhiḥ yāta ṛṣṭimadbhiḥ aśva parṇaiḥ

original: RV_1,088.01c ā varṣiṣṭhayā na iṣā vayo na paptatā sumāyāḥ //
analyzed: ā varṣiṣṭhayā naḥ iṣā vayaḥ na paptata su māyāḥ

original: RV_1,088.02a te 'ruṇebhir varam ā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kaṃ yānti rathatūrbhir aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: te ruṇebhiḥ varam ā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kam yānti rathatūrbhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_1,088.02c rukmo na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma //
analyzed: rukmaḥ na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma

original: RV_1,088.03a śriye kaṃ vo adhi tanūṣu vāśīr medhā vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā /
analyzed: śriye kam vaḥ adhi tanūṣu vāśīḥ medhāḥ vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā

original: RV_1,088.03c yuṣmabhyaṃ kam marutaḥ sujātās tuvidyumnāso dhanayante adrim //
analyzed: yuṣmabhyam kam marutaḥ su jātāḥ tuvidyumnāsaḥ dhanayante adrim

original: RV_1,088.04a ahāni gṛdhrāḥ pary ā va āgur imāṃ dhiyaṃ vārkāryāṃ ca devīm /
analyzed: ahāni gṛdhrāḥ pari ā vaḥ āguḥ imām dhiyam vārkāryām ca devīm

original: RV_1,088.04c brahma kṛṇvanto gotamāso arkair ūrdhvaṃ nunudra utsadhim pibadhyai //
analyzed: brahma kṛṇvantaḥ gotamāsaḥ arkaiḥ ūrdhvam nunudre utsadhim pibadhyai

original: RV_1,088.05a etat tyan na yojanam aceti sasvar ha yan maruto gotamo vaḥ /
analyzed: etat tyad na yojanam aceti sasvar ha yat marutaḥ gotamaḥ vaḥ

original: RV_1,088.05c paśyan hiraṇyacakrān ayodaṃṣṭrān vidhāvato varāhūn //
analyzed: paśyan hiraṇya cakrān ayaḥ daṃṣṭrān vidhāvataḥ varāhūn

original: RV_1,088.06a eṣā syā vo maruto 'nubhartrī prati ṣṭobhati vāghato na vāṇī /
analyzed: eṣā syā vaḥ marutaḥ nubhartrī prati stobhati vāghataḥ na vāṇī

original: RV_1,088.06c astobhayad vṛthāsām anu svadhāṃ gabhastyoḥ //
analyzed: astobhayat vṛthā āsām anu svadhām gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_1,089.01a ā no bhadrāḥ kratavo yantu viśvato 'dabdhāso aparītāsa udbhidaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ bhadrāḥ kratavaḥ yantu viśvatas dabdhāsaḥ aparītāsaḥ udbhidaḥ

original: RV_1,089.01c devā no yathā sadam id vṛdhe asann aprāyuvo rakṣitāro dive-dive //
analyzed: devāḥ naḥ yathā sadam id vṛdhe asan aprāyuvaḥ rakṣitāraḥ dive dive

original: RV_1,089.02a devānām bhadrā sumatir ṛjūyatāṃ devānāṃ rātir abhi no ni vartatām /
analyzed: devānām bhadrā sumatiḥ ṛjūyatām devānām rātiḥ abhi naḥ ni vartatām

original: RV_1,089.02c devānāṃ sakhyam upa sedimā vayaṃ devā na āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase //
analyzed: devānām sakhyam upa sedimā vayam devāḥ naḥ āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase

original: RV_1,089.03a tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayam bhagam mitram aditiṃ dakṣam asridham /
analyzed: tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayam bhagam mitram aditim dakṣam asridham

original: RV_1,089.03c aryamaṇaṃ varuṇaṃ somam aśvinā sarasvatī naḥ subhagā mayas karat //
analyzed: aryamaṇam varuṇam somam aśvinā sarasvatī naḥ subhagā mayaḥ karat

original: RV_1,089.04a tan no vāto mayobhu vātu bheṣajaṃ tan mātā pṛthivī tat pitā dyauḥ /
analyzed: tat naḥ vātaḥ mayobhu vātu bheṣajam tat mātā pṛthivī tat pitā dyauḥ

original: RV_1,089.04c tad grāvāṇaḥ somasuto mayobhuvas tad aśvinā śṛṇutaṃ dhiṣṇyā yuvam //
analyzed: tat grāvāṇaḥ soma sutaḥ mayobhuvaḥ tat aśvinā śṛṇutam dhiṣṇyā yuvam

original: RV_1,089.05a tam īśānaṃ jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ dhiyañjinvam avase hūmahe vayam /
analyzed: tam īśānam jagataḥ tasthuṣas patim dhiyañjinvam avase hūmahe vayam

original: RV_1,089.05c pūṣā no yathā vedasām asad vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyur adabdhaḥ svastaye //
analyzed: pūṣā naḥ yathā vedasām asat vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyuḥ adabdhaḥ svastaye

original: RV_1,089.06a svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: svasti naḥ indraḥ vṛddha śravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_1,089.06c svasti nas tārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu //
analyzed: svasti naḥ tārkṣyaḥ ariṣṭa nemiḥ svasti naḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dadhātu

original: RV_1,089.07a pṛṣadaśvā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvāno vidatheṣu jagmayaḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣat aśvāḥ marutaḥ pṛśni mātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvānaḥ vidatheṣu jagmayaḥ

original: RV_1,089.07c agnijihvā manavaḥ sūracakṣaso viśve no devā avasā gamann iha //
analyzed: agni jihvāḥ manavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gaman iha

original: RV_1,089.08a bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadram paśyemākṣabhir yajatrāḥ /
analyzed: bhadram karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadram paśyema akṣabhiḥ yajatrāḥ

original: RV_1,089.08c sthirair aṅgais tuṣṭuvāṃsas tanūbhir vy aśema devahitaṃ yad āyuḥ //
analyzed: sthiraiḥ aṅgaiḥ tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ tanūbhiḥ vi aśema deva hitam yat āyuḥ

original: RV_1,089.09a śatam in nu śarado anti devā yatrā naś cakrā jarasaṃ tanūnām /
analyzed: śatam id nu śaradaḥ anti devāḥ yatrā naḥ cakrā jarasam tanūnām

original: RV_1,089.09c putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyur gantoḥ //
analyzed: putrāsaḥ yatra pitaraḥ bhavanti mā naḥ madhyā rīriṣata āyuḥ gantoḥ

original: RV_1,089.10a aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ /
analyzed: aditiḥ dyauḥ aditiḥ antarikṣam aditiḥ mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ

original: RV_1,089.10c viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ aditiḥ pañca janāḥ aditiḥ jātam aditiḥ janitvam

original: RV_1,090.01a ṛjunītī no varuṇo mitro nayatu vidvān /
analyzed: ṛju nītī naḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ nayatu vidvān

original: RV_1,090.01c aryamā devaiḥ sajoṣāḥ //
analyzed: aryamā devaiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_1,090.02a te hi vasvo vasavānās te apramūrā mahobhiḥ /
analyzed: te hi vasvaḥ vasavānāḥ te apramūrāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_1,090.02c vratā rakṣante viśvāhā //
analyzed: vratā rakṣante viśvāhā

original: RV_1,090.03a te asmabhyaṃ śarma yaṃsann amṛtā martyebhyaḥ /
analyzed: te asmabhyam śarma yaṃsan amṛtāḥ martyebhyaḥ

original: RV_1,090.03c bādhamānā apa dviṣaḥ //
analyzed: bādhamānāḥ apa dviṣaḥ

original: RV_1,090.04a vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantv indro marutaḥ /
analyzed: vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantu indraḥ marutaḥ

original: RV_1,090.04c pūṣā bhago vandyāsaḥ //
analyzed: pūṣā bhagaḥ vandyāsaḥ

original: RV_1,090.05a uta no dhiyo goagrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇav evayāvaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ dhiyaḥ go agrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇav eva yāvaḥ

original: RV_1,090.05c kartā naḥ svastimataḥ //
analyzed: kartā naḥ svastimataḥ

original: RV_1,090.06a madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
analyzed: madhu vātāḥ ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ

original: RV_1,090.06c mādhvīr naḥ santv oṣadhīḥ //
analyzed: mādhvīḥ naḥ santu oṣadhīḥ

original: RV_1,090.07a madhu naktam utoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ /
analyzed: madhu naktam uta uṣasaḥ madhumat pārthivam rajaḥ

original: RV_1,090.07c madhu dyaur astu naḥ pitā //
analyzed: madhu dyauḥ astu naḥ pitā

original: RV_1,090.08a madhumān no vanaspatir madhumāṃ astu sūryaḥ /
analyzed: madhumān naḥ vanaspatiḥ madhumān astu sūryaḥ

original: RV_1,090.08c mādhvīr gāvo bhavantu naḥ //
analyzed: mādhvīḥ gāvaḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: RV_1,090.09a śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā /
analyzed: śam naḥ mitraḥ śam varuṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā

original: RV_1,090.09c śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ uru kramaḥ

original: RV_1,091.01a tvaṃ soma pra cikito manīṣā tvaṃ rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām /
analyzed: tvam soma pra cikitaḥ manīṣā tvam rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām

original: RV_1,091.01c tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: tava praṇītī pitaraḥ naḥ indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ

original: RV_1,091.02a tvaṃ soma kratubhiḥ sukratur bhūs tvaṃ dakṣaiḥ sudakṣo viśvavedāḥ /
analyzed: tvam soma kratubhiḥ su kratuḥ bhūḥ tvam dakṣaiḥ su dakṣaḥ viśva vedāḥ

original: RV_1,091.02c tvaṃ vṛṣā vṛṣatvebhir mahitvā dyumnebhir dyumny abhavo nṛcakṣāḥ //
analyzed: tvam vṛṣā vṛṣa tvebhiḥ mahitvā dyumnebhiḥ dyumnī abhavaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ

original: RV_1,091.03a rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma /
analyzed: rājñaḥ nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhat gabhīram tava soma dhāma

original: RV_1,091.03c śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma //
analyzed: śuciḥ tvam asi priyaḥ na mitraḥ dakṣāyyaḥ aryamā iva asi soma

original: RV_1,091.04a yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyāṃ yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyām yā parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu

original: RV_1,091.04c tebhir no viśvaiḥ sumanā aheḷan rājan soma prati havyā gṛbhāya //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ viśvaiḥ sumanāḥ a heḍan rājan soma prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: RV_1,091.05a tvaṃ somāsi satpatis tvaṃ rājota vṛtrahā /
analyzed: tvam soma asi sat patiḥ tvam rājā uta vṛtra hā

original: RV_1,091.05c tvam bhadro asi kratuḥ //
analyzed: tvam bhadraḥ asi kratuḥ

original: RV_1,091.06a tvaṃ ca soma no vaśo jīvātuṃ na marāmahe /
analyzed: tvam ca soma naḥ vaśaḥ jīvātum na marāmahe

original: RV_1,091.06c priyastotro vanaspatiḥ //
analyzed: priya stotraḥ vanaspatiḥ

original: RV_1,091.07a tvaṃ soma mahe bhagaṃ tvaṃ yūna ṛtāyate /
analyzed: tvam soma mahe bhagam tvam yūne ṛtāyate

original: RV_1,091.07c dakṣaṃ dadhāsi jīvase //
analyzed: dakṣam dadhāsi jīvase

original: RV_1,091.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato rakṣā rājann aghāyataḥ /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas rakṣa rājan aghāyataḥ

original: RV_1,091.08c na riṣyet tvāvataḥ sakhā //
analyzed: na riṣyet tvāvataḥ sakhā

original: RV_1,091.09a soma yās te mayobhuva ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe /
analyzed: soma yāḥ te mayobhuvaḥ ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe

original: RV_1,091.09c tābhir no 'vitā bhava //
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ vitā bhava

original: RV_1,091.10a imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi /
analyzed: imam yajñam idam vacaḥ jujuṣāṇaḥ upāgahi

original: RV_1,091.10c soma tvaṃ no vṛdhe bhava //
analyzed: soma tvam naḥ vṛdhe bhava

original: RV_1,091.11a soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ vardhayāmo vacovidaḥ /
analyzed: soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam vardhayāmaḥ vacaḥ vidaḥ

original: RV_1,091.11c sumṛḷīko na ā viśa //
analyzed: su mṛḍīkaḥ naḥ ā viśa

original: RV_1,091.12a gayasphāno amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ /
analyzed: gaya sphānaḥ amīva hā vasu vid puṣṭi vardhanaḥ

original: RV_1,091.12c sumitraḥ soma no bhava //
analyzed: su mitraḥ soma naḥ bhava

original: RV_1,091.13a soma rārandhi no hṛdi gāvo na yavaseṣv ā /
analyzed: soma rārandhi naḥ hṛdi gāvaḥ na yavaseṣu ā

original: RV_1,091.13c marya iva sva okye //
analyzed: maryaḥ iva sve okye

original: RV_1,091.14a yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇad deva martyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇat deva martyaḥ

original: RV_1,091.14c taṃ dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ //
analyzed: tam dakṣaḥ sacate kaviḥ

original: RV_1,091.15a uruṣyā ṇo abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhy aṃhasaḥ /
analyzed: uruṣya naḥ abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhi aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_1,091.15c sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ //
analyzed: sakhā su śevaḥ edhi naḥ

original: RV_1,091.16a ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
analyzed: ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvatas soma vṛṣṇyam

original: RV_1,091.16c bhavā vājasya saṃgathe //
analyzed: bhava vājasya saṃgathe

original: RV_1,091.17a ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
analyzed: ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ

original: RV_1,091.17c bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe //
analyzed: bhava naḥ su śravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe

original: RV_1,091.18a saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyāny abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
analyzed: sam te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ sam vṛṣṇyāni abhimātiṣāhaḥ

original: RV_1,091.18c āpyāyamāno amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsy uttamāni dhiṣva //
analyzed: āpyāyamānaḥ amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsi uttamāni dhiṣva

original: RV_1,091.19a yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti tā te viśvā paribhūr astu yajñam /
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti tā te viśvā paribhūḥ astu yajñam

original: RV_1,091.19c gayasphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ suvīro 'vīrahā pra carā soma duryān //
analyzed: gaya sphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ vīra hā pra cara soma duryān

original: RV_1,091.20a somo dhenuṃ somo arvantam āśuṃ somo vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: somaḥ dhenum somaḥ arvantam āśum somaḥ vīram karmaṇyam dadāti

original: RV_1,091.20c sādanyaṃ vidathyaṃ sabheyam pitṛśravaṇaṃ yo dadāśad asmai //
analyzed: sādanyam vidathyam sabheyam pitṛ śravaṇam yaḥ dadāśat asmai

original: RV_1,091.21a aṣāḷhaṃ yutsu pṛtanāsu papriṃ svarṣām apsāṃ vṛjanasya gopām /
analyzed: aṣāḷham yutsu pṛtanāsu paprim svarṣām ap sām vṛjanasya gopām

original: RV_1,091.21c bhareṣujāṃ sukṣitiṃ suśravasaṃ jayantaṃ tvām anu madema soma //
analyzed: bhareṣujām su kṣitim su śravasam jayantam tvām anu madema soma

original: RV_1,091.22a tvam imā oṣadhīḥ soma viśvās tvam apo ajanayas tvaṃ gāḥ /
analyzed: tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma viśvāḥ tvam apaḥ ajanayaḥ tvam gāḥ

original: RV_1,091.22c tvam ā tatanthorv antarikṣaṃ tvaṃ jyotiṣā vi tamo vavartha //
analyzed: tvam ā tatantha uru antarikṣam tvam jyotiṣā vi tamaḥ vavartha

original: RV_1,091.23a devena no manasā deva soma rāyo bhāgaṃ sahasāvann abhi yudhya /
analyzed: devena naḥ manasā deva soma rāyaḥ bhāgam sahasāvan abhi yudhya

original: RV_1,091.23c mā tvā tanad īśiṣe vīryasyobhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsā gaviṣṭau //
analyzed: mā tvā tanat īśiṣe vīryasya ubhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsa gaviṣṭau

original: RV_1,092.01a etā u tyā uṣasaḥ ketum akrata pūrve ardhe rajaso bhānum añjate /
analyzed: etāḥ u tyāḥ uṣasaḥ ketum akrata pūrve ardhe rajasaḥ bhānum añjate

original: RV_1,092.01c niṣkṛṇvānā āyudhānīva dhṛṣṇavaḥ prati gāvo 'ruṣīr yanti mātaraḥ //
analyzed: niṣkṛṇvānāḥ āyudhāni iva dhṛṣṇavaḥ prati gāvaḥ ruṣīḥ yanti mātaraḥ

original: RV_1,092.02a ud apaptann aruṇā bhānavo vṛthā svāyujo aruṣīr gā ayukṣata /
analyzed: ud apaptan aruṇāḥ bhānavaḥ vṛthā su āyujaḥ aruṣīḥ gāḥ ayukṣata

original: RV_1,092.02c akrann uṣāso vayunāni pūrvathā ruśantam bhānum aruṣīr aśiśrayuḥ //
analyzed: akran uṣāsaḥ vayunāni pūrvathā ruśantam bhānum aruṣīḥ aśiśrayuḥ

original: RV_1,092.03a arcanti nārīr apaso na viṣṭibhiḥ samānena yojanenā parāvataḥ /
analyzed: arcanti nārīḥ apasaḥ na viṣṭibhiḥ samānena yojanena ā parāvataḥ

original: RV_1,092.03c iṣaṃ vahantīḥ sukṛte sudānave viśved aha yajamānāya sunvate //
analyzed: iṣam vahantīḥ su kṛte sudānave viśvā id aha yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_1,092.04a adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūr ivāporṇute vakṣa usreva barjaham /
analyzed: adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūḥ iva aporṇute vakṣaḥ usrā iva barjaham

original: RV_1,092.04c jyotir viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvo na vrajaṃ vy uṣā āvar tamaḥ //
analyzed: jyotiḥ viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvaḥ na vrajam vi uṣāḥ āvaḥ tamaḥ

original: RV_1,092.05a praty arcī ruśad asyā adarśi vi tiṣṭhate bādhate kṛṣṇam abhvam /
analyzed: prati arciḥ ruśat asyāḥ adarśi vi tiṣṭhate bādhate kṛṣṇam abhvam

original: RV_1,092.05c svaruṃ na peśo vidatheṣv añjañ citraṃ divo duhitā bhānum aśret //
analyzed: svarum na peśaḥ vidatheṣu añjam citram divaḥ duhitā bhānum aśret

original: RV_1,092.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asyoṣā ucchantī vayunā kṛṇoti /
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya uṣāḥ ucchantī vayunā kṛṇoti

original: RV_1,092.06c śriye chando na smayate vibhātī supratīkā saumanasāyājīgaḥ //
analyzed: śriye chandaḥ na smayate vibhātī su pratīkā saumanasāya ajīgaḥ

original: RV_1,092.07a bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānāṃ diva stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ /
analyzed: bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām divaḥ stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ

original: RV_1,092.07c prajāvato nṛvato aśvabudhyān uṣo goagrāṃ upa māsi vājān //
analyzed: prajāvataḥ nṛvataḥ aśva budhyān uṣaḥ go agrān upa māsi vājān

original: RV_1,092.08a uṣas tam aśyāṃ yaśasaṃ suvīraṃ dāsapravargaṃ rayim aśvabudhyam /
analyzed: uṣaḥ tam aśyām yaśasam su vīram dāsa pravargam rayim aśva budhyam

original: RV_1,092.08c sudaṃsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi vājaprasūtā subhage bṛhantam //
analyzed: su daṃsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi vāja prasūtā subhage bṛhantam

original: RV_1,092.09a viśvāni devī bhuvanābhicakṣyā pratīcī cakṣur urviyā vi bhāti /
analyzed: viśvāni devī bhuvanā abhicakṣyā pratīcī cakṣuḥ urviyā vi bhāti

original: RV_1,092.09c viśvaṃ jīvaṃ carase bodhayantī viśvasya vācam avidan manāyoḥ //
analyzed: viśvam jīvam carase bodhayantī viśvasya vācam avidat manāyoḥ

original: RV_1,092.10a punaḥ-punar jāyamānā purāṇī samānaṃ varṇam abhi śumbhamānā /
analyzed: punar punar jāyamānā purāṇī samānam varṇam abhi śumbhamānā

original: RV_1,092.10c śvaghnīva kṛtnur vija āminānā martasya devī jarayanty āyuḥ //
analyzed: śvaghnī iva kṛtnuḥ vijaḥ āminānā martasya devī jarayantī āyuḥ

original: RV_1,092.11a vyūrṇvatī divo antāṃ abodhy apa svasāraṃ sanutar yuyoti /
analyzed: vyūrṇvatī divaḥ abodhi apa svasāram sanutar yuyoti

original: RV_1,092.11c praminatī manuṣyā yugāni yoṣā jārasya cakṣasā vi bhāti //
analyzed: praminatī manuṣyā yugāni yoṣā jārasya cakṣasā vi bhāti

original: RV_1,092.12a paśūn na citrā subhagā prathānā sindhur na kṣoda urviyā vy aśvait /
analyzed: paśūn na citrā subhagā prathānā sindhuḥ na kṣodaḥ urviyā vi aśvait

original: RV_1,092.12c aminatī daivyāni vratāni sūryasya ceti raśmibhir dṛśānā //
analyzed: a minatī daivyāni vratāni sūryasya ceti raśmibhiḥ dṛśānā

original: RV_1,092.13a uṣas tac citram ā bharāsmabhyaṃ vājinīvati /
analyzed: uṣaḥ tat citram ā bhara asmabhyam vājinīvati

original: RV_1,092.13c yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe //
analyzed: yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe

original: RV_1,092.14a uṣo adyeha gomaty aśvāvati vibhāvari /
analyzed: uṣaḥ adyā iha gomati aśvāvati vibhāvari

original: RV_1,092.14c revad asme vy uccha sūnṛtāvati //
analyzed: revat asme vi uccha sūnṛtāvati

original: RV_1,092.15a yukṣvā hi vājinīvaty aśvāṃ adyāruṇāṃ uṣaḥ /
analyzed: yukṣvā hi vājinīvati aśvām adya aruṇām uṣaḥ

original: RV_1,092.15c athā no viśvā saubhagāny ā vaha //
analyzed: athā naḥ viśvā saubhagāni ā vaha

original: RV_1,092.16a aśvinā vartir asmad ā gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat /
analyzed: aśvinā vartiḥ asmat ā gomat dasrā hiraṇyavat

original: RV_1,092.16c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam //
analyzed: arvāk ratham samanasā ni yacchatam

original: RV_1,092.17a yāv itthā ślokam ā divo jyotir janāya cakrathuḥ /
analyzed: yau itthā ślokam ā divaḥ jyotiḥ janāya cakrathuḥ

original: RV_1,092.17c ā na ūrjaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvam //
analyzed: ā naḥ ūrjam vahatam aśvinā yuvam

original: RV_1,092.18a eha devā mayobhuvā dasrā hiraṇyavartanī /
analyzed: ā iha devā mayobhuvā dasrā hiraṇya vartanī

original: RV_1,092.18c uṣarbudho vahantu somapītaye //
analyzed: uṣarbudhaḥ vahantu soma pītaye

original: RV_1,093.01a agnīṣomāv imaṃ su me śṛṇutaṃ vṛṣaṇā havam /
analyzed: agnīṣomau imam su me śṛṇutam vṛṣaṇā havam

original: RV_1,093.01c prati sūktāni haryatam bhavataṃ dāśuṣe mayaḥ //
analyzed: prati sūktāni haryatam bhavatam dāśuṣe mayaḥ

original: RV_1,093.02a agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ vacaḥ saparyati /
analyzed: agnīṣomā yaḥ adya vām idam vacaḥ saparyati

original: RV_1,093.02c tasmai dhattaṃ suvīryaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam //
analyzed: tasmai dhattam su vīryam gavām poṣam su aśvyam

original: RV_1,093.03a agnīṣomā ya āhutiṃ yo vāṃ dāśād dhaviṣkṛtim /
analyzed: agnīṣomā yaḥ āhutim yaḥ vām dāśāt haviṣkṛtim

original: RV_1,093.03c sa prajayā suvīryaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnavat //
analyzed: sa prajayā su vīryam viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavat

original: RV_1,093.04a agnīṣomā ceti tad vīryaṃ vāṃ yad amuṣṇītam avasam paṇiṃ gāḥ /
analyzed: agnīṣomā ceti tat vīryam vām yat amuṣṇītam avasam paṇim gāḥ

original: RV_1,093.04c avātiratam bṛsayasya śeṣo 'vindataṃ jyotir ekam bahubhyaḥ //
analyzed: avātiratam bṛsayasya śeṣaḥ vindatam jyotiḥ ekam bahubhyaḥ

original: RV_1,093.05a yuvam etāni divi rocanāny agniś ca soma sakratū adhattam /
analyzed: yuvam etāni divi rocanāni agniḥ ca soma sakratū adhattam

original: RV_1,093.05c yuvaṃ sindhūṃr abhiśaster avadyād agnīṣomāv amuñcataṃ gṛbhītān //
analyzed: yuvam sindhūṃr abhiśasteḥ avadyāt agnīṣomau amuñcatam gṛbhītān

original: RV_1,093.06a ānyaṃ divo mātariśvā jabhārāmathnād anyam pari śyeno adreḥ /
analyzed: ā anyam divaḥ mātariśvā jabhāra amathnāt anyam pari śyenaḥ adreḥ

original: RV_1,093.06c agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānoruṃ yajñāya cakrathur u lokam //
analyzed: agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā urum yajñāya cakrathuḥ u lokam

original: RV_1,093.07a agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītaṃ haryataṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
analyzed: agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītam haryatam vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_1,093.07c suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam athā dhattaṃ yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: su śarmāṇā su avasā hi bhūtam atha ā dhattam yajamānāya śam yoḥ

original: RV_1,093.08a yo agnīṣomā haviṣā saparyād devadrīcā manasā yo ghṛtena /
analyzed: yaḥ agnīṣomā haviṣā saparyāt devadrīcā manasā yaḥ ghṛtena

original: RV_1,093.08c tasya vrataṃ rakṣatam pātam aṃhaso viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam //
analyzed: tasya vratam rakṣatam pātam aṃhasaḥ viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam

original: RV_1,093.09a agnīṣomā savedasā sahūtī vanataṃ giraḥ /
analyzed: agnīṣomā sa vedasā sa hūtī vanatam giraḥ

original: RV_1,093.09c saṃ devatrā babhūvathuḥ //
analyzed: sam devatrā babhūvathuḥ

original: RV_1,093.10a agnīṣomāv anena vāṃ yo vāṃ ghṛtena dāśati /
analyzed: agnīṣomau anena vām yaḥ vām ghṛtena dāśati

original: RV_1,093.10c tasmai dīdayatam bṛhat //
analyzed: tasmai dīdayatam bṛhat

original: RV_1,093.11a agnīṣomāv imāni no yuvaṃ havyā jujoṣatam /
analyzed: agnīṣomau imāni naḥ yuvam havyā jujoṣatam

original: RV_1,093.11c ā yātam upa naḥ sacā //
analyzed: ā yātam upa naḥ sacā

original: RV_1,093.12a agnīṣomā pipṛtam arvato na ā pyāyantām usriyā havyasūdaḥ /
analyzed: agnīṣomā pipṛtam arvataḥ naḥ ā pyāyantām usriyāḥ havyasūdaḥ

original: RV_1,093.12c asme balāni maghavatsu dhattaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no adhvaraṃ śruṣṭimantam //
analyzed: asme balāni maghavatsu dhattam kṛṇutam naḥ adhvaram śruṣṭimantam

original: RV_1,094.01a imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahemā manīṣayā /
analyzed: imam stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahema manīṣayā

original: RV_1,094.01c bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃsady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: bhadrā hi naḥ pramatiḥ asya saṃsadi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.02a yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhaty anarvā kṣeti dadhate suvīryam /
analyzed: yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhati anarvā kṣeti dadhate su vīryam

original: RV_1,094.02c sa tūtāva nainam aśnoty aṃhatir agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: sa tūtāva na enam aśnoti aṃhatiḥ agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.03a śakema tvā samidhaṃ sādhayā dhiyas tve devā havir adanty āhutam /
analyzed: śakema tvā samidham sādhaya dhiyaḥ tve devāḥ haviḥ adanti āhutam

original: RV_1,094.03c tvam ādityāṃ ā vaha tān hy uśmasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: tvam ādityān ā vaha tān hi uśmasi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.04a bharāmedhmaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi te citayantaḥ parvaṇā-parvaṇā vayam /
analyzed: bharāma idhmam kṛṇavāma havīṃṣi te citayantaḥ parvaṇā aparvaṇā vayam

original: RV_1,094.04c jīvātave prataraṃ sādhayā dhiyo 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: jīvātave prataram sādhaya dhiyaḥ gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.05a viśāṃ gopā asya caranti jantavo dvipac ca yad uta catuṣpad aktubhiḥ /
analyzed: viśām gopāḥ asya caranti jantavaḥ dvipad ca yat uta catuṣpad aktubhiḥ

original: RV_1,094.05c citraḥ praketa uṣaso mahāṃ asy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: citraḥ praketaḥ uṣasaḥ mahān asi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.06a tvam adhvaryur uta hotāsi pūrvyaḥ praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ /
analyzed: tvam adhvaryuḥ uta hotā asi pūrvyaḥ praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ

original: RV_1,094.06c viśvā vidvāṃ ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: viśvā vidvān ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.07a yo viśvataḥ supratīkaḥ sadṛṅṅ asi dūre cit san taḷid ivāti rocase /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvatas su pratīkaḥ sadṛś asi dūre cit san taḷit iva ati rocase

original: RV_1,094.07c rātryāś cid andho ati deva paśyasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: rātryāḥ cit andhaḥ ati deva paśyasi agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.08a pūrvo devā bhavatu sunvato ratho 'smākaṃ śaṃso abhy astu dūḍhyaḥ /
analyzed: pūrvaḥ devāḥ bhavatu sunvataḥ rathaḥ smākam śaṃsaḥ abhī astu dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_1,094.08c tad ā jānītota puṣyatā vaco 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: tat ā jānīta uta puṣyatā vacaḥ gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.09a vadhair duḥśaṃsāṃ apa dūḍhyo jahi dūre vā ye anti vā ke cid atriṇaḥ /
analyzed: vadhaiḥ duḥśaṃsām apa dūḍhyaḥ jahi dūre vā ye anti vā ke cit atriṇaḥ

original: RV_1,094.09c athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugaṃ kṛdhy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugam kṛdhī agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.10a yad ayukthā aruṣā rohitā rathe vātajūtā vṛṣabhasyeva te ravaḥ /
analyzed: yat ayukthāḥ aruṣā rohitā rathe vāta jūtā vṛṣabhasya iva te ravaḥ

original: RV_1,094.10c ād invasi vanino dhūmaketunāgne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: āt invasi vaninaḥ dhūma ketunā agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.11a adha svanād uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇo drapsā yat te yavasādo vy asthiran /
analyzed: adha svanāt uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇaḥ drapsāḥ yat te yavasādaḥ vi asthiran

original: RV_1,094.11c sugaṃ tat te tāvakebhyo rathebhyo 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: sugam tat te tāvakebhyaḥ rathebhyaḥ gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.12a ayam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāyase 'vayātām marutāṃ heḷo adbhutaḥ /
analyzed: ayam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāyase vayātām marutām heḍaḥ adbhutaḥ

original: RV_1,094.12c mṛḷā su no bhūtv eṣām manaḥ punar agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: mṛḷā su naḥ bhūtu eṣām manaḥ punar agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.13a devo devānām asi mitro adbhuto vasur vasūnām asi cārur adhvare /
analyzed: devaḥ devānām asi mitraḥ adbhutaḥ vasuḥ vasūnām asi cāruḥ adhvare

original: RV_1,094.13c śarman syāma tava saprathastame 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: śarman syāma tava saprathastame gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.14a tat te bhadraṃ yat samiddhaḥ sve dame somāhuto jarase mṛḷayattamaḥ /
analyzed: tat te bhadram yat samiddhaḥ sve dame soma āhutaḥ jarase mṛḍayattamaḥ

original: RV_1,094.14c dadhāsi ratnaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dāśuṣe 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
analyzed: dadhāsi ratnam draviṇam ca dāśuṣe gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayam tava

original: RV_1,094.15a yasmai tvaṃ sudraviṇo dadāśo 'nāgāstvam adite sarvatātā /
analyzed: yasmai tvam su draviṇaḥ dadāśaḥ nāgāstvam adite sarvatātā

original: RV_1,094.15c yam bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi prajāvatā rādhasā te syāma //
analyzed: yam bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi prajāvatā rādhasā te syāma

original: RV_1,094.16a sa tvam agne saubhagatvasya vidvān asmākam āyuḥ pra tireha deva /
analyzed: sa tvam agne saubhaga tvasya vidvān asmākam āyuḥ pra tira iha deva

original: RV_1,094.16c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,095.01a dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete /
analyzed: dve virūpe carataḥ su arthe anyā anyā vatsam upa dhāpayete

original: RV_1,095.01c harir anyasyām bhavati svadhāvāñ chukro anyasyāṃ dadṛśe suvarcāḥ //
analyzed: hariḥ anyasyām bhavati svadhāvān śukraḥ anyasyām dadṛśe su varcāḥ

original: RV_1,095.02a daśemaṃ tvaṣṭur janayanta garbham atandrāso yuvatayo vibhṛtram /
analyzed: daśa imam tvaṣṭuḥ janayanta garbham atandrāsaḥ yuvatayaḥ vibhṛtram

original: RV_1,095.02c tigmānīkaṃ svayaśasaṃ janeṣu virocamānam pari ṣīṃ nayanti //
analyzed: tigma anīkam sva yaśasam janeṣu virocamānam pari sīm nayanti

original: RV_1,095.03a trīṇi jānā pari bhūṣanty asya samudra ekaṃ divy ekam apsu /
analyzed: trīṇi jānā pari bhūṣanti asya samudre ekam divi ekam apsu

original: RV_1,095.03c pūrvām anu pra diśam pārthivānām ṛtūn praśāsad vi dadhāv anuṣṭhu //
analyzed: pūrvām anu pra diśam pārthivānām ṛtūn praśāsat vi dadhau anuṣṭhu

original: RV_1,095.04a ka imaṃ vo niṇyam ā ciketa vatso mātṝr janayata svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ imam vaḥ niṇyam ā ciketa vatsaḥ mātṝḥ janayata svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_1,095.04c bahvīnāṃ garbho apasām upasthān mahān kavir niś carati svadhāvān //
analyzed: bahvīnām garbhaḥ apasām upasthāt mahān kaviḥ niḥ carati svadhāvān

original: RV_1,095.05a āviṣṭyo vardhate cārur āsu jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ svayaśā upasthe /
analyzed: āviṣṭyaḥ vardhate cāruḥ āsu jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ sva yaśāḥ upasthe

original: RV_1,095.05c ubhe tvaṣṭur bibhyatur jāyamānāt pratīcī siṃham prati joṣayete //
analyzed: ubhe tvaṣṭuḥ bibhyatuḥ jāyamānāt pratīcī siṃham prati joṣayete

original: RV_1,095.06a ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvo na vāśrā upa tasthur evaiḥ /
analyzed: ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvaḥ na vāśrāḥ upa tasthuḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_1,095.06c sa dakṣāṇāṃ dakṣapatir babhūvāñjanti yaṃ dakṣiṇato havirbhiḥ //
analyzed: sa dakṣāṇām dakṣa patiḥ babhūva añjanti yam dakṣiṇatas havirbhiḥ

original: RV_1,095.07a ud yaṃyamīti saviteva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīma ṛñjan /
analyzed: ud yaṃyamīti savitā iva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīmaḥ ṛñjan

original: RV_1,095.07c uc chukram atkam ajate simasmān navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti //
analyzed: ud śukram atkam ajate simasmāt navā mātṛbhyaḥ vasanā jahāti

original: RV_1,095.08a tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇuta uttaraṃ yat sampṛñcānaḥ sadane gobhir adbhiḥ /
analyzed: tveṣam rūpam kṛṇute uttaram yat sampṛñcānaḥ sadane gobhiḥ adbhiḥ

original: RV_1,095.08c kavir budhnam pari marmṛjyate dhīḥ sā devatātā samitir babhūva //
analyzed: kaviḥ budhnam pari marmṛjyate dhīḥ sā devatātā samitiḥ babhūva

original: RV_1,095.09a uru te jrayaḥ pary eti budhnaṃ virocamānam mahiṣasya dhāma /
analyzed: uru te jrayaḥ pari eti budhnam virocamānam mahiṣasya dhāma

original: RV_1,095.09c viśvebhir agne svayaśobhir iddho 'dabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhy asmān //
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ agne sva yaśobhiḥ iddhaḥ dabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi asmān

original: RV_1,095.10a dhanvan srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmiṃ śukrair ūrmibhir abhi nakṣati kṣām /
analyzed: dhanvan srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmim śukraiḥ ūrmibhiḥ abhi nakṣati kṣām

original: RV_1,095.10c viśvā sanāni jaṭhareṣu dhatte 'ntar navāsu carati prasūṣu //
analyzed: viśvā sanāni jaṭhareṣu dhatte ntar navāsu carati prasūṣu

original: RV_1,095.11a evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi /
analyzed: eva naḥ agne samidhā vṛdhānaḥ revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi

original: RV_1,095.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,096.01a sa pratnathā sahasā jāyamānaḥ sadyaḥ kāvyāni baḷ adhatta viśvā /
analyzed: sa pratnathā sahasā jāyamānaḥ sadyas kāvyāni baḷ adhatta viśvā

original: RV_1,096.01c āpaś ca mitraṃ dhiṣaṇā ca sādhan devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: āpaḥ ca mitram dhiṣaṇā ca sādhan devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.02a sa pūrvayā nividā kavyatāyor imāḥ prajā ajanayan manūnām /
analyzed: sa pūrvayā nividā kavya tā āyoḥ imāḥ prajāḥ ajanayat manūnām

original: RV_1,096.02c vivasvatā cakṣasā dyām apaś ca devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: vivasvatā cakṣasā dyām apaḥ ca devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.03a tam īḷata prathamaṃ yajñasādhaṃ viśa ārīr āhutam ṛñjasānam /
analyzed: tam īḍata prathamam yajñasādham viśaḥ ārīḥ āhutam ṛñjasānam

original: RV_1,096.03c ūrjaḥ putram bharataṃ sṛpradānuṃ devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: ūrjaḥ putram bharatam sṛpra dānum devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.04a sa mātariśvā puruvārapuṣṭir vidad gātuṃ tanayāya svarvit /
analyzed: sa mātariśvā puru vāra puṣṭiḥ vidat gātum tanayāya svar vid

original: RV_1,096.04c viśāṃ gopā janitā rodasyor devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: viśām gopāḥ janitā rodasyoḥ devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.05a naktoṣāsā varṇam āmemyāne dhāpayete śiśum ekaṃ samīcī /
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā varṇam āmemyāne dhāpayete śiśum ekam samīcī

original: RV_1,096.05c dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antar vi bhāti devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: dyāvākṣāmā rukmaḥ antar vi bhāti devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.06a rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ yajñasya ketur manmasādhano veḥ /
analyzed: rāyaḥ budhnaḥ saṃgamanaḥ vasūnām yajñasya ketuḥ manma sādhanaḥ veḥ

original: RV_1,096.06c amṛtatvaṃ rakṣamāṇāsa enaṃ devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: amṛta tvam rakṣamāṇāsaḥ enam devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.07a nū ca purā ca sadanaṃ rayīṇāṃ jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām /
analyzed: nu ca purā ca sadanam rayīṇām jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām

original: RV_1,096.07c sataś ca gopām bhavataś ca bhūrer devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
analyzed: sataḥ ca gopām bhavataḥ ca bhūreḥ devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dām

original: RV_1,096.08a draviṇodā draviṇasas turasya draviṇodāḥ sanarasya pra yaṃsat /
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ draviṇasaḥ turasya draviṇaḥ dāḥ sa narasya pra yaṃsat

original: RV_1,096.08c draviṇodā vīravatīm iṣaṃ no draviṇodā rāsate dīrgham āyuḥ //
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ vīravatīm iṣam naḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ rāsate dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_1,096.09a evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi /
analyzed: eva naḥ agne samidhā vṛdhānaḥ revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi

original: RV_1,096.09c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,097.01a apa naḥ śośucad agham agne śuśugdhy ā rayim /
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham agne śuśugdhi ā rayim

original: RV_1,097.01c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.02a sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe /
analyzed: sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe

original: RV_1,097.02c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.03a pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣām prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat bhandiṣṭhaḥ eṣām pra asmākāsaḥ ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_1,097.03c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.04a pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam /
analyzed: pra yat te agne sūrayaḥ jāyemahi pra te vayam

original: RV_1,097.04c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.05a pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ /
analyzed: pra yat agneḥ sahasvataḥ viśvatas yanti bhānavaḥ

original: RV_1,097.05c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.06a tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
analyzed: tvam hi viśvatomukha viśvatas paribhūḥ asi

original: RV_1,097.06c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.07a dviṣo no viśvatomukhāti nāveva pāraya /
analyzed: dviṣaḥ naḥ viśvatomukha ati nāvā iva pāraya

original: RV_1,097.07c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,097.08a sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvayāti parṣā svastaye /
analyzed: sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvayāti parṣā svastaye

original: RV_1,097.08c apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: RV_1,098.01a vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ /
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ

original: RV_1,098.01c ito jāto viśvam idaṃ vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaro yatate sūryeṇa //
analyzed: itas jātaḥ viśvam idam vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaraḥ yatate sūryeṇa

original: RV_1,098.02a pṛṣṭo divi pṛṣṭo agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭo viśvā oṣadhīr ā viveśa /
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ divi pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭaḥ viśvāḥ oṣadhīḥ ā viveśa

original: RV_1,098.02c vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭo agniḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam

original: RV_1,098.03a vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astv asmān rāyo maghavānaḥ sacantām /
analyzed: vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astu asmān rāyaḥ maghavānaḥ sacantām

original: RV_1,098.03c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,099.01a jātavedase sunavāma somam arātīyato ni dahāti vedaḥ /
analyzed: jātavedase sunavāma somam arātīyataḥ ni dahāti vedaḥ

original: RV_1,099.01c sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvā nāveva sindhuṃ duritāty agniḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ parṣat ati durgāṇi viśvā nāvā iva sindhum duritā ati agniḥ

original: RV_1,100.01a sa yo vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokā maho divaḥ pṛthivyāś ca samrāṭ /
analyzed: sa yaḥ vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokāḥ mahaḥ divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ca samrāj

original: RV_1,100.01c satīnasatvā havyo bhareṣu marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: satīna satvā havyaḥ bhareṣu marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.02a yasyānāptaḥ sūryasyeva yāmo bhare-bhare vṛtrahā śuṣmo asti /
analyzed: yasya an āptaḥ sūryasya iva yāmaḥ bharebhare vṛtra hā śuṣmaḥ asti

original: RV_1,100.02c vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhir evair marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhiḥ evaiḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.03a divo na yasya retaso dughānāḥ panthāso yanti śavasāparītāḥ /
analyzed: divaḥ na yasya retasaḥ dughānāḥ panthāsaḥ yanti śavasā a parītāḥ

original: RV_1,100.03c taraddveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ pauṃsyebhir marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: tarat dveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ pauṃsyebhiḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.04a so aṅgirobhir aṅgirastamo bhūd vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san /
analyzed: saḥ aṅgirobhiḥ aṅgirastamaḥ bhūt vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san

original: RV_1,100.04c ṛgmibhir ṛgmī gātubhir jyeṣṭho marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: ṛgmibhiḥ ṛgmī gātubhiḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.05a sa sūnubhir na rudrebhir ṛbhvā nṛṣāhye sāsahvāṃ amitrān /
analyzed: sa sūnubhiḥ na rudrebhiḥ ṛbhvā nṛṣāhye sāsahvān amitrān

original: RV_1,100.05c sanīḷebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sanīḷebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.06a sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartāsmākebhir nṛbhiḥ sūryaṃ sanat /
analyzed: sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartā asmākebhiḥ nṛbhiḥ sūryam sanat

original: RV_1,100.06c asminn ahan satpatiḥ puruhūto marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: asmin ahan satpatiḥ puru hūtaḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.07a tam ūtayo raṇayañ chūrasātau taṃ kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām /
analyzed: tam ūtayaḥ raṇayam śūrasātau tam kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām

original: RV_1,100.07c sa viśvasya karuṇasyeśa eko marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sa viśvasya karuṇasya īśe ekaḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.08a tam apsanta śavasa utsaveṣu naro naram avase taṃ dhanāya /
analyzed: tam śavasaḥ utsaveṣu naraḥ naram avase tam dhanāya

original: RV_1,100.08c so andhe cit tamasi jyotir vidan marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: saḥ andhe cit tamasi jyotiḥ vidat marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.09a sa savyena yamati vrādhataś cit sa dakṣiṇe saṃgṛbhītā kṛtāni /
analyzed: sa savyena yamati vrādhataḥ cit sa dakṣiṇe saṃgṛbhītā kṛtāni

original: RV_1,100.09c sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.10a sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhir vide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣṭibhir nv adya /
analyzed: sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhiḥ vide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣṭibhiḥ nu adya

original: RV_1,100.10c sa pauṃsyebhir abhibhūr aśastīr marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sa pauṃsyebhiḥ abhibhūḥ aśastīḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.11a sa jāmibhir yat samajāti mīḷhe 'jāmibhir vā puruhūta evaiḥ /
analyzed: sa jāmibhiḥ yat samajāti mīḷhe jāmibhiḥ vā puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_1,100.11c apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣe marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: apām tokasya tanayasya jeṣe marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.12a sa vajrabhṛd dasyuhā bhīma ugraḥ sahasracetāḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā /
analyzed: sa vajrabhṛt dasyu hā bhīmaḥ ugraḥ sahasra cetāḥ śata nīthaḥ ṛbhvā

original: RV_1,100.12c camrīṣo na śavasā pāñcajanyo marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: camrīṣaḥ na śavasā pāñcajanyaḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.13a tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣā divo na tveṣo ravathaḥ śimīvān /
analyzed: tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣāḥ divaḥ na tveṣaḥ ravathaḥ śimīvān

original: RV_1,100.13c taṃ sacante sanayas taṃ dhanāni marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: tam sacante sanayaḥ tam dhanāni marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.14a yasyājasraṃ śavasā mānam uktham paribhujad rodasī viśvataḥ sīm /
analyzed: yasya ajasram śavasā mānam uktham paribhujat rodasī viśvatas sīm

original: RV_1,100.14c sa pāriṣat kratubhir mandasāno marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sa pāriṣat kratubhiḥ mandasānaḥ marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.15a na yasya devā devatā na martā āpaś cana śavaso antam āpuḥ /
analyzed: na yasya devāḥ devatā na martāḥ āpaḥ cana śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ

original: RV_1,100.15c sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmo divaś ca marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
analyzed: sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmaḥ divaḥ ca marutvān naḥ bhavatu indraḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,100.16a rohic chyāvā sumadaṃśur lalāmīr dyukṣā rāya ṛjrāśvasya /
analyzed: rohit śyāvā sumat aṃśuḥ lalāmīḥ dyukṣā rāye ṛjrāśvasya

original: RV_1,100.16c vṛṣaṇvantam bibhratī dhūrṣu ratham mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu //
analyzed: vṛṣaṇvantam bibhratī dhūrṣu ratham mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_1,100.17a etat tyat ta indra vṛṣṇa ukthaṃ vārṣāgirā abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ /
analyzed: etat tyad te indra vṛṣṇe uktham vārṣāgirāḥ abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ

original: RV_1,100.17c ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣṭibhir ambarīṣaḥ sahadevo bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ //
analyzed: ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣṭibhiḥ ambarīṣaḥ sahadevaḥ bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ

original: RV_1,100.18a dasyūñ chimyūṃś ca puruhūta evair hatvā pṛthivyāṃ śarvā ni barhīt /
analyzed: dasyūm śimyūn ca puruhūtaḥ evaiḥ hatvā pṛthivyām śarvā ni barhīt

original: RV_1,100.18c sanat kṣetraṃ sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ sanat sūryaṃ sanad apaḥ suvajraḥ //
analyzed: sanat kṣetram sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ sanat sūryam sanat apaḥ su vajraḥ

original: RV_1,100.19a viśvāhendro adhivaktā no astv aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam /
analyzed: viśvāhā indraḥ adhivaktā naḥ astu aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam

original: RV_1,100.19c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,101.01a pra mandine pitumad arcatā vaco yaḥ kṛṣṇagarbhā nirahann ṛjiśvanā /
analyzed: pra mandine pitumat arcata vacaḥ yaḥ kṛṣṇa garbhā nirahan ṛjiśvanā

original: RV_1,101.01c avasyavo vṛṣaṇaṃ vajradakṣiṇam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: avasyavaḥ vṛṣaṇam vajra dakṣiṇam marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.02a yo vyaṃsaṃ jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā yaḥ śambaraṃ yo ahan piprum avratam /
analyzed: yaḥ vyaṃsam jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā yaḥ śambaram yaḥ ahan piprum avratam

original: RV_1,101.02c indro yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ ny āvṛṇaṅ marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: indraḥ yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣam ni āvṛṇak marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.03a yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsyam mahad yasya vrate varuṇo yasya sūryaḥ /
analyzed: yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsyam mahat yasya vrate varuṇaḥ yasya sūryaḥ

original: RV_1,101.03c yasyendrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vratam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: yasya indrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vratam marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.04a yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ gopatir vaśī ya āritaḥ karmaṇi-karmaṇi sthiraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ aśvānām yaḥ gavām gopatiḥ vaśī yaḥ āritaḥ karmaṇi karmaṇi sthiraḥ

original: RV_1,101.04c vīḷoś cid indro yo asunvato vadho marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: vīḍoḥ cit indraḥ yaḥ a sunvataḥ vadhaḥ marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.05a yo viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇatas patir yo brahmaṇe prathamo gā avindat /
analyzed: yaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇataḥ patiḥ yaḥ brahmaṇe prathamaḥ gāḥ avindat

original: RV_1,101.05c indro yo dasyūṃr adharāṃ avātiran marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: indraḥ yaḥ dasyūṃr adharān avātirat marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.06a yaḥ śūrebhir havyo yaś ca bhīrubhir yo dhāvadbhir hūyate yaś ca jigyubhiḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ śūrebhiḥ havyaḥ yaḥ ca bhīrubhiḥ yaḥ dhāvadbhiḥ hūyate yaḥ ca jigyubhiḥ

original: RV_1,101.06c indraṃ yaṃ viśvā bhuvanābhi saṃdadhur marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: indram yam viśvā bhuvanā abhi saṃdadhuḥ marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.07a rudrāṇām eti pradiśā vicakṣaṇo rudrebhir yoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ /
analyzed: rudrāṇām eti pradiśā vicakṣaṇaḥ rudrebhiḥ yoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ

original: RV_1,101.07c indram manīṣā abhy arcati śrutam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
analyzed: indram manīṣāḥ abhī arcati śrutam marutvantam sakhyāya havāmahe

original: RV_1,101.08a yad vā marutvaḥ parame sadhasthe yad vāvame vṛjane mādayāse /
analyzed: yat vā marutvas parame sadhasthe yat vā avame vṛjane mādayāse

original: RV_1,101.08c ata ā yāhy adhvaraṃ no acchā tvāyā haviś cakṛmā satyarādhaḥ //
analyzed: atas ā yāhi adhvaram naḥ acchā tvāyā haviḥ cakṛma satya rādhaḥ

original: RV_1,101.09a tvāyendra somaṃ suṣumā sudakṣa tvāyā haviś cakṛmā brahmavāhaḥ /
analyzed: tvāyā indra somam suṣuma su dakṣa tvāyā haviḥ cakṛma brahma vāhaḥ

original: RV_1,101.09c adhā niyutvaḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmin yajñe barhiṣi mādayasva //
analyzed: adhā niyutvas sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmin yajñe barhiṣi mādayasva

original: RV_1,101.10a mādayasva haribhir ye ta indra vi ṣyasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene /
analyzed: mādayasva haribhiḥ ye te indra vi syasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene

original: RV_1,101.10c ā tvā suśipra harayo vahantūśan havyāni prati no juṣasva //
analyzed: ā tvā su śipra harayaḥ vahantu uśan havyāni prati naḥ juṣasva

original: RV_1,101.11a marutstotrasya vṛjanasya gopā vayam indreṇa sanuyāma vājam /
analyzed: marutstotrasya vṛjanasya gopāḥ vayam indreṇa sanuyāma vājam

original: RV_1,101.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,102.01a imāṃ te dhiyam pra bhare maho mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat ta ānaje /
analyzed: imām te dhiyam pra bhare mahaḥ mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat te ānaje

original: RV_1,102.01c tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indraṃ devāsaḥ śavasāmadann anu //
analyzed: tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indram devāsaḥ śavasā amadan anu

original: RV_1,102.02a asya śravo nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśataṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: asya śravaḥ nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśatam vapuḥ

original: RV_1,102.02c asme sūryācandramasābhicakṣe śraddhe kam indra carato vitarturam //
analyzed: asme sūryācandramasā abhicakṣe śraddhe kam indra carataḥ vitarturam

original: RV_1,102.03a taṃ smā ratham maghavan prāva sātaye jaitraṃ yaṃ te anumadāma saṃgame /
analyzed: tam smā ratham maghavan prāva sātaye jaitram yam te anumadāma saṃgame

original: RV_1,102.03c ājā na indra manasā puruṣṭuta tvāyadbhyo maghavañ charma yaccha naḥ //
analyzed: ājā naḥ indra manasā puruṣṭuta tvāyadbhyaḥ maghavan śarma yaccha naḥ

original: RV_1,102.04a vayaṃ jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud avā bhare-bhare /
analyzed: vayam jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud ava bharebhare

original: RV_1,102.04c asmabhyam indra varivaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja //
analyzed: asmabhyam indra varivaḥ su gam kṛdhi pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja

original: RV_1,102.05a nānā hi tvā havamānā janā ime dhanānāṃ dhartar avasā vipanyavaḥ /
analyzed: nānā hi tvā havamānāḥ janāḥ ime dhanānām dhartar avasā vipanyavaḥ

original: RV_1,102.05c asmākaṃ smā ratham ā tiṣṭha sātaye jaitraṃ hīndra nibhṛtam manas tava //
analyzed: asmākam smā ratham ā tiṣṭha sātaye jaitram hi indra nibhṛtam manaḥ tava

original: RV_1,102.06a gojitā bāhū amitakratuḥ simaḥ karman-karmañ chatamūtiḥ khajaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: go jitā bāhū amita kratuḥ simaḥ karman karmam śatamūtiḥ khajaṅkaraḥ

original: RV_1,102.06c akalpa indraḥ pratimānam ojasāthā janā vi hvayante siṣāsavaḥ //
analyzed: akalpaḥ indraḥ pratimānam ojasā athā janāḥ vi hvayante siṣāsavaḥ

original: RV_1,102.07a ut te śatān maghavann uc ca bhūyasa ut sahasrād ririce kṛṣṭiṣu śravaḥ /
analyzed: ud te śatāt maghavan ud ca bhūyasaḥ ud sahasrāt ririce kṛṣṭiṣu śravaḥ

original: RV_1,102.07c amātraṃ tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahy adhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase purandara //
analyzed: amātram tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahī adhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase purandara

original: RV_1,102.08a triviṣṭidhātu pratimānam ojasas tisro bhūmīr nṛpate trīṇi rocanā /
analyzed: triviṣṭi dhātu pratimānam ojasaḥ tisraḥ bhūmīḥ nṛpate trīṇi rocanā

original: RV_1,102.08c atīdaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vavakṣithāśatrur indra januṣā sanād asi //
analyzed: ati idam viśvam bhuvanam vavakṣitha a śatruḥ indra januṣā sanāt asi

original: RV_1,102.09a tvāṃ deveṣu prathamaṃ havāmahe tvam babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ /
analyzed: tvām deveṣu prathamam havāmahe tvam babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ

original: RV_1,102.09c semaṃ naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indraḥ kṛṇotu prasave ratham puraḥ //
analyzed: sa imam naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indraḥ kṛṇotu prasave ratham puras

original: RV_1,102.10a tvaṃ jigetha na dhanā rurodhithārbheṣv ājā maghavan mahatsu ca /
analyzed: tvam jigetha na dhanā rurodhitha arbheṣu ājā maghavan mahatsu ca

original: RV_1,102.10c tvām ugram avase saṃ śiśīmasy athā na indra havaneṣu codaya //
analyzed: tvām ugram avase sam śiśīmasi athā naḥ indra havaneṣu codaya

original: RV_1,102.11a viśvāhendro adhivaktā no astv aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam /
analyzed: viśvāhā indraḥ adhivaktā naḥ astu aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam

original: RV_1,102.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,103.01a tat ta indriyam paramam parācair adhārayanta kavayaḥ puredam /
analyzed: tat te indriyam paramam parācais adhārayanta kavayaḥ purā idam

original: RV_1,103.01c kṣamedam anyad divy anyad asya sam ī pṛcyate samaneva ketuḥ //
analyzed: kṣamā idam anyat divi anyat asya sam ī pṛcyate samanā iva ketuḥ

original: RV_1,103.02a sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathac ca vajreṇa hatvā nir apaḥ sasarja /
analyzed: sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathat ca vajreṇa hatvā niḥ apaḥ sasarja

original: RV_1,103.02c ahann ahim abhinad rauhiṇaṃ vy ahan vyaṃsam maghavā śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: ahan ahim abhinat rauhiṇam vi ahan vyaṃsam maghavā śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,103.03a sa jātūbharmā śraddadhāna ojaḥ puro vibhindann acarad vi dāsīḥ /
analyzed: sa jātūbharmā śraddadhānaḥ ojaḥ puras vibhindan acarat vi dāsīḥ

original: RV_1,103.03c vidvān vajrin dasyave hetim asyāryaṃ saho vardhayā dyumnam indra //
analyzed: vidvān vajrin dasyave hetim asya āryam sahaḥ vardhaya dyumnam indra

original: RV_1,103.04a tad ūcuṣe mānuṣemā yugāni kīrtenyam maghavā nāma bibhrat /
analyzed: tat ūcuṣe mānuṣā imā yugāni kīrtenyam maghavā nāma bibhrat

original: RV_1,103.04c upaprayan dasyuhatyāya vajrī yad dha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe //
analyzed: upaprayan dasyu hatyāya vajrī yat ha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe

original: RV_1,103.05a tad asyedam paśyatā bhūri puṣṭaṃ śrad indrasya dhattana vīryāya /
analyzed: tat asya idam paśyata bhūri puṣṭam śrath indrasya dhattana vīryāya

original: RV_1,103.05c sa gā avindat so avindad aśvān sa oṣadhīḥ so apaḥ sa vanāni //
analyzed: sa gāḥ avindat saḥ avindat aśvān saḥ oṣadhīḥ saḥ apaḥ sa vanāni

original: RV_1,103.06a bhūrikarmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe satyaśuṣmāya sunavāma somam /
analyzed: bhūri karmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe satya śuṣmāya sunavāma somam

original: RV_1,103.06c ya ādṛtyā paripanthīva śūro 'yajvano vibhajann eti vedaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ādṛtya paripanthī iva śūraḥ yajvanaḥ vibhajan eti vedaḥ

original: RV_1,103.07a tad indra preva vīryaṃ cakartha yat sasantaṃ vajreṇābodhayo 'him /
analyzed: tat indra pra iva vīryam cakartha yat sasantam vajreṇa abodhayaḥ him

original: RV_1,103.07c anu tvā patnīr hṛṣitaṃ vayaś ca viśve devāso amadann anu tvā //
analyzed: anu tvā patnīḥ hṛṣitam vayaḥ ca viśve devāsaḥ amadan anu tvā

original: RV_1,103.08a śuṣṇam pipruṃ kuyavaṃ vṛtram indra yadāvadhīr vi puraḥ śambarasya /
analyzed: śuṣṇam piprum kuyavam vṛtram indra yadā avadhīḥ vi puraḥ śambarasya

original: RV_1,103.08c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,104.01a yoniṣ ṭa indra niṣade akāri tam ā ni ṣīda svāno nārvā /
analyzed: yoniḥ te indra niṣade akāri tam ā ni sīda svānaḥ na arvā

original: RV_1,104.01c vimucyā vayo 'vasāyāśvān doṣā vastor vahīyasaḥ prapitve //
analyzed: vimucya vayaḥ vasāya aśvān doṣā vastoḥ vahīyasaḥ prapitve

original: RV_1,104.02a o tye nara indram ūtaye gur nū cit tān sadyo adhvano jagamyāt /
analyzed: ā u tye naraḥ indram ūtaye guḥ nu cit tān sadyas adhvanaḥ jagamyāt

original: RV_1,104.02c devāso manyuṃ dāsasya ścamnan te na ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam //
analyzed: devāsaḥ manyum dāsasya ścamnan te naḥ ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam

original: RV_1,104.03a ava tmanā bharate ketavedā ava tmanā bharate phenam udan /
analyzed: ava tmanā bharate keta vedāḥ ava tmanā bharate phenam udan

original: RV_1,104.03c kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe hate te syātām pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ //
analyzed: kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe hate te syātām pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ

original: RV_1,104.04a yuyopa nābhir uparasyāyoḥ pra pūrvābhis tirate rāṣṭi śūraḥ /
analyzed: yuyopa nābhiḥ uparasya āyoḥ pra pūrvābhiḥ tirate rāṣṭi śūraḥ

original: RV_1,104.04c añjasī kuliśī vīrapatnī payo hinvānā udabhir bharante //
analyzed: añjasī kuliśī vīra patnī payaḥ hinvānāḥ udabhiḥ bharante

original: RV_1,104.05a prati yat syā nīthādarśi dasyor oko nācchā sadanaṃ jānatī gāt /
analyzed: prati yat syā nīthā adarśi dasyoḥ okaḥ nā acchā sadanam jānatī gāt

original: RV_1,104.05c adha smā no maghavañ carkṛtād in mā no magheva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ //
analyzed: adha smā naḥ maghavan carkṛtāt id mā naḥ maghā iva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ

original: RV_1,104.06a sa tvaṃ na indra sūrye so apsv anāgāstva ā bhaja jīvaśaṃse /
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ indra sūrye saḥ apsu anāgāstve ā bhaja jīva śaṃse

original: RV_1,104.06c māntarām bhujam ā rīriṣo naḥ śraddhitaṃ te mahata indriyāya //
analyzed: mā antarām bhujam ā rīriṣaḥ naḥ śraddhitam te mahate indriyāya

original: RV_1,104.07a adhā manye śrat te asmā adhāyi vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya /
analyzed: adhā manye śrat te asmai adhāyi vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya

original: RV_1,104.07c mā no akṛte puruhūta yonāv indra kṣudhyadbhyo vaya āsutiṃ dāḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ a kṛte puruhūta yonau indra kṣudhyadbhyaḥ vayaḥ āsutim dāḥ

original: RV_1,104.08a mā no vadhīr indra mā parā dā mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ /
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ indra mā parā dāḥ mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ

original: RV_1,104.08c āṇḍā mā no maghavañ chakra nir bhen mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi //
analyzed: āṇḍā mā naḥ maghavan śakra niḥ bhet mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi

original: RV_1,104.09a arvāṅ ehi somakāmaṃ tvāhur ayaṃ sutas tasya pibā madāya /
analyzed: arvāṅ ehi soma kāmam tvā āhuḥ ayam sutaḥ tasya pibā madāya

original: RV_1,104.09c uruvyacā jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva piteva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ //
analyzed: uru vyacāḥ jaṭhare ā vṛṣasva pitā iva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ

original: RV_1,105.01a candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi /
analyzed: candramāḥ apsu antar ā suparṇaḥ dhāvate divi

original: RV_1,105.01c na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: na vaḥ hiraṇya nemayaḥ padam vindanti vidyutaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.02a artham id vā u arthina ā jāyā yuvate patim /
analyzed: artham id vai u arthinaḥ ā jāyā yuvate patim

original: RV_1,105.02c tuñjāte vṛṣṇyam payaḥ paridāya rasaṃ duhe vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: tuñjāte vṛṣṇyam payaḥ paridāya rasam duhe vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.03a mo ṣu devā adaḥ svar ava pādi divas pari /
analyzed: mā u su devāḥ adaḥ svar ava pādi divaḥ pari

original: RV_1,105.03c mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ śūne bhūma kadā cana vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ śūne bhūma kadā cana vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.04a yajñam pṛcchāmy avamaṃ sa tad dūto vi vocati /
analyzed: yajñam pṛcchāmi avamam sa tat dūtaḥ vi vocati

original: RV_1,105.04c kva ṛtam pūrvyaṃ gataṃ kas tad bibharti nūtano vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: kva ṛtam pūrvyam gatam kaḥ tat bibharti nūtanaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.05a amī ye devā sthana triṣv ā rocane divaḥ /
analyzed: amī ye devā sthana triṣu ā rocane divaḥ

original: RV_1,105.05c kad va ṛtaṃ kad anṛtaṃ kva pratnā va āhutir vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: kad vaḥ ṛtam kad anṛtam kva pratnā vaḥ āhutiḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.06a kad va ṛtasya dharṇasi kad varuṇasya cakṣaṇam /
analyzed: kad vaḥ ṛtasya dharṇasi kad varuṇasya cakṣaṇam

original: RV_1,105.06c kad aryamṇo mahas pathāti krāmema dūḍhyo vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: kad aryamṇaḥ mahaḥ pathā ati krāmema dūḍhyaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.07a ahaṃ so asmi yaḥ purā sute vadāmi kāni cit /
analyzed: aham saḥ asmi yaḥ purā sute vadāmi kāni cit

original: RV_1,105.07c tam mā vyanty ādhyo vṛko na tṛṣṇajam mṛgaṃ vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: tam mā vyanti ādhyaḥ vṛkaḥ na tṛṣṇajam mṛgam vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.08a sam mā tapanty abhitaḥ sapatnīr iva parśavaḥ /
analyzed: sam mā tapanti abhitas sapatnīḥ iva parśavaḥ

original: RV_1,105.08c mūṣo na śiśnā vy adanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: mūṣaḥ na śiśnā vi adanti mā adhya stotāram te śatakrato vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.09a amī ye sapta raśmayas tatrā me nābhir ātatā /
analyzed: amī ye sapta raśmayaḥ tatra me nābhiḥ ātatā

original: RV_1,105.09c tritas tad vedāptyaḥ sa jāmitvāya rebhati vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: tritaḥ tat veda āptyaḥ sa jāmi tvāya rebhati vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.10a amī ye pañcokṣaṇo madhye tasthur maho divaḥ /
analyzed: amī ye pañca ukṣaṇaḥ madhye tasthuḥ mahaḥ divaḥ

original: RV_1,105.10c devatrā nu pravācyaṃ sadhrīcīnā ni vāvṛtur vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: devatrā nu pravācyam sadhrīcīnāḥ ni vāvṛtuḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.11a suparṇā eta āsate madhya ārodhane divaḥ /
analyzed: suparṇāḥ ete āsate madhye ārodhane divaḥ

original: RV_1,105.11c te sedhanti patho vṛkaṃ tarantaṃ yahvatīr apo vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: te sedhanti pathaḥ vṛkam tarantam yahvatīḥ apaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.12a navyaṃ tad ukthyaṃ hitaṃ devāsaḥ supravācanam /
analyzed: navyam tat ukthyam hitam devāsaḥ su pravācanam

original: RV_1,105.12c ṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ satyaṃ tātāna sūryo vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: ṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ satyam tātāna sūryaḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.13a agne tava tyad ukthyaṃ deveṣv asty āpyam /
analyzed: agne tava tyad ukthyam deveṣu asti āpyam

original: RV_1,105.13c sa naḥ satto manuṣvad ā devān yakṣi viduṣṭaro vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: sa naḥ sattaḥ manuṣvat ā devān yakṣi viduṣṭaraḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.14a satto hotā manuṣvad ā devāṃ acchā viduṣṭaraḥ /
analyzed: sattaḥ hotā manuṣvat ā devān acchā viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_1,105.14c agnir havyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiro vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: agniḥ havyā suṣūdati devaḥ deveṣu medhiraḥ vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.15a brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇo gātuvidaṃ tam īmahe /
analyzed: brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇaḥ gātu vidam tam īmahe

original: RV_1,105.15c vy ūrṇoti hṛdā matiṃ navyo jāyatām ṛtaṃ vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: vi ūrṇoti hṛdā matim navyaḥ jāyatām ṛtam vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.16a asau yaḥ panthā ādityo divi pravācyaṃ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: asau yaḥ panthāḥ ādityaḥ divi pravācyam kṛtaḥ

original: RV_1,105.16c na sa devā atikrame tam martāso na paśyatha vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: na sa devāḥ atikrame tam martāsaḥ na paśyatha vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.17a tritaḥ kūpe 'vahito devān havata ūtaye /
analyzed: tritaḥ kūpe vahitaḥ devān havate ūtaye

original: RV_1,105.17c tac chuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ kṛṇvann aṃhūraṇād uru vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: tat śuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ kṛṇvan aṃhūraṇāt uru vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.18a aruṇo mā sakṛd vṛkaḥ pathā yantaṃ dadarśa hi /
analyzed: aruṇaḥ mā sakṛt vṛkaḥ pathā yantam dadarśa hi

original: RV_1,105.18c uj jihīte nicāyyā taṣṭeva pṛṣṭyāmayī vittam me asya rodasī //
analyzed: ud jihīte nicāyyā taṣṭā iva pṛṣṭi āmayī vittam me asya rodasī

original: RV_1,105.19a enāṅgūṣeṇa vayam indravanto 'bhi ṣyāma vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ /
analyzed: enā āṅgūṣeṇa vayam indravantaḥ bhi syāma vṛjane sarva vīrāḥ

original: RV_1,105.19c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,106.01a indram mitraṃ varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃ havāmahe /
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutam śardhaḥ aditim havāmahe

original: RV_1,106.01c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.02a ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye bhūta devā vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ /
analyzed: te ādityāḥ ā gata sarvatātaye bhūta devāḥ vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,106.02c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.03a avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanā uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā /
analyzed: avantu naḥ pitaraḥ su pravācanāḥ uta devī deva putre ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_1,106.03c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.04a narāśaṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājayann iha kṣayadvīram pūṣaṇaṃ sumnair īmahe /
analyzed: narāśaṃsam vājinam vājayan iha kṣayadvīram pūṣaṇam sumnaiḥ īmahe

original: RV_1,106.04c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.05a bṛhaspate sadam in naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi śaṃ yor yat te manurhitaṃ tad īmahe /
analyzed: bṛhaspate sadam id naḥ sugam kṛdhi śam yos yat te manuḥ hitam tat īmahe

original: RV_1,106.05c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.06a indraṃ kutso vṛtrahaṇaṃ śacīpatiṃ kāṭe nibāḷha ṛṣir ahvad ūtaye /
analyzed: indram kutsaḥ vṛtra haṇam śacīpatim kāṭe nibāḍhaḥ ṛṣiḥ ahvat ūtaye

original: RV_1,106.06c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
analyzed: ratham na durgāt vasavaḥ su dānavaḥ viśvasmāt naḥ aṃhasaḥ niḥ pipartana

original: RV_1,106.07a devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan /
analyzed: devaiḥ naḥ devī aditiḥ ni pātu devaḥ trātā trāyatām aprayucchan

original: RV_1,106.07c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,107.01a yajño devānām praty eti sumnam ādityāso bhavatā mṛḷayantaḥ /
analyzed: yajñaḥ devānām prati eti sumnam ādityāsaḥ bhavata mṛḍayantaḥ

original: RV_1,107.01c ā vo 'rvācī sumatir vavṛtyād aṃhoś cid yā varivovittarāsat //
analyzed: ā vaḥ rvācī sumatiḥ vavṛtyāt aṃhoḥ cit yā varivaḥ vittarā asat

original: RV_1,107.02a upa no devā avasā gamantv aṅgirasāṃ sāmabhi stūyamānāḥ /
analyzed: upa naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu aṅgirasām sāmabhi stūyamānāḥ

original: RV_1,107.02c indra indriyair maruto marudbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat //
analyzed: indraḥ indriyaiḥ marutaḥ marudbhiḥ ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat

original: RV_1,107.03a tan na indras tad varuṇas tad agnis tad aryamā tat savitā cano dhāt /
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ tat varuṇaḥ tat agniḥ tat aryamā tat savitā canaḥ dhāt

original: RV_1,107.03c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,108.01a ya indrāgnī citratamo ratho vām abhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe /
analyzed: yaḥ indra agnī citratamaḥ rathaḥ vām abhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe

original: RV_1,108.01c tenā yātaṃ sarathaṃ tasthivāṃsāthā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: tena ā yātam sa ratham tasthivāṃsā athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.02a yāvad idam bhuvanaṃ viśvam asty uruvyacā varimatā gabhīram /
analyzed: yāvat idam bhuvanam viśvam asti uruvyacā varimatā gabhīram

original: RV_1,108.02c tāvāṃ ayam pātave somo astv aram indrāgnī manase yuvabhyām //
analyzed: tāvān ayam pātave somaḥ astu aram indra agnī manase yuvabhyām

original: RV_1,108.03a cakrāthe hi sadhryaṅ nāma bhadraṃ sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇā uta sthaḥ /
analyzed: cakrāthe hi sadhryak nāma bhadram sadhrīcīnā vṛtra haṇau uta sthaḥ

original: RV_1,108.03c tāv indrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām //
analyzed: tau indra agnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām

original: RV_1,108.04a samiddheṣv agniṣv ānajānā yatasrucā barhir u tistirāṇā /
analyzed: samiddheṣu agniṣu ānajānā yata srucā barhiḥ u tistirāṇā

original: RV_1,108.04c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhir arvāg endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam //
analyzed: tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhiḥ arvāk ā indra agnī saumanasāya yātam

original: RV_1,108.05a yānīndrāgnī cakrathur vīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇy uta vṛṣṇyāni /
analyzed: yāni indra agnī cakrathuḥ vīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇi uta vṛṣṇyāni

original: RV_1,108.05c yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.06a yad abravam prathamaṃ vāṃ vṛṇāno 'yaṃ somo asurair no vihavyaḥ /
analyzed: yat abravam prathamam vām vṛṇānaḥ yam somaḥ asuraiḥ naḥ vihavyaḥ

original: RV_1,108.06c tāṃ satyāṃ śraddhām abhy ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: tām satyām śraddhām abhī ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.07a yad indrāgnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yad brahmaṇi rājani vā yajatrā /
analyzed: yat indra agnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yat brahmaṇi rājani vā yajatrā

original: RV_1,108.07c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.08a yad indrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yad druhyuṣv anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ /
analyzed: yat indra agnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yat druhyuṣu anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ

original: RV_1,108.08c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.09a yad indrāgnī avamasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ /
analyzed: yat indra agnī avamasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ

original: RV_1,108.09c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.10a yad indrāgnī paramasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ /
analyzed: yat indra agnī paramasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ

original: RV_1,108.10c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.11a yad indrāgnī divi ṣṭho yat pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
analyzed: yat indra agnī divi ṣṭhaḥ yat pṛthivyām yat parvateṣu oṣadhīṣu apsu

original: RV_1,108.11c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.12a yad indrāgnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe /
analyzed: yat indra agnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe

original: RV_1,108.12c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
analyzed: atas pari vṛṣaṇau ā hi yātam athā somasya pibatam sutasya

original: RV_1,108.13a evendrāgnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvāsmabhyaṃ saṃ jayataṃ dhanāni /
analyzed: eva indra agnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvā asmabhyam sam jayatam dhanāni

original: RV_1,108.13c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,109.01a vi hy akhyam manasā vasya icchann indrāgnī jñāsa uta vā sajātān /
analyzed: vi hi akhyam manasā vasyaḥ icchan indra agnī jñāsaḥ uta vā sajātān

original: RV_1,109.01c nānyā yuvat pramatir asti mahyaṃ sa vāṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantīm atakṣam //
analyzed: na anyā yuvat pramatiḥ asti mahyam sa vām dhiyam vājayantīm atakṣam

original: RV_1,109.02a aśravaṃ hi bhūridāvattarā vāṃ vijāmātur uta vā ghā syālāt /
analyzed: aśravam hi bhūri dāvattarā vām vijāmātuḥ uta vā gha syālāt

original: RV_1,109.02c athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām indrāgnī stomaṃ janayāmi navyam //
analyzed: athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām indra agnī stomam janayāmi navyam

original: RV_1,109.03a mā cchedma raśmīṃr iti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇāṃ śaktīr anuyacchamānāḥ /
analyzed: mā chedma raśmīṃr iti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇām śaktīḥ anuyacchamānāḥ

original: RV_1,109.03c indrāgnibhyāṃ kaṃ vṛṣaṇo madanti tā hy adrī dhiṣaṇāyā upasthe //
analyzed: indra agnibhyām kam vṛṣaṇaḥ madanti tā hi adrī dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthe

original: RV_1,109.04a yuvābhyāṃ devī dhiṣaṇā madāyendrāgnī somam uśatī sunoti /
analyzed: yuvābhyām devī dhiṣaṇā madāya indra agnī somam uśatī sunoti

original: RV_1,109.04c tāv aśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu //
analyzed: tau aśvinā bhadra hastā su pāṇī ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu

original: RV_1,109.05a yuvām indrāgnī vasuno vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye /
analyzed: yuvām indra agnī vasunaḥ vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtra hatye

original: RV_1,109.05c tāv āsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethāṃ sutasya //
analyzed: tau āsadya barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethām sutasya

original: RV_1,109.06a pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaś ca /
analyzed: pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanā āhaveṣu pra pṛthivyāḥ riricāthe divaḥ ca

original: RV_1,109.06c pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyo mahitvā prendrāgnī viśvā bhuvanāty anyā //
analyzed: pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyaḥ mahitvā pra indra agnī viśvā bhuvanā ati anyā

original: RV_1,109.07a ā bharataṃ śikṣataṃ vajrabāhū asmāṃ indrāgnī avataṃ śacībhiḥ /
analyzed: ā bharatam śikṣatam vajra bāhū asmān indra agnī avatam śacībhiḥ

original: RV_1,109.07c ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaro na āsan //
analyzed: ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaraḥ naḥ āsan

original: RV_1,109.08a purandarā śikṣataṃ vajrahastāsmāṃ indrāgnī avatam bhareṣu /
analyzed: purandarā śikṣatam vajra hastā asmān indra agnī avatam bhareṣu

original: RV_1,109.08c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,110.01a tatam me apas tad u tāyate punaḥ svādiṣṭhā dhītir ucathāya śasyate /
analyzed: tatam me apaḥ tat u tāyate punar svādiṣṭhā dhītiḥ ucathāya śasyate

original: RV_1,110.01c ayaṃ samudra iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya sam u tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ //
analyzed: ayam samudraḥ iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya sam u tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ

original: RV_1,110.02a ābhogayam pra yad icchanta aitanāpākāḥ prāñco mama ke cid āpayaḥ /
analyzed: ābhogayam pra yat icchanta aitana apākāḥ prāñcaḥ mama ke cit āpayaḥ

original: RV_1,110.02c saudhanvanāsaś caritasya bhūmanāgacchata savitur dāśuṣo gṛham //
analyzed: saudhanvanāsaḥ caritasya bhūmanā agacchata savituḥ dāśuṣaḥ gṛham

original: RV_1,110.03a tat savitā vo 'mṛtatvam āsuvad agohyaṃ yac chravayanta aitana /
analyzed: tat savitā vaḥ mṛta tvam āsuvat agohyam yat śravayantaḥ aitana

original: RV_1,110.03c tyaṃ cic camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam ekaṃ santam akṛṇutā caturvayam //
analyzed: tyam cit camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam ekam santam akṛṇuta caturvayam

original: RV_1,110.04a viṣṭvī śamī taraṇitvena vāghato martāsaḥ santo amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: viṣṭvī śamī taraṇi tvena vāghataḥ martāsaḥ santaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_1,110.04c saudhanvanā ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare sam apṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ //
analyzed: saudhanvanāḥ ṛbhavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare sam apṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_1,110.05a kṣetram iva vi mamus tejanenaṃ ekam pātram ṛbhavo jehamānam /
analyzed: kṣetram iva vi mamuḥ tejanena ekam pātram ṛbhavaḥ jehamānam

original: RV_1,110.05c upastutā upamaṃ nādhamānā amartyeṣu śrava icchamānāḥ //
analyzed: upastutāḥ upamam nādhamānāḥ amartyeṣu śravaḥ icchamānāḥ

original: RV_1,110.06a ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ sruceva ghṛtaṃ juhavāma vidmanā /
analyzed: ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ srucā iva ghṛtam juhavāma vidmanā

original: RV_1,110.06c taraṇitvā ye pitur asya saścira ṛbhavo vājam aruhan divo rajaḥ //
analyzed: taraṇi tvā ye pituḥ asya saścire ṛbhavaḥ vājam divaḥ rajaḥ

original: RV_1,110.07a ṛbhur na indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhur vājebhir vasubhir vasur dadiḥ /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ naḥ indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhuḥ vājebhiḥ vasubhiḥ vasuḥ dadiḥ

original: RV_1,110.07c yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priye 'bhi tiṣṭhema pṛtsutīr asunvatām //
analyzed: yuṣmākam devāḥ avasā ahani priye bhi tiṣṭhema pṛtsutīḥ a sunvatām

original: RV_1,110.08a niś carmaṇa ṛbhavo gām apiṃśata saṃ vatsenāsṛjatā mātaram punaḥ /
analyzed: niḥ carmaṇaḥ ṛbhavaḥ gām apiṃśata sam vatsena asṛjata mātaram punar

original: RV_1,110.08c saudhanvanāsaḥ svapasyayā naro jivrī yuvānā pitarākṛṇotana //
analyzed: saudhanvanāsaḥ su apasyayā naraḥ jivrī yuvānā pitarā akṛṇotana

original: RV_1,110.09a vājebhir no vājasātāv aviḍḍhy ṛbhumāṃ indra citram ā darṣi rādhaḥ /
analyzed: vājebhiḥ naḥ vājasātau aviḍḍhi ṛbhumān indra citram ā darṣi rādhaḥ

original: RV_1,110.09c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,111.01a takṣan rathaṃ suvṛtaṃ vidmanāpasas takṣan harī indravāhā vṛṣaṇvasū /
analyzed: takṣan ratham suvṛtam vidmanā apasaḥ takṣan harī indra vāhā vṛṣaṇvasū

original: RV_1,111.01c takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavo yuvad vayas takṣan vatsāya mātaraṃ sacābhuvam //
analyzed: takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavaḥ yuvat vayaḥ takṣan vatsāya mātaram sacābhuvam

original: RV_1,111.02a ā no yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumad vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya suprajāvatīm iṣam /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumat vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya su prajāvatīm iṣam

original: RV_1,111.02c yathā kṣayāma sarvavīrayā viśā tan naḥ śardhāya dhāsathā sv indriyam //
analyzed: yathā kṣayāma sarva vīrayā viśā tat naḥ śardhāya dhāsatha su indriyam

original: RV_1,111.03a ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātiṃ rathāya sātim arvate naraḥ /
analyzed: ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātim rathāya sātim arvate naraḥ

original: RV_1,111.03c sātiṃ no jaitrīṃ sam maheta viśvahā jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim //
analyzed: sātim naḥ jaitrīm sam maheta viśvahā jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim

original: RV_1,111.04a ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huva ūtaya ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ somapītaye /
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huve ūtaye ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ soma pītaye

original: RV_1,111.04c ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā te no hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe //
analyzed: ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā te naḥ hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe

original: RV_1,111.05a ṛbhur bharāya saṃ śiśātu sātiṃ samaryajid vājo asmāṃ aviṣṭu /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ bharāya sam śiśātu sātim samarya jit vājaḥ asmān aviṣṭu

original: RV_1,111.05c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_1,112.01a īḷe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvacittaye 'gniṃ gharmaṃ surucaṃ yāmann iṣṭaye /
analyzed: īḍe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva cittaye gnim gharmam su rucam yāman iṣṭaye

original: RV_1,112.01c yābhir bhare kāram aṃśāya jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ bhare kāram aṃśāya jinvathaḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.02a yuvor dānāya subharā asaścato ratham ā tasthur vacasaṃ na mantave /
analyzed: yuvoḥ dānāya subharāḥ asaścataḥ ratham ā tasthuḥ vacasam na mantave

original: RV_1,112.02c yābhir dhiyo 'vathaḥ karmann iṣṭaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhiyaḥ vathaḥ karman iṣṭaye tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.03a yuvaṃ tāsāṃ divyasya praśāsane viśāṃ kṣayatho amṛtasya majmanā /
analyzed: yuvam tāsām divyasya praśāsane viśām kṣayathaḥ amṛtasya majmanā

original: RV_1,112.03c yābhir dhenum asvam pinvatho narā tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ dhenum a svam pinvathaḥ narā tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.04a yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇir vibhūṣati /
analyzed: yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇiḥ vibhūṣati

original: RV_1,112.04c yābhis trimantur abhavad vicakṣaṇas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ trimantuḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.05a yābhī rebhaṃ nivṛtaṃ sitam adbhya ud vandanam airayataṃ svar dṛśe /
analyzed: yābhiḥ rebham nivṛtam sitam adbhyaḥ ud vandanam airayatam svar dṛśe

original: RV_1,112.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
analyzed: yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvatam tābhiḥ u su ūtibhiḥ aśvinā gatam

original: RV_1,112.06a yābhir antakaṃ jasamānam āraṇe bhujyuṃ yābhir avyathibhir jijinvathuḥ /
analyzed: yābhiḥ antakam jasamānam āraṇe bhujyum yābhiḥ avyathibhiḥ jijinvathuḥ
