analyzed: aśapata yaḥ karasnam vaḥ ādade yaḥ prābravīt pra u tasmai abravītana

original: RV_1,161.13a suṣupvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchatāgohya ka idaṃ no abūbudhat /
analyzed: suṣupvāṃsaḥ ṛbhavaḥ tat apṛcchata agohya kaḥ idam naḥ abūbudhat

original: RV_1,161.13c śvānam basto bodhayitāram abravīt saṃvatsara idam adyā vy akhyata //
analyzed: śvānam bastaḥ bodhayitāram abravīt saṃvatsare idam adyā vi akhyata

original: RV_1,161.14a divā yānti maruto bhūmyāgnir ayaṃ vāto antarikṣeṇa yāti /
analyzed: divā yānti marutaḥ bhūmyā agniḥ ayam vātaḥ antarikṣeṇa yāti

original: RV_1,161.14c adbhir yāti varuṇaḥ samudrair yuṣmāṃ icchantaḥ śavaso napātaḥ //
analyzed: adbhiḥ yāti varuṇaḥ samudraiḥ yuṣmān icchantaḥ śavasaḥ napātaḥ

original: RV_1,162.01a mā no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā marutaḥ pari khyan /
analyzed: mā naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā āyuḥ indraḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ marutaḥ pari khyan

original: RV_1,162.01c yad vājino devajātasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmo vidathe vīryāṇi //
analyzed: yat vājinaḥ deva jātasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmaḥ vidathe vīryāṇi

original: RV_1,162.02a yan nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya rātiṃ gṛbhītām mukhato nayanti /
analyzed: yat nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya rātim gṛbhītām mukhataḥ nayanti

original: RV_1,162.02c suprāṅ ajo memyad viśvarūpa indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam apy eti pāthaḥ //
analyzed: su prāṅ ajaḥ memyat viśva rūpaḥ indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam api eti pāthaḥ

original: RV_1,162.03a eṣa cchāgaḥ puro aśvena vājinā pūṣṇo bhāgo nīyate viśvadevyaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa chāgaḥ puras aśvena vājinā pūṣṇaḥ bhāgaḥ nīyate viśvadevyaḥ

original: RV_1,162.03c abhipriyaṃ yat puroḷāśam arvatā tvaṣṭed enaṃ sauśravasāya jinvati //
analyzed: abhipriyam yat puroḷāśam arvatā tvaṣṭā id enam sauśravasāya jinvati

original: RV_1,162.04a yad dhaviṣyam ṛtuśo devayānaṃ trir mānuṣāḥ pary aśvaṃ nayanti /
analyzed: yat haviṣyam ṛtuśas deva yānam tris mānuṣāḥ pari aśvam nayanti

original: RV_1,162.04c atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamo bhāga eti yajñaṃ devebhyaḥ prativedayann ajaḥ //
analyzed: atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamaḥ bhāgaḥ eti yajñam devebhyaḥ prativedayan ajaḥ

original: RV_1,162.05a hotādhvaryur āvayā agnimindho grāvagrābha uta śaṃstā suvipraḥ /
analyzed: hotā adhvaryuḥ āvayāḥ agnimindhaḥ grāvagrābhaḥ uta śaṃstā su vipraḥ

original: RV_1,162.05c tena yajñena svaraṅkṛtena sviṣṭena vakṣaṇā ā pṛṇadhvam //
analyzed: tena yajñena su araṅkṛtena su iṣṭena vakṣaṇāḥ ā pṛṇadhvam

original: RV_1,162.06a yūpavraskā uta ye yūpavāhāś caṣālaṃ ye aśvayūpāya takṣati /
analyzed: yūpavraskāḥ uta ye yūpa vāhāḥ caṣālam ye aśva yūpāya takṣati

original: RV_1,162.06c ye cārvate pacanaṃ sambharanty uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu //
analyzed: ye ca arvate pacanam sambharanti uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu

original: RV_1,162.07a upa prāgāt suman me 'dhāyi manma devānām āśā upa vītapṛṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: upa prāgāt sumat me dhāyi manma devānām āśāḥ upa vīta pṛṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_1,162.07c anv enaṃ viprā ṛṣayo madanti devānām puṣṭe cakṛmā subandhum //
analyzed: anu enam viprāḥ ṛṣayaḥ madanti devānām puṣṭe cakṛma su bandhum

original: RV_1,162.08a yad vājino dāma saṃdānam arvato yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjur asya /
analyzed: yat vājinaḥ dāma saṃdānam arvataḥ yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjuḥ asya

original: RV_1,162.08c yad vā ghāsya prabhṛtam āsye tṛṇaṃ sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
analyzed: yat vā gha asya prabhṛtam āsye tṛṇam sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_1,162.09a yad aśvasya kraviṣo makṣikāśa yad vā svarau svadhitau riptam asti /
analyzed: yat aśvasya kraviṣaḥ makṣikā āśa yat vā svarau svadhitau riptam asti

original: RV_1,162.09c yad dhastayoḥ śamitur yan nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
analyzed: yat hastayoḥ śamituḥ yat nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_1,162.10a yad ūvadhyam udarasyāpavāti ya āmasya kraviṣo gandho asti /
analyzed: yat ūvadhyam udarasya apavāti yaḥ āmasya kraviṣaḥ gandhaḥ asti

original: RV_1,162.10c sukṛtā tac chamitāraḥ kṛṇvantūta medhaṃ śṛtapākam pacantu //
analyzed: su kṛtā tat śamitāraḥ kṛṇvantu uta medham śṛta pākam pacantu

original: RV_1,162.11a yat te gātrād agninā pacyamānād abhi śūlaṃ nihatasyāvadhāvati /
analyzed: yat te gātrāt agninā pacyamānāt abhi śūlam nihatasya avadhāvati

original: RV_1,162.11c mā tad bhūmyām ā śriṣan mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyas tad uśadbhyo rātam astu //
analyzed: mā tat bhūmyām ā śriṣat mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyaḥ tat uśadbhyaḥ rātam astu

original: RV_1,162.12a ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvaṃ ya īm āhuḥ surabhir nir hareti /
analyzed: ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvam ye īm āhuḥ surabhiḥ niḥ hara iti

original: RV_1,162.12c ye cārvato māṃsabhikṣām upāsata uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu //
analyzed: ye ca arvataḥ māṃsa bhikṣām upāsate uta u teṣām abhigūrtiḥ naḥ invatu

original: RV_1,162.13a yan nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyā ukhāyā yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇa āsecanāni /
analyzed: yat nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyāḥ ukhāyāḥ yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇaḥ āsecanāni

original: RV_1,162.13c ūṣmaṇyāpidhānā carūṇām aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanty aśvam //
analyzed: ūṣmaṇyā apidhānā carūṇām aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanti aśvam

original: RV_1,162.14a nikramaṇaṃ niṣadanaṃ vivartanaṃ yac ca paḍbīśam arvataḥ /
analyzed: nikramaṇam niṣadanam vivartanam yat ca paḍbīśam arvataḥ

original: RV_1,162.14c yac ca papau yac ca ghāsiṃ jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
analyzed: yat ca papau yat ca ghāsim jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: RV_1,162.15a mā tvāgnir dhvanayīd dhūmagandhir mokhā bhrājanty abhi vikta jaghriḥ /
analyzed: mā tvā agniḥ dhvanayīt dhūma gandhiḥ mā ukhā bhrājantī abhi vikta jaghriḥ

original: RV_1,162.15c iṣṭaṃ vītam abhigūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ taṃ devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanty aśvam //
analyzed: iṣṭam vītam abhigūrtam vaṣaṭkṛtam tam devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanti aśvam

original: RV_1,162.16a yad aśvāya vāsa upastṛṇanty adhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyāny asmai /
analyzed: yat aśvāya vāsaḥ upastṛṇanti adhīvāsam yā hiraṇyāni asmai

original: RV_1,162.16c saṃdānam arvantam paḍbīśam priyā deveṣv ā yāmayanti //
analyzed: saṃdānam arvantam paḍbīśam priyā deveṣu ā yāmayanti

original: RV_1,162.17a yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda /
analyzed: yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda

original: RV_1,162.17c sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi //
analyzed: srucā iva tā haviṣaḥ adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi

original: RV_1,162.18a catustriṃśad vājino devabandhor vaṅkrīr aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti /
analyzed: catustriṃśat vājinaḥ deva bandhoḥ vaṅkrīḥ aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti

original: RV_1,162.18c acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-parur anughuṣyā vi śasta //
analyzed: acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruḥ paruḥ anughuṣya vi śasta

original: RV_1,162.19a ekas tvaṣṭur aśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatas tatha ṛtuḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ tvaṣṭuḥ aśvasya viśastā dvā yantārā bhavataḥ tathā ṛtuḥ

original: RV_1,162.19c yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍānām pra juhomy agnau //
analyzed: yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tātā piṇḍānām pra juhomi agnau

original: RV_1,162.20a mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantam mā svadhitis tanva ā tiṣṭhipat te /
analyzed: mā tvā tapat priyaḥ ātmā apiyantam mā svadhitiḥ tanve ā tiṣṭhipat te

original: RV_1,162.20c mā te gṛdhnur aviśastātihāya chidrā gātrāṇy asinā mithū kaḥ //
analyzed: mā te gṛdhnuḥ aviśastā atihāya chidrā gātrāṇi asinā mithū kaḥ

original: RV_1,162.21a na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devāṃ id eṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ /
analyzed: na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi devān id eṣi pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ

original: RV_1,162.21c harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya //
analyzed: harī te pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthāt vājī dhuri rāsabhasya

original: RV_1,162.22a sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyam puṃsaḥ putrāṃ uta viśvāpuṣaṃ rayim /
analyzed: su gavyam naḥ vājī su aśvyam puṃsaḥ putrān uta viśvāpuṣam rayim

original: RV_1,162.22c anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatāṃ haviṣmān //
analyzed: anāgāstvam naḥ aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatram naḥ aśvaḥ vanatām haviṣmān

original: RV_1,163.01a yad akrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyan samudrād uta vā purīṣāt /
analyzed: yat akrandaḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ udyan samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt

original: RV_1,163.01c śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātaṃ te arvan //
analyzed: śyenasya pakṣāḥ hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātam te arvan

original: RV_1,163.02a yamena dattaṃ trita enam āyunag indra eṇam prathamo adhy atiṣṭhat /
analyzed: yamena dattam tritaḥ enam āyunak indraḥ eṇam prathamaḥ adhi atiṣṭhat

original: RV_1,163.02c gandharvo asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrād aśvaṃ vasavo nir ataṣṭa //
analyzed: gandharvaḥ asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrāt aśvam vasavaḥ niḥ ataṣṭa

original: RV_1,163.03a asi yamo asy ādityo arvann asi trito guhyena vratena /
analyzed: asi yamaḥ asi ādityaḥ arvan asi tritaḥ guhyena vratena

original: RV_1,163.03c asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhus te trīṇi divi bandhanāni //
analyzed: asi somena samayā vipṛktaḥ āhuḥ te trīṇi divi bandhanāni

original: RV_1,163.04a trīṇi ta āhur divi bandhanāni trīṇy apsu trīṇy antaḥ samudre /
analyzed: trīṇi te āhuḥ divi bandhanāni trīṇi apsu trīṇi antar samudre

original: RV_1,163.04c uteva me varuṇaś chantsy arvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram //
analyzed: uta iva me varuṇaḥ chantsi arvan yatrā te āhuḥ paramam janitram

original: RV_1,163.05a imā te vājinn avamārjanānīmā śaphānāṃ sanitur nidhānā /
analyzed: imā te vājin avamārjanāni imā śaphānām sanituḥ nidhānā

original: RV_1,163.05c atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣanti gopāḥ //
analyzed: atrā te bhadrāḥ raśanāḥ apaśyam ṛtasya yāḥ abhirakṣanti gopāḥ

original: RV_1,163.06a ātmānaṃ te manasārād ajānām avo divā patayantam pataṅgam /
analyzed: ātmānam te manasā ārāt ajānām avas divā patayantam pataṅgam

original: RV_1,163.06c śiro apaśyam pathibhiḥ sugebhir areṇubhir jehamānam patatri //
analyzed: śiraḥ apaśyam pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ areṇubhiḥ jehamānam patatri

original: RV_1,163.07a atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇam iṣa ā pade goḥ /
analyzed: atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyam jigīṣamāṇam iṣaḥ ā pade goḥ

original: RV_1,163.07c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḷ ād id grasiṣṭha oṣadhīr ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaṭ āt id grasiṣṭhaḥ oṣadhīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_1,163.08a anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvann anu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām /
analyzed: anu tvā rathaḥ anu maryaḥ arvan anu gāvaḥ nu bhagaḥ kanīnām

original: RV_1,163.08c anu vrātāsas tava sakhyam īyur anu devā mamire vīryaṃ te //
analyzed: anu vrātāsaḥ tava sakhyam īyuḥ anu devāḥ mamire vīryam te

original: RV_1,163.09a hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt /
analyzed: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ yaḥ asya pādā manaḥ javāḥ avaraḥ indraḥ āsīt

original: RV_1,163.09c devā id asya haviradyam āyan yo arvantam prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat //
analyzed: devāḥ id asya haviḥ adyam āyan yaḥ arvantam prathamaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat

original: RV_1,163.10a īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ saṃ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ /
analyzed: īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ sam śūraṇāsaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_1,163.10c haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatante yad ākṣiṣur divyam ajmam aśvāḥ //
analyzed: haṃsāḥ iva śreṇiśas yatante yat ākṣiṣuḥ divyam ajmam aśvāḥ

original: RV_1,163.11a tava śarīram patayiṣṇv arvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān /
analyzed: tava śarīram patayiṣṇu arvan tava cittam vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān

original: RV_1,163.11c tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti //
analyzed: tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrā araṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti

original: RV_1,163.12a upa prāgāc chasanaṃ vājy arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ /
analyzed: upa prāgāt śasanam vājī arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ

original: RV_1,163.12c ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhir asyānu paścāt kavayo yanti rebhāḥ //
analyzed: ajaḥ puras nīyate nābhiḥ asya anu paścāt kavayaḥ yanti rebhāḥ

original: RV_1,163.13a upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhastham arvāṃ acchā pitaram mātaraṃ ca /
analyzed: upa prāgāt paramam yat sadhastham arvān acchā pitaram mātaram ca

original: RV_1,163.13c adyā devāñ juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: adyā devām juṣṭatamaḥ hi gamyāḥ athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: RV_1,164.01a asya vāmasya palitasya hotus tasya bhrātā madhyamo asty aśnaḥ /
analyzed: asya vāmasya palitasya hotuḥ tasya bhrātā madhyamaḥ asti aśnaḥ

original: RV_1,164.01c tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asyātrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram //
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ bhrātā ghṛta pṛṣṭhaḥ asya atra apaśyam viśpatim sapta putram

original: RV_1,164.02a sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā /
analyzed: sapta yuñjanti ratham eka cakram ekaḥ aśvaḥ vahati sapta nāmā

original: RV_1,164.02c trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvaṃ yatremā viśvā bhuvanādhi tasthuḥ //
analyzed: tri nābhi cakram ajaram anarvam yatra imā viśvā bhuvanā adhi tasthuḥ

original: RV_1,164.03a imaṃ ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahanty aśvāḥ /
analyzed: imam ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ sapta cakram sapta vahanti aśvāḥ

original: RV_1,164.03c sapta svasāro abhi saṃ navante yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāma //
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ abhi sam navante yatra gavām nihitā sapta nāma

original: RV_1,164.04a ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānam asthanvantaṃ yad anasthā bibharti /
analyzed: kaḥ dadarśa prathamam jāyamānam asthanvantam yat anasthā bibharti

original: RV_1,164.04c bhūmyā asur asṛg ātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat //
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ asuḥ asṛk ātmā kva svid kaḥ vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat

original: RV_1,164.05a pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasāvijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni /
analyzed: pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasā a vijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni

original: RV_1,164.05c vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavā u //
analyzed: vatse baṣkaye dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavayaḥ otavai u

original: RV_1,164.06a acikitvāñ cikituṣaś cid atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān /
analyzed: a cikitvām cikituṣaḥ cit atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān

original: RV_1,164.06c vi yas tastambha ṣaḷ imā rajāṃsy ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam //
analyzed: vi yaḥ tastambha ṣaḍ imā rajāṃsi ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam

original: RV_1,164.07a iha bravītu ya īm aṅga vedāsya vāmasya nihitam padaṃ veḥ /
analyzed: iha bravītu yaḥ īm aṅga veda asya vāmasya nihitam padam veḥ

original: RV_1,164.07c śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakam padāpuḥ //
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīram duhrate gāvaḥ asya vavrim vasānāḥ udakam padā apuḥ

original: RV_1,164.08a mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhīty agre manasā saṃ hi jagme /
analyzed: mātā pitaram ṛte ā babhāja dhītī agre manasā sam hi jagme

original: RV_1,164.08c sā bībhatsur garbharasā nividdhā namasvanta id upavākam īyuḥ //
analyzed: sā bībhatsuḥ garbha rasā nividdhā namasvantaḥ id upavākam īyuḥ

original: RV_1,164.09a yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣv antaḥ /
analyzed: yuktā mātā āsīt dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ atiṣṭhat garbhaḥ vṛjanīṣu antar

original: RV_1,164.09c amīmed vatso anu gām apaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu //
analyzed: amīmet vatsaḥ anu gām apaśyat viśvarūpyam triṣu yojaneṣu

original: RV_1,164.10a tisro mātṝs trīn pitṝn bibhrad eka ūrdhvas tasthau nem ava glāpayanti /
analyzed: tisraḥ mātṝḥ trīn pitṝn bibhrat ekaḥ ūrdhvaḥ tasthau na īm ava glāpayanti

original: RV_1,164.10c mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācam aviśvaminvām //
analyzed: mantrayante divaḥ amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśva vidam vācam a viśvaminvām

original: RV_1,164.11a dvādaśāraṃ nahi taj jarāya varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya /
analyzed: dvādaśa aram nahi tat jarāya varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya

original: RV_1,164.11c ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiś ca tasthuḥ //
analyzed: ā putrāḥ agne mithunāsaḥ atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiḥ ca tasthuḥ

original: RV_1,164.12a pañcapādam pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam /
analyzed: pañca pādam pitaram dvādaśa ākṛtim divaḥ āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam

original: RV_1,164.12c atheme anya upare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḷara āhur arpitam //
analyzed: atha ime anye upare vicakṣaṇam sapta cakre ṣaṣ are āhuḥ arpitam

original: RV_1,164.13a pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminn ā tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: pañca are cakre parivartamāne tasmin ā tasthuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,164.13c tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na śīryate sanābhiḥ //
analyzed: tasya na akṣaḥ tapyate bhūri bhāraḥ sanāt eva na śīryate sa nābhiḥ

original: RV_1,164.14a sanemi cakram ajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti /
analyzed: sa nemi cakram ajaram vi vāvṛte uttānāyām daśa yuktāḥ vahanti

original: RV_1,164.14c sūryasya cakṣū rajasaity āvṛtaṃ tasminn ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: sūryasya cakṣuḥ rajasā eti āvṛtam tasmin ā arpitā bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_1,164.15a sākañjānāṃ saptatham āhur ekajaṃ ṣaḷ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti /
analyzed: sākañjānām saptatham āhuḥ ekajam ṣaṭ id yamāḥ ṛṣayaḥ deva jāḥ iti

original: RV_1,164.15c teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśa sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ //
analyzed: teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśas

original: RV_1,164.16a striyaḥ satīs tāṃ u me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyad akṣaṇvān na vi cetad andhaḥ /
analyzed: striyaḥ satīḥ tām u me puṃsaḥ āhuḥ paśyat akṣaṇvān na vi cetat andhaḥ

original: RV_1,164.16c kavir yaḥ putraḥ sa īm ā ciketa yas tā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat //
analyzed: kaviḥ yaḥ putraḥ saḥ īm ā ciketa yaḥ tāḥ vijānāt sa pituḥ pitā asat

original: RV_1,164.17a avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gaur ud asthāt /
analyzed: avas pareṇa paras enā avareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gauḥ ud asthāt

original: RV_1,164.17c sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardham parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antaḥ //
analyzed: sā kadrīcī kam svid ardham parāgāt kva svid sūte nahi yūthe antar

original: RV_1,164.18a avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asyānuveda para enāvareṇa /
analyzed: avas pareṇa pitaram yaḥ asya anuveda paras enā avareṇa

original: RV_1,164.18c kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devam manaḥ kuto adhi prajātam //
analyzed: kavīyamānaḥ kaḥ iha pra vocat devam manaḥ kutas adhi prajātam

original: RV_1,164.19a ye arvāñcas tāṃ u parāca āhur ye parāñcas tāṃ u arvāca āhuḥ /
analyzed: ye arvāñcaḥ tām u parācaḥ āhuḥ ye parāñcaḥ tām u arvācaḥ āhuḥ

original: RV_1,164.19c indraś ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajaso vahanti //
analyzed: indraḥ ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajasaḥ vahanti

original: RV_1,164.20a dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣam pari ṣasvajāte /
analyzed: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānam vṛkṣam pari sasvajāte

original: RV_1,164.20c tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo abhi cākaśīti //
analyzed: tayoḥ anyaḥ pippalam svādu atti an aśnan anyaḥ abhi cākaśīti

original: RV_1,164.21a yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhāgam animeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti /
analyzed: yatra suparṇāḥ amṛtasya bhāgam animeṣam vidathā abhisvaranti

original: RV_1,164.21c ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa //
analyzed: inaḥ viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atra ā viveśa

original: RV_1,164.22a yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve /
analyzed: yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇāḥ niviśante suvate ca adhi viśve

original: RV_1,164.22c tasyed āhuḥ pippalaṃ svādv agre tan non naśad yaḥ pitaraṃ na veda //
analyzed: tasya id āhuḥ pippalam svādu agre tat na ud naśat yaḥ pitaram na veda

original: RV_1,164.23a yad gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata /
analyzed: yat gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitam traiṣṭubhāt vā traiṣṭubham niratakṣata

original: RV_1,164.23c yad vā jagaj jagaty āhitam padaṃ ya it tad vidus te amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: yat vā jagat jagati āhitam padam ye id tat viduḥ te amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_1,164.24a gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam /
analyzed: gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam

original: RV_1,164.24c vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadākṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ //
analyzed: vākena vākam dvipadā catuṣpadā akṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ

original: RV_1,164.25a jagatā sindhuṃ divy astabhāyad rathantare sūryam pary apaśyat /
analyzed: jagatā sindhum divi astabhāyat rathantare sūryam pari apaśyat

original: RV_1,164.25c gāyatrasya samidhas tisra āhus tato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā //
analyzed: gāyatrasya samidhaḥ tisraḥ āhuḥ tatas mahnā pra ririce mahi tvā

original: RV_1,164.26a upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenum etāṃ suhasto godhug uta dohad enām /
analyzed: upa hvaye su dughām dhenum etām su hastaḥ go duh uta dohat enām

original: RV_1,164.26c śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmas tad u ṣu pra vocam //
analyzed: śreṣṭham savam savitā sāviṣat naḥ bhīddhaḥ gharmaḥ tat u su pra vocam

original: RV_1,164.27a hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsam icchantī manasābhy āgāt /
analyzed: hiṅkṛṇvatī vasu patnī vasūnām vatsam icchantī manasā abhi āgāt

original: RV_1,164.27c duhām aśvibhyām payo aghnyeyaṃ sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya //
analyzed: duhām aśvibhyām payaḥ aghnyā iyam sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya

original: RV_1,164.28a gaur amīmed anu vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānaṃ hiṅṅ akṛṇon mātavā u /
analyzed: gauḥ amīmet anu vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānam hiṅ akṛṇot mātavai u

original: RV_1,164.28c sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ //
analyzed: sṛkvāṇam gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ

original: RV_1,164.29a ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaur abhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāv adhi śritā /
analyzed: ayam sa śiṅkte yena gauḥ abhīvṛtā mimāti māyum dhvasanau adhi śritā

original: RV_1,164.29c sā cittibhir ni hi cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrim auhata //
analyzed: sā cittibhiḥ ni hi cakāra martyam vidyut bhavantī prati vavrim auhata

original: RV_1,164.30a anac chaye turagātu jīvam ejad dhruvam madhya ā pastyānām /
analyzed: anat śaye tura gātu jīvam ejat dhruvam madhye ā pastyānām

original: RV_1,164.30c jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhir amartyo martyenā sayoniḥ //
analyzed: jīvaḥ mṛtasya carati svadhābhiḥ amartyaḥ martyena sa yoniḥ

original: RV_1,164.31a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam /
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam

original: RV_1,164.31c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //
analyzed: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: RV_1,164.32a ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirug in nu tasmāt /
analyzed: yaḥ īm cakāra na saḥ asya veda yaḥ īm dadarśa hiruk id nu tasmāt

original: RV_1,164.32c sa mātur yonā parivīto antar bahuprajā nirṛtim ā viveśa //
analyzed: sa mātuḥ yonā parivītaḥ antar bahuprajāḥ nirṛtim ā viveśa

original: RV_1,164.33a dyaur me pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur me mātā pṛthivī mahīyam /
analyzed: dyauḥ me pitā janitā nābhiḥ atra bandhuḥ me mātā pṛthivī mahī iyam

original: RV_1,164.33c uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt //
analyzed: uttānayoḥ camvoḥ yoniḥ antar atrā pitā duhituḥ garbham ādhāt

original: RV_1,164.34a pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_1,164.34c pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: RV_1,164.35a iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ /
analyzed: iyam vediḥ paraḥ antaḥ pṛthivyāḥ ayam yajñaḥ bhuvanasya nābhiḥ

original: RV_1,164.35c ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyaṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //
analyzed: ayam somaḥ vṛṣṇaḥ aśvasya retaḥ brahmā ayam vācaḥ paramam vyoma

original: RV_1,164.36a saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi /
analyzed: sapta ardha garbhāḥ bhuvanasya retaḥ viṣṇoḥ tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi

original: RV_1,164.36c te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ //
analyzed: te dhītibhiḥ manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvatas

original: RV_1,164.37a na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi /
analyzed: na vi jānāmi yat iva idam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ manasā carāmi

original: RV_1,164.37c yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ //
analyzed: yadā mā agan prathama jāḥ ṛtasya āt id vācaḥ aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ

original: RV_1,164.38a apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ /
analyzed: apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhītaḥ martyaḥ martyena sa yoniḥ

original: RV_1,164.38c tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ni cikyur anyam //
analyzed: tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ni anyam cikyuḥ na ni cikyuḥ anyam

original: RV_1,164.39a ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ /
analyzed: ṛcaḥ akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devāḥ adhi viśve niṣeduḥ

original: RV_1,164.39c yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus ta ime sam āsate //
analyzed: yaḥ tat na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ye id tat viduḥ te ime sam āsate

original: RV_1,164.40a sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma /
analyzed: sūyavasāt bhagavatī hi bhūyāḥ atha u vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: RV_1,164.40c addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī //
analyzed: addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī

original: RV_1,164.41a gaurīr mimāya salilāni takṣaty ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī /
analyzed: gaurīḥ mimāya salilāni takṣatī ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī

original: RV_1,164.41c aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman //
analyzed: aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasra akṣarā parame vyoman

original: RV_1,164.42a tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ samudrāḥ adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_1,164.42c tataḥ kṣaraty akṣaraṃ tad viśvam upa jīvati //
analyzed: tatas kṣarati akṣaram tat viśvam upa jīvati

original: RV_1,164.43a śakamayaṃ dhūmam ārād apaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa /
analyzed: śaka mayam dhūmam ārāt apaśyam viṣūvatā paras enā avareṇa

original: RV_1,164.43c ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan //
analyzed: ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: RV_1,164.44a trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām /
analyzed: trayaḥ keśinaḥ ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapate ekaḥ eṣām

original: RV_1,164.44c viśvam eko abhi caṣṭe śacībhir dhrājir ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam //
analyzed: viśvam ekaḥ abhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ dhrājiḥ ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam

original: RV_1,164.45a catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: catvāri vāc parimitā padāni tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,164.45c guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti //
analyzed: guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti

original: RV_1,164.46a indram mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhur atho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān /
analyzed: indram mitram varuṇam agnim āhuḥ atha u divyaḥ sa suparṇaḥ garutmān

original: RV_1,164.46c ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanty agniṃ yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ //
analyzed: ekam sat viprāḥ bahudhā vadanti agnim yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ

original: RV_1,164.47a kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti /
analyzed: kṛṣṇam niyānam harayaḥ suparṇāḥ apaḥ vasānāḥ divam ud patanti

original: RV_1,164.47c ta āvavṛtran sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivī vy udyate //
analyzed: te āvavṛtran sadanāt ṛtasya āt id ghṛtena pṛthivī vi udyate

original: RV_1,164.48a dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa /
analyzed: dvādaśa pradhayaḥ cakram ekam trīṇi nabhyāni kaḥ u tat ciketa

original: RV_1,164.48c tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭir na calācalāsaḥ //
analyzed: tasmin sākam tri śatā na śaṅkavaḥ rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ na calācalāsaḥ

original: RV_1,164.49a yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi /
analyzed: yaḥ te stanaḥ śaśayaḥ yaḥ mayobhūḥ yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi

original: RV_1,164.49c yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ ratna dhāḥ vasu vid yaḥ su datraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ

original: RV_1,164.50a yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan

original: RV_1,164.50c te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //
analyzed: te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: RV_1,164.51a samānam etad udakam uc caity ava cāhabhiḥ /
analyzed: samānam etat udakam ud ca eti ava ca ahabhiḥ

original: RV_1,164.51c bhūmim parjanyā jinvanti divaṃ jinvanty agnayaḥ //
analyzed: bhūmim parjanyāḥ jinvanti divam jinvanti agnayaḥ

original: RV_1,164.52a divyaṃ suparṇaṃ vāyasam bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ darśatam oṣadhīnām /
analyzed: divyam suparṇam vāyasam bṛhantam apām garbham darśatam oṣadhīnām

original: RV_1,164.52c abhīpato vṛṣṭibhis tarpayantaṃ sarasvantam avase johavīmi //
analyzed: abhīpatas vṛṣṭibhiḥ tarpayantam sarasvantam avase johavīmi

original: RV_1,165.01a kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ /
analyzed: kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_1,165.01c kayā matī kuta etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā //
analyzed: kayā matī kutas etāsaḥ ete rcanti śuṣmam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasūyā

original: RV_1,165.02a kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣur yuvānaḥ ko adhvare maruta ā vavarta /
analyzed: kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣuḥ yuvānaḥ kaḥ adhvare marutaḥ ā vavarta

original: RV_1,165.02c śyenāṃ iva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma //
analyzed: śyenām iva dhrajataḥ antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma

original: RV_1,165.03a kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ sann eko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā /
analyzed: kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ san ekaḥ yāsi satpate kim te itthā

original: RV_1,165.03c sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānair voces tan no harivo yat te asme //
analyzed: sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānaiḥ voceḥ tat naḥ harivas yat te asme

original: RV_1,165.04a brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ /
analyzed: brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śam sutāsaḥ śuṣmaḥ iyarti prabhṛtaḥ me adriḥ

original: RV_1,165.04c ā śāsate prati haryanty ukthemā harī vahatas tā no accha //
analyzed: ā śāsate prati haryanti ukthā imā harī vahataḥ tā naḥ accha

original: RV_1,165.05a ato vayam antamebhir yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhis tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
analyzed: atas vayam antamebhiḥ yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhiḥ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_1,165.05c mahobhir etāṃ upa yujmahe nv indra svadhām anu hi no babhūtha //
analyzed: mahobhiḥ etām upa yujmahe nu indra svadhām anu hi naḥ babhūtha

original: RV_1,165.06a kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan mām ekaṃ samadhattāhihatye /
analyzed: kva syā vaḥ marutaḥ svadhā āsīt yat mām ekam samadhatta ahi hatye

original: RV_1,165.06c ahaṃ hy ugras taviṣas tuviṣmān viśvasya śatror anamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ //
analyzed: aham hi ugraḥ taviṣaḥ tuviṣmān viśvasya śatroḥ anamam vadhasnaiḥ

original: RV_1,165.07a bhūri cakartha yujyebhir asme samānebhir vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ /
analyzed: bhūri cakartha yujyebhiḥ asme samānebhiḥ vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ

original: RV_1,165.07c bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendra kratvā maruto yad vaśāma //
analyzed: bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭha indra kratvā marutaḥ yat vaśāma

original: RV_1,165.08a vadhīṃ vṛtram maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān /
analyzed: vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣaḥ babhūvān

original: RV_1,165.08c aham etā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaś cakara vajrabāhuḥ //
analyzed: aham etāḥ manave viśva ścandrāḥ su gāḥ apaḥ cakara vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_1,165.09a anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na tvāvāṃ asti devatā vidānaḥ /
analyzed: anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na asti devatā vidānaḥ

original: RV_1,165.09c na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha //
analyzed: na jāyamānaḥ naśate na jātaḥ yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha

original: RV_1,165.10a ekasya cin me vibhv astv ojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā /
analyzed: ekasya cit me vibhu astu ojaḥ yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā

original: RV_1,165.10c ahaṃ hy ugro maruto vidāno yāni cyavam indra id īśa eṣām //
analyzed: aham hi ugraḥ marutaḥ vidānaḥ yāni cyavam indraḥ id īśe eṣām

original: RV_1,165.11a amandan mā maruta stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra /
analyzed: amandat mā marutaḥ stomaḥ atra yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra

original: RV_1,165.11c indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyas tanve tanūbhiḥ //
analyzed: indrāya vṛṣṇe su makhāya mahyam sakhye sakhāyaḥ tanve tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_1,165.12a eved ete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śrava eṣo dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: eva id ete prati mā rocamānāḥ anedyaḥ śravaḥ eṣaḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_1,165.12c saṃcakṣyā marutaś candravarṇā acchānta me chadayāthā ca nūnam //
analyzed: saṃcakṣya marutaḥ candra varṇāḥ me chadaya athā ca nūnam

original: RV_1,165.13a ko nv atra maruto māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīṃr acchā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ nu atra marutaḥ māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīṃr acchā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_1,165.13c manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣām bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām //
analyzed: manmāni citrā apivātayantaḥ eṣām bhūta navedāḥ me ṛtānām

original: RV_1,165.14a ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārur asmāñ cakre mānyasya medhā /
analyzed: ā yat duvasyāt duvase na kāruḥ asmām cakre mānyasya medhā

original: RV_1,165.14c o ṣu vartta maruto vipram acchemā brahmāṇi jaritā vo arcat //
analyzed: ā u su varta marutaḥ vipram acchā imā brahmāṇi jaritā vaḥ arcat

original: RV_1,165.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,165.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,166.01a tan nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvam mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya ketave /
analyzed: tat nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvam mahitvam vṛṣabhasya ketave

original: RV_1,166.01c aidheva yāman marutas tuviṣvaṇo yudheva śakrās taviṣāṇi kartana //
analyzed: aidhā iva yāman marutaḥ tuviṣvaṇaḥ yudhā iva śakrāḥ taviṣāṇi kartana

original: RV_1,166.02a nityaṃ na sūnum madhu bibhrata upa krīḷanti krīḷā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ /
analyzed: nityam na sūnum madhu bibhrataḥ upa krīḍanti krīḍā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ

original: RV_1,166.02c nakṣanti rudrā avasā namasvinaṃ na mardhanti svatavaso haviṣkṛtam //
analyzed: nakṣanti rudrāḥ avasā namasvinam na mardhanti svatavasaḥ haviṣkṛtam

original: RV_1,166.03a yasmā ūmāso amṛtā arāsata rāyas poṣaṃ ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe /
analyzed: yasmai ūmāsaḥ amṛtāḥ arāsata rāyaḥ poṣam ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe

original: RV_1,166.03c ukṣanty asmai maruto hitā iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ //
analyzed: ukṣanti asmai marutaḥ hitāḥ iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ

original: RV_1,166.04a ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhir avyata pra va evāsaḥ svayatāso adhrajan /
analyzed: ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhiḥ avyata pra vaḥ evāsaḥ sva yatāsaḥ adhrajan

original: RV_1,166.04c bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citro vo yāmaḥ prayatāsv ṛṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citraḥ vaḥ yāmaḥ prayatāsu ṛṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,166.05a yat tveṣayāmā nadayanta parvatān divo vā pṛṣṭhaṃ naryā acucyavuḥ /
analyzed: yat tveṣa yāmāḥ nadayanta parvatān divaḥ vā pṛṣṭham naryāḥ acucyavuḥ

original: RV_1,166.05c viśvo vo ajman bhayate vanaspatī rathīyantīva pra jihīta oṣadhiḥ //
analyzed: viśvaḥ vaḥ ajman bhayate vanaspatiḥ rathīyantī iva pra jihīte oṣadhiḥ

original: RV_1,166.06a yūyaṃ na ugrā marutaḥ sucetunāriṣṭagrāmāḥ sumatim pipartana /
analyzed: yūyam naḥ ugrāḥ marutaḥ sucetunā ariṣṭa grāmāḥ sumatim pipartana

original: RV_1,166.06c yatrā vo didyud radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhiteva barhaṇā //
analyzed: yatrā vaḥ didyut radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhitā iva barhaṇā

original: RV_1,166.07a pra skambhadeṣṇā anavabhrarādhaso 'lātṛṇāso vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ /
analyzed: pra skambha deṣṇāḥ anavabhra rādhasaḥ lātṛṇāsaḥ vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ

original: RV_1,166.07c arcanty arkam madirasya pītaye vidur vīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā //
analyzed: arcanti arkam madirasya pītaye viduḥ vīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā

original: RV_1,166.08a śatabhujibhis tam abhihruter aghāt pūrbhī rakṣatā maruto yam āvata /
analyzed: śata bhujibhiḥ tam abhihruteḥ aghāt pūrbhiḥ rakṣata marutaḥ yam āvata

original: RV_1,166.08c janaṃ yam ugrās tavaso virapśinaḥ pāthanā śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu //
analyzed: janam yam ugrāḥ tavasaḥ virapśinaḥ pāthana śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu

original: RV_1,166.09a viśvāni bhadrā maruto ratheṣu vo mithaspṛdhyeva taviṣāṇy āhitā /
analyzed: viśvāni bhadrā marutaḥ ratheṣu vaḥ mithaspṛdhyā iva taviṣāṇi āhitā

original: RV_1,166.09c aṃseṣv ā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayo 'kṣo vaś cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte //
analyzed: aṃseṣu ā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayaḥ kṣaḥ vaḥ cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte

original: RV_1,166.10a bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāso añjayaḥ /
analyzed: bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāsaḥ añjayaḥ

original: RV_1,166.10c aṃseṣv etāḥ paviṣu kṣurā adhi vayo na pakṣān vy anu śriyo dhire //
analyzed: aṃseṣu etāḥ paviṣu kṣurāḥ adhi vayaḥ na pakṣān vi anu śriyaḥ

original: RV_1,166.11a mahānto mahnā vibhvo vibhūtayo dūredṛśo ye divyā iva stṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: mahāntaḥ mahnā vibhvaḥ vibhūtayaḥ dūredṛśaḥ ye divyāḥ iva stṛbhiḥ

original: RV_1,166.11c mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāra āsabhiḥ sammiślā indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ //
analyzed: mandrāḥ su jihvāḥ svaritāraḥ āsabhiḥ sammiślāḥ indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ

original: RV_1,166.12a tad vaḥ sujātā maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ vo dātram aditer iva vratam /
analyzed: tat vaḥ su jātāḥ marutaḥ mahitvanam dīrgham vaḥ dātram aditeḥ iva vratam

original: RV_1,166.12c indraś cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti taj janāya yasmai sukṛte arādhvam //
analyzed: indraḥ cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti tat janāya yasmai su kṛte arādhvam

original: RV_1,166.13a tad vo jāmitvam marutaḥ pare yuge purū yac chaṃsam amṛtāsa āvata /
analyzed: tat vaḥ jāmi tvam marutaḥ pare yuge purū yat śaṃsam amṛtāsaḥ āvata

original: RV_1,166.13c ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭim āvyā sākaṃ naro daṃsanair ā cikitrire //
analyzed: ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭim āvyā sākam naraḥ daṃsanaiḥ ā cikitrire

original: RV_1,166.14a yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ /
analyzed: yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ

original: RV_1,166.14c ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsa ebhir yajñebhis tad abhīṣṭim aśyām //
analyzed: ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsaḥ ebhiḥ yajñebhiḥ tat abhīṣṭim aśyām

original: RV_1,166.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,166.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,167.01a sahasraṃ ta indrotayo naḥ sahasram iṣo harivo gūrtatamāḥ /
analyzed: sahasram te indra ūtayaḥ naḥ sahasram iṣaḥ harivas gūrtatamāḥ

original: RV_1,167.01c sahasraṃ rāyo mādayadhyai sahasriṇa upa no yantu vājāḥ //
analyzed: sahasram rāyaḥ mādayadhyai sahasriṇaḥ upa naḥ yantu vājāḥ

original: RV_1,167.02a ā no 'vobhir maruto yāntv acchā jyeṣṭhebhir vā bṛhaddivaiḥ sumāyāḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ vobhiḥ marutaḥ yāntu acchā jyeṣṭhebhiḥ vā bṛhaddivaiḥ su māyāḥ

original: RV_1,167.02c adha yad eṣāṃ niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya cid dhanayanta pāre //
analyzed: adha yat eṣām niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya cit dhanayanta pāre

original: RV_1,167.03a mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇyanirṇig uparā na ṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇya nirṇij uparā naḥ ṛṣṭiḥ

original: RV_1,167.03c guhā carantī manuṣo na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyeva saṃ vāk //
analyzed: guhā carantī manuṣaḥ na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyā iva sam vāc

original: RV_1,167.04a parā śubhrā ayāso yavyā sādhāraṇyeva maruto mimikṣuḥ /
analyzed: parā śubhrāḥ ayāsaḥ yavyā sādhāraṇyā iva marutaḥ mimikṣuḥ

original: RV_1,167.04c na rodasī apa nudanta ghorā juṣanta vṛdhaṃ sakhyāya devāḥ //
analyzed: na rodasī apa nudanta ghorāḥ juṣanta vṛdham sakhyāya devāḥ

original: RV_1,167.05a joṣad yad īm asuryā sacadhyai viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ /
analyzed: joṣat yat īm asuryā sacadhyai viṣita stukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ

original: RV_1,167.05c ā sūryeva vidhato rathaṃ gāt tveṣapratīkā nabhaso netyā //
analyzed: ā sūryā iva vidhataḥ ratham gāt tveṣa pratīkā nabhasaḥ netyā

original: RV_1,167.06a āsthāpayanta yuvatiṃ yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiślāṃ vidatheṣu pajrām /
analyzed: āsthāpayanta yuvatim yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiślām vidatheṣu pajrām

original: RV_1,167.06c arko yad vo maruto haviṣmān gāyad gāthaṃ sutasomo duvasyan //
analyzed: arkaḥ yat vaḥ marutaḥ haviṣmān gāyat gātham suta somaḥ duvasyan

original: RV_1,167.07a pra taṃ vivakmi vakmyo ya eṣām marutām mahimā satyo asti /
analyzed: pra tam vivakmi vakmyaḥ yaḥ eṣām marutām mahimā satyaḥ asti

original: RV_1,167.07c sacā yad īṃ vṛṣamaṇā ahaṃyu sthirā cij janīr vahate subhāgāḥ //
analyzed: sacā yat īm vṛṣamaṇāḥ ahaṃyu sthirā cit janīḥ vahate subhāgāḥ

original: RV_1,167.08a pānti mitrāvaruṇāv avadyāc cayata īm aryamo apraśastān /
analyzed: pānti mitrāvaruṇau avadyāt cayataḥ īm aryamā u apraśastān

original: RV_1,167.08c uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdha īm maruto dātivāraḥ //
analyzed: uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdhe īm marutaḥ dāti vāraḥ

original: RV_1,167.09a nahī nu vo maruto anty asme ārāttāc cic chavaso antam āpuḥ /
analyzed: nahi nu vaḥ marutaḥ anti asme ārāttāt cit śavasaḥ antam āpuḥ

original: RV_1,167.09c te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃso 'rṇo na dveṣo dhṛṣatā pari ṣṭhuḥ //
analyzed: te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃsaḥ rṇaḥ na dveṣaḥ dhṛṣatā pari sthuḥ

original: RV_1,167.10a vayam adyendrasya preṣṭhā vayaṃ śvo vocemahi samarye /
analyzed: vayam adyā indrasya preṣṭhāḥ vayam śvas vocemahi samarye

original: RV_1,167.10c vayam purā mahi ca no anu dyūn tan na ṛbhukṣā narām anu ṣyāt //
analyzed: vayam purā mahi ca naḥ anu dyūn tat naḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ narām anu syāt

original: RV_1,167.11a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,167.11c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,168.01a yajñā-yajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇir dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ vo devayā u dadhidhve /
analyzed: yajñāyajñāḥ vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇiḥ dhiyam dhiyam vaḥ deva yāḥ u dadhidhve

original: RV_1,168.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyor mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ //
analyzed: ā vaḥ rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyoḥ mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_1,168.02a vavrāso na ye svajāḥ svatavasa iṣaṃ svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: vavrāsaḥ na ye sva jāḥ svatavasaḥ iṣam svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ

original: RV_1,168.02c sahasriyāso apāṃ normaya āsā gāvo vandyāso nokṣaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sahasriyāsaḥ apām na ūrmayaḥ āsā gāvaḥ vandyāsaḥ na ukṣaṇaḥ

original: RV_1,168.03a somāso na ye sutās tṛptāṃśavo hṛtsu pītāso duvaso nāsate /
analyzed: somāsaḥ na ye sutāḥ tṛpta aṃśavaḥ hṛtsu pītāsaḥ duvasaḥ na āsate

original: RV_1,168.03c aiṣām aṃseṣu rambhiṇīva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiś ca kṛtiś ca saṃ dadhe //
analyzed: ā eṣām aṃseṣu rambhiṇī iva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiḥ ca kṛtiḥ ca sam dadhe

original: RV_1,168.04a ava svayuktā diva ā vṛthā yayur amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā /
analyzed: ava sva yuktāḥ divaḥ ā vṛthā yayuḥ amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā

original: RV_1,168.04c areṇavas tuvijātā acucyavur dṛḷhāni cin maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: areṇavaḥ tuvi jātāḥ acucyavuḥ dṛḷhāni cit marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_1,168.05a ko vo 'ntar maruta ṛṣṭividyuto rejati tmanā hanveva jihvayā /
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ ntar marutaḥ ṛṣṭi vidyutaḥ rejati tmanā hanvā iva jihvayā

original: RV_1,168.05c dhanvacyuta iṣāṃ na yāmani purupraiṣā ahanyo naitaśaḥ //
analyzed: dhanva cyutaḥ iṣām na yāmani puru praiṣāḥ ahanyaḥ na etaśaḥ

original: RV_1,168.06a kva svid asya rajaso mahas paraṃ kvāvaram maruto yasminn āyaya /
analyzed: kva svid asya rajasaḥ mahaḥ param kva avaram marutaḥ yasmin āyaya

original: RV_1,168.06c yac cyāvayatha vithureva saṃhitaṃ vy adriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam //
analyzed: yat cyāvayatha vithurā iva saṃhitam vi adriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam

original: RV_1,168.07a sātir na vo 'mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī /
analyzed: sātiḥ na vaḥ mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī

original: RV_1,168.07c bhadrā vo rātiḥ pṛṇato na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryeva jañjatī //
analyzed: bhadrā vaḥ rātiḥ pṛṇataḥ na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryā iva jañjatī

original: RV_1,168.08a prati ṣṭobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyo yad abhriyāṃ vācam udīrayanti /
analyzed: prati stobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyaḥ yat abhriyām vācam udīrayanti

original: RV_1,168.08c ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti //
analyzed: ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyām yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti

original: RV_1,168.09a asūta pṛśnir mahate raṇāya tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam /
analyzed: asūta pṛśniḥ mahate raṇāya tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam

original: RV_1,168.09c te sapsarāso 'janayantābhvam ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan //
analyzed: te sapsarāsaḥ janayanta abhvam āt id svadhām iṣirām pari apaśyan

original: RV_1,168.10a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,168.10c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,169.01a mahaś cit tvam indra yata etān mahaś cid asi tyajaso varūtā /
analyzed: mahaḥ cit tvam indra yataḥ etān mahaḥ cit asi tyajasaḥ varūtā

original: RV_1,169.01c sa no vedho marutāṃ cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā //
analyzed: sa naḥ vedhaḥ marutām cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā

original: RV_1,169.02a ayujran ta indra viśvakṛṣṭīr vidānāso niṣṣidho martyatrā /
analyzed: ayujran te indra viśvakṛṣṭīḥ vidānāsaḥ niṣṣidhaḥ martyatrā

original: RV_1,169.02c marutām pṛtsutir hāsamānā svarmīḷhasya pradhanasya sātau //
analyzed: marutām pṛtsutiḥ hāsamānā svarmīḍhasya pradhanasya sātau

original: RV_1,169.03a amyak sā ta indra ṛṣṭir asme sanemy abhvam maruto junanti /
analyzed: amyak sā te indra ṛṣṭiḥ asme sanemi abhvam marutaḥ junanti

original: RV_1,169.03c agniś cid dhi ṣmātase śuśukvān āpo na dvīpaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi //
analyzed: agniḥ cit hi smātase śuśukvān āpaḥ na dvīpam dadhati prayāṃsi

original: RV_1,169.04a tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayeva rātim /
analyzed: tvam tu naḥ indra tam rayim dāḥ ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayā iva rātim

original: RV_1,169.04c stutaś ca yās te cakananta vāyo stanaṃ na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ //
analyzed: stutaḥ ca yāḥ te vāyoḥ stanam na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ

original: RV_1,169.05a tve rāya indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cid ṛtāyoḥ /
analyzed: tve rāyaḥ indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cit ṛtāyoḥ

original: RV_1,169.05c te ṣu ṇo maruto mṛḷayantu ye smā purā gātūyantīva devāḥ //
analyzed: te su naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍayantu ye smā purā gātūyanti iva devāḥ

original: RV_1,169.06a prati pra yāhīndra mīḷhuṣo nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva /
analyzed: prati pra yāhi indra mīḍhuṣaḥ nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva

original: RV_1,169.06c adha yad eṣām pṛthubudhnāsa etās tīrthe nāryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: adha yat eṣām pṛthu budhnāsaḥ etāḥ tīrthe na aryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_1,169.07a prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām marutāṃ śṛṇva āyatām upabdiḥ /
analyzed: prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām marutām śṛṇve āyatām upabdiḥ

original: RV_1,169.07c ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmair ṛṇāvānaṃ na patayanta sargaiḥ //
analyzed: ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmaiḥ ṛṇāvānam na patayanta sargaiḥ

original: RV_1,169.08a tvam mānebhya indra viśvajanyā radā marudbhiḥ śurudho goagrāḥ /
analyzed: tvam mānebhyaḥ indra viśvajanyāḥ rada marudbhiḥ śurudhaḥ go agrāḥ

original: RV_1,169.08c stavānebhi stavase deva devair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: stavānebhiḥ stavase deva devaiḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,170.01a na nūnam asti no śvaḥ kas tad veda yad adbhutam /
analyzed: na nūnam asti no śvas kaḥ tat veda yat adbhutam

original: RV_1,170.01c anyasya cittam abhi saṃcareṇyam utādhītaṃ vi naśyati //
analyzed: anyasya cittam abhi saṃcareṇyam uta adhītam vi naśyati

original: RV_1,170.02a kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutas tava /
analyzed: kim naḥ indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava

original: RV_1,170.02c tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ //
analyzed: tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ

original: RV_1,170.03a kiṃ no bhrātar agastya sakhā sann ati manyase /
analyzed: kim naḥ bhrātar agastya sakhā san ati manyase

original: RV_1,170.03c vidmā hi te yathā mano 'smabhyam in na ditsasi //
analyzed: vidma hi te yathā manaḥ smabhyam id na ditsasi

original: RV_1,170.04a araṃ kṛṇvantu vediṃ sam agnim indhatām puraḥ /
analyzed: aram kṛṇvantu vedim sam agnim indhatām puras

original: RV_1,170.04c tatrāmṛtasya cetanaṃ yajñaṃ te tanavāvahai //
analyzed: tatra amṛtasya cetanam yajñam te tanavāvahai

original: RV_1,170.05a tvam īśiṣe vasupate vasūnāṃ tvam mitrāṇām mitrapate dheṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: tvam īśiṣe vasu pate vasūnām tvam mitrāṇām mitra pate dheṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_1,170.05c indra tvam marudbhiḥ saṃ vadasvādha prāśāna ṛtuthā havīṃṣi //
analyzed: indra tvam marudbhiḥ sam vadasva adha prāśānaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi

original: RV_1,171.01a prati va enā namasāham emi sūktena bhikṣe sumatiṃ turāṇām /
analyzed: prati vaḥ enā namasā aham emi sūktena bhikṣe sumatim turāṇām

original: RV_1,171.01c rarāṇatā maruto vedyābhir ni heḷo dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān //
analyzed: rarāṇatā marutaḥ vedyābhiḥ ni heḍaḥ dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān

original: RV_1,171.02a eṣa va stomo maruto namasvān hṛdā taṣṭo manasā dhāyi devāḥ /
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ namasvān hṛdā taṣṭaḥ manasā dhāyi devāḥ

original: RV_1,171.02c upem ā yāta manasā juṣāṇā yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā namasa id vṛdhāsaḥ //
analyzed: upa īm ā yāta manasā juṣāṇāḥ yūyam hi stha namasaḥ id vṛdhāsaḥ

original: RV_1,171.03a stutāso no maruto mṛḷayantūta stuto maghavā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: stutāsaḥ naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍayantu uta stutaḥ maghavā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_1,171.03c ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāny ahāni viśvā maruto jigīṣā //
analyzed: ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāni ahāni viśvā marutaḥ jigīṣā

original: RV_1,171.04a asmād ahaṃ taviṣād īṣamāṇa indrād bhiyā maruto rejamānaḥ /
analyzed: asmāt aham taviṣāt īṣamāṇaḥ indrāt bhiyā marutaḥ rejamānaḥ

original: RV_1,171.04c yuṣmabhyaṃ havyā niśitāny āsan tāny āre cakṛmā mṛḷatā naḥ //
analyzed: yuṣmabhyam havyā niśitāni āsan tāni āre cakṛma mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_1,171.05a yena mānāsaś citayanta usrā vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām /
analyzed: yena mānāsaḥ citayante usrāḥ vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām

original: RV_1,171.05c sa no marudbhir vṛṣabha śravo dhā ugra ugrebhi sthaviraḥ sahodāḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ marudbhiḥ vṛṣabha śravaḥ dhāḥ ugraḥ ugrebhiḥ sthaviraḥ sahaḥ dāḥ

original: RV_1,171.06a tvam pāhīndra sahīyaso nṝn bhavā marudbhir avayātaheḷāḥ /
analyzed: tvam pāhi indra sahīyasaḥ nṝn bhava marudbhiḥ avayāta heḍāḥ

original: RV_1,171.06c supraketebhiḥ sāsahir dadhāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: su praketebhiḥ sāsahiḥ dadhānaḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,172.01a citro vo 'stu yāmaś citra ūtī sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: citraḥ vaḥ stu yāmaḥ citraḥ ūtī sudānavaḥ

original: RV_1,172.01c maruto ahibhānavaḥ //
analyzed: marutaḥ ahi bhānavaḥ

original: RV_1,172.02a āre sā vaḥ sudānavo maruta ṛñjatī śaruḥ /
analyzed: āre sā vaḥ sudānavaḥ marutaḥ ṛñjatī śaruḥ

original: RV_1,172.02c āre aśmā yam asyatha //
analyzed: āre aśmā yam asyatha

original: RV_1,172.03a tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ /
analyzed: tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ

original: RV_1,172.03c ūrdhvān naḥ karta jīvase //
analyzed: ūrdhvān naḥ karta jīvase

original: RV_1,173.01a gāyat sāma nabhanyaṃ yathā ver arcāma tad vāvṛdhānaṃ svarvat /
analyzed: gāyat sāma nabhanyam yathā veḥ arcāma tat vāvṛdhānam svarvat

original: RV_1,173.01c gāvo dhenavo barhiṣy adabdhā ā yat sadmānaṃ divyaṃ vivāsān //
analyzed: gāvaḥ dhenavaḥ barhiṣi adabdhāḥ ā yat sadmānam divyam vivāsān

original: RV_1,173.02a arcad vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyair mṛgo nāśno ati yaj juguryāt /
analyzed: arcat vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyaiḥ mṛgaḥ na aśnaḥ ati yat juguryāt

original: RV_1,173.02c pra mandayur manāṃ gūrta hotā bharate maryo mithunā yajatraḥ //
analyzed: pra mandayuḥ manām gūrta hotā bharate maryaḥ mithunā yajatraḥ

original: RV_1,173.03a nakṣad dhotā pari sadma mitā yan bharad garbham ā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: nakṣat hotā pari sadma mitā yan bharat garbham ā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_1,173.03c krandad aśvo nayamāno ruvad gaur antar dūto na rodasī carad vāk //
analyzed: krandat aśvaḥ nayamānaḥ ruvat gauḥ antar dūtaḥ na rodasī carat vāc

original: RV_1,173.04a tā karmāṣatarāsmai pra cyautnāni devayanto bharante /
analyzed: tā karma aṣatarā asmai pra cyautnāni devayantaḥ bharante

original: RV_1,173.04c jujoṣad indro dasmavarcā nāsatyeva sugmyo ratheṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: jujoṣat indraḥ dasma varcāḥ nāsatyā iva sugmyaḥ ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_1,173.05a tam u ṣṭuhīndraṃ yo ha satvā yaḥ śūro maghavā yo ratheṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: tam u stuhi indram yaḥ ha satvā yaḥ śūraḥ maghavā yaḥ ratheṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_1,173.05c pratīcaś cid yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaś cit tamaso vihantā //
analyzed: pratīcaḥ cit yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaḥ cit tamasaḥ vihantā

original: RV_1,173.06a pra yad itthā mahinā nṛbhyo asty araṃ rodasī kakṣye nāsmai /
analyzed: pra yat itthā mahinā nṛbhyaḥ asti aram rodasī kakṣye na asmai

original: RV_1,173.06c saṃ vivya indro vṛjanaṃ na bhūmā bharti svadhāvāṃ opaśam iva dyām //
analyzed: sam vivye indraḥ vṛjanam na bhūmā bharti svadhāvān opaśam iva dyām

original: RV_1,173.07a samatsu tvā śūra satām urāṇam prapathintamam paritaṃsayadhyai /
analyzed: samatsu tvā śūra satām urāṇam prapathintamam paritaṃsayadhyai

original: RV_1,173.07c sajoṣasa indram made kṣoṇīḥ sūriṃ cid ye anumadanti vājaiḥ //
analyzed: sajoṣasaḥ indram made kṣoṇīḥ sūrim cit ye anumadanti vājaiḥ

original: RV_1,173.08a evā hi te śaṃ savanā samudra āpo yat ta āsu madanti devīḥ /
analyzed: eva hi te śam savanā samudre āpaḥ yat te āsu madanti devīḥ

original: RV_1,173.08c viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūd gauḥ sūrīṃś cid yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān //
analyzed: viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūt gauḥ sūrīn cit yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān

original: RV_1,173.09a asāma yathā suṣakhāya ena svabhiṣṭayo narāṃ na śaṃsaiḥ /
analyzed: asāma yathā su sakhāyaḥ ena su abhiṣṭayaḥ narām na śaṃsaiḥ

original: RV_1,173.09c asad yathā na indro vandaneṣṭhās turo na karma nayamāna ukthā //
analyzed: asat yathā naḥ indraḥ vandaneṣṭhāḥ turaḥ na karma nayamānaḥ ukthā

original: RV_1,173.10a viṣpardhaso narāṃ na śaṃsair asmākāsad indro vajrahastaḥ /
analyzed: viṣpardhasaḥ narām na śaṃsaiḥ asmāka asat indraḥ vajra hastaḥ

original: RV_1,173.10c mitrāyuvo na pūrpatiṃ suśiṣṭau madhyāyuva upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ //
analyzed: mitrāyuvaḥ na pūrpatim su śiṣṭau madhyāyuvaḥ upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ

original: RV_1,173.11a yajño hi ṣmendraṃ kaś cid ṛndhañ juhurāṇaś cin manasā pariyan /
analyzed: yajñaḥ hi sma indram kaḥ cit ṛndham juhurāṇaḥ cit manasā pariyan

original: RV_1,173.11c tīrthe nācchā tātṛṣāṇam oko dīrgho na sidhram ā kṛṇoty adhvā //
analyzed: tīrthe na acchā tātṛṣāṇam okaḥ dīrghaḥ na sidhram ā kṛṇoti adhvā

original: RV_1,173.12a mo ṣū ṇa indrātra pṛtsu devair asti hi ṣmā te śuṣminn avayāḥ /
analyzed: mā u su naḥ indra atra pṛtsu devaiḥ asti hi sma te śuṣmin avayāḥ

original: RV_1,173.12c mahaś cid yasya mīḷhuṣo yavyā haviṣmato maruto vandate gīḥ //
analyzed: mahaḥ cit yasya mīḍhuṣaḥ yavyā haviṣmataḥ marutaḥ vandate gīḥ

original: RV_1,173.13a eṣa stoma indra tubhyam asme etena gātuṃ harivo vido naḥ /
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ indra tubhyam asme etena gātum harivas vidaḥ naḥ

original: RV_1,173.13c ā no vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā naḥ vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,174.01a tvaṃ rājendra ye ca devā rakṣā nṝn pāhy asura tvam asmān /
analyzed: tvam rājā indra ye ca devāḥ rakṣa nṝn pāhi asura tvam asmān

original: RV_1,174.01c tvaṃ satpatir maghavā nas tarutras tvaṃ satyo vasavānaḥ sahodāḥ //
analyzed: tvam satpatiḥ maghavā naḥ tarutraḥ tvam satyaḥ vasavānaḥ sahaḥ dāḥ

original: RV_1,174.02a dano viśa indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr dart /
analyzed: danaḥ viśaḥ indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīḥ dart

original: RV_1,174.02c ṛṇor apo anavadyārṇā yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ //
analyzed: ṛṇoḥ apaḥ anavadya arṇāḥ yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ

original: RV_1,174.03a ajā vṛta indra śūrapatnīr dyāṃ ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam /
analyzed: aja vṛtaḥ indra śūra patnīḥ dyām ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam

original: RV_1,174.03c rakṣo agnim aśuṣaṃ tūrvayāṇaṃ siṃho na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ agnim aśuṣam tūrvayāṇam siṃhaḥ na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ

original: RV_1,174.04a śeṣan nu ta indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā /
analyzed: śeṣan nu te indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā

original: RV_1,174.04c sṛjad arṇāṃsy ava yad yudhā gās tiṣṭhad dharī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān //
analyzed: sṛjat arṇāṃsi ava yat yudhā gāḥ tiṣṭhat harī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān

original: RV_1,174.05a vaha kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasyāśvā /
analyzed: vaha kutsam indra yasmin cākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasya aśvā

original: RV_1,174.05c pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād abhīke 'bhi spṛdho yāsiṣad vajrabāhuḥ //
analyzed: pra sūraḥ cakram vṛhatāt abhīke bhi spṛdhaḥ yāsiṣat vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_1,174.06a jaghanvāṃ indra mitrerūñ codapravṛddho harivo adāśūn /
analyzed: jaghanvān indra mitrerūm coda pravṛddhaḥ harivas a dāśūn

original: RV_1,174.06c pra ye paśyann aryamaṇaṃ sacāyos tvayā śūrtā vahamānā apatyam //
analyzed: pra ye paśyan aryamaṇam sacā āyoḥ tvayā śūrtāḥ vahamānāḥ apatyam

original: RV_1,174.07a rapat kavir indrārkasātau kṣāṃ dāsāyopabarhaṇīṃ kaḥ /
analyzed: rapat kaviḥ indra arka sātau kṣām dāsāya upabarhaṇīm kaḥ

original: RV_1,174.07c karat tisro maghavā dānucitrā ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhi śret //
analyzed: karat tisraḥ maghavā dānu citrāḥ ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhi śret

original: RV_1,174.08a sanā tā ta indra navyā āguḥ saho nabho 'viraṇāya pūrvīḥ /
analyzed: sanā tā te indra navyā āguḥ sahaḥ nabhaḥ viraṇāya pūrvīḥ

original: RV_1,174.08c bhinat puro na bhido adevīr nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ //
analyzed: bhinat puraḥ na bhidaḥ adevīḥ nanamaḥ vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ

original: RV_1,174.09a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ /
analyzed: tvam dhuniḥ indra dhunimatīḥ ṛṇoḥ apaḥ sīrāḥ na sravantīḥ

original: RV_1,174.09c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti //
analyzed: pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pāraya turvaśam yadum svasti

original: RV_1,174.10a tvam asmākam indra viśvadha syā avṛkatamo narāṃ nṛpātā /
analyzed: tvam asmākam indra viśvadha syāḥ avṛkatamaḥ narām nṛ pātā

original: RV_1,174.10c sa no viśvāsāṃ spṛdhāṃ sahodā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: sa naḥ viśvāsām spṛdhām sahaḥ dāḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,175.01a matsy apāyi te mahaḥ pātrasyeva harivo matsaro madaḥ /
analyzed: matsi apāyi te mahaḥ pātrasya iva harivas matsaraḥ madaḥ

original: RV_1,175.01c vṛṣā te vṛṣṇa indur vājī sahasrasātamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣā te vṛṣṇaḥ induḥ vājī sahasra sātamaḥ

original: RV_1,175.02a ā nas te gantu matsaro vṛṣā mado vareṇyaḥ /
analyzed: ā naḥ te gantu matsaraḥ vṛṣā madaḥ vareṇyaḥ

original: RV_1,175.02c sahāvāṃ indra sānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amartyaḥ //
analyzed: sahāvān indra sānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāh amartyaḥ

original: RV_1,175.03a tvaṃ hi śūraḥ sanitā codayo manuṣo ratham /
analyzed: tvam hi śūraḥ sanitā codayaḥ manuṣaḥ ratham

original: RV_1,175.03c sahāvān dasyum avratam oṣaḥ pātraṃ na śociṣā //
analyzed: sahāvān dasyum avratam oṣaḥ pātram na śociṣā

original: RV_1,175.04a muṣāya sūryaṃ kave cakram īśāna ojasā /
analyzed: muṣāya sūryam kave cakram īśānaḥ ojasā

original: RV_1,175.04c vaha śuṣṇāya vadhaṃ kutsaṃ vātasyāśvaiḥ //
analyzed: vaha śuṣṇāya vadham kutsam vātasya aśvaiḥ

original: RV_1,175.05a śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ /
analyzed: śuṣmintamaḥ hi te madaḥ dyumnintamaḥ uta kratuḥ

original: RV_1,175.05c vṛtraghnā varivovidā maṃsīṣṭhā aśvasātamaḥ //
analyzed: vṛtra ghnā varivaḥ vidā maṃsīṣṭhāḥ aśva sātamaḥ

original: RV_1,175.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha /
analyzed: yathā pūrvebhyaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ indra mayaḥ iva apaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha

original: RV_1,175.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: tām anu tvā nividam johavīmi vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,176.01a matsi no vasyaiṣṭaya indram indo vṛṣā viśa /
analyzed: matsi naḥ vasyaiṣṭaye indram indo vṛṣā viśa

original: RV_1,176.01c ṛghāyamāṇa invasi śatrum anti na vindasi //
analyzed: ṛghāyamāṇaḥ invasi śatrum anti na vindasi

original: RV_1,176.02a tasminn ā veśayā giro ya ekaś carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: tasmin ā veśaya giraḥ yaḥ ekaḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_1,176.02c anu svadhā yam upyate yavaṃ na carkṛṣad vṛṣā //
analyzed: anu svadhā yam upyate yavam na carkṛṣat vṛṣā

original: RV_1,176.03a yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnāṃ vasu /
analyzed: yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnām vasu

original: RV_1,176.03c spāśayasva yo asmadhrug divyevāśanir jahi //
analyzed: spāśayasva yaḥ asmadhruk divyā iva aśaniḥ jahi

original: RV_1,176.04a asunvantaṃ samaṃ jahi dūṇāśaṃ yo na te mayaḥ /
analyzed: a sunvantam samam jahi dūṇāśam yaḥ na te mayaḥ

original: RV_1,176.04c asmabhyam asya vedanaṃ daddhi sūriś cid ohate //
analyzed: asmabhyam asya vedanam daddhi sūriḥ cit ohate

original: RV_1,176.05a āvo yasya dvibarhaso 'rkeṣu sānuṣag asat /
analyzed: āvaḥ yasya dvibarhasaḥ rkeṣu sānuṣak asat

original: RV_1,176.05c ājāv indrasyendo prāvo vājeṣu vājinam //
analyzed: ājau indrasya indo prāvaḥ vājeṣu vājinam

original: RV_1,176.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha /
analyzed: yathā pūrvebhyaḥ jaritṛbhyaḥ indra mayaḥ iva apaḥ na tṛṣyate babhūtha

original: RV_1,176.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: tām anu tvā nividam johavīmi vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,177.01a ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ /
analyzed: ā carṣaṇi prāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ janānām rājā kṛṣṭīnām puru hūtaḥ indraḥ

original: RV_1,177.01c stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā yāhy arvāṅ //
analyzed: stutaḥ śravasyan avasā upa madrik yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā yāhi arvāṅ

original: RV_1,177.02a ye te vṛṣaṇo vṛṣabhāsa indra brahmayujo vṛṣarathāso atyāḥ /
analyzed: ye te vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣabhāsaḥ indra brahma yujaḥ vṛṣa rathāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_1,177.02c tāṃ ā tiṣṭha tebhir ā yāhy arvāṅ havāmahe tvā suta indra some //
analyzed: tām ā tiṣṭha tebhiḥ ā yāhi arvāṅ havāmahe tvā sute indra some

original: RV_1,177.03a ā tiṣṭha rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni /
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha ratham vṛṣaṇam vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni

original: RV_1,177.03c yuktvā vṛṣabhyāṃ vṛṣabha kṣitīnāṃ haribhyāṃ yāhi pravatopa madrik //
analyzed: yuktvā vṛṣabhyām vṛṣabha kṣitīnām haribhyām yāhi pravatā upa madrik

original: RV_1,177.04a ayaṃ yajño devayā ayam miyedha imā brahmāṇy ayam indra somaḥ /
analyzed: ayam yajñaḥ deva yāḥ ayam miyedhaḥ imā brahmāṇi ayam indra somaḥ

original: RV_1,177.04c stīrṇam barhir ā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadya vi mucā harī iha //
analyzed: stīrṇam barhiḥ ā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadya vi muca harī iha

original: RV_1,177.05a o suṣṭuta indra yāhy arvāṅ upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: ā u suṣṭutaḥ indra yāhi arvāṅ upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,177.05c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: vidyāma vastoḥ avasā gṛṇantaḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,178.01a yad dha syā ta indra śruṣṭir asti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhya ūtī /
analyzed: yat ha syā te indra śruṣṭiḥ asti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhyaḥ ūtī

original: RV_1,178.01c mā naḥ kāmam mahayantam ā dhag viśvā te aśyām pary āpa āyoḥ //
analyzed: mā naḥ kāmam mahayantam ā dhak viśvā te aśyām pari āpaḥ āyoḥ

original: RV_1,178.02a na ghā rājendra ā dabhan no yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau /
analyzed: na ghā rājā indraḥ ā dabhat naḥ yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau

original: RV_1,178.02c āpaś cid asmai sutukā aveṣan gaman na indraḥ sakhyā vayaś ca //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai sutukāḥ aveṣan gamat naḥ indraḥ sakhyā vayaḥ ca

original: RV_1,178.03a jetā nṛbhir indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havaṃ nādhamānasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: jetā nṛbhiḥ indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havam nādhamānasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,178.03c prabhartā rathaṃ dāśuṣa upāka udyantā giro yadi ca tmanā bhūt //
analyzed: prabhartā ratham dāśuṣe upāke udyantā giraḥ yadi ca tmanā bhūt

original: RV_1,178.04a evā nṛbhir indraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣo abhi mitriṇo bhūt /
analyzed: eva nṛbhiḥ indraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣaḥ abhi mitriṇaḥ bhūt

original: RV_1,178.04c samarya iṣa stavate vivāci satrākaro yajamānasya śaṃsaḥ //
analyzed: samarye iṣaḥ stavate vivāci satrākaraḥ yajamānasya śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_1,178.05a tvayā vayam maghavann indra śatrūn abhi ṣyāma mahato manyamānān /
analyzed: tvayā vayam maghavan indra śatrūn abhi syāma mahataḥ manyamānān

original: RV_1,178.05c tvaṃ trātā tvam u no vṛdhe bhūr vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: tvam trātā tvam u naḥ vṛdhe bhūḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,179.01a pūrvīr ahaṃ śaradaḥ śaśramāṇā doṣā vastor uṣaso jarayantīḥ /
analyzed: pūrvīḥ aham śaradaḥ śaśramāṇāḥ doṣā vastoḥ uṣasaḥ jarayantīḥ

original: RV_1,179.01c mināti śriyaṃ jarimā tanūnām apy ū nu patnīr vṛṣaṇo jagamyuḥ //
analyzed: mināti śriyam jarimā tanūnām api u nu patnīḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ jagamyuḥ

original: RV_1,179.02a ye cid dhi pūrva ṛtasāpa āsan sākaṃ devebhir avadann ṛtāni /
analyzed: ye cit hi pūrve ṛtasāpaḥ āsan sākam devebhiḥ avadan ṛtāni

original: RV_1,179.02c te cid avāsur nahy antam āpuḥ sam ū nu patnīr vṛṣabhir jagamyuḥ //
analyzed: te cit avāsuḥ nahi antam āpuḥ sam u nu patnīḥ vṛṣabhiḥ jagamyuḥ

original: RV_1,179.03a na mṛṣā śrāntaṃ yad avanti devā viśvā it spṛdho abhy aśnavāva /
analyzed: na mṛṣā śrāntam yat avanti devāḥ viśvāḥ id spṛdhaḥ abhī aśnavāva

original: RV_1,179.03c jayāved atra śatanītham ājiṃ yat samyañcā mithunāv abhy ajāva //
analyzed: jayāva id atra śata nītham ājim yat samyañcā mithunau abhī ajāva

original: RV_1,179.04a nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāma āgann ita ājāto amutaḥ kutaś cit /
analyzed: nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāmaḥ āgan itas ājātaḥ amutas kutas cit

original: RV_1,179.04c lopāmudrā vṛṣaṇaṃ nī riṇāti dhīram adhīrā dhayati śvasantam //
analyzed: lopāmudrā vṛṣaṇam nī riṇāti dhīram adhīrā dhayati śvasantam

original: RV_1,179.05a imaṃ nu somam antito hṛtsu pītam upa bruve /
analyzed: imam nu somam antitas hṛtsu pītam upa bruve

original: RV_1,179.05c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷatu pulukāmo hi martyaḥ //
analyzed: yat sīm āgaḥ cakṛma tat su mṛḍatu pulu kāmaḥ hi martyaḥ

original: RV_1,179.06a agastyaḥ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ prajām apatyam balam icchamānaḥ /
analyzed: agastyaḥ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ prajām apatyam balam icchamānaḥ

original: RV_1,179.06c ubhau varṇāv ṛṣir ugraḥ pupoṣa satyā deveṣv āśiṣo jagāma //
analyzed: ubhau varṇau ṛṣiḥ ugraḥ pupoṣa satyāḥ deveṣu āśiṣaḥ jagāma

original: RV_1,180.01a yuvo rajāṃsi suyamāso aśvā ratho yad vām pary arṇāṃsi dīyat /
analyzed: yuvoḥ rajāṃsi su yamāsaḥ aśvāḥ rathaḥ yat vām pari arṇāṃsi dīyat

original: RV_1,180.01c hiraṇyayā vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantā uṣasaḥ sacethe //
analyzed: hiraṇyayāḥ vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantau uṣasaḥ sacethe

original: RV_1,180.02a yuvam atyasyāva nakṣatho yad vipatmano naryasya prayajyoḥ /
analyzed: yuvam atyasya ava nakṣathaḥ yat vipatmanaḥ naryasya prayajyoḥ

original: RV_1,180.02c svasā yad vāṃ viśvagūrtī bharāti vājāyeṭṭe madhupāv iṣe ca //
analyzed: svasā yat vām viśva gūrtī bharāti vājāya īṭṭe madhu pau iṣe ca

original: RV_1,180.03a yuvam paya usriyāyām adhattam pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvyaṃ goḥ /
analyzed: yuvam payaḥ usriyāyām adhattam pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvyam goḥ

original: RV_1,180.03c antar yad vanino vām ṛtapsū hvāro na śucir yajate haviṣmān //
analyzed: antar yat vaninaḥ vām ṛtapsū hvāraḥ na śuciḥ yajate haviṣmān

original: RV_1,180.04a yuvaṃ ha gharmam madhumantam atraye 'po na kṣodo 'vṛṇītam eṣe /
analyzed: yuvam ha gharmam madhumantam atraye paḥ na kṣodaḥ vṛṇītam eṣe

original: RV_1,180.04c tad vāṃ narāv aśvinā paśvaiṣṭī rathyeva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ //
analyzed: tat vām narau aśvinā paśvaiṣṭiḥ rathyā iva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ

original: RV_1,180.05a ā vāṃ dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā gor oheṇa taugryo na jivriḥ /
analyzed: ā vām dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā goḥ oheṇa taugryaḥ na jivriḥ

original: RV_1,180.05c apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vāṃ jūrṇo vām akṣur aṃhaso yajatrā //
analyzed: apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vām jūrṇaḥ vām akṣuḥ aṃhasaḥ yajatrā

original: RV_1,180.06a ni yad yuvethe niyutaḥ sudānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim /
analyzed: ni yat yuvethe niyutaḥ su dānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim

original: RV_1,180.06c preṣad veṣad vāto na sūrir ā mahe dade suvrato na vājam //
analyzed: preṣat veṣat vātaḥ na sūriḥ ā mahe dade suvrataḥ na vājam

original: RV_1,180.07a vayaṃ cid dhi vāṃ jaritāraḥ satyā vipanyāmahe vi paṇir hitāvān /
analyzed: vayam cit hi vām jaritāraḥ satyāḥ vipanyāmahe vi paṇiḥ hitāvān

original: RV_1,180.07c adhā cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anindyā pātho hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇāv antidevam //
analyzed: adhā cit hi sma aśvinau anindyā pāthaḥ hi sma vṛṣaṇau antidevam

original: RV_1,180.08a yuvāṃ cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau /
analyzed: yuvām cit hi sma aśvinau anu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau

original: RV_1,180.08c agastyo narāṃ nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunīva citayat sahasraiḥ //
analyzed: agastyaḥ narām nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunī iva citayat sahasraiḥ

original: RV_1,180.09a pra yad vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yātho manuṣo na hotā /
analyzed: pra yat vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yāthaḥ manuṣaḥ na hotā

original: RV_1,180.09c dhattaṃ sūribhya uta vā svaśvyaṃ nāsatyā rayiṣācaḥ syāma //
analyzed: dhattam sūribhyaḥ uta vā su aśvyam nāsatyā rayiṣācaḥ syāma

original: RV_1,180.10a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema stomair aśvinā suvitāya navyam /
analyzed: tam vām ratham vayam adyā huvema stomaiḥ aśvinā suvitāya navyam

original: RV_1,180.10c ariṣṭanemim pari dyām iyānaṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ariṣṭa nemim pari dyām iyānam vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,181.01a kad u preṣṭāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām adhvaryantā yad unninītho apām /
analyzed: kad u preṣṭau iṣām rayīṇām adhvaryantā yat unninīthaḥ apām

original: RV_1,181.01c ayaṃ vāṃ yajño akṛta praśastiṃ vasudhitī avitārā janānām //
analyzed: ayam vām yajñaḥ akṛta praśastim vasu dhitī avitārā janānām

original: RV_1,181.02a ā vām aśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspā vātaraṃhaso divyāso atyāḥ /
analyzed: ā vām aśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspāḥ vāta raṃhasaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ

original: RV_1,181.02c manojuvo vṛṣaṇo vītapṛṣṭhā eha svarājo aśvinā vahantu //
analyzed: manaḥ juvaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ ā iha svarājaḥ aśvinā vahantu

original: RV_1,181.03a ā vāṃ ratho 'vanir na pravatvān sṛpravandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ /
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ vaniḥ na pravatvān sṛpra vandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ

original: RV_1,181.03c vṛṣṇa sthātārā manaso javīyān ahampūrvo yajato dhiṣṇyā yaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ sthātārā manasaḥ javīyān ahampūrvaḥ yajataḥ dhiṣṇyā yaḥ

original: RV_1,181.04a iheha jātā sam avāvaśītām arepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ /
analyzed: iha iha jātā sam avāvaśītām arepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ

original: RV_1,181.04c jiṣṇur vām anyaḥ sumakhasya sūrir divo anyaḥ subhagaḥ putra ūhe //
analyzed: jiṣṇuḥ vām anyaḥ su makhasya sūriḥ divaḥ anyaḥ subhagaḥ putraḥ ūhe

original: RV_1,181.05a pra vāṃ niceruḥ kakuho vaśāṃ anu piśaṅgarūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ /
analyzed: pra vām niceruḥ kakuhaḥ vaśām anu piśaṅga rūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ

original: RV_1,181.05c harī anyasya pīpayanta vājair mathrā rajāṃsy aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ //
analyzed: harī anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ mathrā rajāṃsi aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ

original: RV_1,181.06a pra vāṃ śaradvān vṛṣabho na niṣṣāṭ pūrvīr iṣaś carati madhva iṣṇan /
analyzed: pra vām śaradvān vṛṣabhaḥ na niṣṣāh pūrvīḥ iṣaḥ carati madhvaḥ iṣṇan

original: RV_1,181.06c evair anyasya pīpayanta vājair veṣantīr ūrdhvā nadyo na āguḥ //
analyzed: evaiḥ anyasya pīpayanta vājaiḥ veṣantīḥ ūrdhvāḥ nadyaḥ naḥ āguḥ

original: RV_1,181.07a asarji vāṃ sthavirā vedhasā gīr bāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī /
analyzed: asarji vām sthavirā vedhasā gīḥ bāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī

original: RV_1,181.07c upastutāv avataṃ nādhamānaṃ yāmann ayāmañ chṛṇutaṃ havam me //
analyzed: upastutau avatam nādhamānam yāman a yāmam śṛṇutam havam me

original: RV_1,181.08a uta syā vāṃ ruśato vapsaso gīs tribarhiṣi sadasi pinvate nṝn /
analyzed: uta syā vām ruśataḥ vapsasaḥ gīḥ tri barhiṣi sadasi pinvate nṝn

original: RV_1,181.08c vṛṣā vām megho vṛṣaṇā pīpāya gor na seke manuṣo daśasyan //
analyzed: vṛṣā vām meghaḥ vṛṣaṇā pīpāya goḥ na seke manuṣaḥ daśasyan

original: RV_1,181.09a yuvām pūṣevāśvinā purandhir agnim uṣāṃ na jarate haviṣmān /
analyzed: yuvām pūṣā iva aśvinā purandhiḥ agnim uṣām na jarate haviṣmān

original: RV_1,181.09c huve yad vāṃ varivasyā gṛṇāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: huve yat vām varivasyā gṛṇānaḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,182.01a abhūd idaṃ vayunam o ṣu bhūṣatā ratho vṛṣaṇvān madatā manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: abhūt idam vayunam ā u su bhūṣata rathaḥ vṛṣaṇvān madata manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_1,182.01c dhiyañjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalāvasū divo napātā sukṛte śucivratā //
analyzed: dhiyañjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalā vasū divaḥ napātā sukṛte śuci vratā

original: RV_1,182.02a indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā /
analyzed: indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā

original: RV_1,182.02c pūrṇaṃ rathaṃ vahethe madhva ācitaṃ tena dāśvāṃsam upa yātho aśvinā //
analyzed: pūrṇam ratham vahethe madhvaḥ ācitam tena dāśvāṃsam upa yāthaḥ aśvinā

original: RV_1,182.03a kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe jano yaḥ kaś cid ahavir mahīyate /
analyzed: kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe janaḥ yaḥ kaḥ cit a haviḥ mahīyate

original: RV_1,182.03c ati kramiṣṭaṃ juratam paṇer asuṃ jyotir viprāya kṛṇutaṃ vacasyave //
analyzed: ati kramiṣṭam juratam paṇeḥ asum jyotiḥ viprāya kṛṇutam vacasyave

original: RV_1,182.04a jambhayatam abhito rāyataḥ śuno hatam mṛdho vidathus tāny aśvinā /
analyzed: jambhayatam abhitas śunaḥ hatam mṛdhaḥ vidathuḥ tāni aśvinā

original: RV_1,182.04c vācaṃ-vācaṃ jaritū ratninīṃ kṛtam ubhā śaṃsaṃ nāsatyāvatam mama //
analyzed: vācam vācam jarituḥ ratninīm kṛtam ubhā śaṃsam nāsatyā avatam mama

original: RV_1,182.05a yuvam etaṃ cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam ātmanvantam pakṣiṇaṃ taugryāya kam /
analyzed: yuvam etam cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam ātmanvantam pakṣiṇam taugryāya kam

original: RV_1,182.05c yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanī petathuḥ kṣodaso mahaḥ //
analyzed: yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanī petathuḥ kṣodasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_1,182.06a avaviddhaṃ taugryam apsv antar anārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham /
analyzed: avaviddham taugryam apsu antar an ārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham

original: RV_1,182.06c catasro nāvo jaṭhalasya juṣṭā ud aśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti //
analyzed: catasraḥ nāvaḥ jaṭhalasya juṣṭāḥ ud aśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti

original: RV_1,182.07a kaḥ svid vṛkṣo niṣṭhito madhye arṇaso yaṃ taugryo nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat /
analyzed: kaḥ svid vṛkṣaḥ niṣṭhitaḥ madhye arṇasaḥ yam taugryaḥ nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat

original: RV_1,182.07c parṇā mṛgasya pataror ivārabha ud aśvinā ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam //
analyzed: parṇā mṛgasya pataroḥ iva ārabhe ud aśvinau ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam

original: RV_1,182.08a tad vāṃ narā nāsatyāv anu ṣyād yad vām mānāsa ucatham avocan /
analyzed: tat vām narā nāsatyau anu syāt yat vām mānāsaḥ ucatham avocan

original: RV_1,182.08c asmād adya sadasaḥ somyād ā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: asmāt adya sadasaḥ somyāt ā vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,183.01a taṃ yuñjāthām manaso yo javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā yas tricakraḥ /
analyzed: tam yuñjāthām manasaḥ yaḥ javīyān tri vandhuraḥ vṛṣaṇā yaḥ tri cakraḥ

original: RV_1,183.01c yenopayāthaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tridhātunā patatho vir na parṇaiḥ //
analyzed: yena upayāthaḥ su kṛtaḥ duroṇam tri dhātunā patathaḥ viḥ na parṇaiḥ

original: RV_1,183.02a suvṛd ratho vartate yann abhi kṣāṃ yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantānu pṛkṣe /
analyzed: suvṛt rathaḥ vartate yan abhi kṣām yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantā anu pṛkṣe

original: RV_1,183.02c vapur vapuṣyā sacatām iyaṃ gīr divo duhitroṣasā sacethe //
analyzed: vapuḥ vapuṣyā sacatām iyam gīḥ divaḥ duhitrā uṣasā sacethe

original: RV_1,183.03a ā tiṣṭhataṃ suvṛtaṃ yo ratho vām anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān /
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhatam suvṛtam yaḥ rathaḥ vām anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān

original: RV_1,183.03c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca //
analyzed: yena narā nāsatyā iṣayadhyai vartiḥ yāthaḥ tanayāya tmane ca

original: RV_1,183.04a mā vāṃ vṛko mā vṛkīr ā dadharṣīn mā pari varktam uta māti dhaktam /
analyzed: mā vām vṛkaḥ mā vṛkīḥ ā dadharṣīt mā pari varktam uta mā ati dhaktam

original: RV_1,183.04c ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihita iyaṃ gīr dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām //
analyzed: ayam vām bhāgaḥ nihitaḥ iyam gīḥ dasrau ime vām nidhayaḥ madhūnām

original: RV_1,183.05a yuvāṃ gotamaḥ purumīḷho atrir dasrā havate 'vase haviṣmān /
analyzed: yuvām gotamaḥ purumīḍhaḥ atriḥ dasrā havate vase haviṣmān

original: RV_1,183.05c diśaṃ na diṣṭām ṛjūyeva yantā me havaṃ nāsatyopa yātam //
analyzed: diśam na diṣṭām ṛjūyā iva yantā me havam nāsatyā upa yātam

original: RV_1,183.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi /
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya prati vām stomaḥ aśvinau adhāyi

original: RV_1,183.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,184.01a tā vām adya tāv aparaṃ huvemocchantyām uṣasi vahnir ukthaiḥ /
analyzed: tā vām adya tau aparam huvema ucchantyām uṣasi vahniḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_1,184.01c nāsatyā kuha cit santāv aryo divo napātā sudāstarāya //
analyzed: nāsatyā kuha cit santau aryaḥ divaḥ napātā sudāstarāya

original: RV_1,184.02a asme ū ṣu vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ut paṇīṃr hatam ūrmyā madantā /
analyzed: asme u su vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ud paṇīn hatam ūrmyā madantā

original: RV_1,184.02c śrutam me acchoktibhir matīnām eṣṭā narā nicetārā ca karṇaiḥ //
analyzed: śrutam me acchoktibhiḥ matīnām eṣṭā narā nicetārā ca karṇaiḥ

original: RV_1,184.03a śriye pūṣann iṣukṛteva devā nāsatyā vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ /
analyzed: śriye pūṣan iṣukṛtā iva devā nāsatyā vahatum sūryāyāḥ

original: RV_1,184.03c vacyante vāṃ kakuhā apsu jātā yugā jūrṇeva varuṇasya bhūreḥ //
analyzed: vacyante vām kakuhāḥ apsu jātāḥ yugā jūrṇā iva varuṇasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_1,184.04a asme sā vām mādhvī rātir astu stomaṃ hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ /
analyzed: asme sā vām mādhvī rātiḥ astu stomam hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ

original: RV_1,184.04c anu yad vāṃ śravasyā sudānū suvīryāya carṣaṇayo madanti //
analyzed: anu yat vām śravasyā su dānū su vīryāya carṣaṇayaḥ madanti

original: RV_1,184.05a eṣa vāṃ stomo aśvināv akāri mānebhir maghavānā suvṛkti /
analyzed: eṣa vām stomaḥ aśvinau akāri mānebhiḥ maghavānā suvṛkti

original: RV_1,184.05c yātaṃ vartis tanayāya tmane cāgastye nāsatyā madantā //
analyzed: yātam vartiḥ tanayāya tmane ca agastye nāsatyā madantā

original: RV_1,184.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi /
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāram asya prati vām stomaḥ aśvinau adhāyi

original: RV_1,184.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: ā iha yātam pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: RV_1,185.01a katarā pūrvā katarāparāyoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ ko vi veda /
analyzed: katarā pūrvā katarā aparā ayoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ kaḥ vi veda

original: RV_1,185.01c viśvaṃ tmanā bibhṛto yad dha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyeva //
analyzed: viśvam tmanā bibhṛtaḥ yat ha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyā iva

original: RV_1,185.02a bhūriṃ dve acarantī carantam padvantaṃ garbham apadī dadhāte /
analyzed: bhūrim dve a carantī carantam padvantam garbham apadī dadhāte

original: RV_1,185.02c nityaṃ na sūnum pitror upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
analyzed: nityam na sūnum pitroḥ upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī naḥ abhvāt

original: RV_1,185.03a aneho dātram aditer anarvaṃ huve svarvad avadhaṃ namasvat /
analyzed: anehaḥ dātram aditeḥ anarvam huve svarvat avadham namasvat
